atk-s0402a0:3_2: Diṭṭhadhammikanti diṭṭheva dhamme imasmiṃyeva attabhāve uppannaphalaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:3_5: Rājāno gahetvā vividhā kammakāraṇā kārenteti coraṃ gahetvā vividhā kammakāraṇā rājapurisā karonti,
atk-s0402a0:3_7: Taṃ coraṃ evaṃ kammakāraṇā kāriyamānaṃ esa passati.
atk-s0402a0:3_9: “passati coraṃ āgucāriṃ rājāno gahetvā vividhā kammakāraṇā kārente”ti.
atk-s0402a0:3_11: pahārasādhanatthaṃ vā catuhatthadaṇḍaṃ dvedhā chetvā gahitadaṇḍakehi.
atk-s0402a0:3_13: Taṃ karontā sīsakaṭāhaṃ uppāṭetvā tattaṃ ayoguḷaṃ saṇḍāsena gahetvā tattha pakkhipanti,
atk-s0402a0:3_16: Taṃ karontā uttaroṭṭhaubhatokaṇṇacūḷikagalavāṭakaparicchedena cammaṃ chinditvā sabbakese ekato gaṇṭhiṃ katvā daṇḍakena veṭhetvā uppāṭenti,
atk-s0402a0:3_18: Tato sīsakaṭāhaṃ thūlasakkharāhi ghaṃsitvā dhovantā saṅkhavaṇṇaṃ karonti.
atk-s0402a0:3_20: Taṃ karontā saṅkunā mukhaṃ vivaritvā antomukhe dīpaṃ jālenti,
atk-s0402a0:3_21: kaṇṇacūḷikāhi vā paṭṭhāya mukhaṃ nikhādanena khananti,
atk-s0402a0:4_1: Hatthapajjotikanti hatthe telapilotikāya veṭhetvā dīpaṃ viya pajjālenti.
atk-s0402a0:4_3: Taṃ karontā heṭṭhāgīvato paṭṭhāya cammavaṭṭe kantitvā gopphake ṭhapenti,
atk-s0402a0:4_5: So attano cammavaṭṭe akkamitvā akkamitvā patati.
atk-s0402a0:4_7: Taṃ karontā tatheva cammavaṭṭe kantitvā kaṭiyaṃ ṭhapenti,
atk-s0402a0:4_11: Taṃ karontā ubhosu kapparesu ca ubhosu jāṇukesu ca ayavalayāni datvā ayasūlāni koṭṭenti.
atk-s0402a0:4_15: Taṃ kālena kālaṃ sūlāni apanetvā catūhi aṭṭhikoṭīhiyeva ṭhapenti.
atk-s0402a0:5_0: Baḷisamaṃsikanti ubhatomukhehi baḷisehi paharitvā cammamaṃsanhārūni uppāṭenti.
atk-s0402a0:5_1: Kahāpaṇikanti sakalasarīraṃ tiṇhāhi vāsīhi koṭito paṭṭhāya kahāpaṇamattaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:5_3: Khārāpatacchikanti sarīraṃ tattha tattha āvudhehi paharitvā kocchehi khāraṃ ghaṃsanti,
atk-s0402a0:5_5: Palighaparivattikanti ekena passena nipajjāpetvā kaṇṇacchiddena ayasūlaṃ koṭṭetvā pathaviyā ekābaddhaṃ karonti.
atk-s0402a0:5_7: Palālapīṭhakanti cheko kāraṇiko chavicammaṃ acchinditvā nisadapotehi aṭṭhīni bhinditvā kesesu gahetvā ukkhipati,
atk-s0402a0:5_11: Sunakhehipīti katipayāni divasāni āhāraṃ adatvā chātakasunakhehi khādāpenti.
atk-s0402a0:6_0: Na paresaṃ pābhataṃ vilumpanto caratīti paresaṃ santakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ parammukhaṃ ābhataṃ antamaso antaravīthiyaṃ
atk-s0402a0:6_1: patitaṃ sahassabhaṇḍikampi disvā “iminā jīvissāmī”ti vilumpanto na vicarati,
atk-s0402a0:6_2: ko iminā atthoti piṭṭhipādena vā pavaṭṭetvā gacchati.
atk-s0402a0:7_2: Kiñca tanti kiṃ nāma taṃ kāraṇaṃ bhaveyya.
atk-s0402a0:7_10: Suddhaṃ attānaṃ pariharatīti ettha duvidhā suddhi –
atk-s0402a0:7_12: Saraṇagamanena hi pariyāyena suddhaṃ attānaṃ pariharati nāma.
atk-s0402a0:7_20: arahattamaggena pariyāyena suddhaṃ attānaṃ pariharati nāma.
atk-s0402a0:7_21: Arahattaphale patiṭṭhito pana khīṇāsavo chinnamūlake pañcakkhandhe nhāpentopi khādāpentopi bhuñjāpentopi
atk-s0402a0:7_22: nisīdāpentopi nipajjāpentopi nippariyāyeneva suddhaṃ nimmalaṃ attānaṃ pariharati paṭijaggatīti veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:8_7: kāraṇavacanaṃ vā yena kāraṇena parimuccissati sabbavajjehi.
atk-s0402a0:8_12: Kiṃ pana khīṇāsavassa akusalaṃ na vipaccatīti?
atk-s0402a0:8_16: samparāye panassa kammaphalaṃ nāma natthīti. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:10_2: Vīriyañhi padahitabbato padhānabhāvakaraṇato vā padhānanti vuccati.
atk-s0402a0:10_7: paccayānaṃ anuppadānatthāya padhānaṃ nāma durabhisambhavanti dasseti.
atk-s0402a0:10_11: telasappinavanītādīsu vā appamattakampi bhesajjaṃ paresaṃ dethāti vattumpi nīharitvā dātumpi dukkaraṃ ubhatobyūḷhasaṅgāmappavesanasadisaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:15_0: Agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitānanti gehato nikkhamitvā agārassa gharāvāsassa hitāvahehi kasigorakkhādīhi virahitaṃ anagāriyaṃ pabbajjaṃ upagatānaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:15_2: upadhīnaṃ paṭinissaggasaṅkhātassa nibbānassa atthāya vipassanāya ceva maggena ca sahajātavīriyaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:15_3: Tasmāti yasmā imāni dve padhānāni durabhisambhavāni, tasmā. Dutiyaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:17_1: Tatiye tapanīyāti idha ceva samparāye ca tapantīti tapanīyā.
atk-s0402a0:17_2: Tappatīti cittasantāpena tappati anusocati kāyaduccaritaṃ katvā nandayakkho viya nandamāṇavo viya nandagoghātako
atk-s0402a0:17_3: viya devadatto viya dvebhātikā viya ca.
atk-s0402a0:17_4: Te kira gāvaṃ vadhitvā maṃsaṃ dve koṭṭhāse akaṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:17_8: Atha naṃ so “sabbaṃ maṃsaṃ dvedhā vibhattaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:17_9: puna kiṃ maggasī”ti paharitvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpesi.
atk-s0402a0:17_10: Nivattitvā ca naṃ olokento mataṃ disvā “bhāriyaṃ me kammaṃ kata”nti cittaṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0402a0:17_12: So ṭhitaṭṭhānepi nisinnaṭṭhānepi tadeva kammaṃ āvajjeti,
atk-s0402a0:17_19: atthi nu kho te kiñci tapanīyakamma”nti? So “āma,
atk-s0402a0:17_21: Atha naṃ thero “bhāriyaṃ te upāsaka kammaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0402a0:17_23: So teneva kammena kālaṃ katvā niraye nibbatto.
atk-s0402a0:19_4: Idāni te dhamme dassento yā ca asantuṭṭhitātiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:19_5: Imañhi dhammadvayaṃ nissāya satthā sabbaññutaṃ patto,
atk-s0402a0:19_7: Tattha asantuṭṭhitā kusalesu dhammesūti iminā imaṃ dīpeti –
atk-s0402a0:19_8: “ahaṃ jhānamattakena vā obhāsanimittamattakena vā asantuṭṭho hutvā arahattamaggameva uppādesiṃ.
atk-s0402a0:19_11: Padhānasmiṃ ca anukkaṇṭhito hutvā anosakkanāya ṭhatvāyeva padhānakiriyaṃ akāsi”nti imamatthaṃ dassento yā ca appaṭivānitātiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:19_17: anosakkanāyaṃ ṭhito bodhisattakāle sabbaññutaṃ patthento padhānamakāsinti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0402a0:20_0: Idāni yathā tena taṃ padhānaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0402a0:20_2: Tattha pattabbanti iminā pattabbaṃ guṇajātaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0402a0:20_3: Purisathāmenātiādinā purisassa ñāṇathāmo ñāṇavīriyaṃ ñāṇaparakkamo ca kathito.
atk-s0402a0:20_6: Ettāvatā tena caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ vīriyādhiṭṭhānaṃ nāma kathitaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:20_7: Ettha hi kāmaṃ taco cāti ekaṃ aṅgaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:20_13: Iti purimehi catūhi aṅgehi samannāgatena hutvā evaṃ adhiṭṭhitaṃ vīriyaṃ caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ vīriyādhiṭṭhānaṃ nāmāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:20_14: Ettāvatā tena bodhipallaṅke attano āgamanīyapaṭipadā kathitā.
atk-s0402a0:21_0: Idāni tāya paṭipadāya paṭiladdhaguṇaṃ kathetuṃ tassa mayhaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:21_5: Na hi sakkā etaṃ suttappamattena adhigantunti. Tenāha –
atk-s0402a0:22_0: Idāni attanā paṭiladdhaguṇesu bhikkhusaṅghaṃ samādapento tumhe cepi bhikkhavetiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:22_5: Abhiññā sacchikatvāti abhiññāya uttamapaññāya paccakkhaṃ katvā.
atk-s0402a0:22_7: Tasmāti yasmā appaṭivānapadhānaṃ nāmetaṃ bahūpakāraṃ uttamatthasādhakaṃ, tasmā. Pañcamaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:24_1: Chaṭṭhe saṃyojaniyesu dhammesūti dasannaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ paccayabhūtesu tebhūmakadhammesu.
atk-s0402a0:26_4: Na hi tesaṃ uppattiyā cittaṃ pabhassaraṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a0:28_4: Tesaṃ hi uppattiyā cittaṃ pabhassaraṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a0:28_5: Hirī ca ottappañcāti ettha pāpato jigucchanalakkhaṇā hirī,
atk-s0402a0:30_1: Navame lokaṃ pālentīti lokaṃ sandhārenti ṭhapenti rakkhanti.
atk-s0402a0:30_2: Nayidha paññāyetha mātāti imasmiṃ loke janikā mātā “ayaṃ me mātā”ti garucittīkāravasena na paññāyetha.
atk-s0402a0:30_5: Yathā ajeḷakātiādīsu ete hi sattā “ayaṃ me mātā”ti vā “mātucchā”ti vā garucittīkāravasena na jānanti.
atk-s0402a0:32_4: Bhagavatā hi paṭhamabodhiyaṃ vīsati vassāni vassūpanāyikā appaññattā ahosi.
atk-s0402a0:32_5: Bhikkhū anibaddhavāsā vassepi utuvassepi yathāsukhaṃ vicariṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:32_6: Te disvā manussā “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā hemantampi gimhampi vassampi cārikaṃ carissanti haritāni
atk-s0402a0:32_7: tiṇāni sammaddantā ekindriyaṃ jīvaṃ viheṭhentā bahū khuddake pāṇe saṅghātaṃ āpādentā.
atk-s0402a0:32_8: Ime hi nāma aññatitthiyā durakkhātadhammā vassāvāsaṃ allīyissanti saṃkasāyissanti,
atk-s0402a0:32_9: ime nāma sakuṇā rukkhaggesu kulāvakāni katvā vassāvāsaṃ allīyissanti saṃkasāyissantī”tiādīni vatvā ujjhāyiṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:32_11: Bhagavā taṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ katvā imaṃ suttaṃ desento paṭhamaṃ tāva “anujānāmi,
atk-s0402a0:32_14: Atha bhikkhūnaṃ “kadā nu kho vassaṃ upagantabba”nti uppannaṃ vitakkaṃ sutvā “anujānāmi,
atk-s0402a0:32_20: Taṃ sutvā sakalampi idaṃ suttaṃ desento dvemā,
atk-s0402a0:32_23: Purimikāti aparajjugatāya āsāḷhiyā upagantabbā purimakattikapuṇṇamipariyosānā paṭhamā temāsī.
atk-s0402a0:32_24: Pacchimikāti māsagatāya āsāḷhiyā upagantabbā pacchimakattikapariyosānā pacchimā temāsīti. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:33_6: Suddhaṃ attānanti idaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:33_12: balaṃ āgammāti sattannaṃ sekhānaṃ ñāṇabalaṃ ārabbha sandhāya paṭicca.
atk-s0402a0:33_16: Yasmā panetāni dvepi vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0402a0:34_1: Dutiye satisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāvetītiādīsu ayaṃ heṭṭhā anāgatānaṃ padānaṃ vasena atthavaṇṇanā –
atk-s0402a0:34_12: Tathā hi satisambojjhaṅgabhāvanānuyutto yogī vipassanākkhaṇe kiccato tadaṅgavivekanissitaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:34_17: Te hi na kevalaṃ balavavipassanāmaggaphalakkhaṇesuyeva bojjhaṅge uddharanti,
atk-s0402a0:34_20: Tasmā tesaṃ matena etesaṃ jhānānaṃ pavattikkhaṇe kiccato eva vikkhambhanavivekanissitaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:35_0: Kevalaṃ hettha vossaggo duvidho pariccāgavossaggo ca pakkhandanavossaggo cāti.
atk-s0402a0:35_6: Tathā hi ayaṃ satisambojjhaṅgo yathāvuttena pakārena kilese pariccajati,
atk-s0402a0:35_8: Vossaggapariṇāminti iminā pana sakalena vacanena vossaggatthaṃ pariṇamantaṃ pariṇatañca,
atk-s0402a0:35_10: Ayañhi bojjhaṅgabhāvanānuyutto bhikkhu yathā satisambojjhaṅgo kilesapariccāgavossaggatthaṃ nibbānapakkhandanavossaggatthañca paripaccati,
atk-s0402a0:36_0: Idha pana nibbānaṃyeva sabbasaṅkhatehi vivittattā viveko,
atk-s0402a0:36_4: tasmā satisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti vivekaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattiyā vivekanissitaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:36_6: Tañca kho ariyamaggakkhaṇuppattiyā kilesānaṃ samucchedato pariccāgabhāvena ca nibbānapakkhandanabhāvena
atk-s0402a0:36_7: ca pariṇataṃ paripakkanti ayameva attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0402a0:36_9: Iti ime satta bojjhaṅgā lokiyalokuttaramissakā kathitā.
atk-s0402a0:36_10: Imesupi dvīsu balesu etadaggabhāvo vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:37_1: Tatiye vivicceva kāmehītiādīnaṃ catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ pāḷiattho ca bhāvanānayo ca sabbo sabbākārena visuddhimagge vitthāritoyeva.
atk-s0402a0:37_2: Imāni pana cattāri jhānāni eko bhikkhu cittekaggatthāya bhāveti,
atk-s0402a0:37_8: Ayaṃ hi bhikkhu imāni jhānāni samāpajjitvā samāpattito vuṭṭhāya saṅkhāre sammasitvā hetupaccayapariggahaṃ
atk-s0402a0:37_9: katvā sappaccayaṃ nāmarūpañca vavatthapetvā indriyabalabojjhaṅgāni samodhānetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0402a0:38_1: Catutthe saṃkhittena ca vitthārena cāti saṃkhittadhammadesanā vitthāradhammadesanā cāti dveyeva dhammadesanāti dasseti.
atk-s0402a0:38_2: Tattha mātikaṃ uddisitvā kathitā desanā saṃkhittadesanā nāma.
atk-s0402a0:38_3: Tameva mātikaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā kathitā vitthāradesanā nāma.
atk-s0402a0:38_4: Mātikaṃ vā ṭhapetvāpi aṭṭhapetvāpi vitthārato vibhajitvā kathitā vitthāradesanā nāma.
atk-s0402a0:38_5: Tāsu saṃkhittadesanā nāma mahāpaññassa puggalassa vasena kathitā,
atk-s0402a0:38_7: Mahāpaññassa hi vitthāradesanā atipapañco viya hoti.
atk-s0402a0:38_8: Mandapaññassa saṅkhepadesanā sasakassa uppatanaṃ viya hoti,
atk-s0402a0:38_9: neva antaṃ na koṭiṃ pāpuṇituṃ sakkoti.
atk-s0402a0:38_12: Sakalampi hi tepiṭakaṃ saṅkhepadesanā vitthāradesanāti ettheva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0402a0:39_6: kiccādhikaraṇanti imesaṃ catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ yasmiṃ adhikaraṇe.
atk-s0402a0:39_7: Āpanno ca bhikkhūti āpattiṃ āpanno bhikkhu ca.
atk-s0402a0:39_13: Bhikkhū ca na phāsuṃ viharissantīti aññamaññaṃ vivādāpanne bhikkhusaṅghe yepi uddesaṃ vā paripucchaṃ vā gahetukāmā padhānaṃ vā anuyuñjitukāmā,
atk-s0402a0:39_15: Bhikkhusaṅghasmiṃ hi uposathapavāraṇāya ṭhitāya uddesādīhi atthikā uddesādīni gahetuṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0402a0:39_18: Evaṃ bhikkhū ca na phāsuṃ viharissanti.
atk-s0402a0:40_2: Akusalaṃ āpannoti ettha akusalanti āpatti adhippetā,
atk-s0402a0:40_5: āpattiyā pana kañcideva desaṃ aññataraṃ āpattinti attho.
atk-s0402a0:40_11: Accayo accagamāti aparādho atikkamitvā madditvā gato,
atk-s0402a0:40_13: Suṅkadāyakaṃva bhaṇḍasminti yathā suṅkaṭṭhānaṃ pariharitvā nīte bhaṇḍasmiṃ suṅkadāyakaṃ aparādho abhibhavati,
atk-s0402a0:41_1: yo hi raññā ṭhapitaṃ suṅkaṭṭhānaṃ pariharitvā bhaṇḍaṃ harati,
atk-s0402a0:41_2: taṃ saha bhaṇḍasakaṭena ānetvā rañño dassenti.
atk-s0402a0:41_6: evamevaṃ yaṃ so bhikkhu āpattiṃ āpanno,
atk-s0402a0:41_9: Tīhi pana kāraṇehi tasseva bhikkhuno doso.
atk-s0402a0:41_13: Codakassa pana yaṃ so taṃ āpattiṃ āpajjantaṃ addasa,
atk-s0402a0:41_16: Tampi amanasikaritvā ayaṃ bhikkhu attanova dosaṃ paccavekkhanto “iti mameva tattha accayo accagamā suṅkadāyakaṃva
atk-s0402a0:41_18: Dutiyavāre codakassa anattamanatā ca anattamanatāya coditabhāvo cāti dve dosā,
atk-s0402a0:41_19: tesaṃ vasena “accayo accagamā”ti ettha yojanā kātabbā.
atk-s0402a0:42_2: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti yenāti bhummatthe karaṇavacanaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:42_5: Yena vā kāraṇena bhagavā devamanussehi upasaṅkamitabbo,
atk-s0402a0:42_6: tena kāraṇena upasaṅkamīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0402a0:42_12: Atha vā evaṃ gato tato āsannataraṃ ṭhānaṃ bhagavato samīpasaṅkhātaṃ gantvātipi vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a0:43_0: Bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodīti yathā ca khamanīyādīni pucchanto bhagavā tena,
atk-s0402a0:43_1: evaṃ sopi bhagavatā saddhiṃ samappavattamodo ahosi,
atk-s0402a0:43_2: sītodakaṃ viya uṇhodakena sammoditaṃ ekībhāvaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0402a0:43_7: kacci bhoto gotamassa ca sāvakānañca appābādhaṃ appātaṅkaṃ lahuṭṭhānaṃ balaṃ phāsuvihāro”tiādikāya kathāya sammodi,
atk-s0402a0:43_8: taṃ pītipāmojjasaṅkhātassa sammodassa jananato sammodituṃ yuttabhāvato ca sammodanīyaṃ,

atk-s0402a0:121_3: Paññā bhāvīyatīti maggapaññā bhāvīyati brūhīyati vaḍḍhīyati.
atk-s0402a0:121_5: sā pahīyatīti aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu vaṭṭamūlikā mahāavijjā pahīyati.
atk-s0402a0:121_14: tadā avijjaṃ samūlikaṃ ubbaṭṭetvā samugghātayamānāva uppajjati.
atk-s0402a0:121_17: Iti maggacittaṃ maggapaññāti dvepi sahajātadhammāva kathitā.
atk-s0402a0:122_2: cittaṃ na vimuccatīti rāgena upakkiliṭṭhattā maggacittaṃ na vimuccatīti dasseti.
atk-s0402a0:122_3: Avijjupakkiliṭṭhā vā paññā na bhāvīyatīti avijjāya upakkiliṭṭhattā maggapaññā na bhāvīyatīti dasseti. Iti kho,
atk-s0402a0:122_6: Rāgavirāgā cetovimuttīti rāgassa khayavirāgena cetovimutti nāma hoti.
atk-s0402a0:122_8: Avijjāvirāgā paññāvimuttīti avijjāya khayavirāgena paññāvimutti nāma hoti.
atk-s0402a0:123_4: Akatavedīti kataṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā na jānāti.
atk-s0402a0:123_7: Akataññutā akataveditāti parena katassa upakārassa ajānanañceva pākaṭaṃ katvā ajānanañca.
atk-s0402a0:124_1: Dutiye mātu ca pitu cāti janakamātu ca janakapitu ca. Ekena,
atk-s0402a0:124_3: aṃsena mātaraṃ parihareyyāti ekasmiṃ aṃsakūṭe ṭhapetvā mātaraṃ paṭijaggeyya.
atk-s0402a0:124_4: Ekena aṃsena pitaraṃ parihareyyāti ekasmiṃ aṃsakūṭe ṭhapetvā pitaraṃ paṭijaggeyya.
atk-s0402a0:124_5: Vassasatāyuko vassasatajīvīti vassasatāyukakāle jāto sakalaṃ vassasataṃ jīvanto.
atk-s0402a0:124_7: sace putto nāma “mātāpitūnaṃ paṭikarissāmī”ti uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya dakkhiṇe aṃsakūṭe mātaraṃ,
atk-s0402a0:124_8: vāme pitaraṃ ṭhapetvā vassasatāyuko sakalampi vassasataṃ jīvamāno parihareyya.
atk-s0402a0:124_9: So ca nesaṃ ucchādanaparimaddananhāpanasambāhanenāti so ca putto nesaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ aṃsakūṭesu ṭhitānaṃyeva
atk-s0402a0:124_14: Te ca tatthevāti te ca mātāpitaro tattheva tassa aṃsakūṭesu nisinnāva muttakarīsaṃ cajeyyuṃ. Natveva,
atk-s0402a0:124_17: evampi natveva mātāpitūnaṃ kataṃ vā hoti paṭikataṃ vā.
atk-s0402a0:125_2: Puttā hi mātāpitūhi vaḍḍhitā ceva anupālitā ca.
atk-s0402a0:125_3: Posakāti hatthapāde vaḍḍhetvā hadayalohitaṃ pāyetvā posakā.
atk-s0402a0:125_4: Puttā hi mātāpitūhi puṭṭhā bhatā annapānādīhi paṭijaggitā.
atk-s0402a0:125_5: Imassa lokassa dassetāroti sace hi mātāpitaro jātadivaseyeva puttaṃ pāde gahetvā araññe vā nadiyaṃ vā papāte vā khipeyyuṃ,
atk-s0402a0:125_7: Evaṃ akatvā āpāditattā positattā esa imasmiṃ loke iṭṭhāniṭṭhārammaṇaṃ mātāpitaro nissāya passatīti tyāssa imassa lokassa dassetāro nāma honti.
atk-s0402a0:125_10: Dhammasenāpatisāriputtattherasadisova bhikkhu tesu patiṭṭhāpeti nāmāti veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:126_1: Tatiye tenupasaṅkamīti so hi brāhmaṇo “samaṇo kira gotamo kathitaṃ vissajjeti,
atk-s0402a0:126_3: Ahamassa virajjhanapañhaṃ abhisaṅkharissāmī”ti paṇītabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā gabbhadvāraṃ pidahitvā nisinno cintetuṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0402a0:126_7: bhūmigharaṃ kāressāmī”ti bhūmigharaṃ kāretvā tattha pavisitvā –
atk-s0402a0:126_9: evaṃ puṭṭho evaṃ kathessatī”ti ekaṃ gaṇhitvā ekaṃ vissajjento sakaladivasaṃ kiñci passituṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0402a0:126_10: Tassa imināva nīhārena cattāro māsā vītivattā.
atk-s0402a0:126_11: So catunnaṃ māsānaṃ accayena ubhatokoṭikaṃ pañhaṃ nāma addasa.
atk-s0402a0:126_15: ‘sabbākusalānaṃ nāma tumhe kiriyaṃ vadethā’ti naṃ niggaṇhissāmi.
atk-s0402a0:126_17: ‘kusaladhammānaṃ nāma tumhe akiriyaṃ vadethā’ti naṃ niggaṇhissāmi.
atk-s0402a0:126_18: Idañhi ubhatokoṭikaṃ pañhaṃ puṭṭho neva uggilituṃ sakkhissati na niggilituṃ.
atk-s0402a0:126_20: samaṇassa gotamassa parājayo”ti uṭṭhāya apphoṭetvā bhūmigharā nikkhamma “evarūpaṃ pañhaṃ pucchantena
atk-s0402a0:126_21: na ekakena gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti nagare ghosanaṃ kāretvā sakalanāgarehi parivuto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.
atk-s0402a0:126_23: Kimakkhāyīti kiṃ nāma sāvakānaṃ paṭipadaṃ akkhāyīti pucchi.
atk-s0402a0:126_24: Athassa bhagavā catūhi māsehi pañhaṃ abhisaṅkharitvā “diṭṭho me samaṇassa gotamassa parājayapañho”ti
atk-s0402a0:126_25: mānaṃ paggayha āgatabhāvaṃ ñatvā ekapadeneva taṃ pañhaṃ bhindanto kiriyavādī cāhaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:126_27: Atha brāhmaṇo attano mānaṃ apanetvā bhagavantaṃ āyācanto yathākathaṃ panātiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:127_5: Āhuneyyā yajamānānaṃ hontīti dānaṃ dadantānaṃ āhunassa arahā dānapaṭiggāhakā nāma hontīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:128_4: sabbajeṭṭhakassa puttassa ayyakaseṭṭhinova samānanāmakattāpi migāramātāti vuccati.
atk-s0402a0:128_5: Tāya kārito sahassagabbho pāsādo migāramātupāsādo nāma.
atk-s0402a0:128_7: Tatra kho āyasmā sāriputtoti tasmiṃ pāsāde viharanto dhammasenāpatisāriputtatthero.
atk-s0402a0:129_1: Kānici hi suttāni purebhatte bhāsitāni atthi,
atk-s0402a0:130_4: Tathāgato hi paṭhamabodhiyaṃ vīsati vassāni anibaddhavāso hutvā yattha yattha phāsukaṃ hoti,
atk-s0402a0:130_6: Paṭhamaṃ antovassañhi isipatane dhammacakkaṃ pavattetvā aṭṭhārasa mahābrahmakoṭiyo amatapānaṃ pāyetvā bārāṇasiṃ upanissāya isipatane vasi.
atk-s0402a0:130_9: pañcamaṃ antovassaṃ vesāliṃ upanissāya mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:130_20: soḷasamaṃ āḷavakaṃ dametvā caturāsītipāṇasahassāni amatapānaṃ pāyetvā āḷaviyaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:130_24: vīsatimaṃ pana antovassaṃ rājagahaṃyeva upanissāya vasi.
atk-s0402a0:130_25: Evaṃ vīsati vassāni anibaddhavāso hutvā yattha yattha phāsukaṃ hoti,
atk-s0402a0:131_0: Tato paṭṭhāya pana dve senāsanāni dhuvaparibhogāni akāsi.
atk-s0402a0:131_4: Anāthapiṇḍikassa hi visākhāya ca guṇaṃ sandhāya guṇaṃ paṭicca satthā tāni senāsanāni dhuvaparibhogena paribhuñji.
atk-s0402a0:131_5: Utuvassaṃ cārikaṃ caritvāpi hi antovasse dvīsuyeva senāsanesu vasati.
atk-s0402a0:131_6: Evaṃ vasanto pana jetavane rattiṃ vasitvā punadivase bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto dakkhiṇadvārena sāvatthiṃ
atk-s0402a0:131_7: piṇḍāya pavisitvā pācīnadvārena nikkhamitvā pubbārāme divāvihāraṃ karoti.
atk-s0402a0:131_8: Pubbārāme rattiṃ vasitvā punadivase pācīnadvārena sāvatthiṃ piṇḍāya pavisitvā dakkhiṇadvārena nikkhamitvā jetavane divāvihāraṃ karoti.
atk-s0402a0:131_9: Tasmiṃ pana divase sammāsambuddho jetavaneyeva vasi.
atk-s0402a0:131_10: Yattha katthaci vasantassa cassa pañcavidhakiccaṃ avijahitameva hoti.
atk-s0402a0:131_12: Tesu kiccesu pacchimayāmakiccakāle bhagavā lokaṃ olokento sāvatthivāsīnañca samantā ca sāvatthiyā gāvutaaḍḍhayojanayojanaparame
atk-s0402a0:132_0: Tato “kasmiṃ nu kho kāle abhisamayo bhavissatī”ti olokento “sāyanhasamaye”ti disvā “mayi nu kho kathente abhisamayo bhavissati,
atk-s0402a0:132_1: sāvake kathente bhavissatī”ti “sāriputtatthere kathente bhavissatī”ti addasa.
atk-s0402a0:132_2: Tato “kattha nisīditvā kathente bhavissatī”ti olokento “visākhāya ratanapāsāde nisīditvā”ti disvā “buddhānaṃ nāma tayo sāvakasannipātā honti,
atk-s0402a0:132_4: Tesu ajja dhammasenāpatisāriputtattherassa sāvakasannipāto bhavissatī”ti addasa.
atk-s0402a0:132_5: Disvā pātova sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā nivatthanivāsano sugatacīvaraṃ pārupitvā selamayapattaṃ ādāya bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto
atk-s0402a0:132_6: dakkhiṇadvārena nagaraṃ pavisitvā piṇḍāya caranto bhikkhusaṅghassa sulabhapiṇḍapātaṃ katvā vātappahatā
atk-s0402a0:132_7: viya nāvā paṭinivattitvā dakkhiṇadvārena nikkhamitvā bahidvāre aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0402a0:132_8: Tato asīti mahāsāvakā bhikkhuniparisā upāsakaparisā upāsikāparisāti catasso parisā satthāraṃ parivārayiṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:133_4: bhante”ti thero attano parivārehi pañcahi bhikkhusatehi parivuto pubbārāmaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0402a0:133_5: Eteneva niyāmena asīti mahāsāvake pubbārāmameva pesetvā sayaṃ ekena ānandatthereneva saddhiṃ jetavanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0402a0:133_6: Ānandattheropi vihāre satthu vattaṃ katvā vanditvā “pubbārāmaṃ gacchāmi,
atk-s0402a0:134_0: Taṃ divasañhi catasso parisā therasseva dhammakathaṃ sotukāmā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0402a0:134_3: Visākhā pana mahāupāsikā dvīhi jaṅghasahassehi parivuto agamāsi.
atk-s0402a0:134_4: Sattapaṇṇāsāya kulasatasahassānaṃ vasanaṭṭhāne sāvatthinagare gehapālakadārake ṭhapetvā sesajano gandhacuṇṇamālādīni gahetvā pubbārāmameva agamāsi.
atk-s0402a0:134_5: Catūsu dvāragāmesu gāvutaaḍḍhayojanayojanaparamaṭṭhāne sabbeyeva manussā gandhacuṇṇamālādihatthā pubbārāmameva agamaṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:135_0: Dhammasenāpatisāriputtattheropi kho vihāraṃ gantvā vihārapariveṇe aṅgaṇaṭṭhāne aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0402a0:135_2: Thero tattha nisīditvā upaṭṭhākattherena vatte kate bhikkhusaṅghassa ovādaṃ katvā gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā samāpattiṃ appetvā nisīdi.
atk-s0402a0:135_3: So paricchinnakālavasena samāpattito vuṭṭhāya aciravatiṃ gantvā rajojallaṃ pavāhetvā paṭippassaddhadaratho
atk-s0402a0:135_4: otiṇṇatittheneva uttaritvā nivatthanivāsano saṅghāṭiṃ pārupitvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0402a0:135_5: Bhikkhusaṅghopi sammukhasammukhaṭṭhānena otaritvā sarīre rajojallaṃ pavāhetvā paccuttaritvā theraṃ parivārayiṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:135_7: Catassopi parisā attano attano okāsaṃ ñatvā maggaṃ ṭhapetvā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:135_8: Sāriputtattheropi pañcabhikkhusataparivāro dhammasabhaṃ āgantvā sīhamatthakappatiṭṭhite samussitasetacchatte
atk-s0402a0:135_13: kataradhammadesanā nu kho anucchavikā bhavissatī”ti tīṇi piṭakāni āvajjamāno imaṃ saṃyojanapariyāya dhammadesanaṃ addasa.
atk-s0402a0:136_0: Evaṃ desanaṃ sallakkhetvā taṃ desetukāmo bhikkhū āmantesi āvuso,
atk-s0402a0:136_4: ayaṃ panāyasmā “dasabalena samānaṃ ālapanaṃ na karissāmī”ti satthu gāravavasena sāvakālāpaṃ karonto,
atk-s0402a0:137_0: Tasmiṃ pana ratanapāsāde adhivattho eko sotāpanno devaputto atthi,
atk-s0402a0:137_1: so buddhehi vā sāvakehi vā desanāya āraddhamattāyayeva jānāti –
atk-s0402a0:137_8: So tasmimpi divase therena desanāya āraddhamattāya evaṃ aññāsi –
atk-s0402a0:137_9: “yena nīhārena mayhaṃ ayyena dhammasenāpatinā sāriputtattherena desanā āraddhā,
atk-s0402a0:137_13: sotāpannādīnaṃ pana devamanussānaṃ paricchedo na bhavissati.
atk-s0402a0:137_14: Desanāya anucchavikaṃ katvā mayhaṃ ayyassa sādhukāraṃ dassāmī”ti devānubhāvena mahantaṃ saddaṃ katvā –
atk-s0402a0:138_0: Devarājena sādhukāre dinne parivārakapāsādasahasse adhivatthā devatā sabbāva sādhukāraṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:138_6: Tāsaṃ sādhukārasaddena pathaviṭṭhakanāgā ca ākāsaṭṭhakadevatā ca.
atk-s0402a0:138_32: akaniṭṭhā devatāti asaññe ca arūpāvacarasatte ca ṭhapetvā sotāyatanapavattiṭṭhāne sabbā devatā sādhukāramadaṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:139_3: kimatthaṃ nu kho eso”ti āvajjento “dhammasenāpatisāriputtatthero pubbārāme visākhāya ratanapāsāde nisīditvā saṃyojanapariyāyadhammadesanamārabhi,
atk-s0402a0:139_4: amhehipi tattha kāyasakkhīhi bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā tattha agamaṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:139_7: yojananti sakalacakkavāḷaṃ heṭṭhā pathavitalena tiriyaṃ cakkavāḷapariyantena paricchinnaṃ dasahi cakkavāḷasahassehi
atk-s0402a0:139_9: āragganitudanamatte ṭhāne uparimakoṭiyā saṭṭhi devatā sukhumattabhāve māpetvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:140_1: kiṃ nu kho eta”nti āvajjento dasasahassacakkavāḷe ṭhitānaṃ devatānaṃ ekacakkavāḷe sannipatitabhāvaṃ addasa.
atk-s0402a0:140_5: Tasmā thero samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā samāpattito vuṭṭhāya mahaggatacittena adhiṭṭhāsi –
atk-s0402a0:140_8: Adhiṭṭhitakālato paṭṭhāya dakkhiṇajāṇupasse ca cakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyañca nisīditvā “dhammasenāpatisāriputtatthero
atk-s0402a0:140_9: nāma kīdiso dīgho rasso sāmo odāto”ti vattabbakāraṇaṃ nāhosi,
atk-s0402a0:140_12: Dhammaṃ desentassāpissa dakkhiṇajāṇupasse ca cakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyañca nisinnā sabbe ekakaṃseneva saddaṃ suṇiṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:141_4: Kiñcāpi hi sattā kāmabhave appaṃ kālaṃ vasanti kappassa catutthameva koṭṭhāsaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:141_5: itaresu tīsu koṭṭhāsesu kāmabhavo suñño hoti tuccho,
atk-s0402a0:141_7: tathāpi tesaṃ yasmā kāmabhave cutipaṭisandhiyo bahukā honti,
atk-s0402a0:141_10: tattha ālayopi patthanāpi abhilāsopi bahu hoti.
atk-s0402a0:141_15: Iti ajjhattasaṅkhāte kāmabhave chandarāgo ajjhattasaṃyojanaṃ nāma,
atk-s0402a0:141_17: Orambhāgiyāni vā pañca saṃyojanāni ajjhattasaṃyojanaṃ nāma,
atk-s0402a0:141_21: tattha upapattinipphādanato taṃ oraṃ bhajantīti orambhāgiyāni.
atk-s0402a0:141_23: tattha upapattinipphādanato taṃ uddhaṃ bhajantīti uddhambhāgiyāni.
atk-s0402a0:142_0: Evaṃ vuttappabhedena ajjhattasaṃyojanena saṃyutto puggalo ajjhattasaṃyojano,
atk-s0402a0:142_2: Ubhayampi cetaṃ na lokiyassa vaṭṭanissitamahājanassa nāmaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:142_5: Yathā hi mahāaraññe khadiravanasālavanādīni thambho tulāsaṅghāṭoti nāmaṃ na labhanti,
atk-s0402a0:142_7: Yadā pana tato rukkhā tiṇhāya kuṭhāriyā chinditvā thambhādisaṇṭhānena tacchitā honti,
atk-s0402a0:142_9: Evamevaṃ aparicchinnabhavo bahalakileso puthujjano etaṃ nāmaṃ na labhati,
atk-s0402a0:142_10: bhavaṃ paricchinditvā kilese tanuke katvā ṭhitā sotāpannādayova labhanti.
atk-s0402a0:143_0: Imassa ca panatthassa vibhāvanatthaṃ idaṃ vacchakasālopamaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:143_1: Vacchakasālaṃ hi katvā anto khāṇuke koṭṭetvā vacchake yottehi bandhitvā tesu upanibandhanti,
atk-s0402a0:143_2: yottesu appahontesu kaṇṇesupi gahetvā tattha vacchake pavesenti,
atk-s0402a0:143_3: antosālāya okāse appahonte bahi khāṇuke koṭṭetvāpi evameva karonti.
atk-s0402a0:143_4: Tattha koci antobaddho vacchako bahinipanno hoti,
atk-s0402a0:143_10: Tattha antobaddhassa bahinipannassa bandhanaṃ dīghaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a0:143_11: So hi uṇhādipīḷito nikkhamitvā bahi vacchakānaṃ abbhantare nipajjati.
atk-s0402a0:143_16: Ubhopi hi te divasampi khāṇukaṃ anuparigantvā tattheva sayanti.
atk-s0402a0:143_17: Yo pana anto abaddho tattheva vacchakānaṃ antare vicarati.
atk-s0402a0:143_18: Ayaṃ sīlavā vacchako kaṇṇe gahetvā vacchakānaṃ antare vissaṭṭho divasampi aññattha agantvā tattheva carati.
atk-s0402a0:143_19: Bahi abaddhe tattheva vicarantepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0402a0:144_0: Tattha vacchakasālā viya tayo bhavā veditabbā.
atk-s0402a0:144_23: Saṃyojanesu pana sakkāyadiṭṭhi vicikicchā sīlabbataparāmāsoti imāni tīṇi gacchantaṃ nivārenti,
atk-s0402a0:144_25: Kāmacchando byāpādoti imāni pana dve saṃyojanāni samāpattiyā vā avikkhambhetvā maggena vā asamucchinditvā rūpārūpabhave nibbattituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0402a0:145_0: Katamo cāvusoti idaṃ thero yathā nāma puriso dve ratanapeḷā passe ṭhapetvā sampattaparisāya dve hatthe pūretvā sattavidhaṃ ratanaṃ bhājetvā dadeyya,
atk-s0402a0:145_1: evaṃ paṭhamaṃ ratanapeḷaṃ datvā dutiyampi tatheva dadeyya.
atk-s0402a0:145_3: puggalaṃ desessāmi bahiddhāsaṃyojanañcā”ti imāni dve padāni mātikāvasena ṭhapetvā idāni aṭṭhavidhāya parisāya bhājetvā dassetuṃ vitthārakathaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0402a0:146_2: Iti thero ettāvatā ca kira catupārisuddhisīlaṃ uddisitvā “pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto”ti iminā tattha jeṭṭhakasīlaṃ
atk-s0402a0:146_7: itarāni pana tīṇi sīlanti vuttaṭṭhānaṃ nāma atthī”ti ananujānanto uttari āha –
atk-s0402a0:146_13: ayaṃ chinnasīso viya puriso hatthapāde sesāni rakkhissatīti na vattabbo.
atk-s0402a0:146_15: ayaṃ acchinnasīso viya puriso jīvitaṃ sesāni puna pākatikāni katvā rakkhituṃ sakkoti.
atk-s0402a0:146_16: Tasmā sīlavāti iminā pātimokkhasaṃvaraṃ uddisitvā taṃ vitthārento “pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto”tiādimāhāti.
atk-s0402a0:147_1: Ācāragocarasampannoti ācārena ca gocarena ca sampanno.
atk-s0402a0:147_6: Sikkhati sikkhāpadesūti taṃ taṃ sikkhāpadaṃ samādiyitvā sikkhati.
atk-s0402a0:147_7: Apica samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesūti yaṃkiñci sikkhāpadesu sikkhākoṭṭhāsesu sikkhitabbaṃ kāyikaṃ vā vācasikaṃ vā,
atk-s0402a0:147_10: vitthārato pana sabbānetāni pātimokkhasaṃvarādīni padāni visuddhimagge vuttāni,
atk-s0402a0:147_12: Aññataraṃ devanikāyanti chasu kāmāvacaradevaghaṭāsu aññataraṃ devaghaṭaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:147_14: Āgantā itthattanti itthattaṃ mānusakapañcakkhandhabhāvameva āgantā hoti.
atk-s0402a0:147_15: Tatrūpapattiko vā uparūpapattiko vā na hoti,
atk-s0402a0:147_17: Iminā aṅgena sukkhavipassakassa dhātukammaṭṭhānikabhikkhuno heṭṭhimaṃ maggadvayañceva phaladvayañca kathitaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:148_0: Aññataraṃ santaṃ cetovimuttinti aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu aññataraṃ catutthajjhānasamāpattiṃ.
atk-s0402a0:148_2: teheva ca kilesehi cetaso vimuttattā cetovimuttīti vuccati.
atk-s0402a0:148_4: Anāgantā itthattanti puna imaṃ pañcakkhandhabhāvaṃ anāgantā,
atk-s0402a0:148_6: uparūpapattiko vā hoti tattheva vā parinibbāyīti dasseti.
atk-s0402a0:148_7: Iminā aṅgena samādhikammikassa bhikkhuno tayo maggā tīṇi ca phalāni kathitāni.
atk-s0402a0:149_0: Kāmānaṃyeva nibbidāyāti duvidhānampi kāmānaṃ nibbindanatthāya ukkaṇṭhanatthāya.
atk-s0402a0:149_4: Ettāvatā sotāpannassa ca sakadāgāmino ca pañcakāmaguṇikarāgakkhayatthāya anāgāmimaggavipassanā kathitā hoti.
atk-s0402a0:149_6: Iminā anāgāmino bhavarāgakkhayatthāya arahattamaggavipassanā kathitā hoti.
atk-s0402a0:149_7: Taṇhākkhayāya paṭipanno hotīti imināpi sotāpannasakadāgāmīnaṃyeva pañcakāmaguṇikataṇhākkhayakaraṇatthaṃ anāgāmimaggavipassanā kathitā.
atk-s0402a0:149_8: So lobhakkhayāyāti imināpi anāgāmino bhavalobhakkhayatthāya arahattamaggavipassanāva kathitā.
atk-s0402a0:150_0: Iti paṭhamena aṅgena sukkhavipassakassa dhātukammaṭṭhānikabhikkhuno heṭṭhimāni dve maggaphalāni kathitāni,
atk-s0402a0:150_2: “so kāmāna”nti iminā sotāpannasakadāgāmīnaṃ pañcakāmaguṇikarāgakkhayāya upari anāgāmimaggavipassanā,
atk-s0402a0:150_4: “so taṇhākkhayāyā”ti iminā sotāpannasakadāgāmīnaṃ pañcakāmaguṇikataṇhākkhayāya upari anāgāmimaggavipassanā,
atk-s0402a0:150_5: “so lobhakkhayāyā”ti iminā anāgāmino bhavalobhakkhayāya upari arahattamaggavipassanā kathitāti evaṃ chahi
atk-s0402a0:150_6: mukhehi vipassanaṃ kathetvā desanaṃ yathānusandhiṃ pāpesi.
atk-s0402a0:150_10: evaṃ mahāsamayasutte maṅgalasutte ca cūḷarāhulovādasutte ca koṭisatasahassadevatā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu,
atk-s0402a0:151_1: Sabbāpi hi tā attano attabhāve sukhume cittasarikkhake katvā māpesuṃ.
atk-s0402a0:151_6: Mayaṃ dasabalaṃ pakkositvā samāpattiyā thāmaṃ kathāpessāmā”ti sabbāpi ekacittā ahesuntipi samacittā.
atk-s0402a0:151_9: ko nu kho imaṃ samāgamaṃ sampatto,
atk-s0402a0:151_10: ko na sampatto”ti olokayamānā tathāgatassa asampattabhāvaṃ disvā “mayaṃ tathāgataṃ pakkositvā parisaṃ
atk-s0402a0:151_11: paripuṇṇaṃ karissāmā”ti sabbāpi ekacittā ahesuntipi samacittā.
atk-s0402a0:151_13: anāgate kocideva bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā devo vā manusso vā “ayaṃ desanā sāvakabhāsitā”ti agāravaṃ kareyya,
atk-s0402a0:151_14: sammāsambuddhaṃ pakkositvā imaṃ desanaṃ sabbaññubhāsitaṃ karissāma.
atk-s0402a0:151_15: Evaṃ anāgate garubhāvanīyā bhavissatīti sabbāva ekacittā ahesuntipi samacittā.
atk-s0402a0:151_17: sabbāpi hi tā ekasamāpattilābhiniyo vā ahesuṃ ekārammaṇalābhiniyo vāti evampi samacittā.
atk-s0402a0:152_2: Anukampaṃ upādāyāti na therassa anukampaṃ kāruññaṃ anuddayaṃ paṭicca,
atk-s0402a0:152_3: na ca imasmiṃ ṭhāne therassa anukampitabbakiccaṃ atthi.
atk-s0402a0:152_4: Yasmiṃ hi divase thero sūkarakhataleṇadvāre bhāgineyyassa dīghanakhaparibbājakassa vedanākammaṭṭhāne
atk-s0402a0:152_5: kathiyamāne tālavaṇṭaṃ gahetvā satthāraṃ bījamāno ṭhito parassa vaḍḍhitabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā khudaṃ vinodento
atk-s0402a0:152_6: viya parassa sajjitapasādhanaṃ sīse paṭimuñcanto viya ca sāvakapāramiñāṇassa nippadesato matthakaṃ patto,
atk-s0402a0:152_8: Avasesānaṃ pana taṃ ṭhānaṃ sampattānaṃ devamanussānaṃ anukampaṃ upādāya gacchatu bhagavāti bhagavantaṃ yāciṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:153_0: Balavā purisoti dubbalo hi khippaṃ samiñjanapasāraṇaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0402a0:153_3: Sammukhe pāturahosīti sammukhaṭṭhāne puratoyeva pākaṭo ahosi.
atk-s0402a0:153_4: Bhagavā etadavocāti etaṃ “idha sāriputtā”tiādinā nayena attano āgamanakāraṇaṃ avoca.
atk-s0402a0:153_6: “sace koci bālo akataññū bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā upāsako vā upāsikā vā evaṃ cinteyya –
atk-s0402a0:153_8: sammāsambuddho ettakaṃ adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto usūyāya parisaṃ uṭṭhāpetuṃ āgato’ti.
atk-s0402a0:153_9: So imaṃ mayi manopadosaṃ katvā apāye nibbatteyyā”ti.
atk-s0402a0:153_10: Athattano āgamanakāraṇaṃ kathento etaṃ “idha sāriputtā”tiādivacanaṃ avoca.
atk-s0402a0:154_0: Evaṃ attano āgamanakāraṇaṃ kathetvā idāni samāpattiyā thāmaṃ kathetuṃ tā kho pana,
atk-s0402a0:154_3: Tattha yasavasena vā atthaṃ āharituṃ vaṭṭati samāpattivasena vā.
atk-s0402a0:154_4: Yasavasena tāva mahesakkhā devatā dasa dasa ekaṭṭhāne aṭṭhaṃsu,
atk-s0402a0:154_5: tāhi appesakkhatarā vīsati vīsati ekaṭṭhāne aṭṭhaṃsu,
atk-s0402a0:154_8: Samāpattivasena pana yāhi paṇītā samāpatti bhāvitā,
atk-s0402a0:155_1: Na ca aññamaññaṃ byābādhentīti evaṃ sambādhe ṭhāne tiṭṭhantiyopi aññamaññaṃ na byābādhenti na ghaṭṭenti,
atk-s0402a0:155_5: tvaṃ maṃ maddantī ṭhitā”ti vattabbakāraṇaṃ nāhosi.
atk-s0402a0:155_8: Yena tā devatāti yena tathābhāvitena cittena tā devatā dasapi hutvā…pe…
atk-s0402a0:155_11: Idheva khoti sāsane vā manussaloke vā bhummaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:155_13: Tāsañhi devatānaṃ imasmiṃyeva manussaloke imasmiṃyeva ca sāsane taṃ cittaṃ bhāvitaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:155_15: tato ca pana āgantvā evaṃ sukhume attabhāve māpetvā ṭhitā.
atk-s0402a0:155_16: Tattha kiñcāpi kassapadasabalassa sāsane tīṇi maggaphalāni nibbattetvā brahmaloke nibbattadevatāpi atthi,
atk-s0402a0:155_17: sabbabuddhānaṃ pana ekāva anusāsanī ekaṃ sāsananti katvā “idheva kho,
atk-s0402a0:155_18: sāriputtā”ti aññabuddhānaṃ sāsanampi imameva sāsanaṃ karonto āha.
atk-s0402a0:156_0: Idāni sāriputtattheraṃ ārabbha tantivasena anusāsaniṃ kathento tasmātiha,
atk-s0402a0:156_2: Tattha tasmāti yasmā tā devatā idheva santaṃ samāpattiṃ nibbattetvā sante bhave nibbattā, tasmā.
atk-s0402a0:156_3: Santindriyāti pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ santatāya nibbutatāya paṇītatāya santindriyā.
atk-s0402a0:156_4: Santamānasāti mānasassa santatāya nibbutatāya paṇītatāya santamānasā.
atk-s0402a0:156_5: Santaṃyeva upahāraṃ upaharissāmāti kāyacittūpahāraṃ santaṃ nibbutaṃ paṇītaṃyeva upaharissāma.
atk-s0402a0:156_6: Sabrahmacārīsūti samānaṃ ekuddesatādiṃ brahmaṃ carantesu sahadhammikesu.
atk-s0402a0:156_9: sikkhitabbanti iminā ettakena vārena bhagavā desanaṃ sabbaññubhāsitaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0402a0:156_11: Ye imaṃ dhammapariyāyaṃ nāssosunti ye attano pāpikaṃ tucchaṃ niratthakaṃ diṭṭhiṃ nissāya imaṃ evarūpaṃ
atk-s0402a0:156_12: dhammadesanaṃ sotuṃ na labhiṃsūti yathānusandhinā desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0402a0:157_1: Chaṭṭhe varaṇāyaṃ viharatīti varaṇā nāma ekaṃ nagaraṃ,
atk-s0402a0:157_9: yvāyaṃ pañca kāmaguṇe nissāya uppajjati kāmarāgo,
atk-s0402a0:157_11: Kāmarāgena abhiniviṭṭhattā vinibaddhattā tasmiṃyeva ca kāmarāge mahāpaṅke viya paligedhattā anupaviṭṭhattā
atk-s0402a0:157_12: teneva ca kāmarāgena pariyuṭṭhitattā gahitattā kāmarāgeneva ca ajjhositattā gilitvā pariniṭṭhapetvā gahitattāti.
atk-s0402a0:157_14: Diṭṭhirāgoti panettha dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo nissāya uppajjanakarāgo veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:157_15: Puratthimesu janapadesūti therassa vasanaṭṭhānato sāvatthijanapado puratthimadisābhāge hoti,
atk-s0402a0:157_19: Yathā hi yaṃ telaṃ mānaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0402a0:157_22: Yañca jalaṃ taḷākaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0402a0:157_25: evamevaṃ yaṃ pītivacanaṃ hadayaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0402a0:157_26: adhikaṃ hutvā anto asaṇṭhahitvā bahi nikkhamati,
atk-s0402a0:158_2: Upasaṅkamīti “mahākaccānatthero kira nāma attano pitumattampi ayyakamattampi disvā neva abhivādeti na
atk-s0402a0:158_3: paccuṭṭheti na āsanena nimantetī”ti sutvā “na sakkā ettakena niṭṭhaṃ gantuṃ,
atk-s0402a0:158_4: upasaṅkamitvā naṃ pariggaṇhissāmī”ti bhuttapātarāso yenāyasmā mahākaccāno tenupasaṅkami.
atk-s0402a0:158_17: Na hi bhavaṃ kaccāno brāhmaṇeti idaṃ attānaṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0402a0:158_19: amhe evaṃ mahallake disvā bhoto kaccānassa abhivādanamattampi paccuṭṭhānamattampi āsanena nimantanamattampi natthīti.
atk-s0402a0:158_20: Na sampannamevāti na yuttameva na anucchavikameva.
atk-s0402a0:159_0: Thero brāhmaṇassa vacanaṃ sutvā “ayaṃ brāhmaṇo neva vuddhe jānāti na dahare,
atk-s0402a0:159_1: ācikkhissāmissa vuddhe ca dahare cā”ti desanaṃ vaḍḍhento atthi brāhmaṇātiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:159_3: Passatāti tadeva hatthe ṭhapitaṃ āmalakaṃ viya passantena.
atk-s0402a0:159_4: Vuddhabhūmīti yena kāraṇena vuddho nāma hoti,
atk-s0402a0:159_6: Daharabhūmīti yena kāraṇena daharo nāma hoti,
atk-s0402a0:159_10: Kāme paribhuñjatīti vatthukāme kilesakāmeti duvidhepi kāme kamanavasena paribhuñjati.
atk-s0402a0:159_11: Kāmamajjhāvasatīti duvidhepi kāme ghare gharassāmiko viya vasati adhivasati.
atk-s0402a0:159_12: Kāmapariyesanāya ussukoti duvidhānampi kāmānaṃ pariyesanatthaṃ ussukkamāpanno.
atk-s0402a0:159_13: Bālo na therotveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchatīti so na thero bālo mandotveva gaṇanaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0402a0:160_0: “Na tena thero so hoti, yenassa palitaṃ siro;
atk-s0402a0:162_3: Bhadrena yobbanena samannāgatoti yena yobbanena samannāgato yuvā,
atk-s0402a0:162_5: Paṭhamena vayasāti paṭhamavayo nāma tettiṃsa vassāni,
atk-s0402a0:162_7: Paṇḍito therotveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchatīti so evarūpo puggalo paṇḍitoti ca theroti ca gaṇanaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0402a0:163_0: “Yamhi saccañca dhammo ca, ahiṃsā saṃyamo damo;
atk-s0402a0:164_0: Sa ve vantamalo dhīro, thero iti pavuccatī”ti. ;
atk-s0402a0:165_6: Rājāno tasmiṃ samaye dubbalā hontīti tasmiṃ samaye rājāno tāsaṃ sampattīnaṃ abhāvena dubbalā honti.
atk-s0402a0:165_7: Atiyātunti bahiddhā janapadacārikaṃ caritvā icchiticchitakkhaṇe antonagaraṃ pavisituṃ.
atk-s0402a0:165_9: te nisedhessāmā”ti paṭhamayāme vā majjhimayāme vā pacchimayāme vā nikkhamituṃ phāsukaṃ na hoti.
atk-s0402a0:165_10: Tato uṭṭhāya corā manusse pothetvā acchinditvā gacchanti.
atk-s0402a0:165_11: Paccantime vā janapade anusaññātunti gāmaṃ vāsakaraṇatthāya setuṃ attharaṇatthāya pokkharaṇiṃ khaṇāpanatthāya
atk-s0402a0:165_12: sālādīnaṃ karaṇatthāya paccantime janapade anusaññātumpi na sukhaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a0:165_14: Bāhirāni vā kammantānīti bahigāme ārāme khettakammantāni.
atk-s0402a0:165_15: Pāpabhikkhū balavanto hontīti pakkhuttarā yasuttarā puññavanto bahukehi upaṭṭhākehi ca upaṭṭhākīhi ca samannāgatā rājarājamahāmattasannissitā.
atk-s0402a0:165_16: Pesalā bhikkhū tasmiṃ samaye dubbalā hontīti tasmiṃ samaye piyasīlā bhikkhū tāsaṃ sampattīnaṃ abhāvena dubbalā honti.
atk-s0402a0:165_17: Tuṇhībhūtā tuṇhībhūtāva saṅghamajjhe saṅkasāyantīti nissaddā hutvā saṅghamajjhe nisinnā kiñci ekavacanampi
atk-s0402a0:165_18: mukhaṃ ukkhipitvā kathetuṃ asakkontā pajjhāyantā viya nisīdanti.
atk-s0402a0:166_1: Navame micchāpaṭipattādhikaraṇahetūti micchāpaṭipattiyā kāraṇahetu paṭipajjanahetūti attho.
atk-s0402a0:166_3: Evarūpo hi sahavipassanakaṃ maggaṃ ārādhetuṃ sampādetuṃ pūretuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0402a0:166_5: Imasmiṃ sutte saha vipassanāya maggo kathito.
atk-s0402a0:167_3: Atthañca dhammañca paṭibāhantīti suggahitasuttantānaṃ atthañca pāḷiñca paṭibāhanti,
atk-s0402a0:167_4: attano duggahitasuttantānaṃyeva atthañca pāḷiñca uttaritaraṃ katvā dassenti.
atk-s0402a0:167_6: Imasmiṃ sutte sāsanassa vuddhi ca parihāni ca kathitāti.
atk-s0402a0:168_12: Pākatindriyāti pakatiyā ṭhitehi vivaṭehi arakkhitehi indriyehi samannāgatā.
atk-s0402a0:169_1: Dutiye bhaṇḍanajātāti bhaṇḍanaṃ vuccati kalahassa pubbabhāgo,
atk-s0402a0:169_5: Pabbajitā pana āpattivītikkamavācaṃ vadantā kalahajātā nāma.
atk-s0402a0:169_7: Mukhasattīhi vitudantāti guṇānaṃ chindanaṭṭhena dubbhāsitā vācā mukhasattiyoti vuccanti,
atk-s0402a0:169_9: Samaggāti ekakammaṃ ekuddeso samasikkhatāti etesaṃ karaṇena samaggatāya sahitā.
atk-s0402a0:170_6: Okkamane pubbaṅgamāti ettha okkamanaṃ vuccati avagamanaṭṭhena pañca nīvaraṇāni,
atk-s0402a0:170_10: Na vīriyaṃ ārabhantīti duvidhampi vīriyaṃ na karonti.
atk-s0402a0:170_11: Appattassa pattiyāti pubbe appattassa jhānavipassanāmaggaphalavisesassa pattiatthāya.
atk-s0402a0:170_14: Diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjatīti ācariyupajjhāyehi kataṃ anukaronto diṭṭhassa tesaṃ ācārassa anugatiṃ āpajjati nāma.
atk-s0402a0:171_3: “Idaṃ dukkha”nti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānantīti ṭhapetvā taṇhaṃ tebhūmakā pañcakkhandhā dukkhasaccaṃ nāma,
atk-s0402a0:171_5: ito uddhaṃ dukkhaṃ natthīti yathāsabhāvato nappajānanti.
atk-s0402a0:171_7: Sesapadesu pana tassa dukkhassa samuṭṭhāpikā purimataṇhā samudayo nāma,
atk-s0402a0:171_9: dvinnampi vā tesaṃ saccānaṃ accantakkhayo asamuppatti dukkhanirodho nāma,
atk-s0402a0:171_10: aṭṭhaṅgiko ariyamaggo dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā nāmāti evaṃ imasmiṃ sutte catūhi saccehi cattāro maggā ca cattāri ca phalāni kathitāni.
atk-s0402a0:172_1: Pañcame parisākasaṭoti kasaṭaparisā kacavaraparisā palāpaparisāti attho.
atk-s0402a0:172_6: Imāni pana cattāri agatigamanāni bhaṇḍabhājanīye ca vinicchayaṭṭhāne ca labbhanti.
atk-s0402a0:172_7: Tattha bhaṇḍabhājanīye tāva attano bhārabhūtānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ amanāpe bhaṇḍake patte taṃ parivattetvā manāpaṃ dento chandāgatiṃ gacchati nāma.
atk-s0402a0:172_8: Attano pana abhārabhūtānaṃ manāpe bhaṇḍake patte taṃ parivattetvā amanāpaṃ dento dosāgatiṃ gacchati nāma.
atk-s0402a0:172_9: Bhaṇḍakabhājanīyavatthuñca ṭhitikañca ajānanto mohāgatiṃ gacchati nāma.
atk-s0402a0:172_10: Mukharānaṃ vā rājādinissitānaṃ vā “ime me amanāpe bhaṇḍake dinne anatthampi kareyyu”nti bhayena parivattetvā manāpaṃ dento bhayāgatiṃ gacchati nāma.
atk-s0402a0:172_12: sabbesaṃ tulābhūto pamāṇabhūto majjhatto hutvā yaṃ yassa pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0402a0:172_14: ayaṃ catubbidhampi agatigamanaṃ na gacchati nāma.
atk-s0402a0:172_15: Vinicchayaṭṭhāne pana attano bhārabhūtassa garukāpattiṃ lahukāpattīti katvā kathento chandāgatiṃ gacchati nāma.

atk-s0402a0:172_18: Mukharassa vā rājapūjitassa vā “ayaṃ me garukaṃ katvā āpattiṃ kathentassa anatthampi kareyyā”ti garukameva

atk-s0402a0:173_7: Na aññā cittaṃ upaṭṭhapentīti vijānanatthāya cittaṃ na upaṭṭhapenti,
atk-s0402a0:173_9: Uggahetabbaṃ pariyāpuṇitabbanti uggahetabbe ca pariyāpuṇitabbe ca.

atk-s0402a0:173_17: Na ceva aññamaññaṃ paṭipucchantīti aññamaññaṃ atthaṃ vā anusandhiṃ vā pubbāparaṃ vā na pucchanti.
atk-s0402a0:173_18: Na ca paṭivicarantīti pucchanatthāya cārikaṃ na vicaranti.
atk-s0402a0:173_19: Idaṃ kathanti idaṃ byañjanaṃ kathaṃ ropetabbaṃ kinti ropetabbaṃ?
atk-s0402a0:173_20: Imassa ko atthoti imassa bhāsitassa ko attho,
atk-s0402a0:173_26: Na uttāniṃ karontīti pākaṭaṃ na karonti.
atk-s0402a0:174_1: Sattame āmisagarūti catupaccayagarukā lokuttaradhammaṃ lāmakato gahetvā ṭhitaparisā.
atk-s0402a0:174_2: Saddhammagarūti nava lokuttaradhamme garuke katvā cattāro paccaye lāmakato gahetvā ṭhitaparisā.
atk-s0402a0:174_5: Kāyasakkhīti kāyena jhānaphassaṃ phusitvā pacchā nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikatvā ṭhito.
atk-s0402a0:174_16: Sabbesu hi ekasadisesu jātesu sīlavantesu balavagāravaṃ na hoti,

atk-s0402a0:174_18: Te tena lābhaṃ labhantīti te bhikkhū ekaccānaṃ vaṇṇaṃ ekaccānaṃ avaṇṇaṃ kathetvā cattāro paccaye labhanti.
atk-s0402a0:174_23: Anissaraṇapaññāti catūsu paccayesu chandarāgaapakaḍḍhanāya nissaraṇapaññāya virahitā idamatthaṃ etanti ajānantā.
atk-s0402a0:175_0: Sukkapakkhe ubhatobhāgavimuttotiādīsu ayaṃ sattannampi ariyapuggalānaṃ saṅkhepapakāsanā –
atk-s0402a0:175_1: eko bhikkhu paññādhurena abhiniviṭṭho aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā sotāpattimaggaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0402a0:175_2: So tasmiṃ khaṇe dhammānusārī nāma hoti,
atk-s0402a0:175_5: Samāpattīhi vikkhambhanavimuttiyā maggena samucchedavimuttiyāti dvikkhattuṃ vā dvīhi vā bhāgehi vimuttoti attho.
atk-s0402a0:175_6: Aparo paññādhurena abhiniviṭṭho samāpattiyo nibbattetuṃ asakkonto sukkhavipassakova hutvā sotāpattimaggaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0402a0:175_7: So tasmiṃ khaṇe dhammānusārī nāma hoti,
atk-s0402a0:175_10: Aparo saddhādhurena abhiniviṭṭho aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā sotāpattimaggaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0402a0:175_11: So tasmiṃ khaṇe saddhānusārī nāma hoti,
atk-s0402a0:175_14: Aparo saddhādhurena abhiniviṭṭho samāpattiyo nibbattetuṃ asakkonto sukkhavipassakova hutvā sotāpattimaggaṃ pāpuṇāti.

atk-s0402a0:178_4: Na ca saññattiṃ upagacchantīti saññāpanatthaṃ na sannipatanti.
atk-s0402a0:178_6: Na ca nijjhattiṃ upagacchantīti aññamaññaṃ nijjhāpanatthāya na sannipatanti.
atk-s0402a0:178_14: Ime pana na tathā mantentīti appaṭinissaggamantino.

atk-s0402a0:179_1: Dutiyapaṇṇāsakassa paṭhame cakkavattinā saddhiṃ gahitattā “lokānukampāyā”ti na vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:179_2: Ettha ca cakkavattino uppattiyā dve sampattiyo labhanti,
atk-s0402a0:181_1: Tatiye bahuno janassa anutappā hotīti mahājanassa anutāpakārī hoti.
atk-s0402a0:181_2: Tattha cakkavattino kālakiriyā ekacakkavāḷe devamanussānaṃ anutāpaṃ karoti,

atk-s0402a0:183_0: 57. Pañcame buddhāti attano ānubhāvena cattāri saccāni buddhā.
atk-s0402a0:184_3: Tattha khīṇāsavo attano sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā pahīnattā na bhāyati,
atk-s0402a0:185_2: Mānusiṃ vācaṃ na bhāsantīti manussakathaṃ na kathenti.
atk-s0402a0:185_3: Dhammāsokassa kira ekaṃ kinnaraṃ ānetvā dassesuṃ.
atk-s0402a0:185_6: Eko puriso “ahametaṃ kathāpessāmī”ti heṭṭhāpāsādaṃ otāretvā dve khāṇuke koṭṭetvā ukkhaliṃ āropesi.
atk-s0402a0:185_8: Taṃ disvā kinnaro “kiṃ aññaṃ ekaṃ khāṇukaṃ koṭṭetuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti ettakameva āha.
atk-s0402a0:185_9: Puna aparabhāge dve kinnare ānetvā dassesuṃ.
atk-s0402a0:185_12: Eko puriso “ahamete kathāpessāmī”ti te gahetvā antarāpaṇaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0402a0:185_16: kathaṃ te kilāsino na hontī”ti āha.
atk-s0402a0:185_17: Itaro “kathaṃ ime etaṃ nissāya kuṭṭhino na hontī”ti āha.
atk-s0402a0:185_18: Evaṃ mānusiṃ vācaṃ kathetuṃ sakkontāpi dve atthe sampassamānā na kathentīti.
atk-s0402a0:187_2: Na vadeyyāti ovādena vā anusāsaniyā vā na vadeyya,
atk-s0402a0:187_4: Therampāhaṃ na vadeyyanti ahampi theraṃ bhikkhuṃ ovādānusāsanivasena na vadeyyaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:187_7: Noti naṃ vadeyyanti “ahaṃ tava vacanaṃ na karissa”nti naṃ vadeyyaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:187_9: Passampissa nappaṭikareyyanti passantopi jānantopi ahaṃ tassa vacanaṃ na kareyyaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:187_11: Sukkapakkhe pana sādhūti naṃ vadeyyanti “sādhu bhaddakaṃ sukathitaṃ tayā”ti tassa kathaṃ abhinandanto naṃ vadeyyanti attho.
atk-s0402a0:188_1: Dvādasame ubhato vacīsaṃsāroti dvīsupi pakkhesu aññamaññaṃ akkosanapaccakkosanavasena saṃsaramānā vācā vacīsaṃsāro.
atk-s0402a0:188_2: Diṭṭhipaḷāsoti diṭṭhiṃ nissāya uppajjanako yugaggāhalakkhaṇo paḷāso diṭṭhipaḷāso nāma.

atk-s0402a0:189_1: Dutiyassa paṭhame gihisukhanti gihīnaṃ sabbakāmanipphattimūlakaṃ sukhaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:193_0: 69. Pañcame sāmisanti saṃkilesaṃ vaṭṭagāmisukhaṃ. Nirāmisanti nikkilesaṃ vivaṭṭagāmisukhaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:196_4: lokuttarasappītikato ca lokuttaranippītikaṃ agganti evaṃ bhummantaraṃ abhinditvā aggabhāvo veditabbo.

atk-s0402a0:199_1: Ekādasame sappītikārammaṇanti sappītikaṃ jhānadvayaṃ paccavekkhantassa uppannasukhaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:201_3: Nidānaṃ hetu saṅkhāro paccayo rūpanti sabbānipi hi etāni kāraṇavevacanāneva.
atk-s0402a0:202_1: Sattame savedanāti paccayabhūtāya sampayuttavedanāya satiyeva uppajjanti,
atk-s0402a0:203_1: Dasame saṅkhatārammaṇāti paccayanibbattaṃ saṅkhatadhammaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvāva uppajjanti.
atk-s0402a0:203_2: No asaṅkhatārammaṇāti asaṅkhataṃ pana nibbānaṃ ārabbha na uppajjanti.
atk-s0402a0:203_3: Na hontīti maggakkhaṇe na honti nāma,
atk-s0402a0:203_5: Evametesu dasasupi ṭhānesu yāva arahattā desanā desitāti.

atk-s0402a0:210_1: Dasame dhātukusalatāti aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo dhātūti jānanaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:210_2: Manasikārakusalatāti tāsaṃyeva dhātūnaṃ aniccādivasena lakkhaṇattayaṃ āropetvā jānanaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:211_1: Ekādasame āpattikusalatāti pañcannañca sattannañca āpattikkhandhānaṃ jānanaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:211_2: Āpattivuṭṭhānakusalatāti desanāya vā kammavācāya vā āpattīhi vuṭṭhānajānananti.

atk-s0402a0:212_5: pātimokkhaṃ therabhāroti vuccatī”ti imaṃ dasavidhaṃ therabhāraṃ navako hutvā therena anajjhiṭṭho karonto anāgataṃ bhāraṃ vahati nāma.

atk-s0402a0:225_1: Dutiyassa paṭhame evaṃ sammā āyācamāno āyāceyyāti saddho bhikkhu uṭṭhahitvā “yādiso sāriputtatthero paññāya,

atk-s0402a0:225_15: Te gahetvā “ahampi ñāṇena vā iddhiyā vā etampamāṇo homī”ti attānaṃ tuletuṃ vā pamāṇetuṃ vā sakkā,

atk-s0402a0:227_16: Vaṇṇārahassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsatīti suppaṭipannānaṃ sammāpaṭipannānaṃ buddhānaṃ buddhasāvakānaṃ “itipi suppaṭipannā itipi sammāpaṭipannā”ti vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati.
atk-s0402a0:228_2: Pasādaṃ upadaṃsetīti duppaṭipadāya micchāpaṭipadāya “ayaṃ suppaṭipadā sammāpaṭipadā”ti pasādaṃ janeti.
atk-s0402a0:228_3: Pasādanīye ṭhāne appasādanti suppaṭipadāya sammāpaṭipadāya “ayaṃ duppaṭipadā micchāpaṭipadā”ti appasādaṃ janetīti.
atk-s0402a0:229_1: Sattame dvīsūti dvīsu okāsesu dvīsu kāraṇesu.
atk-s0402a0:229_3: Mātari ca pitari cāti mittavindako viya mātari,
atk-s0402a0:230_1: Aṭṭhame tathāgate ca tathāgatasāvake cāti devadatto viya tathāgate,

atk-s0402a0:238_0: 150. Navame catūhi paccayehi anuggaṇhanaṃ āmisānuggaho, dhammena anuggaṇhanaṃ dhammānuggaho.

atk-s0402a0:251_1: Pañcamassa paṭhame samāpattikusalatāti āhārasappāyaṃ utusappāyaṃ pariggaṇhitvā samāpattisamāpajjane chekatā.
atk-s0402a0:251_2: Samāpattivuṭṭhānakusalatāti yathāparicchedena gate kāle viyatto hutvā uṭṭhahanto vuṭṭhānakusalo nāma hoti,

atk-s0402a0:299_13: Taṃ kira theraṃ eko upaṭṭhāko amaccaputto upasaṅkamitvā “mettāyantena paṭhamaṃ kīdise puggale mettāyitabba”nti pucchi.

atk-s0402a0:300_1: Kammaṭṭhānaṃ pana avisaṃvādetvā kathento anulomikesu dhammesu samādapeti nāma koḷitavihāravāsī catunikāyikatissatthero viya.
atk-s0402a0:300_2: Tassa kira jeṭṭhabhātā nandābhayatthero nāma potaliyavihāre vasanto ekasmiṃ roge samuṭṭhite kaniṭṭhaṃ pakkosāpetvā āha – “āvuso,
atk-s0402a0:300_3: mayhaṃ sallahukaṃ katvā ekaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathehī”ti. Kiṃ, bhante,
atk-s0402a0:300_8: ekasmiñca upādārūpe diṭṭhe tevīsati upādārūpāni pākaṭāni hontīti.
atk-s0402a0:300_10: ettaka”nti taṃ uyyojetvā kabaḷīkārāhāraṃ pariggaṇhitvā upādārūpaṃ sallakkhetvā vivaṭṭetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0402a0:300_11: Atha naṃ theraṃ bahivihārā anikkhantameva pakkositvā, “āvuso,
atk-s0402a0:300_12: mahāavassayosi mayhaṃ jāto”ti kaniṭṭhattherassa attanā paṭiladdhaguṇaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0402a0:300_13: Bahujanahitāyāti etassapi hi saddhivihārikādayo “ayaṃ na ajānitvā karissatī”ti tena katameva karontīti bahujanahitāya paṭipanno nāma hotīti.

atk-s0402a0:302_7: jāto”ti ācikkhite sutvā tato paṭṭhāya yāvajīvaṃ sarati na sammussati.

atk-s0402a0:304_6: asukarukkhamūle pabbajito”ti evaṃ yāvajīvaṃ saritabbameva hoti na sammussitabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:305_8: asukarukkhamūle sotāpanno jāto”ti yāvajīvaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ hoti asammussanīyaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:306_3: Sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvāti attanāva abhivisiṭṭhāya paññāya paccakkhaṃ katvā.
atk-s0402a0:306_6: asukarukkhamūle arahattaṃ patta”nti attano arahattapattiṭṭhānaṃ nāma yāvajīvaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ hoti asammussanīyanti yathānusandhināva desanaṃ niṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0402a0:309_0: Ettāvatā kulavipattiṃ dassetvā idāni yasmā nīcakule jātopi ekacco aḍḍho hoti mahaddhano,
atk-s0402a0:309_8: Yattha kasirena ghāsacchādo labbhatīti yasmiṃ kule dukkhena yāgubhattaghāso ca kopīnamattaṃ acchādanañca labbhati.
atk-s0402a0:310_0: Idāni yasmā ekacco nīcakule jātopi upadhisampanno hoti attabhāvasamiddhiyaṃ ṭhito,
atk-s0402a0:310_2: tasmāssa sarīravipattimpi dassetuṃ so ca hoti dubbaṇṇotiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:311_0: Jeṭṭhoti aññasmiṃ jeṭṭhe sati kaniṭṭho āsaṃ na karoti,

atk-s0402a0:314_5: Dhammeneva dasavidhena cakkavattivattena rājā jātoti dhammarājā.
atk-s0402a0:314_6: Sopi na arājakanti sopi aññaṃ nissayarājānaṃ alabhitvā cakkaṃ nāma vattetuṃ na sakkotīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:314_7: Iti satthā desanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā yathānusandhiṃ apāpetvāva tuṇhī ahosi. Kasmā?
atk-s0402a0:314_9: bahū hi imasmiṃ ṭhāne tathārūpā bhikkhū,
atk-s0402a0:314_11: Atheko anusandhikusalo bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ pucchanto ko pana,
atk-s0402a0:315_2: Nissāyāti tadadhiṭṭhānena cetasā tameva nissayaṃ katvā.
atk-s0402a0:315_3: Dhammaṃ sakkarontoti yathā kato so dhammo suṭṭhu kato hoti,
atk-s0402a0:315_5: Dhammaṃ garuṃ karontoti tasmiṃ gāravuppattiyā taṃ garukaronto.
atk-s0402a0:315_6: Dhammaṃ apacāyamānoti tasseva dhammassa añjalikaraṇādīhi nīcavuttitaṃ karonto.
atk-s0402a0:315_7: Dhammaddhajo dhammaketūti taṃ dhammaṃ dhajamiva purakkhatvā ketumiva ukkhipitvā pavattiyā dhammaddhajo dhammaketu ca hutvāti attho.
atk-s0402a0:315_8: Dhammādhipateyyoti dhammādhipatibhūtāgatabhāvena dhammavaseneva ca sabbakiriyānaṃ karaṇena dhammādhipateyyo hutvā.
atk-s0402a0:315_9: Dhammikaṃ rakkhāvaraṇaguttiṃ saṃvidahatīti dhammo assā atthīti dhammikā,
atk-s0402a0:315_10: rakkhā ca āvaraṇañca gutti ca rakkhāvaraṇagutti.
atk-s0402a0:315_11: Tattha “paraṃ rakkhanto attānaṃ rakkhatī”ti vacanato khantiādayo rakkhā.
atk-s0402a0:315_19: Taṃ sabbampi suṭṭhu vidahati pavatteti ṭhapetīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:316_3: antojanasaṅkhātaṃ puttadāraṃ sīlasaṃvare patiṭṭhāpento vatthagandhamālādīni cassa dadamāno sabbopaddave
atk-s0402a0:316_4: cassa nivārayamāno dhammikaṃ rakkhāvaraṇaguttiṃ saṃvidahati nāma.
atk-s0402a0:316_12: tathā nigamavāsino negamā janapadavāsino ca jānapadā.
atk-s0402a0:317_0: Dhammeneva cakkaṃ vattetīti dasakusalakammapathadhammeneva cakkaṃ pavatteti.
atk-s0402a0:317_1: Taṃ hoti cakkaṃ appaṭivattiyanti taṃ tena evaṃ pavattitaṃ āṇācakkaṃ appaṭivattiyaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a0:317_2: Kenaci manussabhūtenāti devatā nāma attanā icchiticchitameva karonti,
atk-s0402a0:317_8: Dhammarājāti navahi lokuttaradhammehi mahājanaṃ rañjetīti dhammarājā.
atk-s0402a0:317_9: Dhammaṃyevāti navalokuttaradhammameva nissāya tameva sakkaronto taṃ garukaronto taṃ apacāyamāno.
atk-s0402a0:317_12: Tameva adhipatiṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā viharatīti dhammādhipateyyo.
atk-s0402a0:317_16: sucaritaṃ sevitabbanti evaṃ sabbattha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:317_18: Dhammeneva anuttaraṃ dhammacakkaṃ pavattetīti navalokuttaradhammeneva asadisaṃ dhammacakkaṃ pavatteti.
atk-s0402a0:317_19: Taṃ hoti cakkaṃ appaṭivattiyanti taṃ evaṃ pavattitaṃ dhammacakkaṃ etesu samaṇādīsu ekenapi paṭivattetuṃ paṭibāhituṃ na sakkā.
atk-s0402a0:319_1: Pañcame isipataneti buddhapaccekabuddhasaṅkhātānaṃ isīnaṃ dhammacakkappavattanatthāya ceva uposathakaraṇatthāya ca āgantvā patane,
atk-s0402a0:319_6: Chahi māsehi chārattūnehīti so kira raññā āṇattadivaseyeva sabbūpakaraṇāni sajjetvā antevāsikehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0402a0:319_7: araññaṃ pavisitvā gāmadvāragāmamajjhadevakulasusānādīsu ṭhitarukkhe ceva jhāmapatitasukkharukkhe ca vivajjetvā
atk-s0402a0:319_8: sampannapadese ṭhite sabbadosavivajjite nābhiaranemīnaṃ anurūpe rukkhe gahetvā taṃ cakkaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0402a0:319_9: Tassa rukkhe vicinitvā gaṇhantassa ceva karontassa ca ettako kālo vītivatto.
atk-s0402a0:320_1: Sakasāvāti pūtisārena ceva pheggunā ca yuttā.
atk-s0402a0:320_7: Tesupi purimā tayo kilesānaṃ samudācārakkhaṇe papatitā nāma,
atk-s0402a0:320_12: pāṇātipāto adinnādānaṃ micchācāro musāvādo pisuṇāvācā micchādiṭṭhīti ime tāva cha sotāpattimaggena pahīyanti,
atk-s0402a0:322_1: Chaṭṭhe apaṇṇakapaṭipadanti aviraddhapaṭipadaṃ ekaṃsapaṭipadaṃ niyyānikapaṭipadaṃ kāraṇapaṭipadaṃ sārapaṭipadaṃ
atk-s0402a0:322_2: maṇḍapaṭipadaṃ apaccanīkapaṭipadaṃ anulomapaṭipadaṃ dhammānudhammapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno hoti,
atk-s0402a0:322_4: Evaṃ gahetvā paṭipanno hi bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā upāsako vā upāsikā vā manussadevanibbānasampattīhi hāyati parihāyati,
atk-s0402a0:322_5: apaṇṇakapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno pana tāhi sampattīhi na parihāyati.
atk-s0402a0:322_6: Atīte kantāraddhānamaggaṃ paṭipannesu dvīsu satthavāhesu yakkhassa vacanaṃ gahetvā bālasatthavāho saddhiṃ satthena anayabyasanaṃ patto,
atk-s0402a0:322_7: yakkhassa vacanaṃ aggahetvā “udakadiṭṭhaṭṭhāne udakaṃ chaḍḍessāmā”ti satthake saññāpetvā maggaṃ paṭipanno paṇḍitasatthavāho viya.
atk-s0402a0:325_0: Yoni cassa āraddhā hotīti ettha yonīti khandhakoṭṭhāsassapi kāraṇassapi passāvamaggassapi nāmaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:325_6: yonijaṃ mattisambhava”nti ca “tamenaṃ kammajavātā nivattitvā uddhaṃpādaṃ adhosiraṃ samparivattetvā mātu
atk-s0402a0:326_4: okāsato yāva bhavaggā savantīti vā āsavā,
atk-s0402a0:326_5: ete dhamme etañca okāsaṃ antokaritvā pavattantīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:326_9: Lokasmimpi hi cirapārivāsikā madirādayo āsavāti vuccanti,
atk-s0402a0:326_16: Āyataṃ vā saṃsāradukkhaṃ savanti pasavantītipi āsavā.
atk-s0402a0:326_17: Purimāni cettha nibbacanāni yattha kilesā āsavāti āgacchanti,
atk-s0402a0:326_23: diṭṭhadhammikānaṃyeva āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya dhammaṃ desemī”ti ettha vivādamūlabhūtā kilesā āsavāti āgatā.
atk-s0402a0:329_0: Te mayhaṃ āsavā khīṇā, viddhastā vinaḷīkatā”ti. –
atk-s0402a0:330_0: Ettha tebhūmakaṃ ca kammaṃ avasesā ca akusalā dhammā.
atk-s0402a0:330_1: “Diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāyā”ti ettha parūpavādavippaṭisāravadhabandhādayo
atk-s0402a0:331_0: Te panete āsavā yattha yathā āgatā,
atk-s0402a0:331_2: Ete hi vinaye tāva “diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya,
atk-s0402a0:331_5: āsavā kāmāsavo bhavāsavo avijjāsavo”ti tidhā āgatā.
atk-s0402a0:331_6: Aññesu ca suttantesu abhidhamme ca teyeva diṭṭhāsavena saha catudhā āgatā.
atk-s0402a0:331_18: Sabbāsavapariyāye teyeva dassanena pahātabbehi saddhiṃ sattadhā āgatā.
atk-s0402a0:331_19: Idha pana abhidhammanayena cattāro āsavā adhippetāti veditabbā.
atk-s0402a0:332_0: Khayāyāti ettha pana āsavānaṃ sarasabhedopi khīṇākāropi maggaphalanibbānānipi “āsavakkhayo”ti vuccati.
atk-s0402a0:332_1: “Yo āsavānaṃ khayo vayo bhedo paribhedo aniccatā antaradhāna”nti ettha hi āsavānaṃ sarasabhedo “āsavakkhayo”ti vutto.
atk-s0402a0:332_4: passato āsavānaṃ khayaṃ vadāmī”ti ettha āsavappahānaṃ āsavānaṃ accantakkhayo asamuppādo khīṇākāro natthibhāvo “āsavakkhayo”ti vutto.
atk-s0402a0:334_0: Khayasmiṃ paṭhamaṃ ñāṇaṃ, tato aññā anantarā”ti. –
atk-s0402a0:335_0: Ettha maggo “āsavakkhayo”ti vutto. “Āsavānaṃ khayā samaṇo hotī”ti ettha phalaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:337_0: Āsavā tassa vaḍḍhanti, ārā so āsavakkhayā”ti. –
atk-s0402a0:338_1: Imasmiṃ pana sutte phalaṃ sandhāya “āsavānaṃ khayāyā”ti āha,
atk-s0402a0:339_3: Jāgariyaṃ anuyuttoti rattindivaṃ cha koṭṭhāse katvā pañcasu koṭṭhāsesu jāgaraṇabhāvaṃ anuyutto,
atk-s0402a0:340_0: Evaṃ mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā idāni tameva ṭhapitapaṭipāṭiyā vibhajanto kathañca,
atk-s0402a0:340_3: Tattha cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvātiādīnaṃ attho visuddhimagge vitthārito,
atk-s0402a0:340_4: tathā paṭisaṅkhā yoniso āhāraṃ āhāreti neva davāyātiādīnaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:340_8: Sīhaseyyaṃ kappetīti sīho viya seyyaṃ kappeti.
atk-s0402a0:340_9: Pāde pādaṃ accādhāyāti vāmapādaṃ dakkhiṇapāde atiādhāya.
atk-s0402a0:340_10: Samaṃ ṭhapite hi pāde jāṇukena jāṇukaṃ gopphakena ca gopphakaṃ ghaṭīyati,
atk-s0402a0:340_12: Tasmā tassa dosassa parivajjanatthaṃ thokaṃ atikkamitvā esa pādaṃ ṭhapeti.
atk-s0402a0:341_0: Sato sampajānoti satiyā ceva sampajaññena ca samannāgato.
atk-s0402a0:341_1: Kathaṃ panesa niddāyanto sato sampajāno nāma hotīti?
atk-s0402a0:341_3: Ayaṃ hi caṅkame caṅkamanto niddāya okkamanabhāvaṃ ñatvā pavattamānaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ ṭhapetvā mañce vā phalake
atk-s0402a0:341_4: vā nipanno niddaṃ upagantvā puna pabujjhamāno kammaṭṭhānaṃ ṭhitaṭṭhāne gaṇhantoyeva pabujjhati.
atk-s0402a0:341_5: Tasmā niddāyantopi sato sampajāno nāma hoti.
atk-s0402a0:341_7: Pariggahakammaṭṭhānavasenāpi panesa sato sampajāno nāma hoti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0402a0:341_8: Ayaṃ hi caṅkamanto niddāya okkamanabhāvaṃ ñatvā pāsāṇaphalake vā mañce vā dakkhiṇena passena nipajjitvā paccavekkhati –
atk-s0402a0:341_14: Tattha ākāsampi ‘ahaṃ vātaṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhita’nti na jānāti,
atk-s0402a0:341_21: Na hi tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ ābhogo vā samannāhāro vā manasikāro vā cetanā vā patthanā vā atthī”ti.
atk-s0402a0:341_22: Tassa evaṃ paccavekkhato taṃ paccavekkhaṇacittaṃ bhavaṅge otarati.
atk-s0402a0:341_23: Evaṃ niddāyantopi sato sampajāno nāma hotīti.
atk-s0402a0:342_0: Uṭṭhānasaññaṃ manasikaritvāti “ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ gate cande vā tārakāya vā uṭṭhahissāmī”ti uṭṭhānakālaparicchedikaṃ saññaṃ manasikaritvā,
atk-s0402a0:342_2: Evaṃ karitvā sayito hi yathāparicchinneyeva kāle uṭṭhahati.
atk-s0402a0:346_3: Jiguccheyyāthāti gūthe viya tasmiṃ vacane sañjātajigucchā bhaveyyātha.
atk-s0402a0:346_6: Dibbena kira āyunā aṭṭīyathāti evamassa sambandho veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:348_4: Na sakkaccaṃ kammantaṃ adhiṭṭhātīti yathā adhiṭṭhitaṃ suadhiṭṭhitaṃ hoti,
atk-s0402a0:348_6: Tattha paccūsakāle padasaddena uṭṭhāya dīpaṃ jāletvā bhaṇḍaṃ pasāretvā anisīdanto pubbaṇhasamayaṃ na sakkaccaṃ kammantaṃ adhiṭṭhāti nāma.
atk-s0402a0:348_7: Ayaṃ hi yaṃ corā rattiṃ bhaṇḍaṃ haritvā “idaṃ amhākaṃ hatthato vissajjessāmā”ti āpaṇaṃ gantvā appena agghena denti,
atk-s0402a0:348_8: yampi bahuverino manussā rattiṃ nagare vasitvā pātova āpaṇaṃ gantvā bhaṇḍaṃ gaṇhanti,
atk-s0402a0:348_9: yaṃ vā pana janapadaṃ gantukāmā manussā pātova āpaṇaṃ gantvā bhaṇḍaṃ kiṇanti,
atk-s0402a0:349_0: Aññesaṃ bhojanavelāya pana bhuñjituṃ āgantvā pātova bhaṇḍaṃ paṭisāmetvā gharaṃ gantvā bhuñjitvā niddāyitvā
atk-s0402a0:349_1: sāyaṃ puna āpaṇaṃ āgacchanto majjhanhikasamayaṃ na sakkaccaṃ kammantaṃ adhiṭṭhāti nāma.
atk-s0402a0:349_2: So hi yaṃ corā pātova vissajjetuṃ na sampāpuṇiṃsu,
atk-s0402a0:349_3: divākāle pana paresaṃ asañcārakkhaṇe āpaṇaṃ gantvā appagghena denti,
atk-s0402a0:349_4: yañca bhojanavelāya puññavanto issarā “āpaṇato idañcidañca laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti pahiṇitvā āharāpenti,
atk-s0402a0:350_0: Yāva yāmabherinikkhamanā pana antoāpaṇe dīpaṃ jālāpetvā anisīdanto sāyanhasamayaṃ na sakkaccaṃ kammantaṃ adhiṭṭhāti nāma.
atk-s0402a0:350_1: So hi yaṃ corā pātopi divāpi vissajjetuṃ na sampāpuṇiṃsu,
atk-s0402a0:350_2: sāyaṃ pana āpaṇaṃ gantvā appagghena denti,
atk-s0402a0:351_0: Na sakkaccaṃ samādhinimittaṃ adhiṭṭhātīti sakkaccakiriyāya samādhiṃ na samāpajjati.
atk-s0402a0:351_1: Ettha ca pātova cetiyaṅgaṇabodhiyaṅgaṇesu vattaṃ katvā senāsanaṃ pavisitvā yāva bhikkhācāravelā,
atk-s0402a0:351_2: tāva samāpattiṃ appetvā anisīdanto pubbaṇhasamayaṃ na sakkaccaṃ samādhinimittaṃ adhiṭṭhāti nāma.
atk-s0402a0:351_3: Pacchābhattaṃ pana piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānaṃ pavisitvā yāva sāyanhasamayā samāpattiṃ
atk-s0402a0:351_4: appetvā anisīdanto majjhanhikasamayaṃ na sakkaccaṃ samādhinimittaṃ adhiṭṭhāti nāma.
atk-s0402a0:351_5: Sāyaṃ pana cetiyaṃ vanditvā therūpaṭṭhānaṃ katvā senāsanaṃ pavisitvā paṭhamayāmaṃ samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā
atk-s0402a0:351_6: anisīdanto sāyanhasamayaṃ na sakkaccaṃ samādhinimittaṃ adhiṭṭhāti nāma.
atk-s0402a0:351_8: Apicettha “samāpattiṃ appetvā”ti vuttaṭṭhāne samāpattiyā asati vipassanāpi vaṭṭati,
atk-s0402a0:353_2: Vidhuroti visiṭṭhadhuro uttamadhuro ñāṇasampayuttena vīriyena samannāgato.
atk-s0402a0:353_5: Ettakaṃ mūlaṃ bhavissati ettako udayoti tasmiṃ “evaṃ kītaṃ evaṃ vikkāyamāna”nti vuttapaṇiye yena kayena taṃ kītaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:354_0: Kusalo hoti paṇiyaṃ ketuñca vikketuñcāti sulabhaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā kiṇanto dullabhaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā vikkiṇanto ca ettha kusalo nāma hoti,
atk-s0402a0:355_3: Paṭibaloti kāyabalena ceva ñāṇabalena ca samannāgatattā samattho.
atk-s0402a0:355_4: Amhākañca kālena kālaṃ anuppadātunti amhākañca gahitadhanamūlikaṃ vaḍḍhiṃ kālena kālaṃ anuppadātuṃ.
atk-s0402a0:356_0: Kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ upasampadāyāti kusaladhammānaṃ sampādanatthāya paṭilābhatthāya.
atk-s0402a0:356_3: Anikkhittadhuroti “aggamaggaṃ apāpuṇitvā imaṃ vīriyadhuraṃ na ṭhapessāmī”ti evaṃ aṭṭhapitadhuro.
atk-s0402a0:357_0: Bahussutāti ekanikāyādivasena bahu buddhavacanaṃ sutaṃ etesanti bahussutā.
atk-s0402a0:357_1: Āgatāgamāti eko nikāyo eko āgamo nāma,
atk-s0402a0:357_4: etesu āgamesu yesaṃ ekopi āgamo āgato paguṇo pavattito,
atk-s0402a0:357_10: Paripañhatīti “imaṃ nāma pucchissāmī”ti aññāti tuleti pariggaṇhāti.
atk-s0402a0:358_0: Imasmiṃ pana sutte paṭhamaṃ paññā āgatā,
atk-s0402a0:358_2: Tattha paṭhamaṃ arahattaṃ patvā pacchā vīriyaṃ katvā kalyāṇamittā sevitabbāti na evaṃ attho daṭṭhabbo,
atk-s0402a0:358_3: desanāya nāma heṭṭhimena vā paricchedo hoti uparimena vā dvīhipi vā koṭīhi.
atk-s0402a0:358_5: Tasmā kathentena paṭhamaṃ kalyāṇamittaupanissayaṃ dassetvā majjhe vīriyaṃ dassetvā pacchā arahattaṃ kathetabbanti.
atk-s0402a0:360_8: Saddhindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hotīti samiddhattherassa kira arahattamaggakkhaṇe saddhindriyaṃ dhuraṃ ahosi,
atk-s0402a0:360_9: sesāni cattāri sahajātindriyāni tasseva parivārāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0402a0:360_10: Iti thero attanā paṭividdhamaggaṃ kathento evamāha.
atk-s0402a0:360_11: Mahākoṭṭhikattherassa pana arahattamaggakkhaṇe samādhindriyaṃ dhuraṃ ahosi,
atk-s0402a0:360_12: sesāni cattāri indriyāni tasseva parivārāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0402a0:360_13: Tasmā sopi samādhindriyaṃ adhimattanti kathento attanā paṭividdhamaggameva kathesi.
atk-s0402a0:360_14: Sāriputtattherassa pana arahattamaggakkhaṇe paññindriyaṃ dhuraṃ ahosi.
atk-s0402a0:360_15: Sesāni cattāri indriyāni tasseva parivārāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0402a0:360_16: Tasmā sopi paññindriyaṃ adhimattanti kathento attanā paṭividdhamaggameva kathesi.
atk-s0402a0:361_3: Evametasmiṃ sutte tīhipi therehi attanā paṭividdhamaggova kathito,
atk-s0402a0:363_3: Neva vuṭṭhāti tamhā ābādhāti iminā atekicchena vātāpamārādinā rogena samannāgato niṭṭhāpattagilāno kathito.
atk-s0402a0:363_4: Vuṭṭhāti tamhā ābādhāti iminā khipitakakacchutiṇapupphakajarādibhedo appamattaābādho kathito.
atk-s0402a0:363_5: Labhanto sappāyāni bhojanāni no alabhantoti iminā pana yesaṃ paṭijagganena phāsukaṃ hoti,
atk-s0402a0:363_7: Ettha ca patirūpo upaṭṭhāko nāma gilānupaṭṭhākaaṅgehi samannāgato paṇḍito dakkho analaso veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:363_9: Tasmiñhi gilāne attano dhammatāya yāpetuṃ asakkonte bhikkhusaṅghena tassa bhikkhuno eko bhikkhu ca sāmaṇero
atk-s0402a0:363_12: tāva gilānassa ca tesañca dvinnaṃ yenattho,
atk-s0402a0:364_0: Aññepi gilānā upaṭṭhātabbāti itarepi dve gilānā upaṭṭhāpetabbā.
atk-s0402a0:364_5: Na kho pana maṃ paṭijaggantī”ti manopadosaṃ katvā apāye nibbatteyya.
atk-s0402a0:364_6: Paṭijaggiyamānassa panassa evaṃ hoti “bhikkhusaṅghena yaṃ kātabbaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:364_9: So bhikkhusaṅghe mettaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā sagge nibbattissati.
atk-s0402a0:364_10: Yo pana appamattakena byādhinā samannāgato labhantopi alabhantopi vuṭṭhātiyeva,
atk-s0402a0:364_11: tassa vināpi bhesajjena vūpasamanabyādhi bhesajje kate khippataraṃ vūpasammati.
atk-s0402a0:364_12: So tato buddhavacanaṃ vā uggaṇhituṃ sakkhissati,
atk-s0402a0:365_1: Niyāmaṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattanti kusalesu dhammesu magganiyāmasaṅkhātaṃ sammattaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:365_3: Dutiyavārena ugghaṭitaññū gahito sāsane nālakattherasadiso buddhantare ekavāraṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ santike
atk-s0402a0:366_0: Dhammadesanā anuññātāti māsassa aṭṭha vāre dhammakathā anuññātā.
atk-s0402a0:366_1: Aññesampi dhammo desetabboti itaresampi dhammo kathetabbo.
atk-s0402a0:366_3: Padaparamassa hi imasmiṃ attabhāve dhammaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ asakkontassāpi anāgate paccayo bhavissati.
atk-s0402a0:366_4: Yo pana tathāgatassa rūpadassanaṃ labhantopi alabhantopi dhammavinayañca savanāya labhantopi alabhantopi dhammaṃ abhisameti,
atk-s0402a0:366_6: Labhanto pana khippameva abhisamessatīti iminā kāraṇena tesaṃ dhammo desetabbo.
atk-s0402a0:368_3: Abhisaṅkharotīti āyūhati rāsiṃ karoti piṇḍaṃ karoti.
atk-s0402a0:368_6: Sabyābajjhā phassā phusantīti sadukkhā vipākaphassā phusanti.
atk-s0402a0:368_7: Sabyābajjhaṃ vedanaṃ vediyatīti sadukkhaṃ vipākavedanaṃ vediyati,
atk-s0402a0:368_9: Seyyathāpi sattā nerayikāti yathā niraye nibbattasattā ekantadukkhaṃ vedanaṃ vediyanti,
atk-s0402a0:368_11: Kiṃ pana tattha upekkhāvedanā natthīti? Atthi,
atk-s0402a0:368_12: dukkhavedanāya pana balavabhāvena sā abbohārikaṭṭhāne ṭhitā.
atk-s0402a0:368_13: Iti nirayova nirayassa upamaṃ katvā āhaṭo.
atk-s0402a0:369_0: Seyyathāpi devā subhakiṇhāti idhāpi devalokova devalokassa upamaṃ katvā āhaṭo.
atk-s0402a0:369_1: Yasmā pana heṭṭhimesu brahmalokesu sappītikajjhānavipāko vattati,
atk-s0402a0:369_4: Iti ayampi tatra paṭibhāgaupamā nāmāti veditabbā.
atk-s0402a0:370_1: Seyyathāpi manussāti manussānaṃ hi kālena sukhaṃ hoti,
atk-s0402a0:370_6: Tesaṃ hi hīnatarānaṃ mahesakkhatarā devatā disvā āsanā vuṭṭhātabbaṃ hoti,
atk-s0402a0:370_9: añjalikammaṃ kātabbanti taṃ sabbampi dukkhaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0402a0:370_11: Te hi kālena sampattiṃ anubhavanti kālena kammanti vokiṇṇasukhadukkhāva honti.
atk-s0402a0:370_12: Iti imasmiṃ sutte tīṇi sucaritāni lokiyalokuttaramissakāni kathitānīti veditabbāni.
atk-s0402a0:372_6: Saraṇaṃ gato hotīti avassayaṃ gato hoti.
atk-s0402a0:372_9: Idañca pana saraṇagamanaṃ aggahitasaraṇapubbassa akatābhinivesassa vasena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:372_10: Iti imasmiṃ sutte saraṇadāyako sotāpattimaggasampāpako arahattamaggasampāpakoti tayo ācariyā bahukārāti āgatā,
atk-s0402a0:372_11: pabbajjādāyako buddhavacanadāyako kammavācācariyo sakadāgāmimaggasampāpako anāgāmimaggasampāpakoti ime ācariyā na āgatā,
atk-s0402a0:372_18: upari dve maggā ca phalāni ca arahattamaggasannissitānīti veditabbāni.
atk-s0402a0:373_1: Na suppatikāraṃ vadāmīti patikāraṃ kātuṃ na sukaranti vadāmi.
atk-s0402a0:373_2: Abhivādanādīsu anekasatavāraṃ anekasahassavārampi hi pañcapatiṭṭhitena nipatitvā vandanto āsanā vuṭṭhāya
atk-s0402a0:373_3: paccuggacchanto diṭṭhadiṭṭhakkhaṇe añjaliṃ paggaṇhanto anucchavikaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ karonto divase divase
atk-s0402a0:373_4: cīvarasataṃ cīvarasahassaṃ piṇḍapātasataṃ piṇḍapātasahassaṃ dadamāno cakkavāḷapariyantena sabbaratanamayaṃ
atk-s0402a0:373_5: āvāsaṃ karonto sappinavanītādinānappakāraṃ bhesajjaṃ anuppadajjamāno neva sakkoti ācariyena katassa patikāraṃ
atk-s0402a0:375_16: Purāṇavaṇo hi attano dhammatāyeva pubbaṃ lohitaṃ yūsanti imāni tīṇi savati,
atk-s0402a0:376_2: tassa attano dhammatāya savanaṃ viya kodhanassapi attano dhammatāya uddhumātassa viya caṇḍikatassa caraṇaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:376_3: kaṭṭhena vā kaṭhalāya vā ghaṭṭanaṃ viya appamattaṃ vacanaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:376_4: bhiyyosomattāya savanaṃ viya “mādisaṃ nāma esa evaṃ vadatī”ti bhiyyosomattāya uddhumāyanabhāvo daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0402a0:377_3: cakkhumā puriso viya hi yogāvacaro daṭṭhabbo,
atk-s0402a0:377_6: vijjantarikāya cakkhumato purisassa samantā rūpadassanaṃ viya sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe nibbānadassanaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:377_9: vijjantarikāya cakkhumato purisassa samantā rūpadassanaṃ viya sakadāgāmimaggakkhaṇe nibbānadassanaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:377_12: vijjantarikāya cakkhumato purisassa samantā rūpadassanaṃ viya anāgāmimaggakkhaṇe nibbānadassanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:378_3: vajirassa maṇigaṇṭhimpi vā pāsāṇagaṇṭhimpi vā vinivijjhitvā agamanabhāvassa natthitā viya arahattamaggañāṇena acchejjānaṃ kilesānaṃ natthibhāvo,
atk-s0402a0:378_4: vajirena nibbiddhavedhassa puna apatipūraṇaṃ viya arahattamaggena chinnānaṃ kilesānaṃ puna anuppādo daṭṭhabboti.
atk-s0402a0:380_4: Sakkatvā garuṃ katvāti sakkārañceva garukārañca katvā.
atk-s0402a0:380_5: Hīno hoti sīlenātiādīsu upādāyupādāya hīnatā veditabbā.
atk-s0402a0:380_6: Tattha yo hi pañca sīlāni rakkhati,
atk-s0402a0:380_7: so dasa sīlāni rakkhantena na sevitabbo.
atk-s0402a0:380_10: Aññatra anuddayā aññatra anukampāti ṭhapetvā anuddayañca anukampañca.
atk-s0402a0:380_11: Attano atthāyeva hi evarūpo puggalo na sevitabbo,
atk-s0402a0:381_0: Sīlasāmaññagatānaṃ satanti sīlena samānabhāvaṃ gatānaṃ santānaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:381_1: Sīlakathā ca no bhavissatīti evaṃ samānasīlānaṃ amhākaṃ sīlameva ārabbha kathā bhavissati.
atk-s0402a0:381_2: Sā ca no pavattinī bhavissatīti sā ca amhākaṃ kathā divasampi kathentānaṃ pavattissati na paṭihaññissati.
atk-s0402a0:381_3: Sā ca no phāsu bhavissatīti sā ca divasampi pavattamānā sīlakathā amhākaṃ phāsuvihāro sukhavihāro bhavissati.
atk-s0402a0:382_1: Tattha tattha paññāya anuggahessāmīti ettha sīlassa asappāye anupakāradhamme vajjetvā sappāye upakāradhamme
atk-s0402a0:382_2: sevanto tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne sīlakkhandhaṃ paññāya anuggaṇhāti nāma.
atk-s0402a0:382_4: Nihīyatīti attano hīnataraṃ puggalaṃ sevanto khāraparissāvane āsittaudakaṃ viya satataṃ samitaṃ hāyati parihāyati.
atk-s0402a0:382_8: Tasmā attano uttariṃ bhajethāti yasmā seṭṭhaṃ puggalaṃ upanamanto udeti khippaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:384_2: Atha kho nanti atha kho assa.
atk-s0402a0:384_4: Evameva khoti ettha gūthakūpo viya dussīlyaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:384_5: Gūthakūpe patitvā ṭhito dhammaniahi viya dussīlapuggalo.
atk-s0402a0:384_6: Gūthakūpato uddhariyamānena tena ahinā purisassa sarīraṃ āruḷhenāpi adaṭṭhabhāvo viya dussīlaṃ sevamānassāpi tassa kiriyāya akaraṇabhāvo.
atk-s0402a0:384_7: Sarīraṃ gūthena makkhetvā ahinā gatakālo viya dussīlaṃ sevamānassa pāpakittisaddaabbhuggamanakālo veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:385_1: Bhiyyosomattāya cicciṭāyatīti taṃ hi jhāyamānaṃ pakatiyāpi papaṭikāyo muñcantaṃ cicciṭāti “ciṭiciṭā”ti saddaṃ karoti,
atk-s0402a0:385_3: Evameva khoti evamevaṃ kodhano attano dhammatāyapi uddhato caṇḍikato hutvā carati,
atk-s0402a0:385_4: appamattakaṃ pana vacanaṃ sutakāle “mādisaṃ nāma evaṃ vadati evaṃ vadatī”ti atirekataraṃ uddhato caṇḍikato hutvā carati.
atk-s0402a0:385_8: Tasmā evarūpo puggalo ajjhupekkhitabbo na sevitabboti yasmā kodhano atiseviyamāno atiupasaṅkamiyamānopi kujjhatiyeva,
atk-s0402a0:385_10: Tasmā palālaggi viya ajjhupekkhitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo.
atk-s0402a0:385_16: Anupasaṅkamitvā apaṭikkamitvā pana majjhattabhāvena tappantassa sītaṃ vūpasammati,
atk-s0402a0:385_17: tasmā palālaggi viya kodhano puggalo majjhattabhāvena ajjhupekkhitabbo,
atk-s0402a0:385_18: na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo.
atk-s0402a0:388_1: Aṭṭhame gūthabhāṇīti yo gūthaṃ viya duggandhakathaṃ katheti.
atk-s0402a0:388_2: Pupphabhāṇīti yo pupphāni viya sugandhakathaṃ katheti.
atk-s0402a0:388_3: Madhubhāṇīti yo madhu viya madhurakathaṃ katheti.
atk-s0402a0:388_12: Attahetu vā parahetu vāti attano vā parassa vā hatthapādādihetu vā dhanahetu vā.
atk-s0402a0:388_13: Āmisakiñcikkhahetu vāti ettha āmisanti lañjo adhippeto.
atk-s0402a0:388_14: Kiñcikkhanti yaṃ vā taṃ vā appamattakaṃ antamaso tittiriyavaṭṭakasappipiṇḍanavanītapiṇḍādimattakassa lañjassa hetūti attho.
atk-s0402a0:388_15: Sampajānamusā bhāsitā hotīti jānantoyeva musāvādaṃ kattā hoti.
atk-s0402a0:389_6: Atthamadhuratāya sakalasarīre kopaṃ ajanetvā pemaṃ janetīti pemanīyā.
atk-s0402a0:389_7: Hadayaṃ gacchati appaṭihaññamānā sukhena cittaṃ pavisatīti hadayaṅgamā.
atk-s0402a0:389_16: Evarūpī kathā bahuno janassa kantā hotīti bahujanakantā.
atk-s0402a0:389_17: Kantabhāveneva bahuno janassa manāpā cittavuddhikarāti bahujanamanāpā.
atk-s0402a0:391_1: Navame cakkhu na hotīti paññācakkhu na hoti.
atk-s0402a0:391_5: Kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāgeti kaṇhasukkāyeva aññamaññaṃ paṭibāhanato paṭipakkhavasena sappaṭibhāgāti vuccanti.
atk-s0402a0:392_0: Na ceva bhogā tathārūpāti tathājātikā bhogāpissa na honti.
atk-s0402a0:392_1: Na ca puññāni kubbatīti puññāni ca na karoti.
atk-s0402a0:392_2: Ettāvatā bhoguppādanacakkhuno ca puññakaraṇacakkhuno ca abhāvo vutto.
atk-s0402a0:392_3: Ubhayattha kaliggāhoti idhaloke ca paraloke cāti ubhayasmimpi aparaddhaggāho,
atk-s0402a0:392_5: Atha vā ubhayattha kaliggāhoti ubhayesampi diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikānaṃ atthānaṃ kaliggāho,
atk-s0402a0:392_11: musāvādena cūbhayanti theyyādīsu ubhayena pariyesatīti attho. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0402a0:392_20: Na socatīti yasmiṃ ṭhāne antosokena na socati.
atk-s0402a0:394_7: Itissa te dhammaṃ kathentā pubbapaṭṭhapanepi kalyāṇaṃ bhaddakaṃ anavajjameva katvā kathenti,
atk-s0402a0:394_11: Tattha desanāya tāva catuppadikagāthāya paṭhamapadaṃ ādi,
atk-s0402a0:394_18: tato paraṃ eko vā aneke vā majjhaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:394_33: Dve dve vā kayiramāne sīlasamādhayo ādi,
atk-s0402a0:395_3: Parisuddhanti parisuddhaṃ nijjaṭaṃ niggaṇṭhiṃ katvā desenti.
atk-s0402a0:395_4: Brahmacariyaṃ pakāsentīti evaṃ desentā ca seṭṭhacariyabhūtaṃ sikkhattayasaṅgahitaṃ ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ pakāsenti.
atk-s0402a0:395_5: Neva ādiṃ manasi karotīti neva pubbapaṭṭhapanaṃ manasi karoti.
atk-s0402a0:396_2: Evameva khoti ettha kumbho nikujjo viya avakujjapañño puggalo daṭṭhabbo,
atk-s0402a0:396_4: udakassa vivaṭṭanakālo viya tasmiṃ āsane nisinnassa uggahetuṃ asamatthakālo,
atk-s0402a0:396_5: udakassa asaṇṭhānakālo viya vuṭṭhahitvā asallakkhaṇakālo veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:397_2: Evameva khoti ettha ucchaṅgo viya ucchaṅgapañño puggalo daṭṭhabbo,
atk-s0402a0:397_4: ucchaṅge nānākhajjakāni khādantassa nisinnakālo viya tasmiṃ āsane nisinnassa uggaṇhanakālo,
atk-s0402a0:397_5: vuṭṭhahantassa satisammosā pakiraṇakālo viya tasmā āsanā vuṭṭhāya gacchantassa asallakkhaṇakālo veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:398_2: Evameva khoti ettha uparimukho ṭhapito kumbho viya puthupañño puggalo daṭṭhabbo,
atk-s0402a0:398_4: udakassa saṇṭhānakālo viya tattha nisinnassa uggaṇhanakālo,
atk-s0402a0:398_5: no vivaṭṭanakālo viya vuṭṭhāya gacchantassa sallakkhaṇakālo veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:399_3: Seyyo etena vuccatīti etasmā puggalā uttaritaroti vuccati.
atk-s0402a0:399_4: Dhammānudhammappaṭipannoti navalokuttaradhammassa anudhammaṃ saha sīlena pubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno.
atk-s0402a0:399_6: Antakaro siyāti koṭikaro paricchedakaro parivaṭumakaro bhaveyyāti.
atk-s0402a0:401_4: Iti mātāpitupūjakāni kulāni mātāpitūhi sabrahmakānīti pakāsetvā idāni nesaṃ sapubbācariyakādibhāvaṃ pakāsento sapubbācariyakānītiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:401_8: Puttakānaṃ hi mātāpitūhi jīvitaṃ āpāditaṃ pālitaṃ ghaṭitaṃ anuppabandhena pavattitaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:401_9: Posakāti hatthapāde vaḍḍhetvā hadayalohitaṃ pāyetvā posetāro.
atk-s0402a0:401_10: Imassa lokassa dassetāroti puttānaṃ hi imasmiṃ loke iṭṭhāniṭṭhārammaṇassa dassanaṃ nāma mātāpitaro nissāya jātanti imassa lokassa dassetāro nāma.
atk-s0402a0:402_1: Yathā brahmuno catasso bhāvanā avijahitā honti mettā karuṇā muditā upekkhāti,
atk-s0402a0:402_2: evameva mātāpitūnaṃ puttakesu catasso bhāvanā avijahitā honti.
atk-s0402a0:402_4: kucchigatasmiṃ hi dārake “kadā nu kho puttakaṃ arogaṃ paripuṇṇaṅgapaccaṅgaṃ passissāmā”ti mātāpitūnaṃ mettacittaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0402a0:402_5: Yadā panesa mando uttānaseyyako ūkāhi vā maṅkulādīhi pāṇakehi daṭṭho dukkhaseyyāya vā pana pīḷito parodati viravati,
atk-s0402a0:402_6: tadāssa saddaṃ sutvā mātāpitūnaṃ kāruññaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0402a0:402_7: ādhāvitvā vidhāvitvā kīḷanakāle pana lobhanīyavayasmiṃ vā ṭhitakāle dārakaṃ oloketvā mātāpitūnaṃ cittaṃ
atk-s0402a0:402_8: sappimaṇḍe pakkhittasatavihatakappāsapicupaṭalaṃ viya mudukaṃ hoti āmoditaṃ pamoditaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:402_10: Yadā panesa putto dārābharaṇaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā pāṭiyekkaṃ agāraṃ ajjhāvasati,
atk-s0402a0:402_11: tadā mātāpitūnaṃ “sakkoti dāni no puttako attano dhammatāya yāpetu”nti majjhattabhāvo uppajjati,
atk-s0402a0:402_12: tasmiṃ kāle upekkhā labbhatīti iminā kāraṇena “brahmāti mātāpitaro”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:403_0: Pubbācariyāti vuccareti mātāpitaro hi jātakālato paṭṭhāya “evaṃ nisīda,
atk-s0402a0:403_20: Iti sabbepi te pacchācariyā nāma honti,
atk-s0402a0:403_24: Āhuneyyā ca puttānanti puttānaṃ āhutaṃ pāhutaṃ abhisaṅkhataṃ annapānādiṃ arahanti,
atk-s0402a0:403_27: Pajāya anukampakāti paresaṃ pāṇe acchinditvāpi attano pajaṃ paṭijagganti gopāyanti.
atk-s0402a0:404_10: Pādānaṃ dhovanenāti uṇhodakasītodakehi pādadhovanena ceva telamakkhanena ca.
atk-s0402a0:404_12: Sagge pamodatīti idha tāva mātāpitūsu pāricariyaṃ disvā pāricariyakāraṇā taṃ paṇḍitamanussā idheva pasaṃsanti,
atk-s0402a0:404_13: paralokaṃ pana gantvā sagge ṭhito so mātāpituupaṭṭhāko dibbasampattīhi āmodati pamodatīti.
atk-s0402a0:406_3: Imasmiṃ ca saviññāṇaketi ettha attano ca parassa cāti ubhayesampi kāyo saviññāṇakaṭṭhena ekato katvā imasminti vutto.
atk-s0402a0:406_4: Ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānānusayāti ahaṅkāradiṭṭhi ca mamaṅkārataṇhā ca mānānusayo cāti attano ca parassa ca kilesā.
atk-s0402a0:406_12: puggalanimittaṃ dhammanimittanti evarūpesu ca bahiddhā sabbanimittesu.
atk-s0402a0:407_3: Etaṃ santaṃ etaṃ paṇītanti nibbānaṃ dassento āha.
atk-s0402a0:407_4: Nibbānaṃ hi kilesānaṃ santatāya santaṃ nāma,
atk-s0402a0:407_5: nibbānaṃ santanti samāpattiṃ appetvāva divasampi nisinnassa cittuppādo santanteva pavattatītipi santaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:407_6: Paṇītanti samāpattiṃ appetvā nisinnassāpi cittuppādo paṇītanteva pavattatīti nibbānaṃ paṇītaṃ nāma.
atk-s0402a0:407_8: “Sabbasaṅkhārasamatho”ti samāpattiṃ appetvā nisinnassa hi divasabhāgampi cittuppādo sabbasaṅkhārasamathoteva pavattati…pe…
atk-s0402a0:407_9: tathā tīsu bhavesu vānasaṅkhātāya taṇhāya abhāvena nibbānanti laddhanāme tasmiṃ samāpattiṃ appetvā nisinnassa
atk-s0402a0:407_10: cittuppādo nibbānaṃ nibbānanteva pavattatīti sabbasaṅkhārasamathotiādīni nāmāni labhati.
atk-s0402a0:407_11: Imasmiṃ pana aṭṭhavidhe ābhogasamannāhāre imasmiṃ ṭhāne ekopi labbhati,
atk-s0402a0:408_2: Paraattabhāvasakaattabhāvāni hi parāni ca oparāni cāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a0:408_4: Iñjitanti rāgiñjitaṃ dosamohamānadiṭṭhikilesaduccaritiñjitanti imāni satta iñjitāni calitāni phanditāni.
atk-s0402a0:408_12: Jātijaranti ettha jātijarāgahaṇeneva byādhimaraṇampi gahitamevāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:410_4: Aññātāro ca dullabhāti paṭivijjhanakapuggalā pana dullabhā.
