atk-s0402a0:410_5: Idaṃ bhagavā “sāriputtattherassa ñāṇaṃ ghaṭṭemī”ti adhippāyena kathesi.
atk-s0402a0:410_9: ahaṃ tumhehi desitaṃ dhammaṃ nayasatena nayasahassena paṭivijjhissāmi,
atk-s0402a0:410_10: mamesa bhāro hotū”ti satthāraṃ desanāya ussāhento etassa bhagavā kālotiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:411_3: Vivattayi saṃyojananti dasavidhampi saṃyojanaṃ samūlakaṃ ubbattetvā chaḍḍesi.
atk-s0402a0:411_4: Sammā mānābhisamayā antamakāsi dukkhassāti sammā upāyena sammā paṭipattiyā navavidhassa mānassa pahānābhisamayena vaṭṭadukkhassa antamakāsi.
atk-s0402a0:411_9: mayā pārāyane udayapañhe idaṃ phalasamāpattimeva sandhāya etaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:412_2: Udayapañhe ca etaṃ padaṃ “pahānaṃ kāmacchandāna”nti āgataṃ,
atk-s0402a0:412_8: Domanassāna cūbhayanti etāsañca kāmasaññānaṃ cetasikadomanassānañcāti ubhinnampi pahānaṃ paṭippassaddhipahānasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0402a0:412_10: Niddese pana “kāmacchandassa ca domanassassa ca ubhinnaṃ pahānaṃ vūpasamaṃ paṭinissaggaṃ paṭippassaddhiṃ amataṃ nibbāna”nti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:412_19: Thinassa ca panūdanantipi thinassa ca panūdanante uppannattā arahattaphalameva adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:412_20: Kukkuccānaṃ nivāraṇanti kukkuccanivāraṇassa maggassa anantaraṃ uppannattā phalameva adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:413_0: Upekkhāsatisaṃsuddhanti catutthajjhānike phale uppannāya upekkhāya ca satiyā ca saṃsuddhaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:413_10: avijjāya pabhedanasaṅkhātaṃ vā nibbānaṃ ārabbha uppannattā evaṃladdhanāmaṃ arahattaphalameva.
atk-s0402a0:413_11: Iti sabbehipi imehi pahānantiādīhi padehi arahattaphalameva pakāsitanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:415_3: Lobho nidānaṃ kammānaṃ samudayāyāti lubbhanapalubbhanasabhāvo lobho vaṭṭagāmikammānaṃ samudayāya piṇḍakaraṇatthāya nidānaṃ kāraṇaṃ paccayoti attho.
atk-s0402a0:416_7: Yatthassa attabhāvo nibbattatīti yasmiṃ ṭhāne assa lobhajakammavato puggalassa attabhāvo nibbattati,
atk-s0402a0:416_9: Tattha taṃ kammaṃ vipaccatīti tesu khandhesu taṃ kammaṃ vipaccati.
atk-s0402a0:416_10: Diṭṭhe vā dhammetiādi yasmā taṃ kammaṃ diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ vā hoti upapajjavedanīyaṃ vā aparapariyāyavedanīyaṃ vā,
atk-s0402a0:417_2: Avātātapahatānīti na vātena na ca ātapena hatāni.
atk-s0402a0:417_6: Suparikammakatāya bhūmiyāti naṅgalakasanena ceva aṭṭhadantakena ca suṭṭhu parikammakatāya khettabhūmiyā.
atk-s0402a0:418_0: Yaṃ panettha diṭṭhe vā dhammetiādi vuttaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:418_1: tattha asammohatthaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne kammavibhatti nāma kathetabbā.
atk-s0402a0:418_5: yaggarukaṃ yabbahulaṃ yadāsannaṃ kaṭattā vā pana kammaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:418_7: Tattha ekajavanavīthiyaṃ sattasu cittesu kusalā vā akusalā vā paṭhamajavanacetanā diṭṭhadhammavedanīyakammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0402a0:418_8: Taṃ imasmiṃyeva attabhāve vipākaṃ deti kākavaḷiyapuṇṇaseṭṭhīnaṃ viya kusalaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:418_10: Tathā asakkontaṃ pana ahosikammaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0402a0:418_13: Yathā hi migaluddakena migaṃ disvā dhanuṃ ākaḍḍhitvā khitto saro sace na virajjhati,
atk-s0402a0:418_15: atha naṃ migaluddako niccammaṃ katvā khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ chetvā maṃsaṃ ādāya puttadāraṃ tosento gacchati.
atk-s0402a0:418_17: migo palāyitvā puna taṃ disaṃ na oloketi.
atk-s0402a0:418_19: Sarassa avirajjhitvā migavijjhanaṃ viya hi diṭṭhadhammavedanīyassa kammassa vipākavārapaṭilābho,
atk-s0402a0:419_4: Tattha aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī ekāya samāpattiyā brahmaloke nibbattati.
atk-s0402a0:419_5: Pañcannampi ānantariyānaṃ kattā ekena kammena niraye nibbattati,
atk-s0402a0:419_6: sesasamāpattiyo ca kammāni ca ahosikammabhāvaṃyeva āpajjanti,
atk-s0402a0:420_0: Ubhinnaṃ antare pana pañcajavanacetanā aparapariyāyavedanīyakammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0402a0:420_3: Sati saṃsārappavattiyā ahosikammaṃ nāma na hoti.
atk-s0402a0:420_5: Yathā hi sunakhaluddakena migaṃ disvā sunakho vissajjito migaṃ anubandhitvā yasmiṃ ṭhāne pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0402a0:420_7: evamevaṃ idaṃ kammaṃ yasmiṃ ṭhāne okāsaṃ labhati,
atk-s0402a0:421_0: Kusalākusalesu pana garukāgarukesu yaṃ garukaṃ hoti,
atk-s0402a0:421_4: Tasmiṃ sati sesāni kusalāni vā akusalāni vā vipaccituṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0402a0:421_6: Yathā hi sāsapappamāṇāpi sakkharā vā ayaguḷikā vā udakarahade pakkhittā udakapiṭṭhe uplavituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0402a0:422_6: Tadetaṃ yathā nāma dvīsu mallesu yuddhabhūmiṃ otiṇṇesu yo balavā,
atk-s0402a0:422_8: evameva itaraṃ dubbalakammaṃ avattharitvā yaṃ āsevanavasena vā bahulaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:423_0: So kira cūḷaṅgaṇiyayuddhe parājito vaḷavaṃ āruyha palāyi.
atk-s0402a0:423_1: Tassa cūḷupaṭṭhāko tissāmacco nāma ekakova pacchato ahosi.
atk-s0402a0:423_2: So ekaṃ aṭaviṃ pavisitvā nisinno jighacchāya bādhayamānāya –
atk-s0402a0:423_6: mayā sāṭakantare ṭhapetvā ekaṃ suvaṇṇasarakabhattaṃ ābhatanti.
atk-s0402a0:423_15: na me ayyānaṃ adatvā āhāro paribhuttapubbo atthi,
atk-s0402a0:423_24: vissattho kālaṃ ghosehī”ti āha. So “kālo, bhante, kālo,
atk-s0402a0:424_0: Athassa bodhimātumahātissatthero taṃ saddaṃ dibbāya sotadhātuyā sutvā ‘katthāyaṃ saddo’ti taṃ āvajjento
atk-s0402a0:424_1: “ajja duṭṭhagāmaṇiabhayamahārājā yuddhaparājito aṭaviṃ pavisitvā nisinno ekaṃ sarakabhattaṃ cattāro koṭṭhāse
atk-s0402a0:424_2: kāretvā ‘ekakova na paribhuñjissāmī’ti kālaṃ ghosāpesī”ti ñatvā “ajja mayā rañño saṅgahaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0402a0:424_8: Rājā attano koṭṭhāsena saddhiṃ therassa koṭṭhāsaṃ patte pakkhipitvā, “bhante,
atk-s0402a0:424_9: āhāraparissayo nāma mā kadāci hotū”ti vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0402a0:424_10: Tissāmaccopi “mama ayyaputte passante bhuñjituṃ na sakkhissāmī”ti attano koṭṭhāsaṃ therasseva patte ākiri.
atk-s0402a0:424_13: Rājā vaḷavaṃ oloketvā “ayampi attano koṭṭhāsaṃ therasseva patte pakkhipanaṃ paccāsīsatī”ti ñatvā tampi tattheva pakkhipitvā theraṃ vanditvā uyyojesi.
atk-s0402a0:424_14: Thero taṃ bhattaṃ ādāya gantvā ādito paṭṭhāya bhikkhusaṅghassa ālopasaṅkhepena adāsi.
atk-s0402a0:425_3: Thero rañño cittaṃ ñatvā atirekabhattaṃ etesaṃ yāpanamattaṃ katvā pattaṃ ākāse khipi,
atk-s0402a0:425_6: Atha rājā pattaṃ dhovitvā “tucchapattaṃ na pesissāmī”ti uttarisāṭakaṃ mocetvā udakaṃ puñchitvā sāṭakaṃ
atk-s0402a0:425_7: patte ṭhapetvā “patto gantvā mama ayyassa hatthe patiṭṭhātū”ti ākāse khipi.
atk-s0402a0:426_0: Aparabhāge rañño tathāgatassa sarīradhātūnaṃ aṭṭhamabhāgaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā vīsaratanasatikaṃ mahācetiyaṃ
atk-s0402a0:426_2: Athassa mahācetiyassa dakkhiṇapasse nipannassa pañcanikāyavasena bhikkhusaṅghe sajjhāyaṃ karonte chahi
atk-s0402a0:426_3: devalokehi cha rathā āgantvā purato ākāse aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:426_4: Rājā “puññapotthakaṃ āharathā”ti ādito paṭṭhāya puññapotthakaṃ vācāpesi.
atk-s0402a0:426_5: Atha naṃ kiñci kammaṃ na paritosesi.
atk-s0402a0:426_7: Potthakavācako “cūḷaṅgaṇiyayuddhe parājitena te deva aṭaviṃ pavisitvā nisinnena ekaṃ sarakabhattaṃ cattāro
atk-s0402a0:426_8: koṭṭhāse kāretvā bodhimātumahātissattherassa bhikkhā dinnā”ti āha.
atk-s0402a0:426_12: Rājā kālaṃ katvā tusitabhavanato āgataratheva patiṭṭhāya tusitabhavanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0402a0:427_0: Yaṃ pana kusalākusalesu āsannamaraṇe anussarituṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0402a0:427_2: Tadetaṃ yathā nāma gogaṇaparipuṇṇassa vajassa dvāre vivaṭe parabhāge dammagavabalavagavesu santesupi
atk-s0402a0:427_3: yo vajadvārassa āsanno hoti antamaso dubbalajaraggavopi,
atk-s0402a0:427_5: evameva aññesu kusalākusalesu santesupi maraṇakālassa āsannattā vipākaṃ deti.
atk-s0402a0:428_1: madhuaṅgaṇagāme kira eko damiḷadovāriko pātova baḷisaṃ ādāya gantvā macche vadhitvā tayo koṭṭhāse katvā ekena taṇḍulaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0402a0:428_4: Iminā nīhārena paññāsa vassāni pāṇātipātakammaṃ katvā aparabhāge mahallako anuṭṭhānaseyyaṃ upagacchati.
atk-s0402a0:428_5: Tasmiṃ khaṇe girivihāravāsī cūḷapiṇḍapātikatissatthero “mā ayaṃ satto mayi passante nassatū”ti gantvā tassa gehadvāre aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0402a0:428_8: Ahaṃ paññāsa vassāni therassa santikaṃ na gatapubbo,
atk-s0402a0:428_13: Thero “upāsakassa kā sarīrappavattī”ti pucchi. Dubbalo, bhanteti.
atk-s0402a0:428_14: Thero gharaṃ pavisitvā satiṃ uppādetvā “sīlaṃ gaṇhissasī”ti āha. Āma, bhante, dethāti.
atk-s0402a0:428_15: Thero tīṇi saraṇāni datvā pañca sīlāni dātuṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0402a0:428_16: Tassa pañca sīlānīti vacanakāleyeva jivhā papati.
atk-s0402a0:428_19: Nibbattakkhaṇeyeva ca “kiṃ nu kho kammaṃ katvā mayā idaṃ laddha”nti āvajjento theraṃ nissāya laddhabhāvaṃ
atk-s0402a0:428_20: ñatvā devalokato āgantvā theraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0402a0:428_25: sace me ayyo pañca sīlāni adassa,
atk-s0402a0:429_1: So tiṃsa vassāni sotāpattimaggatthāya dvattiṃsākāraṃ sajjhāyitvā “ahaṃ evaṃ dvattiṃsākāraṃ sajjhāyanto obhāsamattampi nibbattetuṃ nāsakkhiṃ,
atk-s0402a0:429_2: buddhasāsanaṃ aniyyānikaṃ bhavissatī”ti diṭṭhivipallāsaṃ patvā kālakiriyaṃ katvā mahāgaṅgāya navausabhiko susumārapeto hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0402a0:429_3: Ekaṃ samayaṃ kacchakatitthena saṭṭhi pāsāṇatthambhasakaṭāni agamaṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:429_4: So sabbepi te goṇe ca pāsāṇe ca khādi.
atk-s0402a0:430_0: Etehi pana tīhi muttaṃ aññāṇavasena kataṃ kaṭattā vā pana kammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0402a0:430_1: Taṃ yathā nāma ummattakena khittadaṇḍaṃ yattha vā tattha vā gacchati,
atk-s0402a0:430_2: evameva tesaṃ abhāve yattha katthaci vipākaṃ deti.
atk-s0402a0:431_0: Janakaṃ nāma ekaṃ paṭisandhiṃ janetvā pavattiṃ na janeti,
atk-s0402a0:431_7: Ekacco hi kusalaṃ katvā sugatibhave nibbattati.
atk-s0402a0:431_8: So tattha ṭhito punappunaṃ kusalaṃ katvā taṃ kammaṃ upatthambhetvā anekāni vassasatasahassāni sugatibhavasmiṃyeva vicarati.
atk-s0402a0:431_10: So tattha ṭhito punappunaṃ akusalaṃ katvā taṃ kammaṃ upatthambhetvā bahūni vassasatasahassāni duggatibhavasmiṃyeva vicarati.
atk-s0402a0:432_3: Upatthambhakaṃ pana vipākaṃ janetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0402a0:432_4: aññena kammena dinnāya paṭisandhiyā janite vipāke uppajjanakasukhadukkhaṃ upatthambheti,
atk-s0402a0:432_6: Upapīḷakaṃ nāma aññena kammena dinnāya paṭisandhiyā janite vipāke uppajjanakasukhadukkhaṃ pīḷeti bādheti,
atk-s0402a0:432_9: kusalakamme vipaccamāne akusalakammaṃ upapīḷakaṃ hutvā tassa vipaccituṃ na deti.
atk-s0402a0:432_10: Akusalakamme vipaccamāne kusalakammaṃ upapīḷakaṃ hutvā tassa vipaccituṃ na deti.
atk-s0402a0:432_11: Yathā vaḍḍhamānakaṃ rukkhaṃ vā gacchaṃ vā lataṃ vā kocideva daṇḍena vā satthena vā bhindeyya vā chindeyya vā,
atk-s0402a0:432_12: atha so rukkho vā gaccho vā latā vā vaḍḍhituṃ na sakkuṇeyya;
atk-s0402a0:432_14: akusalaṃ vā pana vipaccamānaṃ kusalena upapīḷitaṃ vipaccituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0402a0:433_0: Rājagahe kira vātakāḷako paññāsa vassāni coraghātakammaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0402a0:433_2: vātakāḷako mahallako core ghātetuṃ na sakkotī”ti.
atk-s0402a0:433_4: Amaccā naṃ apanetvā aññaṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhapayiṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:433_6: tāva ahatavatthāni vā acchādituṃ surabhipupphāni vā piḷandhituṃ pāyāsaṃ vā bhuñjituṃ ucchādananhāpanaṃ vā paccanubhotuṃ nālattha.
atk-s0402a0:433_7: So “dīgharattaṃ me kiliṭṭhavesena carita”nti “pāyāsaṃ me pacāhī”ti bhariyaṃ āṇāpetvā nhānīyasambhārāni
atk-s0402a0:433_8: gāhāpetvā nhānatitthaṃ gantvā sīsaṃ nhatvā ahatavatthāni acchādetvā gandhe vilimpitvā pupphāni piḷandhitvā
atk-s0402a0:433_9: gharaṃ āgacchanto sāriputtattheraṃ disvā “saṃkiliṭṭhakammato camhi apagato,
atk-s0402a0:433_10: ayyo ca me diṭṭho”ti tuṭṭhamānaso theraṃ gharaṃ netvā navasappisakkaracuṇṇābhisaṅkhatena pāyāsena parivisi.
atk-s0402a0:433_12: So anumodanaṃ sutvā anulomikakhantiṃ paṭilabhitvā theraṃ anugantvā nivattamāno antarāmagge taruṇavacchāya
atk-s0402a0:433_13: gāviyā madditvā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpito gantvā tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbatti.
atk-s0402a0:433_22: natthi nu kho pāpakammassa phalanti. Mā,
atk-s0402a0:433_25: balavakalyāṇamittūpanissayaṃ labhitvā dhammasenāpatissa piṇḍapātaṃ datvā anumodanaṃ sutvā anulomikakhantiṃ paṭilabhitvā so tattha nibbattoti.
atk-s0402a0:436_0: Upaghātakaṃ pana sayaṃ kusalampi akusalampi samānaṃ aññaṃ dubbalakammaṃ ghātetvā tassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā attano vipākassa okāsaṃ karoti.
atk-s0402a0:436_1: Evaṃ pana kammena kate okāse taṃ vipākaṃ uppannaṃ nāma vuccati.
atk-s0402a0:436_4: kusalakammassa vipaccanakāle ekaṃ akusalakammaṃ uṭṭhāya taṃ kammaṃ chinditvā pāteti.
atk-s0402a0:436_5: Akusalakammassapi vipaccanakāle ekaṃ kusalakammaṃ uṭṭhāya taṃ kammaṃ chinditvā pāteti.
atk-s0402a0:437_3: atthekaccāni pāpakāni kammasamādānāni upadhisampattipaṭibāḷhāni na vipaccanti,
atk-s0402a0:437_4: atthekaccāni pāpakāni kammasamādānāni kālasampattipaṭibāḷhāni na vipaccanti,
atk-s0402a0:437_5: atthekaccāni pāpakāni kammasamādānāni payogasampattipaṭibāḷhāni na vipaccanti.
atk-s0402a0:437_6: Atthekaccāni pāpakāni kammasamādānāni gativipattiṃ āgamma vipaccanti,
atk-s0402a0:437_10: Atthekaccāni kalyāṇāni kammasamādānāni gativipattipaṭibāḷhāni na vipaccanti,
atk-s0402a0:437_14: Atthekaccāni kalyāṇāni kammasamādānāni gatisampattiṃ āgamma vipaccanti,
atk-s0402a0:438_3: Gatisampattipaṭibāḷhāni na vipaccantītiādīsu aniṭṭhārammaṇānubhavanārahe kamme vijjamāneyeva sugatibhave
atk-s0402a0:438_4: nibbattassa taṃ kammaṃ gatisampattipaṭibāḷhaṃ na vipaccati nāma.
atk-s0402a0:438_5: Gatisampattiyā patibāhitaṃ hutvā na vipaccatīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:438_6: Yo pana pāpakammena dāsiyā vā kammakāriyā vā kucchiyaṃ nibbattitvā upadhisampanno hoti,
atk-s0402a0:438_8: Athassa sāmikā tassa rūpasampattiṃ disvā “nāyaṃ kiliṭṭhakammassānucchaviko”ti cittaṃ uppādetvā attano
atk-s0402a0:438_9: jātaputtaṃ viya bhaṇḍāgārikādiṭṭhānesu ṭhapetvā sampattiṃ yojetvā pariharanti.
atk-s0402a0:438_10: Evarūpassa kammaṃ upadhisampattipaṭibāḷhaṃ na vipaccati nāma.
atk-s0402a0:438_11: Yo pana paṭhamakappikakālasadise sulabhasampannarasabhojane subhikkhakāle nibbattati,
atk-s0402a0:438_12: tassa vijjamānampi pāpakammaṃ kālasampattipaṭibāḷhaṃ na vipaccati nāma.
atk-s0402a0:438_19: evarūpassa pāpakammaṃ payogasampattipaṭibāḷhaṃ na vipaccati nāma.
atk-s0402a0:439_0: Duggatibhave nibbattassa pana pāpakammaṃ gativipattiṃ āgamma vipaccati nāma.
atk-s0402a0:439_1: Yo pana dāsiyā vā kammakāriyā vā kucchismiṃ nibbatto dubbaṇṇo hoti dussaṇṭhāno,
atk-s0402a0:439_2: “yakkho nu kho manusso nu kho”ti vimatiṃ uppādeti.
atk-s0402a0:439_4: atha naṃ “nāyaṃ aññassa kammassa anucchaviko”ti hatthiṃ vā rakkhāpenti assaṃ vā goṇe vā,
atk-s0402a0:439_8: atha naṃ hatthiassādīnaṃ bhattamāsādīni vā pacāpenti,
atk-s0402a0:439_11: Evarūpassa pāpakammaṃ upadhivipattiṃ āgamma vipaccati nāma.
atk-s0402a0:439_12: Yo pana dubbhikkhakāle vā parihīnasampattikāle vā antarakappe vā nibbattati,
atk-s0402a0:439_13: tassa pāpakammaṃ kālavipattiṃ āgamma vipaccati nāma.
atk-s0402a0:439_14: Yo pana payogaṃ sampādetuṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0402a0:439_17: tassa pāpakammaṃ payogavipattiṃ āgamma vipaccati nāma.
atk-s0402a0:440_0: Yo pana iṭṭhārammaṇānubhavanārahe kamme vijjamāneyeva gantvā duggatibhave nibbattati,
atk-s0402a0:440_1: tassa taṃ kammaṃ gativipattipaṭibāḷhaṃ na vipaccati nāma.
atk-s0402a0:440_2: Yo pana puññānubhāvena rājarājamahāmattādīnaṃ gehe nibbattitvā kāṇo vā hoti kuṇī vā khañjo vā pakkhahato vā,
atk-s0402a0:440_3: tassa oparajjasenāpatibhaṇḍāgārikaṭṭhānādīni na anucchavikānīti na denti.
atk-s0402a0:440_4: Iccassa taṃ puññaṃ upadhivipattipaṭibāḷhaṃ na vipaccati nāma.
atk-s0402a0:440_5: Yo pana dubbhikkhakāle vā parihīnasampattikāle vā antarakappe vā manussesu nibbattati,
atk-s0402a0:440_6: tassa taṃ kalyāṇakammaṃ kālavipattipaṭibāḷhaṃ na vipaccati nāma.
atk-s0402a0:440_7: Yo heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva payogaṃ sampādetuṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0402a0:440_8: tassa kalyāṇakammaṃ payogavipattipaṭibāḷhaṃ na vipaccati nāma.
atk-s0402a0:441_0: Kalyāṇakammena pana sugatibhave nibbattassa taṃ kammaṃ gatisampattiṃ āgamma vipaccati nāma.
atk-s0402a0:441_1: Rājarājamahāmattādīnaṃ kule nibbattitvā upadhisampattiṃ pattassa attabhāvasamiddhiyaṃ ṭhitassa devanagare
atk-s0402a0:441_4: evarūpassa kalyāṇakammaṃ upadhisampattiṃ āgamma vipaccati nāma.
atk-s0402a0:441_5: Yo paṭhamakappikesu vā sulabhannapānakāle vā nibbattati,
atk-s0402a0:441_6: tassa kalyāṇakammaṃ kālasampattiṃ āgamma vipaccati nāma.
atk-s0402a0:441_8: tassa kammaṃ payogasampattiṃ āgamma vipaccati nāma.
atk-s0402a0:443_0: Tattha yaṃ kammaṃ atīte āyūhitaṃ atīteyeva vipākavāraṃ labhi,
atk-s0402a0:443_3: taṃ ahosi kammaṃ ahosi kammavipākoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:443_5: paṭisandhijanakaṃ paṭisandhiṃ rūpajanakaṃ vā rūpaṃ janetuṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0402a0:443_6: taṃ ahosi kammaṃ nāhosi kammavipākoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:443_7: Yaṃ pana atīte āyūhitaṃ etarahi laddhavipākavāraṃ paṭisandhijanakaṃ paṭisandhiṃ janetvā rūpajanakaṃ rūpaṃ janetvā ṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:443_8: taṃ ahosi kammaṃ atthi kammavipākoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:443_9: Yaṃ aladdhavipākavāraṃ paṭisandhijanakaṃ vā paṭisandhiṃ rūpajanakaṃ vā rūpaṃ janetuṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0402a0:443_10: taṃ ahosi kammaṃ natthi kammavipākoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:443_11: Yaṃ pana atīte āyūhitaṃ anāgate vipākavāraṃ labhissati,
atk-s0402a0:443_12: paṭisandhijanakaṃ paṭisandhiṃ rūpajanakaṃ rūpaṃ janetuṃ sakkhissati,
atk-s0402a0:443_13: taṃ ahosi kammaṃ bhavissati kammavipākoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:443_15: paṭisandhijanakaṃ paṭisandhiṃ rūpajanakaṃ vā rūpaṃ janetuṃ na sakkhissati,
atk-s0402a0:443_16: taṃ ahosi kammaṃ na bhavissati kammavipākoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:444_0: Yaṃ pana etarahi āyūhitaṃ etarahiyeva vipākavāraṃ labhati,
atk-s0402a0:444_1: taṃ atthi kammaṃ atthi kammavipākoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:444_2: Yaṃ pana etarahi vipākavāraṃ na labhati,
atk-s0402a0:444_3: taṃ atthi kammaṃ natthi kammavipākoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:444_4: Yaṃ pana etarahi āyūhitaṃ anāgate vipākavāraṃ labhissati,
atk-s0402a0:444_5: paṭisandhijanakaṃ paṭisandhiṃ rūpajanakaṃ rūpaṃ janetuṃ sakkhissati,
atk-s0402a0:444_6: taṃ atthi kammaṃ bhavissati kammavipākoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:444_8: paṭisandhijanakaṃ paṭisandhiṃ rūpajanakaṃ vā rūpaṃ janetuṃ sakkhissati,
atk-s0402a0:444_9: taṃ atthi kammaṃ na bhavissati kammavipākoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:445_2: paṭisandhijanakaṃ paṭisandhiṃ rūpajanakaṃ vā rūpaṃ janessati,
atk-s0402a0:445_3: taṃ bhavissati kammaṃ bhavissati kammavipākoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:445_5: paṭisandhijanakaṃ paṭisandhiṃ rūpajanakaṃ vā rūpaṃ janetuṃ na sakkhissati,
atk-s0402a0:445_6: taṃ bhavissati kammaṃ na bhavissati kammavipākoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:446_0: Iti imāni ceva dvādasa abhidhammapariyāyena vibhattāni ca soḷasa kammāni attano ṭhānā osakkitvā suttantikapariyāyena
atk-s0402a0:446_2: Tānipi tato osakkitvā tīṇiyeva kammāni honti diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:446_7: Yadi hi diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ kammaṃ upapajjavedanīyaṃ vā aparapariyāyavedanīyaṃ vā bhaveyya,
atk-s0402a0:446_9: Sacepi upapajjavedanīyaṃ diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ vā aparapariyāyavedanīyaṃ vā bhaveyya,
atk-s0402a0:446_11: Athāpi aparapariyāyavedanīyaṃ diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ vā upapajjavedanīyaṃ vā bhaveyya,
atk-s0402a0:447_1: Ettha pana lobhe vigateti lobhe apagate niruddhe.
atk-s0402a0:447_3: matthakacchinnatālo viya puna aviruḷhisabhāvaṃ katanti attho.
atk-s0402a0:447_8: Evameva khoti ettha bījāni viya kusalākusalaṃ kammaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:447_11: aggiṃ datvā bījānaṃ ḍahanakālo viya maggañāṇena kilesānaṃ daḍḍhakālo,
atk-s0402a0:447_12: masikatakālo viya pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ chinnamūlake katvā ṭhapitakālo,
atk-s0402a0:447_13: mahāvāte opunitvā nadiyā vā pavāhetvā appavattikatakālo viya upādinnakasantānassa nirodhena chinnamūlakānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:447_14: pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ appaṭisandhikabhāvena nirujjhitvā puna bhavasmiṃ paṭisandhiṃ aggahitakālo veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:448_2: yaṃ so avidū andhabālo lobhajañca dosajañca mohajañcāti kammaṃ karoti,
atk-s0402a0:448_3: evaṃ karontena yaṃ tena pakataṃ kammaṃ appaṃ vā yadi vā bahuṃ.
atk-s0402a0:448_4: Idheva taṃ vedaniyanti taṃ kammaṃ tena bālena idha sake attabhāveyeva vedanīyaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:448_6: Vatthuṃ aññaṃ na vijjatīti tassa kammassa vipaccanatthāya aññaṃ vatthu natthi.
atk-s0402a0:448_7: Na hi aññena kataṃ kammaṃ aññassa attabhāve vipaccati.
atk-s0402a0:448_9: mohajañcāpi viddasūti tasmā yo vidū medhāvī paṇḍito taṃ lobhajādibhedaṃ kammaṃ na karoti,
atk-s0402a0:448_12: arahattamaggavijjaṃ uppādetvā taṃ vā pana vijjaṃ uppādento sabbā duggatiyo jahati.
atk-s0402a0:448_16: etthāpi lobhadosasīsena lobhajañca dosajañca kammameva niddiṭṭhanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:450_4: Athāti evaṃ gunnaṃ gamanamaggaṃ ujuṃ mahāpathaṃ nissāya siṃsapāvane sayaṃ patitapaṇṇāni saṅkaḍḍhitvā
atk-s0402a0:450_5: katasanthare sugatamahācīvaraṃ pattharitvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisinne tathāgate.
atk-s0402a0:450_6: Hatthako āḷavakoti hatthato hatthaṃ gatattā evaṃladdhanāmo āḷavako rājaputto.
atk-s0402a0:450_9: Kasmā pana sammāsambuddho taṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā nisinno,
atk-s0402a0:450_11: Sammāsambuddho tāva aṭṭhuppattikāya dhammadesanāya samuṭṭhānaṃ disvā tattha nisinno,
atk-s0402a0:450_12: rājakumāropi pātova uṭṭhāya pañcahi upāsakasatehi parivuto buddhupaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanto mahāmaggā okkamma
atk-s0402a0:450_13: gopathaṃ gahetvā “buddhānaṃ pūjanatthāya missakamālaṃ ocinissāmī”ti gacchanto satthāraṃ disvā upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0402a0:451_5: Gokaṇṭakahatāti navavuṭṭhe deve gāvīnaṃ akkantakkantaṭṭhāne khurantarehi kaddamo uggantvā tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0402a0:451_6: so vātātapena sukkho kakacadantasadiso hoti dukkhasamphasso.
atk-s0402a0:451_10: Verambho vāto vāyatīti catūhi disāhi vāyanto vāto vāyati.
atk-s0402a0:451_11: Ekāya disāya vā dvīhi vā disāhi tīhi vā disāhi vāyanto vāto verambhoti na vuccati.
atk-s0402a0:452_0: Tena hi rājakumārāti idaṃ satthā “ayaṃ rājakumāro lokasmiṃ neva sukhavāsino,
atk-s0402a0:452_2: jānāpessāmi na”nti upari desanaṃ vaḍḍhento āha.
atk-s0402a0:452_3: Tattha yathā te khameyyāti yathā tuyhaṃ rucceyya.
atk-s0402a0:452_9: Taṃ kira paccattharaṇaṃ setavatthassa upari kadalimigacammaṃ attharitvā sibbitvā karonti.
atk-s0402a0:452_12: Ubhatolohitakūpadhānoti sīsūpadhānañca pādūpadhānañcāti pallaṅkassa ubhato ṭhapitalohitakūpadhāno.
atk-s0402a0:452_14: Manāpena paccupaṭṭhitā assūti manāpena upaṭṭhānavidhānena paccupaṭṭhitā bhaveyyuṃ.
atk-s0402a0:453_2: So rāgo tathāgatassa pahīnoti tathārūpo rāgo tathāgatassa pahīnoti attho.
atk-s0402a0:454_2: Na limpati kāmesūti vatthukāmesu ca kilesakāmesu ca taṇhādiṭṭhilepehi na limpati.
atk-s0402a0:454_5: Sabbā āsattiyo chetvāti āsattiyo vuccanti taṇhāyo,
atk-s0402a0:454_6: tā sabbāpi rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu āsattavisattā āsattiyo chinditvā.
atk-s0402a0:454_7: Vineyya hadaye daranti hadayanissitaṃ darathaṃ vinayitvā vūpasametvā.
atk-s0402a0:454_8: Santiṃ pappuyya cetasoti cittassa kilesanibbānaṃ pāpuṇitvā.
atk-s0402a0:456_5: Jiṇṇabyādhimatā hi saṃvegajananaṭṭhena “idāni te maccusamīpaṃ gantabba”nti codenti viya,
atk-s0402a0:456_8: Yathā hi alaṅkatapaṭiyattāya devatāya ākāse ṭhatvā “tvaṃ asukadivase marissasī”ti vutte tassā vacanaṃ saddhātabbaṃ hoti;
atk-s0402a0:456_9: evamevaṃ jiṇṇabyādhimatāpi dissamānā “tvampi evaṃdhammo”ti codenti viya,
atk-s0402a0:456_10: tesañca taṃ vacanaṃ anaññathābhāvitāya devatāya byākaraṇasadisameva hotīti devā viya dūtāti devadūtā.
atk-s0402a0:456_12: Sabbabodhisattā hi jiṇṇabyādhimatapabbajite disvāva saṃvegaṃ āpajjitvā nikkhamma pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:457_2: Iminā hi kammena ayaṃ satto niraye nibbattati,
atk-s0402a0:457_3: atha naṃ tattha yamo rājā devadūte samanuyuñjati.
atk-s0402a0:457_4: Tattha kāyena duccaritaṃ caratīti kāyadvārena tividhaṃ duccaritaṃ carati.
atk-s0402a0:458_2: nirayapālāti ettha ekacce therā “nirayapālā nāma natthi,
atk-s0402a0:458_3: yantarūpaṃ viya kammameva kāraṇaṃ kāretī”ti vadanti.
atk-s0402a0:458_5: Atthi ca kāraṇikā”tiādinā nayena abhidhamme paṭisedhitameva.
atk-s0402a0:458_13: catūsu pana dvāresu cattāro janā honti.
atk-s0402a0:458_19: Abrahmaññoti ettha ca khīṇāsavā brāhmaṇā nāma,
atk-s0402a0:459_3: Nāddasanti attano santike pahitassa kassaci devadūtassa abhāvaṃ sandhāya evaṃ vadati.
atk-s0402a0:460_0: Atha naṃ yamo “nāyaṃ bhāsitassa atthaṃ sallakkhetī”ti ñatvā atthaṃ sallakkhāpetukāmo ambhotiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:460_17: Parato byādhidhammo maraṇadhammoti padadvayepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0402a0:461_0: Paṭhamaṃ devadūtaṃ samanuyuñjitvāti ettha jarājiṇṇasatto atthato evaṃ vadati nāma –
atk-s0402a0:461_2: ahampi tumhe viya taruṇo ahosiṃ ūrubalī bāhubalī javasampanno,
atk-s0402a0:461_4: vijjamānāpi me hatthapādā hatthapādakiccaṃ na karonti,
atk-s0402a0:461_10: Iti tassā pure āgamanāva kalyāṇaṃ karothā”ti.
atk-s0402a0:462_0: Dutiyaṃ devadūtanti etthapi gilānasatto atthato evaṃ vadati nāma –
atk-s0402a0:462_6: Vijjamānāpi me hatthapādā hatthapādakiccaṃ na karonti,
atk-s0402a0:462_12: Iti tassa pure āgamanāva kalyāṇaṃ karothā”ti.
atk-s0402a0:463_3: Bhastā viya vāyunā uddhaṃ jīvitapariyādānā yathākkamaṃ samuggatena sūnabhāvena uddhumātattā uddhumātakaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:463_9: paribhinnaṭṭhāne hi paggharitena pubbena palimakkhitanti attho.
atk-s0402a0:464_0: Tatiyaṃ devadūtanti ettha matakasatto atthato evaṃ vadati nāma –
atk-s0402a0:464_8: Iti tassa pure āgamanāva kalyāṇaṃ karothā”ti.
atk-s0402a0:465_6: Yathā hi sabhaṇḍaṃ coraṃ gahetvā kattabbameva karonti na vinicchinanti.
atk-s0402a0:466_0: Tattha dīghajayantadamiḷo nāma attano dhammatāya sari.
atk-s0402a0:466_1: So kira damiḷo sumanagirimahāvihāre ākāsacetiyaṃ rattapaṭena pūjesi,
atk-s0402a0:466_2: atha niraye ussadasāmante nibbatto aggijālasaddaṃ sutvāva attanā pūjitapaṭaṃ anussari,
atk-s0402a0:466_4: Aparopi puttassa daharabhikkhuno khalisāṭakaṃ dento pādamūle ṭhapesi,
atk-s0402a0:466_6: sopi ussadasāmante nibbatto jālasaddena taṃ sāṭakaṃ anussaritvā sagge nibbatto.
atk-s0402a0:466_7: Evaṃ tāva attano dhammatāya kusalaṃ kammaṃ saritvā sagge nibbattatīti.
atk-s0402a0:467_0: Attano dhammatāya asarante pana tayo devadūte pucchati.
atk-s0402a0:467_4: Taṃ yamo rājā disvā sayaṃ sāreti.
atk-s0402a0:467_5: Eko kira amacco sumanapupphakumbhena mahācetiyaṃ pūjetvā yamassa pattiṃ adāsi,
atk-s0402a0:467_6: taṃ akusalakammena niraye nibbattaṃ yamassa santikaṃ nayiṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:467_7: Tasmiṃ tīhipi devadūtehi kusalaṃ asarante yamo sayaṃ olokento disvā –
atk-s0402a0:467_8: “nanu tvaṃ mahācetiyaṃ sumanapupphakumbhena pūjetvā mayhaṃ pattiṃ adāsī”ti sāresi,
atk-s0402a0:467_9: so tasmiṃ kāle saritvā devalokaṃ gato.
atk-s0402a0:467_11: “mahādukkhaṃ nāma anubhavissati ayaṃ satto”ti tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0402a0:468_0: Tattaṃ ayokhilanti tigāvutaṃ attabhāvaṃ sampajjalitāya lohapathaviyā uttānakaṃ nipajjāpetvā dakkhiṇahatthe tālappamāṇaṃ ayasūlaṃ pavesenti,
atk-s0402a0:468_3: evaṃ urenapi vāmapassenapi dakkhiṇapassenapi nipajjāpetvā te taṃ kammakāraṇaṃ karontiyeva.
atk-s0402a0:468_4: Saṃvesetvāti jalitāya lohapathaviyā tigāvutaṃ attabhāvaṃ nipajjāpetvā.
atk-s0402a0:468_5: Kuṭhārīhīti mahatīhi gehassa ekapakkhacchadanamattāhi kuṭhārīhi tacchanti,
atk-s0402a0:468_9: Tacchantā pana suttāhataṃ karitvā dāruṃ viya aṭṭhaṃsampi chaḷaṃsampi karonti.
atk-s0402a0:468_11: Rathe yojetvāti saddhiṃ yugayottapakkharathacakkakubbarapājanehi sabbato pajjalite rathe yojetvā.
atk-s0402a0:468_14: Sakimpi uddhanti supakkuthitāya ukkhaliyā pakkhittataṇḍulā viya uddhamadhotiriyañca gacchati.
atk-s0402a0:469_5: yathā taṃ samantā yojanasate ṭhatvā olokentassa akkhīni yamakagoḷakā viya nikkhamanti.
atk-s0402a0:470_2: Jātimaraṇasambhaveti jātiyā ca maraṇassa ca kāraṇabhūte.
atk-s0402a0:470_5: Diṭṭhadhammābhinibbutāti diṭṭhadhamme imasmiṃyeva attabhāve sabbakilesanibbānena nibbutā.
atk-s0402a0:472_2: Imaṃ lokaṃ anuvicarantīti aṭṭhamīdivase kira sakko devarājā cattāro mahārājāno āṇāpeti – “tātā,
atk-s0402a0:472_3: ajja aṭṭhamīdivase manussalokaṃ anuvicaritvā puññāni karontānaṃ nāmagottaṃ uggaṇhitvā āgacchathā”ti.
atk-s0402a0:472_6: manussalokaṃ vicaritvā puññakārakānaṃ nāmagottāni suvaṇṇapaṭṭe likhitvā ānethā”ti.
atk-s0402a0:472_12: Tattha uposathaṃ upavasantīti māsassa aṭṭhavāre uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhahanti.
atk-s0402a0:472_14: Taṃ karontā ekasmiṃ addhamāse catunnaṃ uposathadivasānaṃ paccuggamanānuggamanavasena karonti.
atk-s0402a0:472_22: Te evaṃ anuvicaritvā puññakammakārakānaṃ nāmagottāni sovaṇṇamaye paṭṭe likhitvā āharitvā catunnaṃ mahārājānaṃ denti.
atk-s0402a0:472_23: Puttā imaṃ lokaṃ anuvicarantīti catūhi mahārājehi purimanayeneva pahitattā anuvicaranti.
atk-s0402a0:473_2: appakā hontīti catunnaṃ mahārājānaṃ amaccā pārisajjā tā tā gāmanigamarājadhāniyo upasaṅkamanti,
atk-s0402a0:473_3: tato taṃ upanissāya adhivatthā devatā “mahārājānaṃ amaccā āgatā”ti paṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā tesaṃ santikaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0402a0:473_4: Te paṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā “kacci nu kho mārisā bahū manussā matteyyā”ti vuttanayena manussānaṃ puññapaṭipattiṃ pucchitvā “āma, mārisa,
atk-s0402a0:473_5: imasmiṃ gāme asuko ca asuko ca puññāni karontī”ti vutte tesaṃ nāmagottaṃ likhitvā aññattha gacchanti.
atk-s0402a0:473_6: Atha cātuddasiyaṃ catunnaṃ mahārājānaṃ puttāpi tameva suvaṇṇapaṭṭaṃ gahetvā teneva nayena anuvicarantā nāmagottāni likhanti.
atk-s0402a0:473_7: Tadahuposathe pannarase cattāropi mahārājāno teneva nayena tasmiṃyeva suvaṇṇapaṭṭe nāmagottāni likhanti.
atk-s0402a0:473_14: Devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānanti paṭhamaṃ abhinibbatte tettiṃsa devaputte upādāya evaṃladdhanāmānaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:473_15: Tesaṃ pana uppattikathā dīghanikāye sakkapañhasuttavaṇṇanāya vitthāritā.
atk-s0402a0:473_19: kāyā parihāyissantīti navanavānaṃ devaputtānaṃ apātubhāvena devakāyā parihāyissanti,
atk-s0402a0:473_22: Iminā “mayaṃ paripuṇṇe devanagare devasaṅghamajjhe nakkhattaṃ kīḷituṃ na labhissāmā”ti anattamanā honti.
atk-s0402a0:474_2: sakko devānamindoti attano sakkadevarājakālaṃ sandhāya katheti.
atk-s0402a0:474_3: Ekassa vā sakkassa ajjhāsayaṃ gahetvā kathetīti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:475_0: Pāṭihāriyapakkhañcāti ettha pāṭihāriyapakkho nāma antovasse temāsaṃ nibaddhuposatho,
atk-s0402a0:475_1: taṃ asakkontassa dvinnaṃ pavāraṇānaṃ antare ekamāsaṃ nibaddhuposatho,
atk-s0402a0:475_2: tampi asakkontassa paṭhamapavāraṇato paṭṭhāya eko addhamāso pāṭihāriyapakkhoyeva nāma.
atk-s0402a0:475_4: Yopissa mādiso naroti yopi satto mādiso bhaveyya.
atk-s0402a0:475_5: Sakkopi kira vuttappakārassa uposathakammassa guṇaṃ jānitvā dve devalokasampattiyo pahāya māsassa aṭṭha vāre uposathaṃ upavasati.
atk-s0402a0:475_8: yopissa mādiso naroti yopi satto mādiso assa,
atk-s0402a0:475_9: mayā pattaṃ sampattiṃ pāpuṇituṃ iccheyyāti attho.
atk-s0402a0:475_10: Sakkā hi evarūpena uposathakammena sakkasampattiṃ pāpuṇitunti ayamettha adhippāyo.
atk-s0402a0:476_1: Katakaraṇīyoti catūhi maggehi kattabbakiccaṃ katvā ṭhito.
atk-s0402a0:476_5: Parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojanoti yena saṃyojanena baddho bhavesu ākaḍḍhīyati,
atk-s0402a0:476_7: Sammadaññā vimuttoti hetunā nayena kāraṇena jānitvā vimutto.
atk-s0402a0:477_0: Yopissa mādiso naroti yopi mādiso khīṇāsavo assa,
atk-s0402a0:477_1: sopi evarūpaṃ uposathaṃ upavaseyyāti uposathakammassa guṇaṃ jānanto evaṃ vadeyya.
atk-s0402a0:477_2: Aparo nayo yopissa mādiso naroti yopi satto mādiso assa,
atk-s0402a0:477_3: mayā pattaṃ sampattiṃ pāpuṇituṃ iccheyyāti attho.
atk-s0402a0:477_4: Sakkā hi evarūpena uposathakammena khīṇāsavasampattiṃ pāpuṇitunti ayamettha adhippāyo.
atk-s0402a0:479_4: Imaṃ bhagavā kapilapure nibbattakālato paṭṭhāya niddukkhabhāvaṃ gahetvā āha,
atk-s0402a0:479_5: cariyakāle pana tena anubhūtadukkhassa anto natthīti.
atk-s0402a0:479_11: Evaṃ itarāpi dve padumapuṇḍarīkavanehi sañchannā honti.
atk-s0402a0:479_12: Bodhisattassa kira sattaṭṭhavassikakāle rājā amacce pucchi –
atk-s0402a0:479_15: Tato rājā kuddālakammakārake sannipātetvā pokkharaṇiṭṭhānāni gaṇhāpesi.
atk-s0402a0:479_16: Atha sakko devarājā āvajjento taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā –
atk-s0402a0:479_30: devā”ti vissakammadevaputto sakkassa paṭissutvā rattibhāge otaritvā rañño gāhāpitapokkharaṇiṭṭhānesuyeva teneva niyāmena pokkharaṇiyo māpesi.
atk-s0402a0:480_2: So kira tāsu pokkharaṇīsu tattha tattha suvaṇṇarajatamaṇipavāḷamayā khuddakanāvāyo māpetvā “etā kalalakaddamapūritā ca hontu,
atk-s0402a0:480_7: Evaṃ tā māpetvā vissakammo devapurameva gato.
atk-s0402a0:480_8: Tato vibhātāya rattiyā mahājano disvā “mahāpurissassa māpitā bhavissantī”ti gantvā rañño ārocesi.
atk-s0402a0:480_9: Rājā mahājanaparivāro gantvā pokkharaṇiyo disvā “mama puttassa puññiddhiyā devatāhi māpitā bhavissantī”ti attamano ahosi.
atk-s0402a0:481_3: Na kho panassāhanti na kho panassa ahaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:481_9: Ettha hi suiti ca tanti ca nipātamattaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:481_13: Setacchattaṃ dhārīyatīti mānusakasetacchattampi dibbasetacchattampi uparidhāritameva hoti.
atk-s0402a0:481_14: Mā naṃ phusi sītaṃ vāti mā etaṃ bodhisattaṃ sītaṃ vā uṇhādīsu vā aññataraṃ phusatūti attho.
atk-s0402a0:482_0: Tayo pāsādā ahesunti bodhisatte kira soḷasavassuddesike jāte suddhodanamahārājā “puttassa vasanakapāsāde
atk-s0402a0:482_1: kāressāmī”ti vaḍḍhakino sannipātāpetvā bhaddakena nakkhattamuhuttena navabhūmikataparikammaṃ kāretvā
atk-s0402a0:483_3: Cittakammampi karontā tattha tattha pajjalite aggikkhandheyeva akaṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:483_6: Vātapānāni uṇhaggāhāpanatthaṃ divā vivaṭāni rattiṃ pihitāni honti.
atk-s0402a0:484_1: Sītautuggāhāpanatthaṃ panettha bhūmiyo uccā asambādhā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0402a0:484_6: Vātapānasamīpesu cettha nava cāṭiyo ṭhapetvā udakassa pūretvā nīluppalādīhi sañchādenti.
atk-s0402a0:484_8: yehi deve vassante viya udakadhārā nikkhamanti.
atk-s0402a0:484_9: Antopāsāde tattha tattha kalalapūrā doṇiyo ṭhapetvā pañcavaṇṇāni padumāni ropayiṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:484_10: Pāsādamatthake sukkhamahiṃsacammaṃ bandhitvā yantaṃ parivattetvā yāva chadanapiṭṭhiyā pāsāṇe āropetvā tasmiṃ vissajjenti.
atk-s0402a0:484_11: Tesaṃ camme pavaṭṭantānaṃ saddo meghagajjitaṃ viya hoti.
atk-s0402a0:484_12: Dvāravātapānāni panettha divā pihitāni honti rattiṃ vivaṭāni.
atk-s0402a0:485_1: Bhūmiyo panettha dvinnampi utūnaṃ gāhāpanatthāya nātiuccā nātinīcā akaṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:485_7: Ekacce dvāravātapānā rattiṃ vivaṭā divā pihitā,
atk-s0402a0:486_13: Rājā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā puttassa santikaṃ gantvā ārocesi.
atk-s0402a0:486_21: Mahāpuriso dhanuṃ āharāpetvā pallaṅke nisinnova jiyaṃ pādaṅguṭṭhake veṭhetvā kaḍḍhanto pādaṅguṭṭhakeneva
atk-s0402a0:486_22: dhanuṃ āropetvā vāmena hatthena daṇḍe gahetvā dakkhiṇena hatthena kaḍḍhitvā jiyaṃ pothesi.
atk-s0402a0:486_24: “Kiṃ saddo eso”ti ca vutte “devo gajjatī”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:486_27: aṅgīrasassa kumārassa sahassathāmadhanuṃ āropetvā jiyaṃ pothentassa jiyappahārasaddo eso”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:487_2: Taṃ vinivijjhitvā “aññaṃ kiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti āha.
atk-s0402a0:487_4: Taṃ vinivijjhitvā “aññaṃ kiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti āha.
atk-s0402a0:487_8: Taṃ vinivijjhitvā “aññaṃ kiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti āha.
atk-s0402a0:487_10: Tampi vinivijjhitvā “aññaṃ kiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti āha.
atk-s0402a0:487_12: Mahāsatto vālikasakaṭampi palālasakaṭampi vinivijjhitvā udake ekusabhappamāṇaṃ kaṇḍaṃ pesesi,
atk-s0402a0:487_14: Atha naṃ “idāni vātiṅgaṇasaññāya vālaṃ vijjhituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:487_23: tātāti yojanamatthake vātiṅgaṇasaññāya vālaṃ bandhāpetvā rattandhakāre meghapaṭalacchannāsu disāsu kaṇḍaṃ khipi,
atk-s0402a0:487_24: taṃ gantvā yojanamatthake vālaṃ phāletvā pathaviṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0402a0:487_26: taṃ divasaṃ pana mahāsatto loke vattamānasippaṃ sabbameva sandassesi.
atk-s0402a0:487_27: Sakyarājāno attano attano dhītaro alaṅkaritvā pesayiṃsu,
atk-s0402a0:487_29: Mahāpuriso tīsu pāsādesu devo maññe paricārento mahāsampattiṃ anubhavati.
atk-s0402a0:488_5: Rājā kira “tathārūpaṃ issariyasukhasampattiṃ anubhavamānassa purisaṃ disvā parisaṅkā uppajjati,
atk-s0402a0:488_6: sā me puttassa mā ahosī”ti sabbakiccesu itthiyova ṭhapesi.
atk-s0402a0:488_8: Na heṭṭhāpāsādaṃ orohāmīti pāsādato heṭṭhā na otarāmi.
atk-s0402a0:488_9: Iti maṃ cattāro māse añño sikhābaddho puriso nāma passituṃ nālattha.
atk-s0402a0:488_11: Dāsakammakaraporisassāti dāsānañceva devasikabhattavetanābhatānaṃ kammakarānañca nissāya jīvamānapurisānañca.
atk-s0402a0:489_1: Evarūpena ca sukhumālenāti evaṃjātikena ca niddukkhabhāvena.
atk-s0402a0:489_3: Evaṃ tathāgato ettakena ṭhānena attano sirisampattiṃ kathesi.
atk-s0402a0:489_5: “evarūpāyapi pana sampattiyā ṭhito pamādaṃ akatvā appamattova ahosi”nti appamādalakkhaṇasseva dīpanatthaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0402a0:489_11: Jigucchatīti asuciṃ viya disvā jigucchaṃ uppādeti.
atk-s0402a0:489_12: Attānaṃyeva atisitvāti jarādhammampi samānaṃ attānaṃ atikkamitvā aṭṭīyati harāyatīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:489_23: Tato paṭṭhāya yāva arahattā antarā mahāsattassa yobbanamado nāma na uppajjati.
atk-s0402a0:489_25: Ettha pana ārogyamadoti ahaṃ nirogoti ārogyaṃ nissāya uppajjanako mānamado.
atk-s0402a0:489_26: Jīvitamadoti ahaṃ ciraṃ jīvīti taṃ nissāya uppajjanako mānamado.
atk-s0402a0:490_1: Tathāsantāti yathā santā eva aviparītabyādhiādisabhāvāva hutvāti attho.
atk-s0402a0:490_3: Mama evaṃ vihārinoti mayhaṃ evaṃ jigucchāvihārena viharantassa evaṃ jigucchanaṃ nappatirūpaṃ bhaveyya nānucchavikaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:490_4: Sohaṃ evaṃ viharantoti so ahaṃ evaṃ paraṃ jigucchamāno viharanto,
atk-s0402a0:490_6: Ñatvā dhammaṃ nirūpadhinti sabbūpadhivirahitaṃ nibbānadhammaṃ ñatvā.
atk-s0402a0:490_7: Sabbe made abhibhosmīti sabbe tayopi made abhibhaviṃ samatikkamiṃ.
atk-s0402a0:490_8: Nekkhamme daṭṭhu khematanti nibbāne khemabhāvaṃ disvā.
atk-s0402a0:490_11: Tassa me ahu ussāhoti tassa mayhaṃ taṃ nekkhammasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānaṃ abhipassantassa ussāho ahu,
atk-s0402a0:490_14: kāmāni paṭisevitunti ahaṃ dāni duvidhepi kāme paṭisevituṃ abhabbo.
atk-s0402a0:490_15: Anivatti bhavissāmīti pabbajjato ca sabbaññutaññāṇato ca na nivattissāmi,
atk-s0402a0:490_18: Iti imāhi gāthāhi mahābodhipallaṅke attano āgamanīyavīriyaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0402a0:492_2: Attādhipateyyantiādīsu attānaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā nibbattitaṃ guṇajātaṃ attādhipateyyaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:492_4: Navavidhaṃ lokuttaradhammaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā nibbattitaṃ dhammādhipateyyaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:492_20: Passaddho kāyoti nāmakāyo ca karajakāyo ca passaddho vūpasantadaratho.
atk-s0402a0:492_22: Samāhitaṃ cittanti ārammaṇe cittaṃ sammā āhitaṃ suṭṭhu ṭhapitaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:492_25: Suddhaṃ attānaṃ pariharatīti suddhaṃ nimmalaṃ katvā attānaṃ pariharati paṭijaggati,
atk-s0402a0:492_27: Ayañca yāva arahattamaggā pariyāyena suddhamattānaṃ pariharati nāma,
atk-s0402a0:493_1: Jānaṃ passaṃ viharantīti taṃ dhammaṃ jānantā passantā viharanti.
atk-s0402a0:493_4: tīṇi ādhipateyyānīti ettāvatā tīṇi ādhipateyyāni lokiyalokuttaramissakāni kathitāni.
atk-s0402a0:494_2: saccaṃ vā yadi vā musāti yaṃ tvaṃ karosi,
atk-s0402a0:494_3: taṃ yadi vā yathāsabhāvaṃ yadi vā no yathāsabhāvanti tava attāva jānāti.
atk-s0402a0:494_4: Iminā ca kāraṇena veditabbaṃ “pāpakammaṃ karontassa loke paṭicchannaṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthī”ti.
atk-s0402a0:494_7: Attānaṃ parigūhasīti yathā me attāpi na jānāti,
atk-s0402a0:494_17: Yo ca phusī jātikkhayaṃ padhānavāti yo jhāyī padhānavā māraṃ abhibhavitvā jātikkhayaṃ arahattaṃ phusi.
atk-s0402a0:494_19: Lokavidūti tayo loke vidite pākaṭe katvā ṭhito.
atk-s0402a0:494_21: Sabbesu dhammesu atammayo munīti sabbe tebhūmakadhamme taṇhāsaṅkhātāya tammayatāya abhāvena atammayo
atk-s0402a0:494_22: khīṇāsavamuni kadāci katthaci na hīyati na parihīyatīti vuttaṃ hotīti.
atk-s0402a0:496_4: Saddhāya sammukhībhāvāti yadi hi saddhā na bhaveyya,
atk-s0402a0:496_8: Tesaṃ pana sammukhībhāvena sakkā kātunti tasmā “saddhāya sammukhībhāvā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:496_9: Ettha ca dve dhammā sulabhā deyyadhammā ceva dakkhiṇeyyā ca,
atk-s0402a0:496_11: Puthujjanassa hi saddhā athāvarā padavārena nānā hoti,
atk-s0402a0:496_12: teneva mahāmoggallānasadisopi aggasāvako pāṭibhogo bhavituṃ asakkonto āha –
atk-s0402a0:498_4: Assaddho hi satakkhattuṃ hatthe dhovitvāpi malinahatthova hoti,
atk-s0402a0:498_9: Dānasaṃvibhāgaratoti dānaṃ dadanto saṃvibhāgañca karonto dānasaṃvibhāgarato nāma hoti.
atk-s0402a0:499_0: Dassanakāmo sīlavatanti dasapi yojanāni vīsampi tiṃsampi yojanasatampi gantvā sīlasampanne daṭṭhukāmo
atk-s0402a0:499_1: hoti pāṭaliputtakabrāhmaṇo viya saddhātissamahārājā viya ca.
atk-s0402a0:499_2: Pāṭaliputtassa kira nagaradvāre sālāya nisinnā dve brāhmaṇā kāḷavallimaṇḍapavāsimahānāgattherassa guṇakathaṃ
atk-s0402a0:499_3: sutvā “amhehi taṃ bhikkhuṃ daṭṭhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti dvepi janā nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:499_5: Eko samuddatīraṃ patvā nāvāya mahātitthapaṭṭane oruyha anurādhapuraṃ āgantvā “kāḷavallimaṇḍapo kuhi”nti pucchi.
atk-s0402a0:499_7: So anupubbena therassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ patvā cūḷanagaragāme dhuraghare nivāsaṃ gahetvā therassa āhāraṃ
atk-s0402a0:499_8: sampādetvā pātova vuṭṭhāya therassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pucchitvā gantvā janapariyante ṭhito theraṃ dūratova
atk-s0402a0:499_9: āgacchantaṃ disvā sakiṃ tattheva ṭhito vanditvā puna upasaṅkamitvā gopphakesu daḷhaṃ gahetvā vandanto “uccā, bhante,
atk-s0402a0:499_14: tumhākaṃ pana guṇā mecakavaṇṇassa samuddassa matthakena gantvā sakalajambudīpatalaṃ ajjhottharitvā gatā,
atk-s0402a0:499_15: ahampi pāṭaliputtanagaradvāre nisinno tumhākaṃ guṇakathaṃ assosi”nti.
atk-s0402a0:499_16: So therassa bhikkhāhāraṃ datvā attano ticīvaraṃ paṭiyādetvā therassa santike pabbajitvā tassovāde patiṭṭhāya katipāheneva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0402a0:500_1: mayhaṃ vanditabbayuttakaṃ ekaṃ ayyaṃ ācikkhathā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0402a0:500_8: “kiṃ mayhaṃ mahallakakāle rājagehe kamma”nti divāṭṭhāne mañce nipajjitvā bhūmiyaṃ lekhaṃ likhanto acchi.
atk-s0402a0:500_9: Rājā “kahaṃ thero”ti pucchitvā “divāṭṭhāne”ti sutvā tattha gacchanto theraṃ bhūmiyaṃ lekhaṃ likhantaṃ
atk-s0402a0:500_13: evaṃvidhassa saddhassa pasannassa rañño kasmā vippaṭisāraṃ karitthā”ti. “Āvuso,
atk-s0402a0:500_15: mahallakattherassa bhāro”ti vatvā aparabhāge anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyanto bhikkhusaṅghaṃ āha –
atk-s0402a0:500_18: “idaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ antare appatiṭṭhahitvā raññā diṭṭhakāleyeva bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhātū”ti adhiṭṭhahitvā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0402a0:500_20: Pañcayojanamagge dhajaṃ dhāretuṃ samatthā rukkhā dhajapaggahitāva ahesuṃ.
atk-s0402a0:500_21: Gacchāpi gumbāpi sabbe kūṭāgārābhimukhā hutvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:501_3: Kūṭāgāraṃ ākāsena gantvā thūpārāmaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā silācetiyaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0402a0:501_4: Cetiyaṃ saha vatthunā uppatitvā kūṭāgāramatthake aṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0402a0:501_6: Tasmiṃ khaṇe mahābyagghatthero nāma lohapāsāde sattamakūṭāgāre nisinno bhikkhūnaṃ vinayakammaṃ karonto taṃ saddaṃ sutvā “kiṃ saddo eso”ti paṭipucchi. Bhante,
atk-s0402a0:501_10: puññavante nissāya sakkāraṃ labhissāmāti antevāsike khamāpetvā ākāseneva āgantvā taṃ kūṭāgāraṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0402a0:501_12: Rājā gandhapupphacuṇṇāni ādāya gantvā ākāse ṭhitaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ disvā kūṭāgāraṃ pūjesi.
atk-s0402a0:501_13: Tasmiṃ khaṇe kūṭāgāraṃ otaritvā pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:501_14: Rājā mahāsakkārena sarīrakiccaṃ kāretvā dhātuyo gahetvā cetiyaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0402a0:502_0: Saddhammaṃ sotumicchatīti tathāgatappaveditaṃ saddhammaṃ sotukāmo hoti piṇḍapātikattherādayo viya.
atk-s0402a0:502_1: Gaṅgāvanavāliaṅgaṇamhi kira tiṃsa bhikkhū vassaṃ upagatā anvaddhamāsaṃ uposathadivase catupaccayasantosabhāvanārāmamahāariyavaṃsañca kathenti.
atk-s0402a0:502_2: Eko piṇḍapātikatthero pacchābhāgena āgantvā paṭicchannaṭṭhāne nisīdi.
atk-s0402a0:502_3: Atha naṃ eko gonaso jaṅghapiṇḍimaṃsaṃ saṇḍāsena gaṇhanto viya ḍaṃsi.
atk-s0402a0:502_4: Thero olokento gonasaṃ disvā “ajja dhammassavanantarāyaṃ na karissāmī”ti gonasaṃ gahetvā thavikāya pakkhipitvā
atk-s0402a0:502_5: thavikāmukhaṃ bandhitvā avidūre ṭhāne ṭhapetvā dhammaṃ suṇantova nisīdi.
atk-s0402a0:502_6: Aruṇuggamanañca visaṃ vikkhambhetvā therassa tiṇṇaṃ phalānaṃ pāpuṇanañca visassa daṭṭhaṭṭhāneneva otaritvā
atk-s0402a0:502_9: “āvuso eko me coro gahito”ti thavikaṃ muñcitvā gonasaṃ vissajjesi.
atk-s0402a0:503_0: Dīghavāpiyampi “mahājātakabhāṇakatthero gāthāsahassaṃ mahāvessantaraṃ kathessatī”ti tissamahāgāme tissamahāvihāravāsī
atk-s0402a0:503_1: eko daharo sutvā tato nikkhamitvā ekāheneva navayojanamaggaṃ āgato.
atk-s0402a0:503_3: Daharo dūramaggāgamanena sañjātakāyadarathattā paṭṭhānagāthāya saddhiṃ avasānagāthaṃyeva vavatthapesi.
atk-s0402a0:503_4: Tato therassa “idamavocā”ti vatvā uṭṭhāya gamanakāle “mayhaṃ āgamanakammaṃ moghaṃ jāta”nti rodamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0402a0:503_5: Eko manusso taṃ kathaṃ sutvā gantvā therassa ārocesi, “bhante,
atk-s0402a0:503_6: ‘tumhākaṃ dhammakathaṃ sossāmī’ti eko daharabhikkhu tissamahāvihārā āgato,
atk-s0402a0:503_7: so ‘kāyadarathabhāvena me āgamanaṃ moghaṃ jāta’nti rodamāno ṭhito”ti.
atk-s0402a0:503_9: So punadivase therassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā sotāpattiphalaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0402a0:504_0: Aparāpi ullakolikaṇṇivāsikā ekā itthī puttakaṃ pāyamānā “dīghabhāṇakamahāabhayatthero nāma ariyavaṃsapaṭipadaṃ
atk-s0402a0:504_1: kathetī”ti sutvā pañcayojanamaggaṃ gantvā divākathikattherassa nisinnakāleyeva vihāraṃ pavisitvā bhūmiyaṃ
atk-s0402a0:504_2: puttaṃ nipajjāpetvā divākathikattherassa ṭhitakāva dhammaṃ assosi.
atk-s0402a0:504_5: Thero tayo eva paccaye kathetvā uṭṭhānākāraṃ akāsi.
atk-s0402a0:504_7: ‘ariyavaṃsaṃ kathessāmī’ti siniddhabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā madhurapānakaṃ pivitvā yaṭṭhimadhukatelādīhi bhesajjaṃ
atk-s0402a0:504_11: Aruṇuggamanañca therassa “idamavocā”ti vacanañca upāsikāya sotāpattiphaluppatti ca ekakkhaṇeyeva ahosi.
atk-s0402a0:505_0: Aparāpi kaḷamparavāsikā itthī aṅkena puttaṃ ādāya “dhammaṃ sossāmī”ti cittalapabbataṃ gantvā ekaṃ rukkhaṃ
atk-s0402a0:505_1: nissāya dārakaṃ nipajjāpetvā sayaṃ ṭhitakāva dhammaṃ suṇāti.
atk-s0402a0:505_2: Rattibhāgasamanantare eko dīghajātiko tassā passantiyāyeva samīpe nipannadārakaṃ catūhi dāṭhāhi ḍaṃsitvā agamāsi.
atk-s0402a0:505_6: Anekakkhattuṃ kho pana me ayaṃ saṃsāravaṭṭe vaṭṭantiyā putto ahosi,
atk-s0402a0:505_7: dhammameva carissāmī”ti tiyāmarattiṃ ṭhitakāva dhammaṃ paggaṇhitvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya aruṇe uggate
atk-s0402a0:505_8: saccakiriyāya puttassa visaṃ nimmathetvā puttaṃ gahetvā gatā.
atk-s0402a0:505_9: Evarūpā puggalā dhammaṃ sotukāmā nāma honti.
atk-s0402a0:507_3: atthavase sampassamānenāti tayo atthe tīṇi kāraṇāni passantena.
atk-s0402a0:507_5: Yo dhammaṃ desetīti yo puggalo catusaccadhammaṃ pakāseti.
atk-s0402a0:509_0: 44. Catutthe ṭhānehīti kāraṇehi. Pavattinīti appaṭihatā niyyānikā.
atk-s0402a0:511_1: Pañcame paṇḍitapaññattānīti paṇḍitehi paññattāni kathitāni pasatthāni.
atk-s0402a0:511_2: Sappurisapaññattānīti sappurisehi mahāpurisehi paññattāni kathitāni pasatthāni.
atk-s0402a0:511_7: puṇṇovāde damoti vuttā khantipi āḷavake vuttā paññāpi imasmiṃ sutte vaṭṭatiyeva.
atk-s0402a0:511_8: Mātāpitu upaṭṭhānanti mātāpitūnaṃ rakkhanaṃ gopanaṃ paṭijagganaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:511_13: Idaṃ mātāpituupaṭṭhānaṃ sabbhi upaññātanti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0402a0:511_14: Sataṃ etāni ṭhānānīti santānaṃ uttamapurisānaṃ etāni ṭhānāni kāraṇāni.
atk-s0402a0:511_15: Ariyo dassanasampannoti idha imesaṃyeva tiṇṇaṃ ṭhānānaṃ kāraṇena ariyo ceva dassanasampanno ca veditabbo,
atk-s0402a0:511_17: Atha vā sataṃ etāni ṭhānānīti mātupaṭṭhānaṃ pitupaṭṭhānanti etāni ṭhānāni santānaṃ uttamapurisānaṃ kāraṇānīti
atk-s0402a0:511_18: evaṃ mātāpituupaṭṭhākavasena imissā gāthāya attho veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:511_20: Sa lokaṃ bhajate sivanti so khemaṃ devalokaṃ gacchatīti.
atk-s0402a0:513_2: Kāyenātiādīsu bhikkhū āgacchante disvā paccuggamanaṃ karontā gacchante anugacchantā āsanasālāya sammajjanaupalepanādīni
atk-s0402a0:513_3: karontā āsanāni paññāpentā pānīyaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpentā kāyena puññaṃ pasavanti nāma.
atk-s0402a0:513_10: cetiyaṃ vandathā”tiādīni vadantā vācāya puññaṃ pasavanti nāma.
atk-s0402a0:513_11: Bhikkhū piṇḍāya carante disvā “labhantū”ti cintentā manasā puññaṃ pasavanti nāma.
atk-s0402a0:515_7: Maggaphalāni pana asammasanūpagattā idha na kathīyanti.
atk-s0402a0:515_15: Yathā hatthiassagomahiṃsādīnaṃ sattisūlādīni sañjānanalakkhaṇāni na hatthiādayo,
atk-s0402a0:517_3: Na uppādo paññāyatītiādīhi uppādajarābhaṅgānaṃ abhāvo vutto.
atk-s0402a0:521_1: Dasame ātappaṃ karaṇīyanti vīriyaṃ kātuṃ yuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:521_3: anuppādaṃ sādhessāmīti iminā kāraṇena kattabbanti attho.
atk-s0402a0:522_0: Ettake ṭhāne satthā āṇāpetvā āṇattiṃ pavattetvā idāni samādapento yato kho,
atk-s0402a0:522_7: Ime ca pana ātāpādayo tayopi lokiyalokuttaramissakā kathitā.
atk-s0402a0:524_7: yattha sakkā hoti dvīhipi tīhipi jaṅghasahassehi saddhiṃ nilīyituṃ.
atk-s0402a0:524_9: yattha sakkā hoti sattahi vā aṭṭhahi vā jaṅghasahassehi saddhiṃ nilīyituṃ.
atk-s0402a0:524_11: Rodhanti ghanaṃ aññamaññaṃ saṃsaṭṭhasākhaṃ ekābaddhaṃ mahāvanasaṇḍaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:524_12: Pariyodhāya atthaṃ bhaṇissantīti pariyodahitvā taṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ pakkhipitvā atthaṃ kathayissanti.
atk-s0402a0:524_14: Pariyodhāya atthaṃ bhaṇantīti kismiñci kiñci vattuṃ āraddheyeva “mā evaṃ avacuttha,
atk-s0402a0:524_16: na esa evarūpaṃ karissatī”ti taṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ pakkhipitvā mahantampi dosaṃ harantā atthaṃ bhaṇanti.
atk-s0402a0:524_18: Te hi tassapi dosaṃ paṭicchādetvā atthaṃ bhaṇanti.
atk-s0402a0:526_6: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsūti puttadāre attano vacanaṃ akaronte disvā “samaṇassa gotamassa santikaṃ
atk-s0402a0:526_12: mayaṃ brāhmaṇā na khattiyā nāmaccā na gahapatikāti brāhmaṇabhāvaṃ jānāpetvā jiṇṇātiādimāhaṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:526_14: Avassayabhūtaṃ patiṭṭhākammaṃ amhehi na katanti dassenti.
atk-s0402a0:526_18: ahampi kho etaṃ sampaṭicchāmīti ca dasseti.
atk-s0402a0:527_0: Idāni yasmā te brāhmaṇā mahallakattā pabbajitvāpi vattaṃ pūretuṃ na sakkhissanti,
atk-s0402a0:527_1: tasmā ne pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpento bhagavā yodha kāyena saṃyamotiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:527_4: Taṃ tassa petassāti taṃ puññaṃ tassa paralokaṃ gatassa tāyanaṭṭhena tāṇaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:527_10: Evaṃ te brāhmaṇā tathāgatena pañcasu sīlesu samādapitā yāvajīvaṃ pañca sīlāni rakkhitvā sagge nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:529_0: 53. Dutiye bhājananti yaṃkiñci bhaṇḍakaṃ. Sesaṃ paṭhame vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:531_5: Sandiṭṭhiko dhammo hotīti sāmaṃ passitabbo hoti.
atk-s0402a0:531_7: Ehipassikoti “ehi passā”ti evaṃ dassetuṃ sakkāti āgamanīyapaṭipadaṃ pucchati.
atk-s0402a0:531_14: Imasmiṃ pana sutte brāhmaṇena lokuttaramaggo pucchito,
atk-s0402a0:531_16: So hi sāmaṃ passitabbattā sandiṭṭhiko nāmāti.
atk-s0402a0:535_0: 56. Pañcame akālikanti na kālantare pattabbaṃ. Opaneyyikanti paṭipattiyā upagantabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:537_2: Avīci maññe phuṭo ahosīti yathā avīci mahānirayo nirantaraphuṭo nerayikasattehi paripuṇṇo,
atk-s0402a0:537_4: Kukkuṭasaṃpātikāti ekagāmassa chadanapiṭṭhito uppatitvā itaragāmassa chadanapiṭṭhe patanasaṅkhāto kukkuṭasaṃpāto etāsu atthīti kukkuṭasaṃpātikā.
atk-s0402a0:537_6: gāmantarato gāmantaraṃ kukkuṭānaṃ padasā gamanasaṅkhāto kukkuṭasaṃpādo etāsu atthīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:537_9: attano parikkhāresu pana uppajjamāno na adhammarāgoti adhippeto,
atk-s0402a0:537_13: Attanā pariggahitavatthumhi pana uppajjamāno samalobho nāma,
atk-s0402a0:537_16: Devo na sammā dhāraṃ anuppavecchatīti vassitabbayutte kāle vassaṃ na vassati.
atk-s0402a0:537_20: tehi daṭṭhattā nikkhantanikkhantāni sālisīsāni setavaṇṇāni honti nissārāni.
atk-s0402a0:537_22: Salākāvuttanti vapitaṃ vapitaṃ sassaṃ salākāmattameva sampajjati,
atk-s0402a0:537_25: Vāḷe amanusse ossajjantīti caṇḍayakkhe manussapathe vissajjenti,
atk-s0402a0:539_2: Dhammassa cānudhammaṃ byākarontīti ettha dhammo nāma kathitakathā,
atk-s0402a0:539_9: bhotā gotamena vuttā sakāraṇā vādappavatti kiñcipi gārayhaṃ kāraṇaṃ na āgacchatīti.
atk-s0402a0:539_10: Atha vā tehi parehi vuttā sakāraṇā vādappavatti kiñci gārayhaṃ kāraṇaṃ na āgacchatīti pucchati.
atk-s0402a0:540_0: Antarāyakaro hotīti antarāyaṃ vināsaṃ kicchalābhakaṃ vilomakaṃ karoti.
atk-s0402a0:540_2: Khato ca hotīti guṇakhananena khato hoti.
atk-s0402a0:542_7: Nāssa vaṇṇaṃ parikkhareti assa goṇassa sarīravaṇṇaṃ na upaparikkhanti,
atk-s0402a0:542_9: Yasmiṃ kasmiñci jātiyeti yattha katthaci kulajāte.
atk-s0402a0:542_10: Yāsu kāsuci etāsūti etāsu khattiyādippabhedāsu yāsu kāsuci jātīsu.
atk-s0402a0:543_5: khandhabhāraṃ kilesabhāraṃ kāmaguṇabhārañca oropetvā ṭhitoti attho.
atk-s0402a0:543_6: Katakiccoti catūhi maggehi kiccaṃ katvā ṭhito.
atk-s0402a0:543_7: Pāragū sabbadhammānanti sabbadhammā vuccanti pañcakkhandhā dvādasāyatanāni aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo,
atk-s0402a0:544_4: Na hi sante upāsareti buddhapaccekabuddhakhīṇāsave uttamapurise na upasaṅkamanti.
atk-s0402a0:544_6: Mūlajātā patiṭṭhitāti iminā sotāpannassa saddhaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0402a0:544_7: Kule vā idha jāyareti idha vā manussaloke khattiyabrāhmaṇavessakule jāyanti.
atk-s0402a0:544_10: adhigacchantīti sīlasamādhipaññāti ime guṇe pūretvā anukkamena nibbānaṃ adhigacchantīti.
atk-s0402a0:546_3: gacchissāmi tassa santika”nti cintetvā bhuttapātarāso mahājanaparivuto upasaṅkami.
atk-s0402a0:546_6: So kira ito pubbe tathāgatassa santikaṃ agatapubbo.
atk-s0402a0:546_9: mayi paṭhamataraṃ akathente katheyya vā na vā.
atk-s0402a0:546_11: atha maṃ samāgamaṭṭhāne kathentaṃ evaṃ vakkhanti ‘tvaṃ idha kasmā kathesi,
atk-s0402a0:546_12: yena te samaṇassa gotamassa santikaṃ gantvā vacanamattampi na laddha’nti.
atk-s0402a0:546_13: Tasmā ‘evaṃ me ayaṃ garahā muccissatī”’ti maññamāno bhāsati.
atk-s0402a0:546_15: tathāgatassa pana ñāṇaṃ ghaṭṭessāmīti adhippāyeneva bhāsati.
atk-s0402a0:546_16: Evampi tevijjā brāhmaṇāti tevijjakabrāhmaṇā evaṃpaṇḍitā evaṃdhīrā evaṃbyattā evaṃbahussutā evaṃvādino,
atk-s0402a0:546_20: ettakena kāraṇena sammatāti ayañhi ettha attho.
atk-s0402a0:547_0: Yathā kathaṃ pana brāhmaṇāti ettha yathāti kāraṇavacanaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:547_7: Taṃ sutvā brāhmaṇo “jānanaṭṭhāneyeva maṃ sammāsambuddho pucchi,
atk-s0402a0:547_11: Mātito ca pitito cāti yassa mātā brāhmaṇī,
atk-s0402a0:547_17: so ubhato sujāto mātito ca pitito ca.
atk-s0402a0:547_20: “Samavepākiniyā gahaṇiyā”ti pana ettha kammajatejodhātu gahaṇīti vuccati.
atk-s0402a0:548_0: Yāva sattamā pitāmahayugāti ettha pitu pitā pitāmaho,
atk-s0402a0:548_5: Tato uddhaṃ sabbepi pubbapurisā pitāmahaggahaṇeneva gahitā.
atk-s0402a0:548_8: atha vā akkhitto anupakkuṭṭho jātivādenāti dasseti.
atk-s0402a0:548_12: na akkosaṃ vā nindaṃ vā pattapubbo.
atk-s0402a0:549_2: ajjhāyakā ajjhāyakāteva tatiyaṃ akkharaṃ upanibbatta”nti evaṃ paṭhamakappikakāle jhānavirahitānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ garahavacanaṃ uppannaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:549_4: mante parivattetīti iminā atthena pasaṃsāvacanaṃ katvā voharanti.
atk-s0402a0:550_2: Saha nighaṇḍunā ca keṭubhena ca sanighaṇḍukeṭubhānaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:550_7: Itihāsapañcamānanti āthabbaṇavedaṃ catutthaṃ katvā itiha āsa,
atk-s0402a0:550_8: itiha āsāti īdisavacanapaṭisaṃyutto purāṇakathāsaṅkhāto khattavijjāsaṅkhāto vā itihāso pañcamo etesanti itihāsapañcamā.
atk-s0402a0:551_0: Padaṃ tadavasesañca byākaraṇaṃ adhīyati vedeti cāti padako veyyākaraṇo.
atk-s0402a0:551_2: Mahāpurisalakkhaṇanti mahāpurisānaṃ buddhādīnaṃ lakkhaṇadīpakaṃ dvādasasahassaganthapamāṇaṃ satthaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:551_4: yesaṃ vasena “iminā lakkhaṇena samannāgatā buddhā nāma honti,
atk-s0402a0:551_15: Avayo nāma yo tāni atthato ca ganthato ca sandhāretuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0402a0:552_0: Tena hīti idaṃ bhagavā naṃ āyācantaṃ disvā “idānissa pañhaṃ kathetuṃ kālo”ti ñatvā āha.
atk-s0402a0:552_5: Idha panetaṃ tissannaṃ vijjānaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipattidassanatthaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:552_6: Tattha dvinnaṃ vijjānaṃ anupadavaṇṇanā ceva bhāvanānayo ca visuddhimagge vitthāritova.
atk-s0402a0:553_4: Avijjāti tasseva pubbenivāsassa aviditakaraṇaṭṭhena tappaṭicchādako moho vuccati.
atk-s0402a0:553_5: Tamoti sveva moho paṭicchādakaṭṭhena tamoti vuccati.
atk-s0402a0:553_6: Ālokoti sāyeva vijjā obhāsakaraṇaṭṭhena ālokoti vuccati.
atk-s0402a0:553_7: Ettha ca vijjā adhigatāti ayaṃ attho.
atk-s0402a0:553_10: athassa adhigatavijjassa avijjā vihatā vinaṭṭhāti attho. Kasmā?
atk-s0402a0:553_17: Kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhatāya pahitattassa.
atk-s0402a0:553_20: yathā appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato avijjā vihaññeyya,
atk-s0402a0:553_28: Etassa tena padhānānuyogassa anurūpameva phalaṃ laddhanti.
atk-s0402a0:555_0: Tatiyavijjāya so evaṃ samāhite citteti vipassanāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānacittaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:555_2: Arahattamaggo hi āsavavināsanato āsavānaṃ khayoti vuccati,
atk-s0402a0:555_5: So idaṃ dukkhanti evamādīsu ettakaṃ dukkhaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:555_6: na ito bhiyyoti sabbampi dukkhasaccaṃ sarasalakkhaṇappaṭivedhena yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti paṭivijjhati,
atk-s0402a0:555_7: tassa ca dukkhassa nibbattikaṃ taṇhaṃ “ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo”ti,
atk-s0402a0:555_10: Tassa ca sampāpakaṃ ariyamaggaṃ “ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā”ti sarasalakkhaṇappaṭivedhena yathābhūtaṃ
atk-s0402a0:556_0: Evaṃ sarūpato saccāni dassetvā idāni kilesavasena pariyāyato dassento ime āsavātiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:556_1: Tassa evaṃ jānato evaṃ passatoti tassa bhikkhuno evaṃ jānantassa evaṃ passantassa.
atk-s0402a0:556_7: Vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇanti iminā paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0402a0:556_9: Tena hi ñāṇena so paccavekkhanto khīṇā jātītiādīni pajānāti.
atk-s0402a0:556_12: Na tāvassa atītā jāti khīṇā pubbeva khīṇattā,
atk-s0402a0:556_17: Yā pana maggassa abhāvitattā uppajjeyya ekacatupañcavokārabhavesu ekacatupañcakkhandhappabhedā jāti,
atk-s0402a0:556_18: sā maggassa bhāvitattā anuppādadhammataṃ āpajjanena khīṇā.
atk-s0402a0:556_19: Taṃ so maggabhāvanāya pahīnakilese paccavekkhitvā kilesābhāve vijjamānampi kammaṃ āyatiappaṭisandhikaṃ hotīti jānanto pajānāti.
atk-s0402a0:557_3: Puthujjanakalyāṇakena hi saddhiṃ satta sekkhā brahmacariyavāsaṃ vasanti nāma,
atk-s0402a0:557_5: Tasmā so attano brahmacariyavāsaṃ paccavekkhanto “vusitaṃ brahmacariya”nti pajānāti.
atk-s0402a0:557_6: Kataṃ karaṇīyanti catūsu saccesu catūhi maggehi pariññāpahānasacchikiriyābhāvanābhisamayavasena soḷasavidhampi kiccaṃ niṭṭhāpitanti attho.
atk-s0402a0:557_9: Tasmā so attano karaṇīyaṃ paccavekkhanto “kataṃ karaṇīya”nti pajānāti.
atk-s0402a0:557_11: evaṃ soḷasavidhakiccabhāvāya kilesakkhayāya vā maggabhāvanākiccaṃ me natthīti pajānāti.
atk-s0402a0:557_13: imasmā evaṃ pakārā idāni vattamānakkhandhasantānā aparaṃ khandhasantānaṃ mayhaṃ natthi,
atk-s0402a0:557_14: ime pana pañcakkhandhā pariññātā tiṭṭhanti chinnamūlakā rukkhā viya.
atk-s0402a0:557_15: Te carimakaviññāṇanirodhena anupādāno viya jātavedo nibbāyissantīti pajānāti.
atk-s0402a0:558_13: Taṃ namassanti gotamanti taṃ gotamagottaṃ buddhasāvakā namassanti.
atk-s0402a0:559_4: Saggāpāyañca passatīti cha kāmāvacare nava brahmaloke cattāro ca apāye passati.
atk-s0402a0:559_9: Nāññaṃ lapitalāpananti yo panañño tevijjoti aññehi lapitavacanamattameva lapati,
atk-s0402a0:559_11: attapaccakkhato ñatvā parassapi tisso vijjā kathentamevāhaṃ tevijjoti vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:559_14: Idāni brāhmaṇo bhagavato kathāya pasanno pasannākāraṃ karonto abhikkantantiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:561_7: Tevijjesu brāhmaṇesu dānaṃ dadeyyāti sabbametaṃ dānaṃ tevijjesu dadeyya,
atk-s0402a0:563_1: Dasame saṅgāravoti evaṃnāmako rājagahanagare jiṇṇapaṭisaṅkharaṇakārako āyuttakabrāhmaṇo.
atk-s0402a0:563_6: Yaññaṃ yajāmāti bāhirasamaye sabbacatukkena sabbaṭṭhakena sabbasoḷasakena sabbadvattiṃsāya sabbacatusaṭṭhiyā
atk-s0402a0:563_7: sabbasatena sabbapañcasatenāti ca evaṃ pāṇaghātapaṭisaṃyutto yañño nāma hoti.
atk-s0402a0:563_11: Yaññādhikaraṇanti yajanakāraṇā ceva yājanakāraṇā cāti attho.
atk-s0402a0:563_12: Ekasmiñhi bahūnaṃ dadantepi dāpentepi bahūsupi bahūnaṃ dentesupi dāpentesupi puññapaṭipadā anekasārīrikā nāma hoti.
atk-s0402a0:563_14: Tuyhañca tuyhañca yajāmīti vadantassāpi tvañca tvañca yajāhīti āṇāpentassāpi ca anekasārīrikāva hoti.
atk-s0402a0:563_16: Yassa vā tassa vāti yasmā vā tasmā vā.
atk-s0402a0:563_17: Ekamattānaṃ dametīti attano indriyadamanavasena ekaṃ attānameva dameti.
atk-s0402a0:563_18: Ekamattānaṃ sametīti attano rāgādisamanavasena ekaṃ attānameva sameti.
atk-s0402a0:564_0: Evamidaṃ brāhmaṇassa kathaṃ sutvā satthā cintesi –
atk-s0402a0:564_1: “ayaṃ brāhmaṇo pasughātakasaṃyuttaṃ mahāyaññaṃ anekasārīrikaṃ puññapaṭipadaṃ vadeti,
atk-s0402a0:564_5: handassa ekasārīrikañca anekasārīrikañca paṭipadaṃ desessāmī”ti upari desanaṃ vaḍḍhento tena hi brāhmaṇātiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:564_6: Tattha yathā te khameyyāti yathā tuyhaṃ rucceyya.
atk-s0402a0:564_7: Idha tathāgato loke uppajjatītiādi visuddhimagge vitthāritameva.
atk-s0402a0:564_13: Anuttaraṃ brahmacariyogadhanti arahattamaggasaṅkhātassa brahmacariyassa anuttaraṃ ogadhaṃ uttamapatiṭṭhābhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:565_0: Appaṭṭhatarāti yattha bahūhi veyyāvaccakarehi vā upakaraṇehi vā attho natthi.
atk-s0402a0:565_1: Appasamārambhatarāti yattha bahūnaṃ kammacchedavasena pīḷāsaṅkhāto samārambho natthi.
atk-s0402a0:565_4: ete me pujjāti yathā bhavaṃ gotamo,
atk-s0402a0:565_7: tumheyeva dve janā mayhaṃ pujjā ca pāsaṃsā cāti imamatthaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vadati.
atk-s0402a0:565_10: attano kho pana vaṇṇe vutte padussanako nāma natthī”ti.
atk-s0402a0:565_11: Tasmā pañhaṃ akathetukāmo vaṇṇabhaṇanena vikkhepaṃ karonto evamāha.
atk-s0402a0:566_0: Na kho tyāhanti na kho te ahaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:567_3: Yaṃnūnāhaṃ parimoceyyanti yaṃnūnāhaṃ ubhopete vihesato parimoceyyaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:567_4: Brāhmaṇo hi ānandena pucchitaṃ pañhaṃ akathento viheseti,
atk-s0402a0:567_6: Iti ubhopete vihesato mocessāmīti cintetvā evamāha.
atk-s0402a0:567_8: Antarākathā udapādīti aññissā kathāya antarantare katarā kathā uppajjīti pucchati.
atk-s0402a0:567_9: Tadā kira rājantepure tīṇi pāṭihāriyāni ārabbha kathā udapādi,
atk-s0402a0:567_11: Atha brāhmaṇo “idāni vattuṃ sakkhissāmī”ti rājantepure uppannaṃ kathaṃ ārocento ayaṃ khvajja,
atk-s0402a0:567_13: Tattha ayaṃ khvajjāti ayaṃ kho ajja.
atk-s0402a0:567_16: Iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ dassesunti bhikkhācāraṃ gacchantā ākāseneva gamiṃsu ceva āgamiṃsu cāti evaṃ pubbe pavattaṃ ākāsagamanaṃ sandhāyevamāha.
atk-s0402a0:567_17: Etarahi pana bahutarā ca bhikkhūti idaṃ so brāhmaṇo “pubbe bhikkhū ‘cattāro paccaye uppādessāmā’ti maññe evamakaṃsu,
atk-s0402a0:567_18: idāni paccayānaṃ uppannabhāvaṃ ñatvā soppena ceva pamādena ca vītināmentī”ti laddhiyā evamāha.
atk-s0402a0:568_5: Anekavihitaṃ iddhividhantiādīnaṃ attho ceva bhāvanānayo ca visuddhimagge vitthāritova.
atk-s0402a0:569_0: Nimittena ādisatīti āgatanimittena vā gatanimittena vā ṭhitanimittena vā “idaṃ nāma bhavissatī”ti katheti.
atk-s0402a0:569_2: eko kira rājā tisso muttā gahetvā purohitaṃ pucchi “kiṃ me, ācariya,
atk-s0402a0:569_5: tena ca samayena ekā sarabū “makkhikaṃ gahessāmī”ti pakkhantā,
atk-s0402a0:569_15: Evampi te manoti evaṃ tava mano somanassito vā domanassito vā kāmavitakkādisaṃyutto vāti.
atk-s0402a0:569_17: Itipi te cittanti itipi tava cittaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:569_18: imañca imañca atthaṃ cintayamānaṃ pavattatīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:569_19: Bahuṃ cepi ādisatīti bahuṃ cepi katheti.
atk-s0402a0:570_2: Saddaṃ sutvāti aññassa cittaṃ ñatvā kathentānaṃ sutvā.
atk-s0402a0:570_3: Vitakkavipphārasaddanti vitakkavipphāravasena uppannaṃ vippalapantānaṃ suttappamattādīnaṃ saddaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:570_5: Yaṃ vitakkayato tassa so saddo uppanno,
atk-s0402a0:571_1: eko kira manusso “aṭṭaṃ karissāmī”ti gāmā nagaraṃ gacchanto nikkhantaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya “vinicchayasabhāyaṃ
atk-s0402a0:571_2: rañño ca rājamahāmattānañca idaṃ kathessāmi idaṃ kathessāmī”ti vitakkento rājakulaṃ gato viya rañño purato
atk-s0402a0:571_3: ṭhito viya aṭṭakārakena saddhiṃ kathento viya ca ahosi,
atk-s0402a0:571_4: tassa taṃ vitakkavipphāravasena niccharantaṃ saddaṃ sutvā eko puriso “kenaṭṭhena gacchasī”ti āha.
atk-s0402a0:571_7: So gantvā aṭṭaṃ katvā jayameva pāpuṇi.
atk-s0402a0:572_1: Atha naṃ nikkhamantaṃ ekā dārikā aññavihitā na addasa.
atk-s0402a0:572_2: So gāmadvāre ṭhatvā nivattitvā oloketvā taṃ disvā vitakkento agamāsi.
atk-s0402a0:572_3: Gacchantoyeva ca “kiṃ nu kho kurumānā dārikā na addasā”ti vacībhedaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0402a0:572_4: Passe ṭhito eko puriso sutvā “tumhe, bhante,
atk-s0402a0:573_5: Āgamanena jānāti nāma kasiṇaparikammakāleyeva “yenākārenesa kasiṇabhāvanaṃ āraddho paṭhamajjhānaṃ vā…pe…
atk-s0402a0:573_6: catutthajjhānaṃ vā aṭṭha vā samāpattiyo nibbattessatī”ti jānāti.
atk-s0402a0:573_7: Pubbabhāgena jānāti nāma paṭhamavipassanāya āraddhāyayeva jānāti,
atk-s0402a0:573_8: “yenākārena esa vipassanaṃ āraddho sotāpattimaggaṃ vā nibbattessati…pe…
atk-s0402a0:573_12: imassa nāma cittassa anantarā imaṃ nāma vitakkaṃ vitakkessati,
atk-s0402a0:573_13: ito vuṭṭhitassa etassa hānabhāgiyo vā samādhi bhavissati ṭhitibhāgiyo vā visesabhāgiyo vā nibbedhabhāgiyo vā,
atk-s0402a0:573_15: Tattha puthujjano cetopariyañāṇalābhī puthujjanānaṃyeva cittaṃ jānāti,
atk-s0402a0:573_17: Ariyesupi heṭṭhimo uparimassa cittaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0402a0:573_22: Tesañhi heṭṭhimā heṭṭhimā samāpatti tatravattiyeva hoti.
atk-s0402a0:573_23: Tatheva taṃ hotīti etaṃ ekaṃsena tatheva hoti.
atk-s0402a0:574_0: Evaṃ vitakkethāti evaṃ nekkhammavitakkādayo pavattentā vitakketha.
atk-s0402a0:574_1: Mā evaṃ vitakkayitthāti evaṃ kāmavitakkādayo pavattentā mā vitakkayittha.
atk-s0402a0:574_4: Mā evanti niccantiādinā nayena mā manasā karittha.
atk-s0402a0:574_6: Idañca upasampajjāti idaṃ catumaggaphalappabhedaṃ lokuttaradhammameva upasampajja pāpuṇitvā nipphādetvā viharatha.
atk-s0402a0:575_0: Māyāsahadhammarūpaṃ viya khāyatīti māyāya samānakāraṇajātikaṃ viya hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
atk-s0402a0:575_1: Māyākāropi hi udakaṃ gahetvā telaṃ karoti,
atk-s0402a0:575_2: telaṃ gahetvā udakanti evaṃ anekarūpaṃ māyaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0402a0:575_6: pāṭihāriyaṃ māyāsahadhammarūpaṃ viya khāyatīti cintāmaṇikavijjāsarikkhakataṃ sandhāya evaṃ āha.
atk-s0402a0:575_7: Cintāmaṇikavijjaṃ jānantāpi hi āgacchantameva disvā “ayaṃ idaṃ nāma vitakkento āgacchatī”ti jānanti.
atk-s0402a0:576_2: Bhavañhi gotamo avitakkaṃ avicāranti idha brāhmaṇo avasesaṃ ādesanāpāṭihāriyaṃ bāhirakanti na gaṇhi.
atk-s0402a0:576_3: Idañca pana sabbaṃ so brāhmaṇo tathāgatassa vaṇṇaṃ kathentoyeva āha.
atk-s0402a0:576_4: Addhā kho tyāyanti ekaṃseneva tayā ayaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:576_5: Āsajja upanīya vācā bhāsitāti mama guṇe ghaṭṭetvā mameva guṇānaṃ santikaṃ upanītā vācā bhāsitā.
atk-s0402a0:576_6: Apica tyāhaṃ byākarissāmīti apica te ahameva kathessāmīti.
atk-s0402a0:578_9: Titthiyā nāma yesaṃ tā diṭṭhiyo ruccanti khamanti.
atk-s0402a0:578_12: gunnaṃ dakkhiṇāpatho āyatana”nti ettha sañjātiṭṭhānaṃ āyatanaṃ nāma.
atk-s0402a0:581_5: Sabbepi hi diṭṭhigatikā sañjāyamānā imesuyeva tīsu ṭhānesu sañjāyanti,
atk-s0402a0:581_6: samosaraṇamānāpi etesuyeva tīsu ṭhānesu samosaranti sannipatanti,
atk-s0402a0:581_7: diṭṭhigatikabhāve ca nesaṃ etāneva tīṇi kāraṇānīti titthabhūtāni sañjātiādinā atthena āyatanānītipi titthāyatanāni.
atk-s0402a0:581_9: Samanuyuñjiyamānānīti kā nāmetā diṭṭhiyoti evaṃ pucchiyamānāni.
atk-s0402a0:581_10: Samanugāhiyamānānīti kiṃkāraṇā etā diṭṭhiyo uppannāti evaṃ sammā anuggāhiyamānāni.
atk-s0402a0:581_11: Samanubhāsiyamānānīti paṭinissajjetha etāni pāpakāni diṭṭhigatānīti evaṃ sammā anusāsiyamānāni.
atk-s0402a0:581_14: “samanuyuñjatīti vā samanuggāhatīti vā samanubhāsatīti vā esese ekaṭṭhe same samabhāge tajjāte taññevā”ti.
atk-s0402a0:582_0: Parampi gantvāti ācariyaparamparā laddhiparamparā attabhāvaparamparāti etesu yaṃkiñci paramparaṃ gantvāpi.
atk-s0402a0:582_10: amhākaṃ ācariyapācariyo ahetuapaccayavādī”ti evaṃ gacchantāni hi etāni ācariyaparamparaṃ gacchanti nāma.
atk-s0402a0:582_13: amhākaṃ ācariyapācariyo ahetuapaccayaladdhiko”ti evaṃ gacchantāni laddhiparamparaṃ gacchanti nāma.
atk-s0402a0:582_16: amhākaṃ ācariyapācariyassa attabhāvo ahetu apaccayo”ti evaṃ gacchantāni attabhāvaparamparaṃ gacchanti nāma.
atk-s0402a0:582_17: Evaṃ pana suvidūrampi gacchantāni akiriyamatteyeva saṇṭhahanti,
atk-s0402a0:582_18: ekopi etesaṃ diṭṭhigatikānaṃ kattā vā kāretā vā na paññāyati.
atk-s0402a0:583_1: Kāmañca purisotipi vutte puggalotipi vutte sattoyeva vutto hoti,
atk-s0402a0:583_2: ayaṃ pana sammutikathā nāma yo yathā jānāti,
atk-s0402a0:583_4: Paṭisaṃvedetīti attano santāne uppannaṃ jānāti paṭisaṃviditaṃ karoti,
atk-s0402a0:583_8: Iminā kammavedanañca kiriyavedanañca paṭikkhipitvā ekaṃ vipākavedanameva sampaṭicchanti.
atk-s0402a0:583_9: Ye vā ime pittasamuṭṭhānā ābādhā semhasamuṭṭhānā vātasamuṭṭhānā sannipātikā utupariṇāmajā visamaparihārajā
atk-s0402a0:583_10: opakkamikā ābādhā kammavipākajā ābādhāti aṭṭha rogā vuttā,
atk-s0402a0:583_11: tesu satta paṭikkhipitvā ekaṃ vipākavedanaṃyeva sampaṭicchanti.
atk-s0402a0:583_12: Yepime diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ upapajjavedanīyaṃ aparapariyāyavedanīyanti tayo kammarāsayo vuttā,
atk-s0402a0:583_13: tesupi dve paṭibāhitvā ekaṃ aparapariyāyakammaṃyeva sampaṭicchanti.
atk-s0402a0:583_14: Yepime diṭṭhadhammavedanīyo vipāko upapajjavedanīyo aparapariyāyavedanīyoti tayo vipākarāsayo vuttā,
atk-s0402a0:583_15: tesupi dve paṭibāhitvā ekaṃ aparapariyāyavipākameva sampaṭicchanti.
atk-s0402a0:583_16: Yepime kusalacetanā akusalacetanā vipākacetanā kiriyacetanāti cattāro cetanārāsayo vuttā,
atk-s0402a0:583_17: tesupi tayo paṭibāhitvā ekaṃ vipākacetanaṃyeva sampaṭicchanti.
atk-s0402a0:584_3: imā tisso vedanā paccuppanne attanā katamūlakena vā āṇattimūlakena vā pubbekatena vā ahetuapaccayā vā paṭisaṃvedituṃ nāma na sakkā,
atk-s0402a0:584_5: Evaṃvādino panete heṭṭhā vuttesu aṭṭhasu rogesu ekampi asampaṭicchitvā sabbe paṭibāhanti,
atk-s0402a0:584_6: heṭṭhā vuttesu ca tīsu kammarāsīsu tīsu vipākarāsīsu catūsu cetanārāsīsu ekampi asampaṭicchitvā sabbepi paṭibāhanti.
atk-s0402a0:585_3: imā tisso vedanā paccuppanne attanā katamūlakena vā āṇattimūlakena vā pubbekatena vā issaranimmānahetunā vā paṭisaṃvedituṃ nāma na sakkā,
atk-s0402a0:585_5: Evaṃvādino panete heṭṭhā vuttesu rogādīsu ekampi asampaṭicchitvā sabbaṃ paṭibāhanti.
atk-s0402a0:586_0: Evaṃ satthā mātikaṃ nikkhipitvā idāni taṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ tatra,
atk-s0402a0:586_2: Tattha evaṃ vadāmīti laddhipatiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ evaṃ vadāmīti dasseti.
atk-s0402a0:586_3: Laddhiñhi appatiṭṭhāpetvā niggayhamānā laddhito laddhiṃ saṅkamanti,
atk-s0402a0:586_6: Laddhiyā pana patiṭṭhāpitāya saṅkamituṃ alabhantā suniggahitā honti,
atk-s0402a0:586_7: iti nesaṃ laddhipatiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ evaṃ vadāmīti āha.
atk-s0402a0:586_12: Pāṇātipātino bhavissanti pubbekatahetūti ye keci loke pāṇaṃ atipātenti,
atk-s0402a0:586_15: Na hi pāṇātipātakammaṃ attanā katamūlakena na āṇattimūlakena na issaranimmānahetunā na ahetuapaccayā sakkā paṭisaṃvedetuṃ,
atk-s0402a0:586_19: Iti bhagavā tesaṃyeva laddhiṃ gahetvā tesaṃ niggahaṃ āropeti.
atk-s0402a0:587_2: Idaṃ vā karaṇīyaṃ idaṃ vā akaraṇīyanti ettha ayaṃ adhippāyo –
atk-s0402a0:587_4: idaṃ vā akaraṇīyanti akattabbassa akaraṇatthāya kattukamyatā vā paccattapurisakāro vā na hoti.
atk-s0402a0:587_5: Chandavāyāmesu vā asantesu “idaṃ kattabba”ntipi “idaṃ na kattabba”ntipi na hoti.
atk-s0402a0:587_6: Iti karaṇīyākaraṇīye kho pana saccato thetato anupalabbhiyamāneti evaṃ kattabbe ca akattabbe ca bhūtato thirato apaññāyamāne alabbhamāne.
atk-s0402a0:587_7: Yadi hi kattabbaṃ kātuṃ akattabbato ca viramituṃ labheyya,
atk-s0402a0:587_9: Yasmā pana ubhayampi taṃ esa nupalabbhati,
atk-s0402a0:587_10: tasmā taṃ saccato thetato na upalabbhati,
atk-s0402a0:587_13: Anārakkhānaṃ viharatanti chasu dvāresu nirārakkhānaṃ viharantānaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:587_14: Na hoti paccattaṃ sahadhammiko samaṇavādoti evaṃ bhūtānaṃ tumhākaṃ vā aññesaṃ vā mayaṃ samaṇāti paccattaṃ sakāraṇo samaṇavādo na hoti na ijjhati.
atk-s0402a0:588_0: Evaṃ pubbekatavādino niggahetvā idāni issaranimmānavādino niggahetuṃ tatra,
atk-s0402a0:589_0: Evaṃ imesaṃ titthāyatanānaṃ parampi gantvā akiriyāya saṇṭhahanabhāvena tucchabhāvaṃ aniyyānikabhāvaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:589_1: asārabhāvena thusakoṭṭanasadisataṃ āpajjanabhāvena aggisaññāya dhamamānakhajjupanakasarikkhataṃ taṃdiṭṭhikānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:589_2: purimassapi majjhimassapi pacchimassapi atthadassanatāya abhāvena andhaveṇūpamataṃ saddamatteneva tāni
atk-s0402a0:589_3: gahetvā sāradiṭṭhikānaṃ pathaviyaṃ patitassa beluvapakkassa daddabhāyitasaddaṃ sutvā “pathavī saṃvaṭṭamānā
atk-s0402a0:589_4: āgacchatī”ti saññāya palāyantena sasakena sarikkhabhāvañca dassetvā idāni attanā desitassa dhammassa
atk-s0402a0:589_5: sārabhāvañceva niyyānikabhāvañca dassetuṃ ayaṃ kho pana,
atk-s0402a0:589_7: Tattha aniggahitoti aññehi aniggahito niggahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyo.
atk-s0402a0:589_9: “saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ naṃ karissāmā”ti pavattehipi tathā kātuṃ asakkuṇeyyo.
atk-s0402a0:589_11: Appaṭikuṭṭhoti “kiṃ iminā haratha na”nti evaṃ appaṭibāhito,
atk-s0402a0:590_1: bhikkhave”ti pañhaṃ pucchitvā “imā cha dhātuyo”tiādinā nayena mātikaṃ nikkhipitvā yathāpaṭipāṭiyā vibhajitvā dassento puna imā cha dhātuyotiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:590_5: Manopavicārāti vitakkavicārapādehi aṭṭhārasasu ṭhānesu manassa upavicārā.
atk-s0402a0:591_7: Taṃ kho panetaṃ saṅkhepato āgataṭṭhāne saṅkhepatopi vitthāratopi kathetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0402a0:591_8: Vitthārato āgataṭṭhāne saṅkhepato kathetuṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0402a0:591_10: Imasmiṃ pana titthāyatanasutte idaṃ saṅkhepato chadhātuvasena kammaṭṭhānaṃ āgataṃ.
atk-s0402a0:592_0: Saṅkhepato chadhātuvasena kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariggaṇhantopi evaṃ pariggaṇhāti –
atk-s0402a0:592_1: pathavīdhātu āpodhātu tejodhātu vāyodhātūti imāni cattāri mahābhūtāni,
atk-s0402a0:592_3: Ekasmiṃ ca upādārūpe diṭṭhe sesāni tevīsati diṭṭhānevāti sallakkhetabbāni.
atk-s0402a0:592_7: phasso ca cetanā ca saṅkhārakkhandhoti ime cattāro arūpakkhandhā nāma.
atk-s0402a0:592_8: Cattāri pana mahābhūtāni catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādārūpaṃ rūpakkhandho nāma.
atk-s0402a0:592_10: rūpakkhandho rūpanti nāmañca rūpañcāti dveyeva dhammā honti,
atk-s0402a0:592_11: tato uddhaṃ satto vā jīvo vā natthīti evaṃ ekassa bhikkhuno saṅkhepato chadhātuvasena arahattasampāpakaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:593_0: Vitthārato pariggaṇhanto pana cattāri mahābhūtāni pariggaṇhitvā ākāsadhātupariggahānusārena tevīsati upādārūpāni pariggaṇhāti.
atk-s0402a0:593_1: Atha nesaṃ paccayaṃ upaparikkhanto puna cattāreva mahābhūtāni disvā tesu pathavīdhātu vīsatikoṭṭhāsā,
atk-s0402a0:593_4: vāyodhātu chakoṭṭhāsāti koṭṭhāsavasena samodhānetvā dvācattālīsa mahābhūtāni ca vavatthapetvā tesu tevīsati
atk-s0402a0:593_6: Tāni ca vatthurūpena saddhiṃ chasaṭṭhi hontīti chasaṭṭhi rūpāni passati.
atk-s0402a0:593_9: Tehi sahajātā vedanādayopi tattakāyevāti ekāsīti vedanā vedanākkhandho,
atk-s0402a0:593_11: ekāsīti cetanā saṅkhārakkhandhoti ime cattāro arūpakkhandhā tebhūmakavasena gayhamānā catuvīsādhikāni
atk-s0402a0:593_12: tīṇi dhammasatāni hontīti iti ime ca arūpadhammā chasaṭṭhi ca rūpadhammāti sabbepi samodhānetvā nāmañca
atk-s0402a0:593_14: tato uddhaṃ satto vā jīvo vā natthīti nāmarūpavasena pañcakkhandhe vavatthapetvā tesaṃ paccayaṃ pariyesanto
atk-s0402a0:593_15: avijjāpaccayā taṇhāpaccayā kammapaccayā āhārapaccayāti evaṃ paccayaṃ disvā “atītepi imehi paccayehi idaṃ
atk-s0402a0:593_18: etarahipi etehiyeva pavattatī”ti tīsu kālesu kaṅkhaṃ vitaritvā anukkamena paṭipajjamāno arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0402a0:593_19: Evaṃ vitthāratopi chadhātuvasena arahattasampāpakaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:594_0: Cakkhu phassāyatananti suvaṇṇādīnaṃ suvaṇṇādiākaro viya dve cakkhuviññāṇāni dve sampaṭicchanāni tīṇi
atk-s0402a0:594_1: santīraṇānīti imehi sattahi viññāṇehi sahajātānaṃ sattannaṃ phassānaṃ samuṭṭhānaṭṭhena ākaroti āyatanaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:594_3: Mano phassāyatananti ettha pana dvāvīsati vipākaphassā yojetabbā.
atk-s0402a0:594_4: Iti hidaṃ chaphassāyatanānaṃ vasena kammaṭṭhānaṃ āgataṃ.
atk-s0402a0:594_7: ettha hi purimāni pañca āyatanāni upādārūpaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:594_8: tesu diṭṭhesu avasesaṃ upādārūpaṃ diṭṭhameva hoti.
atk-s0402a0:594_11: tena sahajātā vedanādayo sesā tayo arūpakkhandhāti heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva saṅkhepato ca vitthārato ca arahattasampāpakaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:595_0: Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvāti cakkhuviññāṇena rūpaṃ passitvā.
atk-s0402a0:595_4: Ettha ca iṭṭhaṃ vā hotu aniṭṭhaṃ vā,
atk-s0402a0:595_13: Taṃ kho panetaṃ saṅkhepato āgataṭṭhāne saṅkhepatopi vitthāratopi kathetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0402a0:595_14: Vitthārato āgataṭṭhāne saṅkhepato kathetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0402a0:595_15: Imasmiṃ pana titthāyatanasutte idaṃ saṅkhepato aṭṭhārasamanopavicāravasena kammaṭṭhānaṃ āgataṃ.
atk-s0402a0:596_2: rūpaṃ saddo gandho rasoti imāni nava upādārūpāni,
atk-s0402a0:596_3: tesu diṭṭhesu sesaṃ upādārūpaṃ diṭṭhameva hoti.
atk-s0402a0:596_7: tena sahajātā vedanādayo tayo arūpakkhandhāti heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva saṅkhepato ca vitthārato ca arahattasampāpakaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:597_3: vitthārato panetaṃ padaṃ visuddhimagge pakāsitaṃ. Channaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:597_7: Yassa hi tathāgato dvādasapadaṃ paccayāvaṭṭaṃ kathetukāmo hoti,
atk-s0402a0:597_9: Gabbhāvakkanti vaṭṭasmiṃ hi dassite kathetumpi sukhaṃ hoti paraṃ avabodhe utumpīti sukhāvabodhanatthaṃ idamāraddhanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:597_10: Tattha channaṃ dhātūnanti heṭṭhā vuttānaṃyeva pathavīdhātuādīnaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:597_14: Kassa channaṃ dhātūnaṃ paccayena, kiṃ mātu,
atk-s0402a0:597_17: paṭisandhiggaṇhanakasattasseva pana channaṃ dhātūnaṃ paccayena gabbhassāvakkanti nāma hoti.
atk-s0402a0:597_18: Gabbho ca nāmesa nirayagabbho tiracchānayonigabbho pettivisayagabbho manussagabbho devagabbhoti nānappakāro hoti.
atk-s0402a0:597_20: Avakkanti hotīti okkanti nibbatti pātubhāvo hoti,
atk-s0402a0:599_0: Okkantiyā sati nāmarūpanti “viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpa”nti vuttaṭṭhāne vatthudasakaṃ kāyadasakaṃ bhāvadasakaṃ
atk-s0402a0:599_1: tayo arūpino khandhāti tettiṃsa dhammā gahitā,
atk-s0402a0:599_2: imasmiṃ pana “okkantiyā sati nāmarūpa”nti vuttaṭṭhāne viññāṇakkhandhampi pakkhipitvā gabbhaseyyakānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:599_4: Nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanantiādīhi yatheva okkantiyā sati nāmarūpapātubhāvo dassito,
atk-s0402a0:600_0: Vediyamānassāti ettha vedanaṃ anubhavantopi vediyamānoti vuccati jānantopi.
atk-s0402a0:600_2: vediyatīti maṃ saṅgho dhāretū”ti ettha hi anubhavanto vediyamāno nāma,
atk-s0402a0:600_3: “sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vediyamāno sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vediyāmīti pajānātī”ti ettha jānanto.
atk-s0402a0:600_5: Idaṃ dukkhanti paññapemīti evaṃ jānantassa sattassa “idaṃ dukkhaṃ ettakaṃ dukkhaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:600_6: natthi ito uddhaṃ dukkha”nti paññapemi bodhemi jānāpemi.
atk-s0402a0:601_1: ṭhapetvā hi taṇhaṃ tebhūmakā pañcakkhandhā dukkhaṃ nāma,
atk-s0402a0:601_3: tesaṃ dvinnampi saccānaṃ anuppattinirodho dukkhanirodho nāma,
atk-s0402a0:601_4: ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā nāma.
atk-s0402a0:601_5: Iti bhagavā okkantiyā sati nāmarūpanti kathentopi vediyamānassa jānamānasseva kathesi,
atk-s0402a0:601_14: ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti paññapemīti kathentopi vediyamānassa jānamānasseva kathesi.
atk-s0402a0:602_0: Idāni tāni paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapitāni saccāni vitthārento katamañca,
atk-s0402a0:602_5: tattha “dukkhasamudayaṃ ariyasaccaṃ yāyaṃ taṇhā ponobbhavikā”ti imāya tantiyā āgataṃ,
atk-s0402a0:602_7: Tattha ca dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ “yo tassāyeva taṇhāya asesavirāganirodho”ti imāya tantiyā āgataṃ,
atk-s0402a0:603_0: Tattha asesavirāganirodhāti asesavirāgena ca asesanirodhena ca.
atk-s0402a0:603_4: Imehi pana padehi yaṃ āgamma avijjādayo nirujjhanti,
atk-s0402a0:603_6: Nibbānañhi avijjānirodhotipi saṅkhāranirodhotipi evaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ nirodhanāmena kathīyati.
atk-s0402a0:603_10: Tattha yasmā avijjādīnaṃ nirodho nāma khīṇākāropi vuccati arahattampi nibbānampi,
atk-s0402a0:603_11: tasmā idha khīṇākāradassanavasena dvādasasu ṭhānesu arahattaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:603_13: Idaṃ vuccatīti ettha nibbānameva sandhāya idanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:603_14: Aṭṭhaṅgikoti na aṭṭhahi aṅgehi vinimutto añño maggo nāma atthi.
atk-s0402a0:603_15: Yathā pana pañcaṅgikaṃ tūriyanti vutte pañcaṅgamattameva tūriyanti vuttaṃ hoti,
atk-s0402a0:603_18: Niggaṇhanto hi hāpetvā vā dasseti vaḍḍhetvā vā taṃ parivattetvā vā.
atk-s0402a0:603_19: Tattha yasmā cattāri ariyasaccāni “na imāni cattāri,
atk-s0402a0:603_20: dve vā tīṇi vā”ti evaṃ hāpetvāpi “pañca vā cha vā”ti evaṃ vaḍḍhetvāpi “na imāni cattāri ariyasaccāni,
atk-s0402a0:603_21: aññāneva cattāri ariyasaccānī”ti dassetuṃ na sakkā.
atk-s0402a0:605_1: Dutiye amātāputtikānīti mātā ca putto ca mātāputtaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:605_2: parittātuṃ samatthabhāvena natthi ettha mātāputtanti amātāputtikāni.
atk-s0402a0:605_4: Tattha mātāpi puttaṃ nappaṭilabhatīti tasmiṃ aggibhaye uppanne mātāpi puttaṃ passituṃ na labhati,
atk-s0402a0:605_5: puttopi mātaraṃ passituṃ na labhatīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:605_9: Yadā hi te aṭavito janapadaṃ otaritvā gāmanigamarājadhāniyo paharitvā vilumpanti,
atk-s0402a0:605_13: Bhayasmiṃ hi sampatte yesaṃ yānakāni atthi,
atk-s0402a0:605_14: te attano parikkhārabhaṇḍaṃ tesu āropetvā palāyanti.
atk-s0402a0:605_16: te kājena vā ādāya sīsena vā ukkhipitvā palāyantiyeva.
atk-s0402a0:605_21: Mātāpi puttaṃ paṭilabhatīti āgacchantaṃ vā gacchantaṃ vā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne nilīnaṃ vā passituṃ labhati.
atk-s0402a0:605_23: Mātāpi puttaṃ paṭilabhatīti kulle vā uḷumpe vā mattikābhājane vā dārukkhaṇḍe vā laggaṃ vuyhamānaṃ passituṃ paṭilabhati,
atk-s0402a0:605_24: sotthinā vā puna uttaritvā gāme vā araññe vā ṭhitaṃ passituṃ labhatīti.
atk-s0402a0:606_0: Evaṃ pariyāyato amātāputtikāni bhayāni dassetvā idāni nippariyāyena dassento tīṇimānītiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:606_4: “jaraṃ paṭicca uppajjati bhayaṃ bhayānakaṃ chambhitattaṃ lomahaṃso cetaso utrāso.
atk-s0402a0:606_6: maraṇaṃ paṭicca uppajjati bhayaṃ bhayānakaṃ chambhitattaṃ lomahaṃso cetaso utrāso”ti.
atk-s0402a0:608_3: Cārikā ca nāmesā bhagavato duvidhā hoti turitacārikā ca aturitacārikā cāti.
atk-s0402a0:608_4: Tattha dūrepi bodhaneyyapuggalaṃ disvā tassa bodhanatthāya sahasā gamanaṃ turitacārikā nāma.
atk-s0402a0:608_6: Yaṃ pana gāmanigamapaṭipāṭiyā devasikaṃ yojanaaddhayojanavasena piṇḍapātacariyādīhi lokaṃ anuggaṇhantassa gamanaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:608_10: Vitthārena pana cārikākathā sumaṅgalavilāsiniyā dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāya ambaṭṭhasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttā.
atk-s0402a0:608_17: Tasmā tassa avidūre buddhānaṃ anucchaviko eko vanasaṇḍo atthi,
atk-s0402a0:609_5: na tesaṃ koci savanantarāyo ahosī”ti ayamattho veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:610_12: kenaci pārijuññena anabhibhūto aparikkhīṇaṃyeva taṃ kulaṃ pahāya saddhāya pabbajitoti vuttaṃ hoti.
