atk-s0402a0:610_14: tassa kho pana bhoto gotamassāti attho.
atk-s0402a0:610_19: Abbhuggatoti sadevakaṃ lokaṃ ajjhottharitvā uggato. Kinti?
atk-s0402a0:610_26: Iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇenāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a0:611_3: pāpakaraṇe rahābhāvāti imehi kāraṇehi so bhagavā arahanti veditabbo”tiādinā nayena mātikaṃ nikkhipitvā
atk-s0402a0:611_4: sabbāneva etāni padāni visuddhimagge buddhānussatiniddese vitthāritānīti tato nesaṃ vitthāro gahetabbo.
atk-s0402a0:612_0: So imaṃ lokanti so bhavaṃ gotamo imaṃ lokaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:612_16: Evamettha tīhi padehi okāsalokena saddhiṃ sattaloko,
atk-s0402a0:613_11: Evaṃ sabbepi tibhavūpage satte tīhākārehi tīsu padesu pakkhipitvā puna dvīhi padehi pariyādātuṃ sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṃ pajaṃ sadevamanussanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:613_12: Evaṃ pañcahi padehi tena tenākārena tedhātukameva pariyādinnanti.
atk-s0402a0:614_0: Sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedetīti sayanti sāmaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:615_1: pariyosānakalyāṇanti so bhagavā sattesu kāruññataṃ paṭicca hitvāpi anuttaraṃ vivekasukhaṃ dhammaṃ deseti.
atk-s0402a0:615_2: Tañca kho appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā desento ādikalyāṇādippakārameva deseti,
atk-s0402a0:615_3: ādimhipi kalyāṇaṃ bhaddakaṃ anavajjameva katvā deseti, majjhepi,
atk-s0402a0:615_4: pariyosānepi kalyāṇaṃ bhaddakaṃ anavajjameva katvā desetīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a0:616_2: Desanāya tāva catuppadikāyapi gāthāya paṭhamapādo ādi nāma,
atk-s0402a0:616_10: majjhe eko vā dve vā bahū vā majjhameva.
atk-s0402a0:617_5: majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhā”ti evaṃ vutto pana ariyamaggo majjhaṃ nāma.
atk-s0402a0:617_8: brahmacariyaṃ etaṃpāraṃ etaṃpariyosāna”nti ettha phalaṃ pariyosananti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:617_11: brahmacariyaṃ vussati nibbānaparāyaṇaṃ nibbānapariyosāna”nti ettha nibbānaṃ pariyosānanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:617_13: Bhagavā hi dhammaṃ desento ādimhi sīlaṃ dassetvā majjhe maggaṃ pariyosāne nibbānaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0402a0:620_0: Sātthaṃ sabyañjananti yassa hi yāgubhattaitthipurisādivaṇṇanānissitā desanā hoti,
atk-s0402a0:620_2: Bhagavā pana tathārūpaṃ desanaṃ pahāya catusatipaṭṭhānādinissitaṃ desanaṃ deseti.
atk-s0402a0:620_4: Yassa pana desanā ekabyañjanādiyuttā vā sabbaniroṭṭhabyañjanā vā sabbavissaṭṭhabyañjanā vā sabbaniggahitabyañjanā vā,
atk-s0402a0:620_5: tassa damiḷakirātayavanādimilakkhānaṃ bhāsā viya byañjanapāripūriyā abhāvato abyañjanā nāma desanā hoti.
atk-s0402a0:622_0: Sambandhaṃ vavatthitaṃ vimuttaṃ, dasadhā byañjanabuddhiyā pabhedo”ti. –
atk-s0402a0:623_0: Evaṃ vuttaṃ dasavidhaṃ byañjanaṃ amakkhetvā paripuṇṇabyañjanameva katvā dhammaṃ deseti.
atk-s0402a0:623_8: Yo hi “imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ nissāya lābhaṃ vā sakkāraṃ vā labhissāmī”ti deseti,
atk-s0402a0:623_10: Bhagavā pana lokāmisanirapekkho hitapharaṇeneva mettābhāvanāya muduhadayo ullumpanasabhāvasaṇṭhitena cittena deseti.
atk-s0402a0:623_12: Brahmacariyaṃ pakāsetīti ettha brahmacariyanti sikkhattayasaṅgahitaṃ sakalaṃ sāsanaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:623_13: Tasmā brahmacariyaṃ pakāsetīti so dhammaṃ deseti ādikalyāṇaṃ…pe…
atk-s0402a0:623_15: evaṃ desento ca sikkhattayasaṅgahitaṃ sakalasāsanabrahmacariyaṃ pakāsetīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0402a0:623_17: brahmabhūtānaṃ vā buddhādīnaṃ cariyanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a0:624_0: Sādhu kho panāti sundaraṃ kho pana,
atk-s0402a0:624_2: Tathārūpānaṃ arahatanti yathārūpo so bhavaṃ gotamo,
atk-s0402a0:624_3: evarūpānaṃ anekehipi kappakoṭisatasahassehi dullabhadassanānaṃ byāmappabhāparikkhittehi asītianubyañjanapaṭimaṇḍitehi
atk-s0402a0:624_6: Dassanaṃ hotīti pasādasommāni akkhīni ummīletvā dassanamattampi sādhu hoti.
atk-s0402a0:624_7: Sace pana aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatena brahmassarena dhammaṃ desentassa ekapadampi sotuṃ labhissāma,
atk-s0402a0:624_9: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsūti sabbakiccāni pahāya tuṭṭhamānasā agamaṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:624_12: “sace no micchādiṭṭhikā codessanti ‘kasmā tumhe samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ vanditthā’ti,
atk-s0402a0:624_14: Sace no sammādiṭṭhikā codessanti ‘kasmā bhagavantaṃ na vanditthā’ti,
atk-s0402a0:625_2: ahaṃ asukassa putto datto nāma mitto nāma idhāgato”ti vadantā nāmaṃ sāventi nāma.
atk-s0402a0:625_4: ahaṃ vāseṭṭho nāma kaccāno nāma idhāgato”ti vadantā gottaṃ sāventi nāma.
atk-s0402a0:625_5: Ete kira daliddā jiṇṇakulaputtā “parisamajjhe nāmagottavasena pākaṭā bhavissāmā”ti evaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:625_8: Tattha kerāṭikā “ekaṃ dve kathāsallāpe karonte vissāsiko hoti,
atk-s0402a0:625_9: atha vissāse sati ekaṃ dve bhikkhā adātuṃ na yutta”nti tato attānaṃ mocentā tuṇhībhūtā nisīdanti.
atk-s0402a0:625_10: Andhabālā aññāṇatāyeva avakkhittamattikāpiṇḍā viya yattha katthaci tuṇhībhūtā nisīdanti.
atk-s0402a0:626_1: Etadavocāti pādantato paṭṭhāya yāva kesaggā tathāgatassa sarīraṃ olokento asītianubyañjanasamujjalehi
atk-s0402a0:626_2: dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇehi paṭimaṇḍitaṃ sarīrā nikkhamitvā samantato asītihatthappadesaṃ ajjhottharitvā
atk-s0402a0:626_3: ṭhitāhi chabbaṇṇāhi ghanabuddharaṃsīhi samparivāritaṃ tathāgatassa sarīraṃ disvā sañjātavimhayo vaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0402a0:627_4: Tassa hi pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ patiṭṭhitokāsassa vippasannataṃ disvā tesaṃ vippasannatā pākaṭā ahosi.
atk-s0402a0:627_5: Yasmā pana sā mane vippasanneyeva hoti,
atk-s0402a0:627_8: Taṃ esa vippasannataṃ gahetvā “vippasannāni indriyānī”ti āha.
atk-s0402a0:627_11: Sāradaṃ badarapaṇḍunti saradakāle jātaṃ nātisuparipakkaṃ badaraṃ.
atk-s0402a0:627_14: Sampati bandhanā pamuttanti taṃkhaṇaññeva bandhanā pamuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:627_15: Tassa hi bandhanamūlaṃ apanetvā paramukhaṃ katvā phalake ṭhapitassa caturaṅgulamattaṃ ṭhānaṃ olokentānaṃ parisuddhaṃ pariyodātaṃ hutvā khāyati.
atk-s0402a0:627_19: Ukkāmukhe sukusalasampahaṭṭhanti suvaṇṇakārauddhane pacitvā sukusalena suvaṇṇakārena ghaṭṭanaparimajjanahaṃsanena
atk-s0402a0:627_21: Paṇḍukambale nikkhittanti agginā pacitvā dīpidāṭhāya ghaṃsitvā gerukaparikammaṃ katvā rattakambale ṭhapitaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:628_20: Kuttakanti soḷasannaṃ nāṭakitthīnaṃ ṭhatvā naccanayoggaṃ uṇṇāmayattharaṇaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:628_21: Hatthattharādayo hatthipiṭṭhādīsu attharaṇakaattharakā ceva hatthirūpādīni dassetvā kataattharakā ca.
atk-s0402a0:629_5: so bhagavato vippasannindriyāditaṃ disvā “addhā esa evarūpesu uccāsayanamahāsayanesu nisīdati ceva nipajjati ca.
atk-s0402a0:629_7: parisuddho chavivaṇṇo pariyodāto”ti maññamāno imaṃ senāsanavaṇṇaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0402a0:630_0: Laddhā ca pana na kappantīti ettha kiñci kiñci kappati.
atk-s0402a0:630_5: tūlikaṃ vijaṭetvā “bimbohanañca kātu”nti vacanato imānipi ekena vidhānena kappanti.
atk-s0402a0:630_6: Akappiyaṃ pana upādāya sabbāneva na kappantīti vuttāni.
atk-s0402a0:631_3: Ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāyāti aṭṭhārasa piṭṭhikaṇṭake koṭiyā koṭiṃ paṭipādento ujuṃ kāyaṃ ṭhapetvā.
atk-s0402a0:631_4: Parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvāti kammaṭṭhānābhimukhaṃ satiṃ ṭhapetvā,
atk-s0402a0:631_11: Upasampajja viharāmīti paṭilabhitvā paccakkhaṃ katvā viharāmi.
atk-s0402a0:631_13: Dibbo me eso tasmiṃ samaye caṅkamo hotīti cattāri hi rūpajjhānāni samāpajjitvā caṅkamantassa caṅkamo dibbacaṅkamo nāma hoti,
atk-s0402a0:632_0: So evaṃ pajānāmi “rāgo me pahīno”ti mahābodhipallaṅke arahattamaggena pahīnarāgameva dassento “so evaṃ pajānāmi rāgo me pahīno”ti āha.
atk-s0402a0:632_5: Phalasamāpattiñhi samāpannassapi samāpattito vuṭṭhitassāpi caṅkamādayo ariyacaṅkamādayo honti.
atk-s0402a0:634_3: gijjhā vā tassa kūṭesu vasantīti gijjhakūṭo,
atk-s0402a0:634_5: Etenassa rājagahaṃ gocaragāmaṃ katvā viharantassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ dassitaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:634_9: Sarabho nāma paribbājako acirapakkanto hotīti sarabhoti evaṃnāmako paribbājako imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajitvā nacirasseva pakkanto hoti,
atk-s0402a0:634_11: Sammāsambuddhe hi loke uppanne titthiyā naṭṭhalābhasakkārā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0402a0:635_0: “Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā sakkato hoti garukato mānito pūjito apacito lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:635_1: Aññatitthiyā pana paribbājakā asakkatā honti agarukatā amānitā apūjitā na lābhino cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārāna”nti (udā.14;
atk-s0402a0:636_0: Te evaṃ parihīnalābhasakkārā pañcasatamattā ekasmiṃ paribbājakārāme sannipatitvā sammantayiṃsu – “bho,
atk-s0402a0:636_1: mayaṃ samaṇassa gotamassa uppannakālato paṭṭhāya hatalābhasakkārā jātā,
atk-s0402a0:636_2: samaṇassa gotamassa sāvakānañcassa ekaṃ avaṇṇaṃ upadhāretha,
atk-s0402a0:636_3: avaṇṇaṃ pattharitvā etassa sāsanaṃ garahitvā amhākaṃ lābhasakkāraṃ uppādessāmā”ti.
atk-s0402a0:636_5: “tīsu dvāresu ājīve cāti catūsupi ṭhānesu samaṇassa gotamassa vajjaṃ passituṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0402a0:636_6: imāni cattāri ṭhānāni muñcitvā aññattha olokethā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:636_9: ime anvaḍḍhamāsaṃ sannipatitvā dvāravātapānāni pidhāya sāmaṇerānampi pavesanaṃ na denti.
atk-s0402a0:636_11: āvaṭṭanimāyaṃ osāretvā osāretvā janaṃ āvaṭṭetvā āvaṭṭetvā khādanti.
atk-s0402a0:636_18: taṃ mayaṃ amhākaṃ samaye jeṭṭhakaṃ karissāmā”ti.
atk-s0402a0:637_2: ahaṃ na sakkhissāmī”ti bahūhi vutte sarabhaṃ pucchiṃsu –
atk-s0402a0:637_5: sace tumhe attano kathāya ṭhatvā maṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ karissathā”ti.
atk-s0402a0:637_7: tvaṃ katoyevāsi amhehi jeṭṭhakoti. So āha –
atk-s0402a0:637_8: “taṃ āharantena thenetvā vā vilumpitvā vā āharituṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0402a0:637_9: samaṇassa pana gotamassa sāvakasadisena hutvā tassa sāvake vanditvā vattapaṭivattaṃ katvā tesaṃ patte bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā āharituṃ sakkā.
atk-s0402a0:637_11: Yaṃkiñci katvā āharitvā ca no dehīti.
atk-s0402a0:637_12: Tena hi maṃ disvā apassantā viya bhaveyyāthāti paribbājakānaṃ saññaṃ datvā dutiyadivase pātova uṭṭhāya
atk-s0402a0:637_13: gijjhakūṭamahāvihāraṃ gantvā diṭṭhadiṭṭhānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitena pāde vandi.
atk-s0402a0:637_16: ayaṃ pana saddho bhavissati pasanno”ti. Bhante,
atk-s0402a0:637_18: mayaṃ pana anupadhāretvā atittheneva pakkhantā aniyyānikamagge vicarāmāti.
atk-s0402a0:637_19: So evaṃ vatvā diṭṭhe diṭṭhe bhikkhū punappunaṃ vandati,
atk-s0402a0:638_0: Taṃ iminā nīhārena vasantaṃ eko mahāthero disvā,
atk-s0402a0:638_3: kiṃ na pabbajasī”ti. Ko maṃ, bhante,
atk-s0402a0:638_5: Mayañhi cirakālaṃ bhadantānaṃ paccatthikā hutvā vicarimhāti.
atk-s0402a0:638_9: Atha naṃ thero vatte pasīditvā nacirasseva upasampādesi.
atk-s0402a0:638_10: So uposathadivase bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ uposathaggaṃ pavisitvā bhikkhū mahantena ussāhena pātimokkhaṃ paggaṇhante
atk-s0402a0:638_11: disvā “iminā nīhārena osāretvā osāretvā lokaṃ khādanti,
atk-s0402a0:638_22: So gaṇhanto paribbājake passitvā “kīdisaṃ ācariyā”ti pucchito, “āvuso,
atk-s0402a0:638_24: katipāhena āharissāmī”ti vatvā nacirasseva uggaṇhitvā upajjhāyaṃ āha –
atk-s0402a0:639_0: So punadivase yathānivatthapārutova gahitanīhāreneva pattaṃ gahetvā gijjhakūṭā nikkhamma paribbājakārāmaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0402a0:639_2: nāsakkhittha maññe āvaṭṭanimāyaṃ āharitu”nti taṃ parivārayiṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:639_5: ito paṭṭhāya amhākaṃ lābhasakkāro mahā bhavissati.
atk-s0402a0:639_7: mā vivādaṃ akatthāti. Sace te, ācariya,
atk-s0402a0:639_12: nagare vicarantā samaṇassa gotamassa avaṇṇaṃ kathessāmā”ti anugghāṭitesuyeva nagaradvāresu dvārasamīpaṃ
atk-s0402a0:639_14: Evaṃ saliṅgeneva apakkantaṃ taṃ paribbājakaṃ sandhāya –
atk-s0402a0:640_0: Taṃ divasaṃ pana bhagavā paccūsasamaye lokaṃ olokento idaṃ addasa –
atk-s0402a0:640_1: “ajja sarabho paribbājako nagare vicaritvā pakāsanīyakammaṃ karissati,
atk-s0402a0:640_2: tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ avaṇṇaṃ kathento visaṃ siñcitvā paribbājakārāmaṃ gamissati,
atk-s0402a0:640_5: Tasmiṃ samāgame caturāsīti pāṇasahassāni amatapānaṃ pivissantī”ti.
atk-s0402a0:640_7: yathāruciyā avaṇṇaṃ pattharatū”ti cintetvā ānandattheraṃ āmantesi – “ānanda,
atk-s0402a0:640_8: aṭṭhārasasu mahāvihāresu bhikkhusaṅghassa mayā saddhiṃyeva piṇḍāya carituṃ ārocehī”ti.
atk-s0402a0:640_11: Satthā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ ādāya dvāragāmasamīpeyeva piṇḍāya cari.
atk-s0402a0:640_12: Sarabhopi paribbājakehi saddhiṃ nagaraṃ paviṭṭho tattha tattha parisamajjhe rājadvāravīthicatukkādīsu
atk-s0402a0:640_13: ca gantvā “aññāto mayā samaṇānaṃ sakyaputtiyānaṃ dhammo”tiādīni abhāsi.
atk-s0402a0:640_14: Taṃ sandhāya so rājagahe parisati evaṃ vācaṃ bhāsatītiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:640_19: Sace hi samaṇassa gotamassa sāsane koci sāro abhavissa,
atk-s0402a0:640_22: āvaṭṭanimāyaṃ osāretvā samaṇā lokaṃ khādantīti evamatthaṃ dīpento evamāha.
atk-s0402a0:641_0: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhūti atha evaṃ tasmiṃ paribbājake bhāsamāne araññavāsino pañcasatā bhikkhū “asukaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:641_1: nāma satthā piṇḍāya carituṃ gato”ti ajānantā bhikkhācāravelāyaṃ rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:641_4: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsūti “imaṃ kāraṇaṃ dasabalassa ārocessāmā”ti upasaṅkamiṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:642_1: Adhivāsesi bhagavā tuṇhībhāvenāti kāyaṅgavācaṅgāni acopetvā abbhantare khantiṃ dhāretvā citteneva adhivāsesīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:642_3: “kiṃ nu kho ajja mayā sarabhassa vādaṃ maddituṃ gacchantena ekakena gantabbaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:642_8: “samaṇo gotamo vāduppattiṭṭhānaṃ gacchanto pakkhaṃ ukkhipitvā gantvā parisabalena uppannaṃ vādaṃ maddati,
atk-s0402a0:642_10: Na kho pana mayhaṃ uppanne vāde paraṃ gahetvā maddanakiccaṃ atthi,
atk-s0402a0:642_12: Anacchariyaṃ cetaṃ yvāhaṃ idāni buddhabhūto attano uppannaṃ vādaṃ maddeyyaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:642_13: cariyaṃ caraṇakāle ahetukapaṭisandhiyaṃ nibbattenāpi hi mayā vahitabbaṃ dhuraṃ añño vahituṃ samattho nāma nāhosi.
atk-s0402a0:644_0: Tadāssu kaṇhaṃ yuñjenti, svāssu taṃ vahate dhura”nti. –
atk-s0402a0:645_1: Atīte kira eko satthavāho ekissā mahallikāya gehe nivāsaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0402a0:645_2: Athassa ekissā dhenuyā rattibhāgasamanantare gabbhavuṭṭhānaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0402a0:645_4: Mahallikāya vacchakaṃ diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya puttasineho udapādi.
atk-s0402a0:645_8: imameva vacchakaṃ dehī”ti āha. Gaṇha, ammāti.
atk-s0402a0:645_9: Sā taṃ gaṇhitvā khīraṃ pāyetvā yāgubhattatiṇādīni dadamānā posesi.
atk-s0402a0:645_10: So vuddhimanvāya paripuṇṇarūpo balavīriyasampanno ahosi sampannācāro,
atk-s0402a0:645_12: Athekassa satthavāhassa pañcahi sakaṭasatehi āgacchantassa udakabhinnaṭṭhāne sakaṭacakkaṃ laggi.
atk-s0402a0:645_13: So dasapi vīsampi tiṃsampi yojetvā nīharāpetuṃ asakkonto kāḷakaṃ upasaṅkamitvā āha – “tāta,
atk-s0402a0:645_17: “añño iminā saddhiṃ dhuraṃ vahituṃ samattho natthī”ti dhurasakaṭe yottaṃ bandhitvā taṃ ekakaṃyeva yojesi.
atk-s0402a0:645_18: So taṃ sakaṭaṃ ukkhipitvā thale patiṭṭhāpetvā eteneva nihārena pañca sakaṭasatāni nīhari.
atk-s0402a0:645_19: So sabbapacchimasakaṭaṃ nīharitvā mociyamāno “su”nti katvā sīsaṃ ukkhipi.
atk-s0402a0:646_0: Satthavāho “ayaṃ ettakāni sakaṭāni ukkhipanto evaṃ na akāsi,
atk-s0402a0:646_1: vetanatthaṃ maññe karotī”ti sakaṭagaṇanāya kahāpaṇe gahetvā pañcasatabhaṇḍikaṃ tassa gīvāya bandhāpesi.
atk-s0402a0:646_2: So aññesaṃ attano santikaṃ allīyituṃ adento ujukaṃ gehameva agamāsi.
atk-s0402a0:646_3: Mahallikā disvā mocetvā kahāpaṇabhāvaṃ ñatvā “kasmā, putta,
atk-s0402a0:646_5: mā tvaṃ ‘mayā kammaṃ katvā ābhatena ayaṃ jīvissatī’ti saññamakāsī”ti vatvā goṇaṃ uṇhodakena nhāpetvā
atk-s0402a0:646_6: telena abbhañjitvā “ito paṭṭhāya puna mā evamakāsī”ti ovadi.
atk-s0402a0:646_7: Evaṃ satthā “cariyaṃ caraṇakāle ahetukapaṭisandhiyaṃ nibbattenāpi hi mayā vahitabbadhuraṃ añño vahituṃ
atk-s0402a0:646_8: samattho nāma nāhosī”ti cintetvā ekakova agamāsi.
atk-s0402a0:646_9: Taṃ dassetuṃ atha kho bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhitotiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:647_0: Tattha paṭisallānāti puthuttārammaṇehi cittaṃ paṭisaṃharitvā sallānato,
atk-s0402a0:647_2: Tenupasaṅkamīti paribbājakesu sakalanagare pakāsanīyakammaṃ katvā nagarā nikkhamma paribbājakārāme sannipatitvā “sace,
atk-s0402a0:647_6: Samaṇe gotame ekaṃ karonte ahaṃ dve karissāmi,
atk-s0402a0:647_15: sataṃ karonte sahassaṃ karissāmīti evaṃ aññamaññaṃ sīhanādakathaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā nisinnesu upasaṅkami.
atk-s0402a0:648_0: Upasaṅkamanto pana yasmā paribbājakārāmassa nagaramajjheneva maggo,
atk-s0402a0:648_1: tasmā surattadupaṭṭaṃ nivāsetvā sugatamahācīvaraṃ pārupitvā vissaṭṭhabalo rājā viya ekakova nagaramajjhena agamāsi.
atk-s0402a0:648_2: Micchādiṭṭhikā disvā “paribbājakā samaṇassa gotamassa pakāsanīyakammaṃ karontā avaṇṇaṃ patthariṃsu,
atk-s0402a0:648_3: so ete anuvattitvā saññāpetuṃ gacchati maññe”ti anubandhiṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:648_6: Mayampi tasmiṃ samāgame kāyasakkhino bhavissāmā”ti anubandhiṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:649_0: Paribbājakā rukkhānaṃ khandhaviṭapasākhantarehi samuggacchantā chabbaṇṇaghanabuddharasmiyo disvā “aññadā evarūpo obhāso nāma natthi,
atk-s0402a0:649_1: kiṃ nu kho eta”nti ulloketvā “samaṇo gotamo āgacchatī”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:649_2: Taṃ sutvāva sarabho jāṇukantare sīsaṃ ṭhapetvā adhomukho nisīdi.
atk-s0402a0:649_3: Evaṃ tasmiṃ samaye bhagavā taṃ ārāmaṃ upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
atk-s0402a0:649_4: Tathāgato hi jambudīpatale aggakule jātattā aggāsanārahotissa sabbattha āsanaṃ paññattameva hoti.
atk-s0402a0:650_0: Te paribbājakā sarabhaṃ paribbājakaṃ etadavocunti sammāsambuddhe kira sarabhena saddhiṃ ettakaṃ kathenteyeva
atk-s0402a0:650_1: bhikkhusaṅgho satthu padānupadiko hutvā paribbājakārāmaṃ sampāpuṇi,
atk-s0402a0:650_3: Tato te paribbājakā “acchariyaṃ samaṇassa gotamassa kammaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:650_4: sakalanagaraṃ vicaritvā avaṇṇaṃ pattharitvā pakāsanīyakammaṃ katvā āgatānaṃ verīnaṃ paṭisattūnaṃ paccāmittānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:650_5: santikaṃ āgantvā thokampi viggāhikakathaṃ na kathesi,
atk-s0402a0:650_6: āgatakālato paṭṭhāya satapākatelena makkhento viya amatapānaṃ pāyento viya madhurakathaṃ kathetī”ti sabbepi sammāsambuddhaṃ anuvattantā etadavocuṃ.
atk-s0402a0:651_6: sabbe dhammā mayā abhisambuddhā”ti evaṃ paṭijānato tava.
atk-s0402a0:651_7: Anabhisambuddhāti ime nāma dhammā tayā anabhisambuddhā.
atk-s0402a0:651_9: Aññena vā aññaṃ paṭicarissatīti aññena vā vacanena aññaṃ vacanaṃ paṭicchādessati,
atk-s0402a0:651_11: Bahiddhā kathaṃ apanāmessatīti bahiddhā aññaṃ āgantukakathaṃ āharanto purimakathaṃ apanāmessati.
atk-s0402a0:651_12: Appaccayanti anabhiraddhiṃ atuṭṭhākāraṃ pātukarissatīti pākaṭaṃ karissati.
atk-s0402a0:652_0: Evaṃ bhagavā paṭhamavesārajjena sīhanādaṃ naditvā puna dutiyādīhi nadanto yo kho maṃ paribbājakātiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:652_1: Tattha yassa kho pana te atthāya dhammo desitoti yassa maggassa vā phalassa vā atthāya tayā catusaccadhammo desito.
atk-s0402a0:652_2: So na niyyātīti so dhammo na niyyāti na niggacchati,
atk-s0402a0:652_3: na taṃ atthaṃ sādhetīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a0:652_6: Sammā dukkhakkhayāyāti hetunā nayena kāraṇena sakalassa vaṭṭadukkhassa khayāya.
atk-s0402a0:652_7: Atha vā yassa kho pana te atthāya dhammo desitoti yassa te atthāya dhammo desito.
atk-s0402a0:652_13: So na niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāyāti so dhammo yo naṃ yathādesitaṃ karoti,
atk-s0402a0:652_14: tassa takkarassa sammā hetunā nayena kāraṇena vaṭṭadukkhakkhayāya na niyyāti na niggacchati,
atk-s0402a0:652_15: taṃ atthaṃ na sādhetīti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0402a0:652_16: Seyyathāpi sarabho paribbājakoti yathā ayaṃ sarabho paribbājako pajjhāyanto appaṭibhāno nisinno,
atk-s0402a0:653_0: Evaṃ tīhi padehi sīhanādaṃ naditvā desanaṃ nivattentasseva tathāgatassa tasmiṃ ṭhāne sannipatitā caturāsītipāṇasahassaparimāṇā
atk-s0402a0:653_2: satthā parisāya amatapānassa pītabhāvaṃ ñatvā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0402a0:653_3: Tamatthaṃ dassetuṃ atha kho bhagavātiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:653_5: Vehāsaṃ pakkāmīti abhiññāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya adhiṭṭhāya saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena ākāsaṃ pakkhandi.
atk-s0402a0:653_6: Evaṃ pakkhando ca pana taṃkhaṇaññeva gijjhakūṭamahāvihāre patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0402a0:654_4: Sīhanādaṃ nadissāmīti sīhassa nadato ākāraṃ disvā “ayampi tiracchānagato, ahampi,
atk-s0402a0:654_7: So sīhassa sammukhā nadituṃ asakkonto tasmiṃ gocarāya pakkante ekako nadituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0402a0:654_12: Apica bhinnassaraṃ amanāpasaddaṃ nadatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a0:654_13: Evameva kho tvanti iminā opammena paribbājakā tathāgataṃ sīhasadisaṃ katvā sarabhaṃ siṅgālasadisaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:654_15: Purisakaravitaṃ ravissāmīti mahākukkuṭaṃ ravantaṃ disvā “imassapi dve pādā dve pakkhā,
atk-s0402a0:654_17: ahampi evarūpaṃ ravitaṃ ravissāmī”ti sā tassa sammukhā ravituṃ asakkontī tasmiṃ pakkante ravamānā kukkuṭikāravaṃyeva ravi.
atk-s0402a0:654_22: Gambhīraṃ naditabbaṃ maññatīti jeṭṭhakavasabhassa nādasadisaṃ gambhīranādaṃ naditabbaṃ maññati.
atk-s0402a0:656_1: Pañcame kālāmānaṃ nigamoti kālāmā nāma khattiyā,
atk-s0402a0:656_4: Upasaṅkamiṃsūti sappinavanītādibhesajjāni ceva aṭṭhavidhapānakāni ca gāhāpetvā upasaṅkamiṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:656_5: Sakaṃyeva vādaṃ dīpentīti attanoyeva laddhiṃ kathenti.
atk-s0402a0:656_13: tasmā tattha aṭaviṃ atikkantā ca atikkamitukāmā ca vāsaṃ kappenti.
atk-s0402a0:656_14: Tesupi paṭhamaṃ āgatā attano laddhiṃ dīpetvā pakkamiṃsu,
atk-s0402a0:656_17: amhākaṃ santike kiñci kiñci sippaṃ uggaṇhiṃsū”ti attano laddhiṃ dīpetvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:656_19: Te etamatthaṃ dīpetvā bhagavato evamārocetvā tesaṃ no,
atk-s0402a0:657_2: Mā itikirāyāti evaṃ kira etanti mā gaṇhittha.
atk-s0402a0:657_3: Mā piṭakasampadānenāti amhākaṃ piṭakatantiyā saddhiṃ sametīti mā gaṇhittha.
atk-s0402a0:657_6: Mā ākāraparivitakkenāti sundaramidaṃ kāraṇanti evaṃ kāraṇaparivitakkenapi mā gaṇhittha.
atk-s0402a0:657_7: Mā diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyāti amhākaṃ nijjhāyitvā khamitvā gahitadiṭṭhiyā saddhiṃ sametītipi mā gaṇhittha.
atk-s0402a0:657_9: imassa kathaṃ gahetuṃ yuttantipi mā gaṇhittha.
atk-s0402a0:657_10: Mā samaṇo no garūti ayaṃ samaṇo amhākaṃ garu,
atk-s0402a0:657_11: imassa kathaṃ gahetuṃ yuttantipi mā gaṇhittha.
atk-s0402a0:657_14: Yaṃsa hotīti yaṃ kāraṇaṃ tassa puggalassa hoti.
atk-s0402a0:658_1: Tattha kammaṭṭhānakathāya vā bhāvanānaye vā pāḷivaṇṇanāya vā yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā,
atk-s0402a0:658_3: Evaṃ averacittoti evaṃ akusalaverassa ca puggalaverino ca natthitāya averacitto.
atk-s0402a0:658_9: Sace kho pana atthi paro lokoti yadi imamhā lokā paraloko nāma atthi.
atk-s0402a0:658_12: yenāhaṃ kāyassa bhedā parammaraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjissāmīti evaṃ sabbattha nayo veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:658_15: Ubhayeneva visuddhaṃ attānaṃ samanupassāmīti yañca pāpaṃ na karomi,
atk-s0402a0:660_4: Tesaṃ kira purebhatte pubbaṇhasamayeyeva gehe eko pañho samuṭṭhito,
atk-s0402a0:660_6: Te “taṃ pañhaṃ sossāmā”ti therassa santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā tuṇhī nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:660_7: Thero “gāme taṃ samuṭṭhitaṃ pañhaṃ sotuṃ āgatā bhavissantī”ti tesaṃ manaṃ ñatvā tameva pañhaṃ ārabhanto etha tumhe sāḷhātiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:660_8: Tattha atthi lobhoti lubbhanasabhāvo lobho nāma atthīti pucchati.
atk-s0402a0:660_9: Abhijjhāti kho ahaṃ sāḷhā etamatthaṃ vadāmīti etaṃ lobhasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ ahaṃ “abhijjhā”ti vadāmi,
atk-s0402a0:661_0: So evaṃ pajānātīti so cattāro brahmavihāre bhāvetvā ṭhito ariyasāvako samāpattito vuṭṭhāya vipassanaṃ ārabhanto evaṃ pajānāti.
atk-s0402a0:661_1: Atthi idanti atthi dukkhasaccasaṅkhātaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ nāmarūpavasena paricchinditvā pajānanto esa “evaṃ pajānāti atthi ida”nti vutto.
atk-s0402a0:661_4: Imassa saññāgatassa uttari nissaraṇanti imassa vipassanāsaññāsaṅkhātassa saññāgatassa uttari nissaraṇaṃ nāma nibbānaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:661_6: Vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇanti ekūnavīsatividhaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:661_7: Ahu pubbe lobhoti pubbe me lobho ahosi.
atk-s0402a0:661_8: Tadahu akusalanti taṃ akusalaṃ nāma ahosi,
atk-s0402a0:661_11: tasseva akusalassa natthibhāvaṃ kusalaṃ khemanti sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0402a0:661_13: Nibbutoti abbhantare santāpakarānaṃ kilesānaṃ abhāvena nibbuto.
atk-s0402a0:663_5: addhānanti atītamaddhānaṃ nāma kālopi vaṭṭati khandhāpi.
atk-s0402a0:663_7: Tattha atīte kassapo nāma sammāsambuddho ahosi,
atk-s0402a0:663_8: tassa kikī nāma kāsikarājā aggupaṭṭhāko ahosi,
atk-s0402a0:663_9: vīsati vassasahassāni āyu ahosīti iminā nayena kathento atītaṃ ārabbha kathaṃ katheti nāma.
atk-s0402a0:663_11: tassa saṅkho nāma rājā aggupaṭṭhāko bhavissati,
atk-s0402a0:663_12: asīti vassasahassāni āyu bhavissatīti iminā nayena kathento anāgataṃ ārabbha kathaṃ katheti nāma.
atk-s0402a0:663_13: Etarahi asuko nāma rājā dhammikoti iminā nayena kathento paccuppannaṃ ārabbha kathaṃ katheti nāma.
atk-s0402a0:664_15: tathā cakkhū”ti puṭṭhena “kenaṭṭhena pucchasī”ti paṭipucchitvā “dassanaṭṭhena pucchāmī”ti vutte “na hī”ti byākātabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:664_19: “Taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīra”ntiādīni puṭṭhena pana “abyākatametaṃ bhagavatā”ti ṭhapetabbo,
atk-s0402a0:665_0: Ṭhānāṭhāne na saṇṭhātīti kāraṇākāraṇe na saṇṭhāti.
atk-s0402a0:665_2: sassatavādī yuttena kāraṇena pahoti ucchedavādiṃ niggahetuṃ,
atk-s0402a0:665_3: ucchedavādī tena niggayhamāno “kiṃ panāhaṃ ucchedaṃ vadāmī”ti sassatavādibhāvameva dīpeti,
atk-s0402a0:665_7: suññatavādimhi pahonte puggalavādīti evaṃ ṭhānāṭhāne na saṇṭhāti nāma.
atk-s0402a0:666_0: Parikappe na saṇṭhātīti idaṃ pañhapucchanepi pañhakathanepi labbhati. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0402a0:666_2: so itarena “idaṃ nāma tvaṃ pucchissasī”ti vutto ñātabhāvaṃ ñatvā “na etaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:666_5: so itarena “idaṃ nāma kathessasī”ti vutto ñātabhāvaṃ ñatvā “na etaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:667_0: Aññātavāde na saṇṭhātīti aññātavāde jānitavāde na saṇṭhāti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0402a0:667_4: Itaro pucchitabbaniyāmeneva pañhaṃ pucchitvāpi tassa kathāya “apañhaṃ nu kho pucchita”nti vimatiṃ karoti.
atk-s0402a0:667_8: pañhaṃ kathentena nāma evaṃ kathetabbo”ti vadati.
atk-s0402a0:667_9: Itaro kathetabbaniyāmeneva pañhaṃ kathetvāpi tassa kathāya “apañho nu kho mayā kathito”ti vimatiṃ karoti.
atk-s0402a0:668_0: Paṭipadāya na saṇṭhātīti paṭipattiyaṃ na tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0402a0:668_2: Ayaṃ pañho nāma cetiyaṅgaṇe pucchitena na kathetabbo,
atk-s0402a0:668_4: Āsanasālāya nisinnakāle yāguṃ vā bhattaṃ vā gahetvā nisinnakāle paribhuñjitvā nisinnakāle divāvihāraṭṭhānagamanakālepi.
atk-s0402a0:668_5: Divāṭṭhāne nisinnakāle pana okāsaṃ kāretvāva pucchantassa kathetabbo,
atk-s0402a0:668_7: Idaṃ vattaṃ ajānitvā pucchanto paṭipadāya na saṇṭhāti nāma.
atk-s0402a0:668_12: etaṃ imasmiṃ ca kāraṇe sati ayaṃ puggalo na kathetuṃ yutto nāma hoti.
atk-s0402a0:669_0: Ṭhānāṭhāne saṇṭhātīti sassatavādī yuttena kāraṇena pahoti ucchedavādiṃ niggahetuṃ,
atk-s0402a0:669_1: ucchedavādī tena niggayhamānopi “ahaṃ tayā satakkhattuṃ niggayhamānopi ucchedavādīyevā”ti vadati.
atk-s0402a0:669_4: Parikappe saṇṭhātīti “pañhaṃ pucchissāmī”ti kaṇṭhaṃ sodhento “tvaṃ imaṃ nāma pucchissasī”ti vutte, “āma,
atk-s0402a0:669_6: Pañhaṃ kathessāmīti hanuṃ saṃsodhentopi “tvaṃ imaṃ nāma kathessasī”ti vutte, “āma,
atk-s0402a0:670_0: Aññātavāde saṇṭhātīti imaṃ pañhaṃ pucchitvā “suṭṭhu te pañho pucchito,
atk-s0402a0:670_1: pucchantena nāma evaṃ pucchitabba”nti vutte sampaṭicchati,
atk-s0402a0:670_4: kathentena nāma evaṃ kathetabba”nti vutte sampaṭicchati,
atk-s0402a0:670_6: Paṭipadāya saṇṭhātīti gehe nisīdāpetvā yāgukhajjakādīni datvā yāva bhattaṃ niṭṭhāti,
atk-s0402a0:670_8: Sappiādīni bhesajjāni aṭṭhavidhāni pānakāni vatthacchādanamālāgandhādīni vā ādāya vihāraṃ gantvā tāni
atk-s0402a0:670_9: datvā divāṭṭhānaṃ pavisitvā okāsaṃ kāretvā pañhaṃ pucchati.
atk-s0402a0:670_10: Evañhi vattaṃ ñatvā pucchanto paṭipadāya saṇṭhāti nāma.
atk-s0402a0:671_0: Aññenaññaṃ paṭicaratīti aññena vacanena aññaṃ paṭicchādeti,
atk-s0402a0:671_2: Bahiddhā kathaṃ apanāmetīti āgantukakathaṃ otārento purimakathaṃ bahiddhā apanāmeti.
atk-s0402a0:671_5: tvaṃ imañcimañca āpattiṃ āpanno”ti āhaṃsu. So āha – “bhante,
atk-s0402a0:671_14: tuyhaṃ phāsukena vā aphāsukena vā kammaṃ natthi,
atk-s0402a0:671_18: Evaṃ āgantukakathāvasena bahiddhā kathaṃ apanāmetīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:672_0: Abhiharatīti ito cito ca suttaṃ āharitvā avattharati.
atk-s0402a0:672_2: Pubbe kira bhikkhū mahācetiyaṅgaṇe sannipatitvā saṅghakiccaṃ katvā bhikkhūnaṃ ovādaṃ datvā aññamaññaṃ pañhasākacchaṃ karonti.
atk-s0402a0:672_3: Tatthāyaṃ thero tīhi piṭakehi tato tato suttaṃ āharitvā divasabhāge ekampi pañhaṃ niṭṭhāpetuṃ na deti.
atk-s0402a0:672_5: Anupajagghatīti parena pañhe pucchitepi kathitepi pāṇiṃ paharitvā mahāhasitaṃ hasati,
atk-s0402a0:672_7: akathetabbaṃ nu kho kathesi”nti vimati uppajjati.
atk-s0402a0:672_9: akkhare vā pade vā byañjane vā durutte “evaṃ nāmetaṃ vattabba”nti ujjhāyamāno vicarati.
atk-s0402a0:673_1: Abhijānāti ekaṃ dhammanti ekaṃ kusaladhammaṃ abhijānāti ariyamaggaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:673_2: Parijānāti ekaṃ dhammanti ekaṃ dukkhasaccadhammaṃ tīraṇapariññāya parijānāti.
atk-s0402a0:673_3: Pajahati ekaṃ dhammanti ekaṃ sabbākusaladhammaṃ pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti.
atk-s0402a0:673_4: Sacchikaroti ekaṃ dhammanti ekaṃ arahattaphaladhammaṃ nirodhameva vā paccakkhaṃ karoti.
atk-s0402a0:673_5: Sammāvimuttiṃ phusatīti sammā hetunā nayena kāraṇena arahattaphalavimokkhaṃ ñāṇaphassena phusati.
atk-s0402a0:674_6: Idaṃ vatthu yadidaṃ anupādā cittassa vimokkhoti evaṃ sabbapadesu yojanā veditabbā.
atk-s0402a0:674_7: Etadatthā mantanāti yā ayaṃ kacchākacchesu puggalesu kacchena saddhiṃ mantanā,
atk-s0402a0:674_9: Etadatthā upanisāti ohitasoto saupanisoti evaṃ vuttā upanisāpi etadatthāyeva.
atk-s0402a0:674_14: Arahattaphalatthāya hi sabbametanti suttantaṃ vinivattetvā upari gāthāhi kūṭaṃ gaṇhanto ye viruddhātiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:675_5: Guṇaṃ ghaṭṭetvā kathā hi anariyakathā nāma,
atk-s0402a0:675_11: Sampamohaṃ parājayanti aññamaññassa appamattena mukhadosena sampamohañca parājayañca.
atk-s0402a0:675_14: Dhammaṭṭhapaṭisaṃyuttāti yā ca dhamme ṭhitena kathitakathā,
atk-s0402a0:675_15: sā dhammaṭṭhā ceva hoti tena ca dhammena paṭisaṃyuttāti dhammaṭṭhapaṭisaṃyuttā.
atk-s0402a0:676_2: Upārambhaṃ na sikkheyyāti kāraṇuttariyalakkhaṇaṃ upārambhaṃ na sikkheyya.
atk-s0402a0:676_3: Khalitañca na gāhayeti appamattakaṃ mukhakhalitaṃ “ayaṃ te doso”ti na gāhayeyya.
atk-s0402a0:676_5: Nābhimaddeti ekaṃ kāraṇaṃ āharitvā na maddeyya.
atk-s0402a0:676_6: Na vācaṃ payutaṃ bhaṇeti saccālikapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ vācaṃ na bhaṇeyya.
atk-s0402a0:676_9: Na samusseyya mantayeti na mānussayena samussito bhaveyya.
atk-s0402a0:676_10: Na hi mānussitā hutvā paṇḍitā kathayanti,
atk-s0402a0:676_11: mānena pana anussitova hutvā mantaye katheyya bhāseyyāti.
atk-s0402a0:678_1: Aṭṭhame bhagavaṃmūlakāti bhagavā mūlaṃ etesanti bhagavaṃmūlakā.
atk-s0402a0:678_4: tasmiṃ parinibbute ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ añño samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā ime dhamme uppādetuṃ samattho nāma nāhosi,
atk-s0402a0:678_5: bhagavato pana no ime dhammā uppāditā.
atk-s0402a0:678_6: Bhagavantañhi nissāya mayaṃ ime dhamme ājānāma paṭivijjhāmāti evaṃ bhagavaṃmūlakā no, bhante, dhammāti.
atk-s0402a0:678_7: Bhagavaṃnettikāti bhagavā dhammānaṃ netā vinetā anunetā yathāsabhāvato pāṭiyekkaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ nāmaṃ gahetvāva
atk-s0402a0:678_9: Bhagavaṃpaṭisaraṇāti catubhūmakadhammā sabbaññutaññāṇassa āpāthaṃ āgacchamānā bhagavati paṭisaranti nāmāti bhagavaṃpaṭisaraṇā.
atk-s0402a0:678_11: Apica mahābodhimaṇḍe nisinnassa bhagavato paṭivedhavasena phasso āgacchati –
atk-s0402a0:678_13: Tvaṃ phusanaṭṭhena phasso nāma. Vedanā, saññā, saṅkhārā,
atk-s0402a0:678_17: Evaṃ catubhūmakadhammānaṃ yathāsabhāvato pāṭiyekkaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ nāmaṃ gaṇhanto bhagavā dhamme paṭisaratīti bhagavaṃpaṭisaraṇā.
atk-s0402a0:678_18: Bhagavantaṃyeva paṭibhātūti bhagavatova etassa bhāsitassa attho upaṭṭhātu,
atk-s0402a0:679_1: Appasāvajjoti lokavajjavasenapi vipākavajjavasenapīti dvīhipi vajjehi appasāvajjo,
atk-s0402a0:679_3: Mātāpitaro hi bhātibhaginiādayo ca puttabhātikānaṃ āvāhavivāhamaṅgalaṃ nāma kārenti.
atk-s0402a0:679_5: Sadārasantosamūlikā pana apāye paṭisandhi nāma na hotīti evaṃ vipākavajjavasena appasāvajjo.
atk-s0402a0:679_9: dve tīṇi bhavantarāni gantvāpi nāpagacchatīti dandhavirāgī.
atk-s0402a0:680_1: eko kira puriso bhātu jāyāya micchācāraṃ carati.
atk-s0402a0:680_2: Tassāpi itthiyā attano sāmikato soyeva piyataro ahosi.
atk-s0402a0:680_4: “imasmiṃ kāraṇe pākaṭe jāte mahatī garahā bhavissati,
atk-s0402a0:680_8: Sā tuṇhī hutvā katipāhaccayena puna kathesi,
atk-s0402a0:680_10: Tato tatiyavāraṃ kathito “kinti katvā okāsaṃ labhissāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0402a0:680_11: Athassa sā upāyaṃ kathentī “tvaṃ mayā vuttameva karohi,
atk-s0402a0:680_15: Jeṭṭhabhātāpissa araññe kammaṃ katvā gharaṃ āgato.
atk-s0402a0:680_16: Sā tasmiṃ muducittā viya hutvā “ehi sāmi,
atk-s0402a0:680_17: sīse te olikhissāmī”ti olikhantī “upakkiliṭṭhaṃ te sīsa”nti āmalakapiṇḍaṃ datvā “gaccha asukaṭṭhāne sīsaṃ dhovitvā āgacchāhī”ti pesesi.
atk-s0402a0:680_18: So tāya vuttatitthameva gantvā āmalakakakkena sīsaṃ makkhetvā udakaṃ oruyha onamitvā sīsaṃ dhovi.
atk-s0402a0:680_19: Atha naṃ itaro rukkhantarato nikkhamitvā khandhaṭṭhike paharitvā jīvitā voropetvā gehaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0402a0:681_0: Itaro bhariyāya sinehaṃ pariccajitumasakkonto tasmiṃyeva gehe mahādhammani hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0402a0:681_1: So tassā ṭhitāyapi nisinnāyapi gantvā sarīre patati.
atk-s0402a0:681_2: Atha naṃ sā “soyeva ayaṃ bhavissatī”ti ghātāpesi.
atk-s0402a0:681_3: So puna tassā sinehena tasmiṃyeva gehe kukkuro hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0402a0:681_4: So padasā gamanakālato paṭṭhāya tassā pacchato pacchato carati.
atk-s0402a0:682_0: Sopi puna tasmiṃyeva gehe vacchako hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0402a0:682_5: So tadāpi tassā upari sinehaṃ chindituṃ asakkonto catutthe vāre tassāyeva kucchiyaṃ jātissaro hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0402a0:682_6: So paṭipāṭiyā catūsu attabhāvesu tāya ghātitabhāvaṃ disvā “evarūpāya nāma paccatthikāya kucchismiṃ nibbattosmī”ti
atk-s0402a0:682_7: tato paṭṭhāya tassā hatthena attānaṃ phusituṃ na deti.
atk-s0402a0:682_12: kasmā tvaṃ mātu hatthena attānaṃ phusituṃ na desi.
atk-s0402a0:682_16: paccāmittā esā”ti taṃ pavattiṃ sabbaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0402a0:682_18: kiṃ amhākaṃ īdise ṭhāne nivāsakicca”nti taṃ ādāya nikkhamitvā ekaṃ vihāraṃ gantvā pabbajitvā ubhopi tattha vasantā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:683_0: Mahāsāvajjoti lokavajjavasenapi vipākavajjavasenapīti dvīhipi kāraṇehi mahāsāvajjo. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0402a0:683_1: Dosena hi duṭṭho hutvā mātaripi aparajjhati,
atk-s0402a0:683_7: Dosavasena pana katena ānantariyakammena kappaṃ niraye paccati.
atk-s0402a0:683_10: Dosena hi duṭṭho mātāpitūsupi cetiyepi bodhimhipi pabbajitesupi aparajjhitvā “mayhaṃ khamathā”ti.
atk-s0402a0:683_12: Tassa saha khamāpanena taṃ kammaṃ pākatikameva hoti.
atk-s0402a0:684_1: Mohena hi mūḷho hutvā mātāpitūsupi cetiyepi bodhimhipi pabbajitesupi aparajjhitvā gatagataṭṭhāne garahaṃ labhati.
atk-s0402a0:684_3: Mohavasena pana katena ānantariyakammena kappaṃ niraye paccati.
atk-s0402a0:684_6: Mohena mūḷhena hi katakammaṃ saṇikaṃ muccati.
atk-s0402a0:684_7: Yathā hi acchacammaṃ satakkhattumpi dhoviyamānaṃ na paṇḍaraṃ hoti,
atk-s0402a0:684_8: evameva mohena mūḷhena katakammaṃ sīghaṃ na muccati,
atk-s0402a0:686_2: akusalāni ca tāni mūlāni cāti vā akusalamūlāni. Yadapi,
atk-s0402a0:686_7: Akusalamūlaṃ vā sandhāya idha tampīti attho vaṭṭatiyeva.
atk-s0402a0:686_10: Asatā dukkhaṃ uppādayatīti abhūtena avijjamānena yaṃkiñci tassa abhūtaṃ dosaṃ vatvā dukkhaṃ uppādeti.
atk-s0402a0:686_14: Pabbājanāyāti gāmato vā raṭṭhato vā pabbājanīyakammena.
atk-s0402a0:686_16: Balattho itipīti balena me attho itipi,
atk-s0402a0:688_1: Na ātappaṃ karoti tassa nibbeṭhanāyāti tassa abhūtassa nibbeṭhanatthāya vīriyaṃ na karoti.
atk-s0402a0:688_2: Itipetaṃ atacchanti imināpi kāraṇena etaṃ atacchaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:689_7: Gimhakālasmiñhi māluvāsipāṭikāya phalitāya bījāni uppatitvā vaṭarukkhādīnaṃ mūle patanti.
atk-s0402a0:689_8: Tattha yassa rukkhassa mūle tīsu disāsu tīṇi bījāni patitāni honti,
atk-s0402a0:689_9: tasmiṃ rukkhe pāvussakena meghena abhivaṭṭhe tīhi bījehi tayo aṅkurā uṭṭhahitvā taṃ rukkhaṃ allīyanti.
atk-s0402a0:689_10: Tato paṭṭhāya rukkhadevatāyo sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0402a0:689_11: Tepi aṅkurā vaḍḍhamānā latābhāvaṃ āpajjitvā taṃ rukkhaṃ abhiruhitvā sabbaviṭapasākhāpasākhā saṃsibbitvā taṃ rukkhaṃ upari pariyonandhanti.
atk-s0402a0:689_12: So māluvālatāhi saṃsibbito ghanehi mahantehi māluvāpattehi sañchanno deve vā vassante vāte vā vāyante
atk-s0402a0:690_0: Evameva khoti ettha pana idaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ –
atk-s0402a0:690_1: sālādīsu aññatararukkho viya hi ayaṃ satto daṭṭhabbo,
atk-s0402a0:690_4: tāva tāsaṃ latānaṃ ujukaṃ rukkhārohanaṃ viya lobhādīnaṃ dvāraṃ asampattakālo,
atk-s0402a0:690_7: khuddakasākhānaṃ palujjanakālo viya dvārappattānaṃ kilesānaṃ vasena khuddānukhuddakā āpattiyo āpannakālo,
atk-s0402a0:690_9: latānusārena otiṇṇena udakena mūlesu tintesu rukkhassa bhūmiyaṃ patanakālo viya kamena cattāri pārājikāni
atk-s0402a0:691_1: Evameva khoti ettha pana idaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ –
atk-s0402a0:691_2: sālādīsu aññatararukkho viya ayaṃ satto daṭṭhabbo,
atk-s0402a0:691_4: tāsaṃ appavattiṃ kātuṃ āgatapuriso viya yogāvacaro,
atk-s0402a0:691_8: khaṇittiyā mūlacchedanaṃ viya vipassanāñāṇena avijjāmūlassa chindanakālo,
atk-s0402a0:691_12: mahāvāte opuṇitvā appavattanakālo viya upādinnakakkhandhānaṃ appaṭisandhikanirodhena nirujjhitvā punabbhave paṭisandhiaggahaṇakālo daṭṭhabboti.
atk-s0402a0:693_1: Dasame tadahuposatheti tasmiṃ ahu uposathe taṃ divasaṃ uposathe,
atk-s0402a0:693_5: Divā divassāti divasassa divā nāma majjhanho,
atk-s0402a0:693_7: Kuto nu tvaṃ āgacchasīti kiṃ karontī vicarasīti pucchati.
atk-s0402a0:693_12: Sāyanhasamaye sāmikānaṃ gāvo niyyātetvāti gopālakā hi devasikavetanena vā pañcāhadasāhaaddhamāsamāsachamāsasaṃvaccharaparicchedena
atk-s0402a0:693_14: Idha pana devasikavetanena rakkhantaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ –
atk-s0402a0:693_16: Iti paṭisañcikkhatīti attano gehaṃ gantvā bhuñjitvā mañce nipanno evaṃ paccavekkhati.
atk-s0402a0:693_17: Abhijjhāsahagatenāti taṇhāya sampayuttena. Evaṃ kho, visākhe,
atk-s0402a0:693_23: Na mahāvipphāroti vipākavipphārassa amahantatāya na mahāvipphāro.
atk-s0402a0:694_1: Paraṃ yojanasatanti yojanasataṃ atikkamitvā tato paraṃ.
atk-s0402a0:694_2: Tesu daṇḍaṃ nikkhipāhīti tesu yojanasatato parabhāgesu ṭhitesu sattesu daṇḍaṃ nikkhipa,
atk-s0402a0:694_4: Nāhaṃ kvacani kassaci kiñcanatasminti ahaṃ katthaci kassaci parassa kiñcanatasmiṃ na homi.
atk-s0402a0:694_7: Na ca mama kvacani katthaci kiñcanatatthīti mamāpi kvacani anto vā bahiddhā vā katthaci ekaparikkhārepi kiñcanatā natthi,
atk-s0402a0:694_11: Adinnaṃyeva paribhuñjatīti punadivase mañce nipajjantopi pīṭhe nisīdantopi yāguṃ pivantopi bhattaṃ bhuñjantopi te bhoge adinneyeva paribhuñjati.
atk-s0402a0:694_15: Evaṃ upavutthassa hi uposathassa appamattakampi vipākaphalaṃ iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ manāpaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0402a0:695_1: Saṃkiliṭṭhena hi cittena upavuttho uposatho na mahapphalo hotīti dassitattā visuddhena cittena upavutthassa mahapphalatā anuññātā hoti.
atk-s0402a0:695_6: Tathāgataṃ anussaratīti aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi tathāgataguṇe anussarati.
atk-s0402a0:695_7: Ettha hi itipi so bhagavāti so bhagavā itipi sīlena,
atk-s0402a0:695_8: itipi samādhināti sabbe lokiyalokuttarā buddhaguṇā saṅgahitā.
atk-s0402a0:695_10: Tathāgataṃ anussarato cittaṃ pasīdatīti lokiyalokuttare tathāgataguṇe anussarantassa cittuppādo pasanno hoti.
atk-s0402a0:696_2: Tajjaṃ vāyāmanti tajjātikaṃ tadanucchavikaṃ kakkena makkhanaghaṃsanadhovanavāyāmaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:696_4: Kiliṭṭhasmiṃ hi sīse pasādhanaṃ pasādhetvā nakkhattaṃ kīḷamāno na sobhati,
atk-s0402a0:696_5: parisuddhe pana tasmiṃ pasādhanaṃ pasādhetvā nakkhattaṃ kīḷamāno sobhati,
atk-s0402a0:696_6: evameva kiliṭṭhacittena uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya uposatho upavuttho na mahapphalo hoti,
atk-s0402a0:696_7: parisuddhena pana cittena uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya upavuttho uposatho mahapphalo hotīti adhippāyena evamāha.
atk-s0402a0:696_9: tassa guṇānussaraṇavasena ayaṃ uposatho brahmuposatho nāma,
atk-s0402a0:696_11: Brahmunā saddhiṃ saṃvasatīti sammāsambuddhena saddhiṃ saṃvasati.
atk-s0402a0:697_2: Kuruvindakapāsāṇacuṇṇena hi saddhiṃ lākhaṃ yojetvā maṇike katvā vijjhitvā suttena āvuṇitvā taṃ maṇi kalāpapantiṃ ubhato gahetvā piṭṭhiṃ ghaṃsenti,
atk-s0402a0:697_7: Dhammuposathanti sahatantikaṃ navalokuttaradhammaṃ ārabbha upavutthattā ayaṃ uposatho “dhammuposatho”ti vutto.
atk-s0402a0:697_8: Idhāpi pariyodapanāti pade ṭhatvā purimanayeneva yojanā kātabbā.
atk-s0402a0:698_0: Saṅghaṃ anussaratīti aṭṭhannaṃ ariyapuggalānaṃ guṇe anussarati.
atk-s0402a0:698_1: Usmañca paṭiccāti dve tayo vāre gāhāpitaṃ usumaṃ paṭicca.
atk-s0402a0:698_7: Saṅghuposathanti aṭṭhannaṃ ariyapuggalānaṃ guṇe ārabbha upavutthattā ayaṃ uposatho “saṅghuposatho”ti vutto.
atk-s0402a0:699_3: Vālaṇḍupakanti assavālehi vā makacivālādīhi vā kataṃ aṇḍupakaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:699_4: Tajjaṃ vāyāmanti telena temetvā malassa tintabhāvaṃ ñatvā chārikaṃ pakkhipitvā vālaṇḍupakena ghaṃsanavāyāmo.
atk-s0402a0:699_5: Idha pariyodapanāti pade ṭhatvā evaṃ yojanā kātabbā kiliṭṭhasmiñhi ādāse maṇḍitapasādhitopi attabhāvo olokiyamāno na sobhati,
atk-s0402a0:699_7: Evameva kiliṭṭhena cittena upavuttho uposatho na mahapphalo hoti,
atk-s0402a0:699_9: Sīluposathanti attano sīlānussaraṇavasena upavuttho uposatho sīluposatho nāma.
atk-s0402a0:700_0: Devatā anussaratīti devatā sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā attano saddhādiguṇe anussarati.
atk-s0402a0:700_5: Tajjaṃ vāyāmanti uddhane pakkhipanadhamanaparivattanādikaṃ anurūpaṃ vāyāmaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:700_6: Idha pariyodapanāti pade ṭhatvā evaṃ yojanā veditabbā –
atk-s0402a0:700_7: saṃkiliṭṭhasuvaṇṇamayena hi pasādhanabhaṇḍena pasādhitā nakkhattaṃ kīḷamānā na sobhanti,
atk-s0402a0:700_9: Evameva saṃkiliṭṭhacittassa uposatho na mahapphalo hoti,
atk-s0402a0:700_11: Devatuposathanti devatā sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā attano guṇe anussarantena upavutthauposatho devatuposatho nāma.
atk-s0402a0:700_12: Sesaṃ imesu buddhānussatiādīsu kammaṭṭhānesu yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā,
atk-s0402a0:701_2: Paṭiviratāti pahīnakālato paṭṭhāya tato dussīlyato oratā viratāva.
atk-s0402a0:701_3: Nihitadaṇḍā nihitasatthāti parūpaghātatthāya daṇḍaṃ vā satthaṃ vā ādāya avattanato nikkhittadaṇḍā ceva nikkhittasatthā cāti attho.
atk-s0402a0:701_4: Ettha ca ṭhapetvā daṇḍaṃ sabbampi avasesaṃ upakaraṇaṃ sattānaṃ vihiṃsanabhāvato satthanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:701_5: Yaṃ pana bhikkhū kattaradaṇḍaṃ vā dantakaṭṭhavāsiṃ vā pipphalakaṃ vā gahetvā vicaranti,
atk-s0402a0:701_11: tāya eva dayāpannatāya sabbesaṃ pāṇabhūtānaṃ hitacittakāti attho.
atk-s0402a0:701_14: Arahataṃ anukaromīti yathā purato gacchantaṃ pacchato gacchanto anugacchati nāma,
atk-s0402a0:701_15: evaṃ ahampi arahantehi paṭhamaṃ kataṃ imaṃ guṇaṃ pacchā karonto tesaṃ arahantānaṃ anukaromi.
atk-s0402a0:701_16: Uposatho ca me upavuttho bhavissatīti evaṃ karontena mayā arahatañca anukataṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0402a0:702_8: athenaṃ sucibhūtaṃ attabhāvaṃ katvā viharantīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a0:703_3: Methunāti rāgapariyuṭṭhānavasena sadisattā methunakāti laddhavohārehi paṭisevitabbato methunoti saṅkhaṃ gatā asaddhammā.
atk-s0402a0:704_4: Yo hi puriso kadāci musāvādaṃ vadati,
atk-s0402a0:704_6: Tassa musāvādena antaritattā saccaṃ saccena na ghaṭīyati.
atk-s0402a0:704_9: jīvitahetupi musā avatvā saccena saccaṃ saṃdahantiyevāti saccasandhā.
atk-s0402a0:704_12: Eko puggalo haliddirāgo viya thusarāsimhi nikhātakhāṇu viya assapiṭṭhe ṭhapitakumbhaṇḍamiva ca na ṭhitakatho hoti.
atk-s0402a0:704_13: Eko pāsāṇalekhā viya indakhīlo viya ca ṭhitakatho hoti,
atk-s0402a0:704_14: asinā sīsaṃ chindantepi dve kathā na katheti.
atk-s0402a0:704_18: Ekacco hi puggalo na paccayiko hoti,
atk-s0402a0:704_20: asukena nāmā”ti vutte “mā tassa vacanaṃ saddahathā”ti vattabbataṃ āpajjati.
atk-s0402a0:704_28: Avisaṃvādakā lokassāti tāya saccavāditāya lokaṃ na visaṃvādentīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:705_4: Tasmā antomajjhanhike dasakkhattuṃ bhuñjamānāpi ekabhattikāva honti.
atk-s0402a0:705_9: Atikkante majjhanhike yāva sūriyatthaṅgamanā bhojanaṃ vikālabhojanaṃ nāma,
atk-s0402a0:706_0: Sāsanassa ananulomattā visūkaṃ paṭāṇibhūtaṃ dassananti visūkadassanaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:706_2: antamaso mayūranaccanādivasenāpi pavattānaṃ naccādīnaṃ visūkabhūtaṃ dassanañcāti naccagītavāditavisūkadassanaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:706_3: Naccādīni hi attanā payojetuṃ vā parehi payojāpetuṃ vā payuttāni passituṃ vā neva bhikkhūnaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:707_5: gandhavasena chavirāgavasena ca sādiyanto vibhūseti nāma.
atk-s0402a0:707_7: tasmā yāya dussīlyacetanāya tāni mālādhāraṇādīni mahājano karoti,
atk-s0402a0:708_3: sakalajambudīpatalaṃ bheritalasadisaṃ katvā kaṭippamāṇehi sattahi ratanehi pūritānanti attho.
atk-s0402a0:708_4: Issariyādhipaccanti issarabhāvena vā issariyameva vā ādhipaccaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:708_8: Kalaṃ nāgghati soḷasinti ekaṃ ahorattaṃ upavutthauposathe puññaṃ soḷasabhāge katvā tato ekaṃ bhāgañca na agghati.
atk-s0402a0:709_1: Rattiṃ na bhuñjeyya vikālabhojananti uposathaṃ upavasanto rattibhojanañca divāvikālabhojanañca na bhuñjeyya.
atk-s0402a0:709_2: Mañce chamāyaṃva sayetha santhateti muṭṭhihatthapādake kappiyamañce vā sudhādiparikammakatāya bhūmiyaṃ
atk-s0402a0:709_3: vā tiṇapaṇṇapalālādīni santharitvā kate santhate vā sayethāti attho.
atk-s0402a0:709_4: Etaṃ hi aṭṭhaṅgikamāhuposathanti evaṃ pāṇātipātādīni asamācarantena upavutthaṃ uposathaṃ aṭṭhahi aṅgehi samannāgatattā aṭṭhaṅgikanti vadanti.
atk-s0402a0:709_5: Taṃ pana upavasantena “sve uposathiko bhavissāmī”ti ajjeva “idañca idañca kareyyāthā”ti āhārādividhānaṃ vicāretabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:709_6: Uposathadivase pātova bhikkhussa vā bhikkhuniyā vā dasasīlalakkhaṇaññuno upāsakassa vā upāsikāya vā santike
atk-s0402a0:709_8: Pāḷiṃ ajānantena pana “buddhapaññattaṃ uposathaṃ adhiṭṭhāmī”ti adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:709_11: Uposathaṃ upavasantena parūparodhapaṭisaṃyuttā kammantā na vicāretabbā,
atk-s0402a0:709_13: gehe pana āhāraṃ labhitvā niccabhattikabhikkhunā viya paribhuñjitvā vihāraṃ gantvā dhammo vā sotabbo,
atk-s0402a0:710_7: Atha vā pabhāsantīti disāhi disā obhāsanti.
atk-s0402a0:710_9: Veḷuriyanti maṇīti vatvāpi iminā jātimaṇibhāvaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0402a0:710_13: Siṅgīsuvaṇṇanti gosiṅgasadisaṃ hutvā uppannattā evaṃ nāmakaṃ suvaṇṇaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:710_23: kenaci aninditā hutvā devaloke uppajjantīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:712_1: Tatiyassa paṭhame channoti evaṃnāmako channaparibbājako. Tumhepi, āvusoti, āvuso,
atk-s0402a0:712_4: Tato thero “ayaṃ paribbājako amhe rāgādīnaṃ pahānaṃ paññāpemāti vadati,
atk-s0402a0:712_5: natthi panetaṃ bāhirasamaye”ti taṃ paṭikkhipanto mayaṃ kho,
atk-s0402a0:712_9: Tato paribbājako cintesi “ayaṃ thero bāhirasamayaṃ luñcitvā haranto ‘mayamevā’ti āha.
atk-s0402a0:712_10: Kiṃ nu kho ādīnavaṃ disvā ete etesaṃ pahānaṃ paññāpentī”ti.
atk-s0402a0:712_11: Atha theraṃ pucchanto kiṃ pana tumhetiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:712_13: Tattha attatthanti diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaṃ lokiyalokuttaraṃ attano atthaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:713_4: Kammassakatapaññā jhānapaññā vipassanāpaññāti imā tisso paññā appavattikaraṇena nirodhetīti paññānirodhiko.
atk-s0402a0:713_5: Aniṭṭhaphaladāyakattā dukkhasaṅkhātassa vighātasseva pakkhe vattatīti vighātapakkhiko.
atk-s0402a0:715_1: Dutiye tena hi gahapatīti thero kira cintesi –
atk-s0402a0:715_2: “ayaṃ idha āgacchanto na aññātukāmo hutvā āgami,
atk-s0402a0:715_5: Iti taṃyeva kathaṃ kathāpetukāmo tena hītiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:715_11: Paradhammāpasādanāti paresaṃ laddhiyā ghaṭṭanā vambhanā avakkhipanā.
atk-s0402a0:715_13: Attho ca vuttoti mayā pucchitapañhāya attho ca pakāsito.
atk-s0402a0:715_14: Attā ca anupanītoti amhe evarūpāti evaṃ attā ca na upanīto.
atk-s0402a0:717_1: Tatiye gilānā vuṭṭhitoti gilāno hutvā vuṭṭhito.
atk-s0402a0:717_3: Upasaṅkamīti bhuttapātarāso mālāgandhādīni ādāya mahāparivāraparivuto upasaṅkami.
atk-s0402a0:717_4: Bāhāyaṃ gahetvāti na bāhāyaṃ gahetvā ākaḍḍhi,
atk-s0402a0:717_5: nisinnāsanato vuṭṭhāya tassa santikaṃ gantvā dakkhiṇabāhāyaṃ aṅguṭṭhakena saññaṃ datvā ekamantaṃ apanesīti veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:717_7: sīla”ntiādinā nayena sattannaṃ sekhānaṃ sīlañca samādhiñca paññañca kathetvā upari arahattaphalavasena asekhā sīlasamādhipaññāyo kathento –
atk-s0402a0:717_9: sekhavipassanāñāṇato ca asekhaphalasamādhi pacchā uppajjatī”ti dīpesi.
atk-s0402a0:719_1: Catutthe kūṭāgārasālāyanti dve kaṇṇikā gahetvā haṃsavaṭṭakacchannena katāya gandhakuṭiyā.
atk-s0402a0:719_2: Aparisesaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ paṭijānātīti appamattakampi asesetvā sabbaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ paṭijānāti.
atk-s0402a0:719_4: Ñāṇadassanaṃ paccupaṭṭhitanti sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ mayhaṃ upaṭṭhitamevāti dasseti.
atk-s0402a0:719_13: Vedanākkhayā sabbaṃ dukkhaṃ nijjiṇṇaṃ bhavissatīti vedanākkhayena pana sakalavaṭṭadukkhaṃ nijjiṇṇameva bhavissati.
atk-s0402a0:719_15: Nijjarāya visuddhiyāti kilesajīraṇakapaṭipadāya kilese vā nijjīraṇato nijjarāya sattānaṃ visuddhiyā.
atk-s0402a0:719_16: Samatikkamo hotīti sakalassa vaṭṭadukkhassa atikkamo hoti. Idha, bhante,
atk-s0402a0:720_5: Ñāyassa adhigamāyāti saha vipassanāya maggassa adhigamanatthāya.
atk-s0402a0:720_7: Navañca kammaṃ na karotīti navaṃ kammaṃ nāyūhati.
atk-s0402a0:720_9: Phussa phussa byantī karotīti phusitvā phusitvā vigatantaṃ karoti,
atk-s0402a0:720_10: vipākaphassaṃ phusitvā phusitvā taṃ kammaṃ khepetīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:720_15: Paccattaṃ veditabbā viññūhīti paṇḍitehi attano attano santāneyeva jānitabbā,
atk-s0402a0:720_20: Vivicceva kāmehītiādikāya pana samādhisampadāya tayo maggā,
atk-s0402a0:720_22: Anāgāmī ariyasāvako hi samādhimhi paripūrakārīti vutto.
atk-s0402a0:720_24: Keci pana sīlasamādhayopi arahattaphalasampayuttāva idha adhippetā.
atk-s0402a0:720_25: Ekekassa pana vasena paṭipattidassanatthaṃ visuṃ visuṃ tanti āropitāti.
atk-s0402a0:722_4: Aveccappasādeti guṇe avecca jānitvā uppanne acalappasāde.
atk-s0402a0:722_9: chasu koṭṭhāsesu vitthambhanabhūtāya vāyodhātuyā siyā aññathattaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:722_10: Na tvevāti imesaṃ hi catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ aññamaññabhāvūpagamanena siyā aññathattaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:722_11: ariyasāvakassa pana na tveva siyāti dasseti.
atk-s0402a0:722_15: Ariyasāvako hi manusso hutvā devopi hoti brahmāpi.
atk-s0402a0:724_4: Viññāṇaṃ bījanti sahajātaṃ abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇaṃ viruhanaṭṭhena bījaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:724_5: Taṇhā snehoti paggaṇhanānubrūhanavasena taṇhā udakaṃ nāma.
atk-s0402a0:726_0: 78. Sattame cetanāti kammacetanā. Patthanāpi kammapatthanāva. Sesaṃ purimasadisamevāti.
atk-s0402a0:728_5: “idaṃ varaṃ idaṃ niṭṭhā”ti evaṃ upaṭṭhitanti attho.
atk-s0402a0:728_9: na kho ettha ekaṃsena byākātabbanti attho.
atk-s0402a0:728_10: Upaṭṭhānasāraṃ sevatoti idaṃ sāraṃ varaṃ niṭṭhāti evaṃ upaṭṭhitaṃ sevamānassa.
atk-s0402a0:728_12: Ettāvatā kammavādikiriyavādīnaṃ pabbajjaṃ ṭhapetvā seso sabbopi bāhirakasamayo gahito hoti.
atk-s0402a0:728_14: Ettāvatā imaṃ sāsanaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbāpi kammavādikiriyavādīnaṃ pabbajjā gahitā.
atk-s0402a0:728_15: Na ca panassa sulabharūpo samasamo paññāyāti evaṃ sekkhabhūmiyaṃ ṭhatvā pañhaṃ kathento assa ānandassa paññāya samasamo na sulabhoti dasseti.
atk-s0402a0:730_1: Navame etadavocāti pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto dasabalassa vattaṃ dassetvā attano divāvihāraṭṭhānaṃ gantvā “imasmiṃ loke mūlagandho nāma atthi,
atk-s0402a0:730_4: Ime pana tayopi gandhā anuvātaṃyeva gacchanti,
atk-s0402a0:730_7: yassa paṭivātampi gandho gacchatī”ti cintetvā aṭṭhannaṃ varānaṃ gahaṇakāleyeva kaṅkhuppattisamaye upasaṅkamanavarassa
atk-s0402a0:730_8: gahitattā takkhaṇaṃyeva divāṭṭhānato vuṭṭhāya satthu santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno uppannāya
atk-s0402a0:730_18: kiñci gandhajātanti ettha saraṇagamanādayo guṇavaṇṇabhāsanavasena disāgāmitāya gandhasadisattā gandhā,
atk-s0402a0:730_21: Sīlavāti pañcasīlena vā dasasīlena vā sīlavā.
atk-s0402a0:731_0: Na pupphagandho paṭivātametīti vassikapupphādīnaṃ gandho paṭivātaṃ na gacchati.
atk-s0402a0:731_1: Na candanaṃ tagaramallikā vāti candanatagaramallikānampi gandho paṭivātaṃ na gacchatīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:731_4: Sopi paṭivātaṃ vidatthimattampi ratanamattampi gantuṃ na sakkotīti vadanti.
atk-s0402a0:731_5: Satañca gandho paṭivātametīti satañca paṇḍitānaṃ buddhapaccekabuddhabuddhaputtānaṃ sīlādiguṇagandho paṭivātaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0402a0:731_6: Sabbā disā sappuriso pavāyatīti sappuriso paṇḍito sīlādiguṇagandhena sabbā disā pavāyati,
atk-s0402a0:733_5: Dvīhi buddhehi kathito sikhinā ca bhagavatā amhākañca satthārā.
atk-s0402a0:733_6: Imasmā hi kappā ekatiṃsakappamatthake aruṇavatinagare aruṇavato rañño pabhāvatiyā nāma mahesiyā kucchismiṃ
atk-s0402a0:733_7: nibbattitvā paripakke ñāṇe mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā sikhī bhagavā bodhimaṇḍe sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭivijjhitvā
atk-s0402a0:733_8: pavattitavaradhammacakko aruṇavatiṃ nissāya viharanto ekadivasaṃ pātova sarīrappaṭijagganaṃ katvā mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivāro
atk-s0402a0:733_9: “aruṇavatiṃ piṇḍāya pavisissāmī”ti nikkhamitvā vihāradvārakoṭṭhakasamīpe ṭhito abhibhuṃ nāma aggasāvakaṃ
atk-s0402a0:734_2: sikhī bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho abhibhuṃ bhikkhuṃ āmantesi – ‘āyāma, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0402a0:734_7: abhibhū bhikkhu sikhissa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa paccassosi. Atha kho,
atk-s0402a0:734_9: sikhī bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho abhibhū ca bhikkhu yena aññataro brahmaloko tenupasaṅkamiṃsū”ti.
atk-s0402a0:735_0: Tattha mahābrahmā sammāsambuddhaṃ disvā attamano paccuggamanaṃ katvā brahmāsanaṃ paññāpetvā adāsi,
atk-s0402a0:736_4: brahmuno ca brahmaparisāya ca brahmapārisajjānañca dhammīkathāti. ‘Evaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:736_7: abhibhū bhikkhu sikhissa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa paṭissuṇitvā brahmuno ca brahmaparisāya ca brahmapārisajjānañca dhammiṃ kathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0402a0:736_10: ayañca bhikkhu ṭhapetvā satthāraṃ sayaṃ dhammakathaṃ ārabhī”ti.
atk-s0402a0:737_0: Satthā tesaṃ anattamanabhāvaṃ ñatvā abhibhuṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavoca –
atk-s0402a0:737_2: brahmā ca brahmaparisā ca brahmapārisajjā ca.
atk-s0402a0:737_5: Thero satthu vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā anekavihitaṃ iddhivikubbanaṃ katvā sahassilokadhātuṃ sarena viññāpento
atk-s0402a0:737_7: Kiṃ pana katvā thero sahassilokadhātuṃ viññāpesīti?
atk-s0402a0:737_8: Nīlakasiṇaṃ tāva samāpajjitvā sabbattha andhakāraṃ phari,
atk-s0402a0:737_9: tato “kimidaṃ andhakāra”nti sattānaṃ ābhoge uppanne ālokaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0402a0:737_11: sahassacakkavāḷe devamanussā añjaliṃ paggaṇhitvā paggaṇhitvā theraṃyeva namassamānā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:737_12: Thero “mahājano mayhaṃ dhammaṃ desentassa saraṃ suṇātū”ti imā gāthā abhāsi.
atk-s0402a0:737_13: Sabbe osaṭāya parisāya majjhe nisīditvā dhammaṃ desentassa viya saddaṃ assosuṃ.
atk-s0402a0:738_0: Atha kho bhagavā saddhiṃ therena aruṇavatiṃ paccāgantvā piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pucchi –
atk-s0402a0:738_3: abhibhussa bhikkhuno brahmaloke ṭhitassa gāthāyo bhāsamānassā”ti. Te “āma,
atk-s0402a0:738_4: bhante”ti paṭijānitvā sutabhāvaṃ āvikarontā tadeva gāthādvayaṃ udāhariṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:738_5: Satthā “sādhu sādhū”ti sādhukāraṃ datvā desanaṃ niṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0402a0:738_6: Evaṃ tāva idaṃ suttaṃ ito ekatiṃsakappamatthake sikhinā bhagavatā kathitaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:739_0: Amhākaṃ pana bhagavā sabbaññutaṃ patto pavattitavaradhammacakko sāvatthiṃ upanissāya jetavane viharanto
atk-s0402a0:739_1: jeṭṭhamūlamāsapuṇṇamadivase bhikkhū āmantetvā imaṃ aruṇavatisuttaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0402a0:739_2: Ānandatthero bījaniṃ gahetvā bījayamāno ṭhitakova ādito paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānā ekabyañjanampi ahāpetvā sakalasuttaṃ uggaṇhi.
atk-s0402a0:739_3: So punadivase piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto dasabalassa vattaṃ dassetvā attano divāvihāraṭṭhānaṃ gantvā saddhivihārikantevāsikesu
atk-s0402a0:739_4: vattaṃ dassetvā pakkantesu hiyyo kathitaṃ aruṇavatisuttaṃ āvajjento nisīdi.
atk-s0402a0:739_7: “sikhissa bhagavato aggasāvako brahmaloke ṭhatvā cakkavāḷasahasse andhakāraṃ vidhametvā sarīrobhāsaṃ
atk-s0402a0:739_8: dassetvā attano saddaṃ sāvento dhammakathaṃ kathesīti hiyyo satthārā kathitaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:739_10: dasa pāramiyo pūretvā sabbaññutaṃ patto pana sammāsambuddho kittakaṃ ṭhānaṃ sarena viññāpeyyā”ti.
atk-s0402a0:739_11: So evaṃ uppannāya vimatiyā vinodanatthaṃ taṅkhaṇeyeva bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tamatthaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0402a0:739_12: Etamatthaṃ dassetuṃ atha kho āyasmā ānandoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:740_0: Tattha sammukhāti sammukhībhūtena mayā etaṃ sutaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:740_3: Kīvatakaṃ pahoti sarena viññāpetunti kittakaṃ ṭhānaṃ sarīrobhāsena vihatandhakāraṃ katvā sarena viññāpetuṃ sakkoti.
atk-s0402a0:740_5: appameyyā tathāgatāti idaṃ bhagavā iminā adhippāyenāha – ānanda,
atk-s0402a0:740_8: Tathāgatā pana dasa pāramiyo pūretvā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ pattā appameyyā.
atk-s0402a0:740_9: So tvaṃ nakhasikhāya paṃsuṃ gahetvā mahāpathavipaṃsunā saddhiṃ upamento viya kiṃ nāmetaṃ vadesi.
atk-s0402a0:740_16: Iti bhagavā iminā adhippāyena appameyyabhāvaṃ vatvā tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0402a0:741_1: tvaṃ tāḷacchiddaṃ gahetvā anantākāsena upamento viya,
atk-s0402a0:741_2: cātakasakuṇaṃ gahetvā diyaḍḍhayojanasatikena supaṇṇarājena upamento viya,
atk-s0402a0:741_3: hatthisoṇḍāya udakaṃ gahetvā mahāgaṅgāya upamento viya,
atk-s0402a0:741_4: caturatanike āvāṭe udakaṃ gahetvā sattahi sarehi upamento viya,
atk-s0402a0:741_5: nāḷikodanamattalābhiṃ manussaṃ gahetvā cakkavattiraññā upamento viya,
atk-s0402a0:741_6: paṃsupisācakaṃ gahetvā sakkena devaraññā upamento viya,
atk-s0402a0:741_7: khajjopanakappabhaṃ gahetvā sūriyappabhāya upamento viya kiṃ nāmetaṃ vadesīti dīpento dutiyampi appameyyabhāvameva vatvā tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0402a0:741_10: handa naṃ yāvatatiyaṃ yācitvā buddhasīhanādaṃ nadāpessāmī”ti.
atk-s0402a0:741_13: Athassa bhagavā byākaronto sutā te ānandātiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:741_16: sahassī cūḷanikā lokadhātū’ti ettakameva vatvā tuṇhī jāto,
atk-s0402a0:741_17: idāni buddhasīhanādaṃ nadissatī”ti so satthāraṃ yācanto etassa bhagavā kālotiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:742_7: Idāni taṃ sahassaguṇaṃ katvā dassento tāva sahassadhā lokoti āha.
atk-s0402a0:742_10: Yasmā pana ekekasmiṃ cakkavāḷe cattāro cattāro mahārājāno,
atk-s0402a0:743_2: Dvisahassī majjhimikā lokadhātūti ayaṃ sahassacakkavāḷāni sahassabhāgena gaṇetvā dasasatasahassacakkavāḷaparimāṇā
atk-s0402a0:743_6: Ettakepi hi ṭhāne tathāgatā andhakāraṃ vidhametvā sarīrobhāsaṃ dassetvā sarena viññāpetuṃ sakkontīti dīpeti.
atk-s0402a0:743_8: Bodhisattānañhi pacchimabhave devalokato cavitvā mātukucchiyaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇadivase ca kucchito nikkhamanadivase
atk-s0402a0:744_0: Tisahassī mahāsahassīti sahassito paṭṭhāya tatiyāti tisahassī,
atk-s0402a0:744_1: sahassaṃ sahassadhā katvā gaṇitaṃ majjhimikaṃ sahassadhā katvā gaṇitattā mahantehi sahassehi gaṇitāti mahāsahassī.
atk-s0402a0:744_3: Bhagavā ākaṅkhamāno ettake ṭhāne andhakāraṃ vidhametvā sarīrobhāsaṃ dassetvā sarena viññāpeyyāti.
atk-s0402a0:744_8: Ettāvatā hi bhagavatā āṇākkhettaṃ nāma dassitaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:744_11: Yāvatā pana ākaṅkheyyāti yattakaṃ ṭhānaṃ iccheyya,
atk-s0402a0:744_15: koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷamhi yāva brahmalokā sāsapehi pūretvā sace koci puratthimāya disāya ekacakkavāḷe ekaṃ sāsapaṃ pakkhipanto āgaccheyya,
atk-s0402a0:745_15: āhārappasutāti evaṃ tehi tehi kāraṇehi vikkhittā ca pamattā ca honti.
atk-s0402a0:745_16: Kathaṃ nu kho te satthā sarena viññāpeyyā”ti.
atk-s0402a0:745_17: So evaṃ cintetvā vimaticchedanatthaṃ tathāgataṃ pucchanto yathā kathaṃ panātiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:746_5: tattha naṃ attano ānubhāvena atthaṃ gameyya.
atk-s0402a0:746_16: kiṃ nu kho ayaṃ nāgāvaṭṭabhūtāvaṭṭayakkhāvaṭṭadevatāvaṭṭānaṃ aññataro”ti vitakkaṃ uppādeyyuṃ.
atk-s0402a0:746_17: Tato tesu manussesu ālokañca andhakārañca āvajjitvā “kiṃ paccayā nu kho ida”nti pariyesamānesu satthā
atk-s0402a0:746_20: Atha nesaṃ santāsaṃ āpannabhāvaṃ ñatvā odātakasiṇasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā paṇḍaraṃ ghanabuddharasmiṃ
atk-s0402a0:746_21: vissajjento candasahassasūriyasahassauṭṭhānakālo viya ekappahāreneva sabbaṃ ekālokaṃ kareyya.
atk-s0402a0:746_22: Tañca kho tilabījamattena kāyappadesena obhāsaṃ muñcanto.
atk-s0402a0:746_23: Yo hi cakkavāḷapathaviṃ dīpakapallakaṃ katvā mahāsamudde udakaṃ telaṃ katvā sineruṃ vaṭṭiṃ katvā aññasmiṃ sinerumuddhani ṭhapetvā jāleyya,
atk-s0402a0:746_25: Tato paraṃ vidatthimpi obhāsetuṃ na sakkuṇeyya.
atk-s0402a0:746_26: Tathāgato pana tilaphalappamāṇena sarīrappadesena obhāsaṃ muñcitvā tisahassimahāsahassilokadhātuṃ ekobhāsaṃ kareyya tato vā pana bhiyyo.
atk-s0402a0:747_0: Taṃ ālokaṃ sañjāneyyunti taṃ ālokaṃ disvā “yena sūriyo atthañceva gamito uṭṭhāpito ca,
atk-s0402a0:747_2: esa so puriso idāni ālokaṃ katvā ṭhito,
atk-s0402a0:747_3: aho acchariyapuriso”ti añjaliṃ paggayha namassamānā nisīdeyyuṃ.
atk-s0402a0:747_5: Yo hi ekaṃ cakkavāḷapabbataṃ bheriṃ katvā mahāpathaviṃ bhericammaṃ katvā sineruṃ daṇḍaṃ katvā aññasmiṃ sinerumatthake ṭhapetvā ākoṭeyya,
atk-s0402a0:747_8: Tathāgato pana pallaṅke vā pīṭhe vā nisīditvā tisahassimahāsahassilokadhātuṃ sarena viññāpeti,
atk-s0402a0:747_11: Iti bhagavā iminā ettakena visayakkhettameva dasseti.
atk-s0402a0:748_0: Imañca pana buddhasīhanādaṃ sutvā therassa abbhantare balavapīti uppannā,
atk-s0402a0:748_1: so pītivasena udānaṃ udānento lābhā vata metiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:748_2: Tattha yassa me satthā evaṃmahiddhikoti yassa mayhaṃ satthā evaṃmahiddhiko,
atk-s0402a0:748_3: tassa mayhaṃ evaṃmahiddhikassa satthu paṭilābho lābhā ceva suladdhañcāti attho.
atk-s0402a0:748_4: Atha vā yvāhaṃ evarūpassa satthuno pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā vicarituṃ,
atk-s0402a0:748_10: ete sabbepi mayhaṃ lābhā ceva suladdhañcātipi sandhāya evamāha.
atk-s0402a0:748_11: Ettha ca bhagavato andhakārālokasaddasavanasaṅkhātānaṃ iddhīnaṃ mahantatāya mahiddhikatā,
atk-s0402a0:748_14: So kira pubbe upaṭṭhākatthere āghātaṃ bandhitvā carati.
atk-s0402a0:748_15: Tasmā idāni okāsaṃ labhitvā imasmiṃ buddhasīhanādapariyosāne jalamānaṃ dīpasikhaṃ nibbāpento viya carantassa
atk-s0402a0:748_16: goṇassa tuṇḍe pahāraṃ dento viya bhattabharitaṃ pātiṃ avakujjanto viya therassa pasādabhaṅgaṃ karonto evamāha.
atk-s0402a0:749_0: Evaṃ vutte bhagavāti evaṃ udāyittherena vutte bhagavā yathā nāma papātataṭe ṭhatvā pavedhamānaṃ purisaṃ
atk-s0402a0:749_1: ekamante ṭhito hitesī puriso “ito ehi ito ehī”ti punappunaṃ vadeyya,
atk-s0402a0:749_2: evamevaṃ udāyittheraṃ tasmā vacanā nivārento mā hevaṃ udāyi,
atk-s0402a0:749_7: Nanu ca satthā ekassa sāvakassa dhammadesanāya uppannapasādassa mahānisaṃsaṃ aparicchinnaṃ akāsi,
atk-s0402a0:749_8: so kasmā imassa buddhasīhanādaṃ ārabbha uppannassa pasādassa ānisaṃsaṃ paricchindatīti?
atk-s0402a0:749_10: Dandhapaññopi hi sotāpanno sattakkhattuṃ devesu ca manussesu ca attabhāvaṃ paṭilabhati,
atk-s0402a0:749_14: Iti nibbānena kūṭaṃ gaṇhanto imaṃ sīhanādasuttaṃ niṭṭhāpesīti.
atk-s0402a0:751_21: Tasmāti yasmā imāni tīṇi samaṇakaraṇīyāni, tasmā.
atk-s0402a0:751_24: Iti imasmiṃ suttante tisso sikkhā lokiyalokuttarā kathitāti.
atk-s0402a0:753_2: Ahampi dammo ahampi dammoti ahampi “dammo dammamāno”ti vadamāno gāvīti.
atk-s0402a0:753_4: Gāvo hi kāḷāpi rattāpi setādivaṇṇāpi honti,
atk-s0402a0:753_5: gadrabhassa pana tādiso vaṇṇo nāma natthi.
atk-s0402a0:753_9: Imasmimpi sutte tisso sikkhā missikāva kathitāti.
atk-s0402a0:757_3: Tasmiṃ samaye paññattāni sikkhāpadāneva sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:757_4: So kira bhikkhu ajjavasampanno ujujātiko avaṅko akuṭilo,
atk-s0402a0:757_5: tasmā “ahaṃ ettakāni sikkhāpadāni rakkhituṃ sakkuṇeyyaṃ vā na vā”ti cintetvā satthu ārocesi.
atk-s0402a0:757_7: So kira “ettakesu sikkhāpadesu sikkhantassa agaru tīsu sikkhāsu sikkhitu”nti maññamāno evamāha.
atk-s0402a0:757_8: Atha bhagavā yathā nāma paññāsa tiṇakalāpiyo ukkhipituṃ asakkontassa kalāpiyasataṃ bandhitvā sīse ṭhapeyya,
atk-s0402a0:757_9: evameva ekissāpi sikkhāya sikkhituṃ asakkontassa aparā dvepi sikkhā upari pakkhipanto tasmātiha tvaṃ bhikkhūtiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:757_10: Sukhumālo kira uttaro nāma jānapadamanusso lohapāsādavihāre vasati.
atk-s0402a0:757_14: Taṃ ādāya aṭaviṃ gantvā tena lāyitaṃ tiṇaṃyeva karaḷe bandhitvā “paññāsa karaḷe gahetuṃ sakkhissasi uttarā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:757_20: Daharabhikkhū karaḷasataṃ bandhitvā tassa sīse ṭhapayiṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:757_21: So ukkhipitvā nitthunanto gantvā aggisālāya samīpe pātesi.
atk-s0402a0:757_22: Atha naṃ bhikkhū “kilantarūposi uttarā”ti āhaṃsu. Āma, bhante,
atk-s0402a0:757_24: imaṃ ekampi karaḷasataṃ ukkhipituṃ asakkontaṃ maṃ “paṇṇāsa karaḷe ukkhipāhī”ti vadiṃsu. Āma, uttara,
atk-s0402a0:759_3: Khayasmiṃ paṭhamaṃ ñāṇanti paṭhamameva maggañāṇaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0402a0:759_4: Maggo hi kilesānaṃ khepanato khayo nāma,
atk-s0402a0:759_6: Tato aññā anantarāti tato catutthamaggañāṇato anantarā aññā uppajjati,
atk-s0402a0:759_10: Iti suttepi gāthāsupi satta sekhā kathitā.
atk-s0402a0:761_2: Yatthetaṃ sabbaṃ samodhānaṃ gacchatīti yāsu sikkhāsu sabbametaṃ diyaḍḍhasikkhāpadasataṃ saṅgahaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0402a0:761_5: sabbena sabbaṃ kātuṃ na sakkotīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:761_13: Ime pana aṅguttaramahānikāyavaḷañjanakaācariyā “cattāri pārājikāni ṭhapetvā sesāni sabbānipi khuddānukhuddakānī”ti vadanti.
atk-s0402a0:761_14: Tāni āpajjatipi vuṭṭhātipīti ettha pana khīṇāsavo tāva lokavajjaṃ nāpajjati,
atk-s0402a0:761_16: Āpajjanto ca kāyenapi vācāyapi cittenapi āpajjati.
atk-s0402a0:761_25: na hi mayā ettha evarūpaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjane ca vuṭṭhāne ca ariyapuggalassa abhabbatā kathitā.
atk-s0402a0:762_1: Sakadāgāmino hi rāgādayo abbhapaṭalaṃ viya macchikāpattaṃ viya ca tanukā honti,
atk-s0402a0:762_7: Tattha parinibbāyīti heṭṭhā anotaritvā upariyeva parinibbānadhammo.
atk-s0402a0:763_0: Padesaṃ padesakārītiādīsu padesakārī puggalo nāma sotāpanno ca sakadāgāmī ca anāgāmī ca,
atk-s0402a0:765_3: tasmā “dve vā tīṇi vā kulānī”ti etthapi dve vā tayo vā bhaveti attho veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:765_4: Ayañhi dve vā bhave sandhāvati tayo vā,
atk-s0402a0:765_6: Tasmā dve vā tīṇi vā cattāri vā pañca vā cha vāti evamettha vikappo daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0402a0:765_7: Ekabījīti ekasseva bhavassa bījaṃ etassa atthīti ekabījī.
atk-s0402a0:765_12: Tattha yo idha anāgāmiphalaṃ patvā avihādīsu nibbatto tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā uparūpari nibbattitvā akaniṭṭhaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0402a0:765_14: Yo pana avihādīsu nibbatto tattheva aparinibbāyitvā akaniṭṭhampi appatvā uparimabrahmaloke parinibbāyati,
atk-s0402a0:765_18: Yo pana avihādīsu catūsu aññatarasmiṃ nibbattitvā tattheva parinibbāyati,
atk-s0402a0:765_19: ayaṃ na uddhaṃsoto na akaniṭṭhagāmī nāma.
atk-s0402a0:766_0: Yattha katthaci uppanno pana sasaṅkhārena sappayogena arahattaṃ patto sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī nāma.
atk-s0402a0:766_2: Yo pana kappasahassāyukesu avihesu nibbattitvā pañcamaṃ kappasataṃ atikkamitvā arahattaṃ patto,
atk-s0402a0:766_7: Kappasahassāyukesu tāva avihesu nibbattitvā eko nibbattadivaseyeva arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0402a0:766_11: Aparo evaṃ asakkonto dvinnaṃ kappasatānaṃ matthake pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0402a0:766_13: Aparo evampi asakkonto catunnaṃ kappasatānaṃ matthake pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0402a0:767_0: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne ṭhatvā catuvīsati sotāpannā,
atk-s0402a0:767_4: Imasmiṃ hi sāsane saddhādhuraṃ paññādhuranti dve dhurāni,
atk-s0402a0:767_6: Tattheko saddhādhurena abhinivisitvā sotāpattiphalaṃ patvā ekameva bhavaṃ nibbattitvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti,
atk-s0402a0:767_11: Tathā kolaṃkolā sattakkhattuparamā cāti ime catuvīsati sotāpannā nāma.
atk-s0402a0:767_12: Tīsu pana vimokkhesu suññatavimokkhena sakadāgāmibhūmiṃ pattā catunnaṃ paṭipadānaṃ vasena cattāro sakadāgāmino,
atk-s0402a0:767_14: appaṇihitavimokkhena pattā cattāroti ime dvādasa sakadāgāmino.
atk-s0402a0:769_1: Aṭṭhame taṃ vā pana anabhisambhavaṃ appaṭivijjhanti taṃ arahattaṃ apāpuṇanto appaṭivijjhanto.
atk-s0402a0:771_1: Dasame āsavānaṃ khayāti ettha arahattamaggo adhipaññāsikkhā nāma.
atk-s0402a0:771_2: Phalaṃ pana sikkhitasikkhassa uppajjanato sikkhāti na vattabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:772_0: Yathā pure tathā pacchāti yathā paṭhamaṃ tīsu sikkhāsu sikkhati,
atk-s0402a0:772_3: Yathā adho tathā uddhanti yathā heṭṭhimakāyaṃ asubhavasena passati,
atk-s0402a0:772_6: Yathā divā tathā rattinti yathā divā tisso sikkhā sikkhati,
atk-s0402a0:772_8: Abhibhuyya disā sabbāti sabbā disā ārammaṇavasena abhibhavitvā.
atk-s0402a0:773_4: Dhīraṃ paṭipadantagunti khandhadhīraāyatanadhīravasena dhīraṃ dhitisampannaṃ paṭipattiyā antaṃ gataṃ.
atk-s0402a0:773_8: Vimokkho hoti cetasoti cittassa vimutti vimuccanā appavattibhāvo hoti.
atk-s0402a0:773_9: Taṇhākkhayavimuttino hi khīṇāsavassa carimakaviññāṇanirodhena parinibbānaṃ viya cetaso vimokkho hoti,
atk-s0402a0:775_1: Ekādasame saṅkavā nāma kosalānaṃ nigamoti saṅkavāti evaṃnāmako kosalaraṭṭhe nigamo.
atk-s0402a0:775_11: ativiya sallikhitaṃ katvā saṇhaṃ saṇhaṃ kathetīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:776_1: Maṃ accagamāti maṃ atikkamma adhibhavitvā pavatto.
atk-s0402a0:776_6: puna evarūpassa aparādhassa dosassa khalitassa vā akaraṇatthāyāti attho.
atk-s0402a0:776_11: Taṃ te mayaṃ paṭiggaṇhāmāti taṃ tava aparādhaṃ mayaṃ khamāma.
atk-s0402a0:776_13: ariyassa vinayeti esā kassapa buddhassa bhagavato sāsane vuddhi nāma. Katamā?
atk-s0402a0:776_14: Yāyaṃ accayaṃ accayato disvā yathādhammaṃ paṭikaritvā āyatiṃ saṃvarāpajjanā.
atk-s0402a0:776_15: Desanaṃ pana puggalādhiṭṭhānaṃ karonto “yo accayaṃ accayato disvā yathādhammaṃ paṭikaroti,
atk-s0402a0:776_17: Na sikkhākāmoti tisso sikkhā na kāmeti na pattheti na piheti.
atk-s0402a0:778_7: Tassa kho tanti ettha tanti nipātamattaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:778_8: Natthi sā iddhi vā ānubhāvo vāti sā vā iddhi so vā ānubhāvo natthi.
atk-s0402a0:778_13: Gabbhīnipi hontīti diyaḍḍhamāsaṃ patvā gahitagabbhāni honti.
atk-s0402a0:778_15: Idāni yasmā buddhānaṃ gahapatikena vā sassehi vā attho natthi,
atk-s0402a0:778_16: sāsane pana tappaṭirūpakaṃ puggalaṃ vā atthaṃ vā dassetuṃ taṃ taṃ opammaṃ āharanti.
atk-s0402a0:778_20: Sikkhā pana idhāpi missikā eva kathitā.
atk-s0402a0:780_1: Dutiye cīvarapavivekanti cīvaraṃ nissāya uppajjanakakilesehi vivittabhāvaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:781_2: Nīvārādīsu nīvārā nāma araññe sayaṃ jātavīhijāti.
atk-s0402a0:782_1: Dussīlyañcassa pahīnaṃ hotīti pañca dussīlyāni pahīnāni honti.
atk-s0402a0:783_9: Yaṃ panettha “dussīlyañcassa pahīnaṃ micchādiṭṭhi cassa pahīnā”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:783_10: taṃ sotāpattimaggena pahīnabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:785_8: Natthi taṃ saṃyojananti duvidhamevassa saṃyojanaṃ natthi,
atk-s0402a0:785_9: itarampi pana puna imaṃ lokaṃ ānetuṃ asamatthatāya natthīti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:787_1: Catutthe na bāhulikā hontīti paccayabāhullikā na honti.
atk-s0402a0:787_2: Na sāthalikāti tisso sikkhā sithilaṃ katvā na gaṇhanti.
atk-s0402a0:787_3: Okkamane nikkhittadhurāti okkamanaṃ vuccati avagamanaṭṭhena pañca nīvaraṇāni,
atk-s0402a0:787_5: Paviveke pubbaṅgamāti kāyacittaupadhivivekasaṅkhāte tividhepi viveke pubbaṅgamā.
atk-s0402a0:789_5: Kāyo passambhatīti nāmakāyopi rūpakāyopi vigatadaratho hoti.
atk-s0402a0:790_1: Pabbatakandarapadarasākhāti ettha kandaro nāma “ka”nti laddhanāmena udakena dārito udakabhinno pabbatappadeso,
atk-s0402a0:790_3: Padaraṃ nāma aṭṭha māse deve avassante phalito bhūmippadeso.
atk-s0402a0:792_4: Rañño aṅganti rañño hatthapādādiaṅgasamatāya aṅganteva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0402a0:792_11: Anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ lokassāti sabbalokassa asadisaṃ puññaviruhanaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:793_6: aggaphalaṃ arahattaṃ appatvā vīriyadhuraṃ na nikkhipissāmīti evaṃ paṭipanno.
atk-s0402a0:793_9: Chaṭṭhe tīṇi ca maggāni tīṇi ca phalāni,
atk-s0402a0:793_13: Phalaṃ pana javitajavena uppajjanato javoti ca vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0402a0:795_8: Na mahapphalaṃ hotīti vipākaphalena mahapphalaṃ na hoti.
atk-s0402a0:795_11: Kāsikaṃ vatthanti tīhi kappāsaaṃsūhi suttaṃ kantitvā katavatthaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:797_1: Navame yathā yathāyanti yathā yathā ayaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:797_2: Tathā tathā tanti tathā tathā taṃ kammaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:797_7: Na hi sakkā katassa kammassa vipākaṃ paṭisedhetuṃ.
atk-s0402a0:797_11: Brahmacariyavāso na hotīti yaṃ maggabhāvanato pubbe upapajjavedanīyaṃ kammaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0402a0:797_12: tassa avassaṃ paṭisaṃvedanīyattā brahmacariyaṃ vutthampi avutthameva hoti.
atk-s0402a0:797_13: Okāso na paññāyati sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyāti yasmā ca evaṃ sante tena kammāyūhanañceva vipākānubhavanā ca hoti,
atk-s0402a0:797_14: tasmā hetunā nayena vaṭṭadukkhassa antakiriyāya okāso na paññāyati nāma.
atk-s0402a0:798_0: Yathā yathā vedanīyanti yena yenākārena veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:798_1: Tathā tathāssa vipākaṃ paṭisaṃvediyatīti tena tenākārena assa vipākaṃ paccanubhoti.
atk-s0402a0:798_3: yadetaṃ sattasu javanesu paṭhamajavanakammaṃ sati paccaye vipākavāraṃ labhantameva diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ hoti,
atk-s0402a0:798_5: Yañca sattamajavanakammaṃ sati paccaye upapajjavedanīyaṃ hoti,
atk-s0402a0:798_9: Etesu ākāresu yena yenākārena veditabbaṃ kammaṃ ayaṃ puriso karoti,
atk-s0402a0:798_11: Aṭṭhakathāyañhi laddhavipākavārameva kammaṃ yathāvedanīyaṃ kammaṃ nāmāti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:798_14: brahmacariyavāso hotīti kammakkhayakarassa brahmacariyassa khepetabbakammasambhavato vāso nāma hoti,
atk-s0402a0:798_16: Okāso paññāyati sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyāti yasmā evaṃ sante tena tena maggena abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa
atk-s0402a0:798_17: nirodhena tesu tesu bhavesu āyatiṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ na uppajjati,
atk-s0402a0:798_18: tasmā okāso paññāyati sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāya.
atk-s0402a0:799_3: Tattha appamattakanti parittaṃ thokaṃ mandaṃ lāmakaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:799_5: Diṭṭhadhammavedanīyanti tasmiṃ kammeyeva diṭṭhadhamme vipaccitabbaṃ vipākavāraṃ labhantaṃ diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a0:799_6: Nāṇupi khāyatīti dutiye attabhāve aṇupi na khāyati,
atk-s0402a0:799_7: aṇumattampi dutiye attabhāve vipākaṃ na detīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:799_8: Bahudevāti bahukaṃ pana vipākaṃ kimeva dassatīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0402a0:799_15: So hi kāyānupassanāsaṅkhātāya kāyabhāvanāya bhāvitakāyo nāma.
atk-s0402a0:799_25: So hi pamāṇakarānaṃ rāgādīnaṃ abhāvena appamāṇavihārī nāma.
atk-s0402a0:803_4: Kāmavitakkādīsu kāme ārabbha uppanno vitakko kāmavitakko.
atk-s0402a0:803_6: Ñātivitakkādīsu “amhākaṃ ñātakā bahū puññavantā”tiādinā nayena ñātake ārabbha uppanno vitakko ñātivitakko.
atk-s0402a0:803_7: “Asuko janapado khemo subhikkho”tiādinā nayena janapadamārabbha uppanno vitakko janapadavitakko.
atk-s0402a0:803_8: “Aho vata maṃ pare na avajāneyyu”nti evaṃ uppanno vitakko anavaññattipaṭisaṃyutto vitakko nāma.
atk-s0402a0:803_10: So hoti samādhi na ceva santoti so avasiṭṭhadhammavitakko vipassanāsamādhi avūpasantakilesattā santo na hoti.
atk-s0402a0:803_14: Sasaṅkhāraniggayhavāritagatoti sasaṅkhārena sappayogena kilese niggaṇhitvā vāretvā vārito,
atk-s0402a0:804_2: samayoti ettha samayo nāma utusappāyaṃ āhārasappāyaṃ senāsanasappāyaṃ puggalasappāyaṃ dhammassavanasappāyanti
atk-s0402a0:804_4: Yaṃ taṃ cittanti yasmiṃ samaye taṃ vipassanācittaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:804_8: Puthuttārammaṇaṃ pahāya ekasmiṃ nibbānagocareyeva tiṭṭhatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a0:804_16: Kilesānaṃ chinnante uppannattā na sappayogena kilese niggaṇhitvā vāretvā vāritoti na sasaṅkhāraniggayhavāritagato.
atk-s0402a0:804_17: Ettāvatā ayaṃ bhikkhu vivaṭṭetvā arahattaṃ patto nāma hoti.
atk-s0402a0:805_0: Idāni khīṇāsavassa sato abhiññāpaṭipadaṃ dassento yassa yassa cātiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:805_1: Tattha abhiññā sacchikaraṇīyassāti abhijānitvā paccakkhaṃ kātabbassa.
atk-s0402a0:805_2: Sati satiāyataneti pubbahetusaṅkhāte ceva idāni ca paṭiladdhabbe abhiññāpādakajjhānādibhede ca sati satikāraṇe.
atk-s0402a0:805_3: Vitthārato pana ayaṃ abhiññākathā visuddhimagge vuttanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-s0402a0:805_4: Āsavānaṃ khayātiādi cettha phalasamāpattivasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:807_5: Kālena kālaṃ samādhinimittaṃ manasikātabbantiādīsu taṃ taṃ kālaṃ sallakkhetvā ekaggatāya yuttakāle ekaggatā manasikātabbā.
atk-s0402a0:807_14: Ṭhānaṃ taṃ cittaṃ kosajjāya saṃvatteyyāti kāraṇaṃ vijjati yena taṃ cittaṃ kosajjabhāve tiṭṭheyya.
atk-s0402a0:807_16: Upekkhānimittaṃyeva manasi kareyyāti ettha ca ñāṇajavaṃ upekkheyyāti ayamattho.
atk-s0402a0:808_1: Ālimpeyyāti tattha aṅgāre pakkhipitvā aggiṃ datvā nāḷikāya dhamanto aggiṃ gāhāpeyya.
atk-s0402a0:808_2: Ukkāmukhe pakkhipeyyāti aṅgāre viyūhitvā aṅgāramatthake vā ṭhapeyya,
atk-s0402a0:809_0: Sammā samādhiyati āsavānaṃ khayāyāti arahattaphalatthāya sammā ṭhapīyati.
atk-s0402a0:809_1: Ettāvatā hi vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattappatto bhikkhu dassito.
atk-s0402a0:809_2: Idāni tassa khīṇāsavassa abhiññāya paṭipadaṃ dassento yassa yassa cātiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:811_1: Tatiyassa paṭhame pubbeva sambodhāti sambodhito pubbeva,
atk-s0402a0:811_7: Dīpaṅkarassa hi bhagavato pādamūle aṭṭhadhammasamodhānena abhinīhārasamiddhito pabhuti tathāgato sammāsambodhiṃ
atk-s0402a0:811_8: satto laggo “pattabbā mayā esā”ti tadadhigamāya parakkamaṃ amuñcantoyeva āgato,
atk-s0402a0:811_10: Ko nu khoti katamo nu kho.
atk-s0402a0:811_14: Tassa mayhanti tassa evaṃ bodhisattasseva sato mayhaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:811_15: Chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānanti nibbānaṃ āgamma ārabbha paṭicca chandarāgo vinayaṃ gacchati pahīyati,
atk-s0402a0:811_17: Idaṃ lokanissaraṇanti idaṃ nibbānaṃ lokato nissaṭattā lokanissaraṇanti vuccati.
atk-s0402a0:811_20: Ñāṇañca pana me dassananti dvīhipi padehi paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:815_5: Imesu pana catūsupi suttesu khandhalokova kathito.
atk-s0402a0:817_4: Te kira gāyantā naccantā hasantā vicariṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:817_6: Satthā te pakkosāpetvā tesaṃ ovādatthāya idaṃ suttaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0402a0:817_10: Dantavidaṃsakahasitanti dante dassetvā pāṇiṃ paharantānaṃ mahāsaddena hasitaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:817_11: Setughāto gīteti gīte vo paccayaghāto hotu,
atk-s0402a0:817_15: Dhammappamoditānaṃ satanti ettha dhammo vuccati kāraṇaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:817_17: Sitaṃ sitamattāyāti tasmiṃ sitakāraṇe sati yaṃ sitaṃ karotha,
atk-s0402a0:817_18: taṃ vo sitamattāya aggadante dassetvā pahaṭṭhākāramattadassanāyayeva yuttanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a0:819_2: Paṭisevanāya natthi tittīti yathā yathā paṭisevati,
atk-s0402a0:819_3: tathā tathā ruccatiyevāti titti nāma natthi.
atk-s0402a0:819_5: Sace hi mahāsamudde udakaṃ surā bhaveyya,
atk-s0402a0:819_7: tassa tattha carantassapi sayantassapi titti nāma na bhaveyya.
atk-s0402a0:821_2: Na bhaddakaṃ maraṇaṃ hotīti apāye paṭisandhipaccayatāya na laddhakaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a0:821_4: Sukkapakkhe sagge paṭisandhipaccayatāya bhaddakaṃ hoti laddhakaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:821_5: Taṃ pana ekantena sotāpannādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ ariyasāvakānaṃyeva vaṭṭati.
atk-s0402a0:823_0: 111. Aṭṭhame byāpannanti pakatibhāvaṃ jahitvā ṭhitaṃ. Sesaṃ purimasutte vuttanayameva.
atk-s0402a0:825_5: Taṃ kammaṃ kammasamudayāya saṃvattatīti taṃ kammaṃ aññesampi vaṭṭagāmikammānaṃ samudayāya piṇḍakaraṇatthāya saṃvattati.
atk-s0402a0:825_6: Na taṃ kammaṃ kammanirodhāyāti taṃ pana kammaṃ vaṭṭagāmikammānaṃ nirodhatthāya na saṃvattati.
atk-s0402a0:827_5: Yo cetaso sārāgoti yo cittassa rāgo rajjanā rajjitattaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:827_10: Yadā vā tena vipāko ñāto hoti vidito,
atk-s0402a0:827_11: tadā te ceva dhamme tañca vipākaṃ abhinivatteti.
atk-s0402a0:827_15: Paññāya ativijjha passatīti saha vipassanāya maggapaññāya nibbijjhitvā passati.
atk-s0402a0:829_5: tesaṃ vā ākappaṃ avijahanena “ahampi brahmacārī”ti evaṃpaṭiñño.
atk-s0402a0:829_7: Natthi kāmesu dosoti kilesakāmena vatthukāme sevantassa natthi doso.
atk-s0402a0:829_8: Pātabyatanti pivitabbataṃ paribhuñjitabbataṃ nirāsaṅkena cittena pipāsitassa pānīyapivanasadisaṃ paribhuñjitabbataṃ.
atk-s0402a0:831_1: Dutiye kataññū katavedīti “iminā mayhaṃ kata”nti tena katakammaṃ ñatvā viditaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā paṭikaraṇakapuggalo.
atk-s0402a0:835_3: Tena ca vittiṃ āpajjatīti tena jhānena tuṭṭhiṃ āpajjati.
atk-s0402a0:835_9: Nirayampi gacchatītiādi nirayādīhi avippamuttattā aparapariyāyavasena tattha gamanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:835_10: Na hi tassa upacārajjhānato balavataraṃ akusalaṃ atthi,
atk-s0402a0:835_17: Imasmiṃ pana sutte puthujjanassa upapattijjhānaṃ kathitaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:837_3: Natthi dinnanti dinnassa phalābhāvaṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0402a0:837_9: Phalaṃ vipākoti yaṃ phalanti vā vipākoti vā vuccati,
atk-s0402a0:837_11: Natthi ayaṃ lokoti paraloke ṭhitassa ayaṃ loko natthi,
atk-s0402a0:837_12: natthi paro lokoti idha loke ṭhitassāpi paraloko natthi,
atk-s0402a0:837_14: Natthi mātā natthi pitāti tesu sammāpaṭipattimicchāpaṭipattīnaṃ phalābhāvavasena vadati.
atk-s0402a0:837_15: Natthi sattā opapātikāti cavitvā uppajjanakasattā nāma natthīti vadati.
atk-s0402a0:839_1: Chaṭṭhe apaṇṇako maṇīti chahi talehi samannāgato pāsako.
atk-s0402a0:839_2: Sugatiṃ sagganti cātumahārājikādīsu aññataraṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:839_3: Imasmiṃ sutte sīlañca sammādiṭṭhi cāti ubhayampi missakaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:841_4: Imesu pana paṭipāṭiyā catūsu suttesu agārikapaṭipadā kathitā.
atk-s0402a0:843_8: Ninhātapāpakanti sabbe pāpe ninhāpetvā dhovitvā ṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:846_2: evaṃ tattha vacīsaṅkhāranirodho dutiyajjhānasamāpatti vacīmoneyyanti veditabbā.
atk-s0402a0:846_3: Manomoneyyampi imināva nayena atthaṃ ñatvā cittasaṅkhāranirodho saññāvedayitanirodhasamāpatti manomoneyyanti veditabbā.
atk-s0402a0:848_7: Sampavāretīti alaṃ alanti vācāya ceva hatthavikārena ca paṭikkhipāpeti.
atk-s0402a0:848_8: Sādhu vata māyanti sādhu vata maṃ ayaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:848_12: Anissaraṇapaññoti chandarāgaṃ pahāya saṃkaḍḍhitvā paribhuñjanto nissaraṇapañño nāma hoti,
atk-s0402a0:852_2: Tathāgato hi paṭhamabodhiyaṃ vīsati vassāni kadāci cāpāle cetiye,
atk-s0402a0:852_5: kadāci gotamaketi evaṃ yebhuyyena devakulesuyeva vihāsi.
atk-s0402a0:852_6: Imasmiṃ pana kāle vesāliṃ upanissāya gotamakassa yakkhassa bhavanaṭṭhāne vihāsi.
atk-s0402a0:853_0: Idañca bhagavatā suttaṃ atthuppattiyaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:853_3: Sambahulā kira brāhmaṇapabbajitā attanā uggahitabuddhavacanaṃ nissāya jānanamadaṃ uppādetvā dhammassavanaggaṃ na gacchanti –
atk-s0402a0:853_7: Satthā te bhikkhū pakkosāpetvā mukhapaṭiññaṃ gahetvā mūlapariyāyaṃ desesi.
atk-s0402a0:853_10: Apassantā “sammāsambuddho ‘mayhaṃ kathā niyyātī’ti mukhasampattameva kathetī”ti cintayiṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:853_11: Satthā tesaṃ manaṃ jānitvā imaṃ suttantaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0402a0:854_10: satta cittānī”ti jānitvā paṭivijjhitvā paccakkhaṃ katvā, tathā –
