atk-s0402a0:854_11: “ime cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”tiādinā nayena te te dhamme jānitvā paṭivijjhitvā paccakkhameva katvāti attho.
atk-s0402a0:854_16: Alañca pana voti yuttañca pana tumhākaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:854_19: suppaṭipanno saṅgho”ti tīṇi ratanāni guṇato anussarantānaṃ tumhākaṃ yuttameva tuṭṭhiṃ kātunti attho.
atk-s0402a0:855_2: Bodhisatte kira dakkhiṇadisābhāgena bodhimaṇḍaṃ abhiruḷhe dakkhiṇadisābhāgo heṭṭhā avīciṃ pāpuṇanto viya ahosi,
atk-s0402a0:855_4: Pacchimadisaṃ gate pacchimabhāgo heṭṭhā avīciṃ pāpuṇanto viya ahosi,
atk-s0402a0:855_6: Uttaradisaṃ gate uttaradisābhāgo heṭṭhā avīciṃ pāpuṇanto viya,
atk-s0402a0:855_8: Pācīnadisaṃ gate pācīnadisābhāgo heṭṭhā avīciṃ pāpuṇanto viya,
atk-s0402a0:855_10: Bodhirukkhopi sakiṃ heṭṭhā avīciṃ pāpuṇanto viya,
atk-s0402a0:855_12: Tasmimpi divase evaṃ chahi ākārehi cakkavāḷasahassī mahāpathavī akampittha.
atk-s0402a0:857_4: Ayaṃ kira bharaṇḍu kālāmo sakyānaṃ aggapiṇḍaṃ khādanto vicarati.
atk-s0402a0:857_5: Tassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ sampattakāle ekā dhammadesanā samuṭṭhahissatīti ñatvā bhagavā evaṃ adhiṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0402a0:857_9: So kira āḷārakālāmakāle tasmiṃyeva assame ahosi,
atk-s0402a0:857_13: Kāmānaṃ pariññaṃ paññāpetīti ettha pariññā nāma samatikkamo,
atk-s0402a0:857_15: Na rūpānaṃ pariññanti rūpānaṃ samatikkamabhūtaṃ arūpāvacarasamāpattiṃ na paññāpeti.
atk-s0402a0:857_16: Na vedanānaṃ pariññanti vedanānaṃ samatikkamaṃ nibbānaṃ na paññāpeti.
atk-s0402a0:859_1: Pañcame abhikkantāya rattiyāti ettha abhikkantasaddo khayasundarābhirūpaabbhanumodanādīsu dissati.
atk-s0402a0:859_5: bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ pātimokkha”nti evamādīsu khaye dissati.
atk-s0402a0:859_6: “Ayaṃ imesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”ti evamādīsu sundare.
atk-s0402a0:860_0: “Ko me vandati pādāni, iddhiyā yasasā jalaṃ;
atk-s0402a0:862_4: Tena abhikkantāya rattiyāti iṭṭhāya kantāya manāpāya rattiyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a0:862_8: “Kadā saññūḷhā pana te gahapati samaṇassa gotamassa vaṇṇā”ti evamādīsu thutiyaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:863_1: Tathā hissa “kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariya”nti evamādīsu anavasesatā attho.
atk-s0402a0:863_2: “Kevalakappā ca aṅgamagadhā pahūtaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ ādāya upasaṅkamissantī”ti evamādīsu yebhuyyatā.
atk-s0402a0:863_6: anuruddhassa bāhiyo nāma saddhivihāriko kevalakappaṃ saṅghabhedāya ṭhito”ti evamādīsu daḷhatthatā.
atk-s0402a0:864_2: yathā taṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassā”ti evamādīsu abhisaddahanamattho.
atk-s0402a0:864_5: pañcahi samaṇakappehi phalaṃ paribhuñjitu”nti evamādīsu vohāro.
atk-s0402a0:864_13: Tasmā kevalakappaṃ jetavananti ettha anavasesaṃ samantato jetavananti attho.
atk-s0402a0:865_3: Oḷārikanti brahmadevatāya hi pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhānakāle attabhāvo oḷāriko māpetuṃ vaṭṭati pathavī vā,
atk-s0402a0:865_6: Nappavattino ahesunti sajjhāyamūḷhakā vācā parihīnāyeva ahesuṃ.
atk-s0402a0:868_1: Chaṭṭhe goyogapilakkhasminti gāvīnaṃ vikkayaṭṭhāne uṭṭhitapilakkhassa santike.
atk-s0402a0:871_1: Aṭṭhame idaṃ te mānasminti ayaṃ te navavidhena vaḍḍhitamānoti attho.
atk-s0402a0:871_2: Idaṃ te uddhaccasminti idaṃ tava uddhaccaṃ cittassa uddhatabhāvo.
atk-s0402a0:871_3: Idaṃ te kukkuccasminti idaṃ tava kukkuccaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:873_3: Vivaṭo virocatīti ettha ekato ubhato attato sabbatthakatoti catubbidhā vivaṭatā veditabbā.
atk-s0402a0:875_4: Gāḷhaṃ katvā pharusaṃ katvā vuccamānopīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:877_4: Aṅganteva saṅkhyaṃ gacchatīti hattho viya pādo viya ca avassaṃ icchitabbattā aṅganti saṅkhyaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0402a0:877_7: tato vā uttarinti dūre kaṇḍaṃ pāteti.
atk-s0402a0:877_8: Duṭṭhagāmaṇiabhayassa hi yodhājīvo navausabhamattaṃ kaṇḍaṃ pātesi,
atk-s0402a0:877_11: akkhaṇaṃ vā vijju vijjantarikāya vijjhituṃ samatthoti attho.
atk-s0402a0:877_12: Mahato kāyassa padāletāti ekatobaddhaṃ phalakasatampi mahiṃsacammasatampi aṅguṭṭhapamāṇabahalaṃ lohapaṭṭampi
atk-s0402a0:877_13: caturaṅgulabahalaṃ asanapadarampi vidatthibahalaṃ udumbarapadarampi dīghantena vālikasakaṭampi vinivijjhituṃ
atk-s0402a0:877_17: Sammappaññāya passatīti sammā hetunā kāraṇena sahavipassanāya maggapaññāya passati.
atk-s0402a0:881_7: Iti imasmiṃ sutte tīṇi lakkhaṇāni missakāni kathitāni.
atk-s0402a0:885_2: Idamassa javasmiṃ vadāmīti ayamassa ñāṇajavoti vadāmi.
atk-s0402a0:885_3: Idamassa vaṇṇasmiṃ vadāmīti ayamassa guṇavaṇṇoti vadāmi.
atk-s0402a0:885_4: Idamassa ārohapariṇāhasminti ayamassa uccabhāvo parimaṇḍalabhāvoti vadāmīti.
atk-s0402a0:887_5: Tattha ayaṃ tīhi maggehi ñāṇajavasampannoti veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:897_1: Pañcamassa paṭhame yathābhataṃ nikkhittoti yathā ānetvā ṭhapito.
atk-s0402a0:899_1: Dasame sunakkhattantiādīsu yasmiṃ divase tayo sucaritadhammā pūritā honti,
atk-s0402a0:899_3: tenassa sadā sunakkhattaṃ nāma hotīti vuccati.
atk-s0402a0:899_10: Ettha ca dasaccharapamāṇo kālo khaṇo nāma,
atk-s0402a0:899_11: tena khaṇena dasakkhaṇo kālo layo nāma,
atk-s0402a0:899_12: tena layena ca dasalayo kālo khaṇalayo nāma,
atk-s0402a0:899_14: tena dasaguṇo khaṇamuhutto nāmāti ayaṃ vibhāgo veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:899_15: Suyiṭṭhaṃ brahmacārisūti yasmiṃ divase tīṇi sucaritāni pūritāni,
atk-s0402a0:899_16: tadāssa seṭṭhacārīsu dinnadānaṃ suyiṭṭhaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0402a0:899_17: Padakkhiṇaṃ kāyakammanti taṃ divasaṃ tena kataṃ kāyakammaṃ vaḍḍhikāyakammaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0402a0:901_1: Ito paresu āgāḷhā paṭipadāti gāḷhā kakkhaḷā lobhavasena thiraggahaṇā.
atk-s0402a0:901_2: Nijjhāmāti attakilamathānuyogavasena suṭṭhu jhāmā santattā paritattā.
atk-s0402a0:901_3: Majjhimāti neva kakkhaḷā na jhāmā majjhe bhavā.
atk-s0402a0:901_6: uccārakammādīsu lokiyakulaputtācārena virahito ṭhitakova uccāraṃ karoti,
atk-s0402a0:901_9: Hatthāpalekhanoti hatthe piṇḍamhi niṭṭhite jivhāya hatthaṃ apalekhati,
atk-s0402a0:901_10: uccārampi katvā hatthasmiṃyeva daṇḍakasaññī hutvā hatthena apalekhati.
atk-s0402a0:901_12: bhadante”ti vutto na etīti na ehibhadantiko.
atk-s0402a0:901_14: bhante”ti vuttopi na tiṭṭhatīti na tiṭṭhabhadantiko.
atk-s0402a0:901_15: Tadubhayampi kira so “etassa vacanaṃ kataṃ bhavissatī”ti na karoti.
atk-s0402a0:901_17: Uddissakatanti idaṃ tumhe uddissa katanti evamārocitabhikkhaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:901_18: Nimantananti “asukaṃ nāma kulaṃ vā vīthiṃ vā gāmaṃ vā paviseyyāthā”ti evaṃ nimantitabhikkhampi na sādiyati na gaṇhāti.
atk-s0402a0:901_19: Na kumbhimukhāti kumbhito uddharitvā dīyamānaṃ bhikkhampi na gaṇhāti.
atk-s0402a0:901_20: Na kaḷopimukhāti kaḷopīti ukkhali vā pacchi vā,
atk-s0402a0:901_23: Na eḷakamantaranti ummāraṃ antaraṃ katvā dīyamānaṃ na gaṇhāti. Kasmā?
atk-s0402a0:901_26: Dvinnanti dvīsu bhuñjamānesu ekasmiṃ uṭṭhāya dente na gaṇhāti. Kasmā?
atk-s0402a0:902_0: Na gabbhiniyātiādīsu pana gabbhiniyā kucchiyaṃ dārako kilamati,
atk-s0402a0:902_4: Dubbhikkhasamaye kira acelakasāvakā acelakānaṃ atthāya tato tato taṇḍulādīni samādapetvā bhattaṃ pacanti,
atk-s0402a0:902_6: Na yattha sāti yattha sunakho “piṇḍaṃ labhissāmī”ti upaṭṭhito hoti,
atk-s0402a0:902_7: tattha tassa adatvā āhaṭaṃ na gaṇhāti. Kasmā?
atk-s0402a0:902_10: Sace hi acelakaṃ disvā “imassa bhikkhaṃ dassāmā”ti manussā bhattagehaṃ pavisanti,
atk-s0402a0:902_11: tesu ca pavisantesu kaḷopimukhādīsu nilīnā makkhikā uppatitvā saṇḍasaṇḍā caranti,
atk-s0402a0:902_12: tato āhaṭaṃ bhikkhaṃ na gaṇhāti. Kasmā?
atk-s0402a0:903_3: Ekāgārikoti yo ekasmiṃyeva gehe bhikkhaṃ labhitvā nivattati.
atk-s0402a0:903_12: ekāhavārena dvīhavārena sattāhavārena addhamāsavārenāti evaṃ divasavārena ābhatabhattabhojanaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:904_2: gacchantopi ukkuṭikova hutvā uppatitvā uppatitvā gacchati.
atk-s0402a0:904_3: Kaṇṭakāpassayikoti ayakaṇṭake vā pakatikaṇṭake vā bhūmiyaṃ koṭṭetvā tattha cammaṃ attharitvā ṭhānacaṅkamādīni karoti.
atk-s0402a0:904_6: Pāto majjhanhike sāyanti divasassa tikkhattuṃ “pāpaṃ pavāhessāmī”ti udakorohanānuyogaṃ anuyutto viharati.
atk-s0402a0:905_0: Kāye kāyānupassītiādīni heṭṭhā ekakanipātavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
atk-s0402a0:905_5: ayaṃ kāmasukhallikānuyogañca attakilamathānuyogañcāti dve ante anupagatā,
atk-s0402a0:905_6: sassatucchedantehi vā vimuttā majjhimā paṭipadāti veditabbā.
atk-s0402a0:906_4: Suññato samādhītiādīhi tīhipi samādhīhi vipassanāva kathitā.
atk-s0402a0:911_6: Mamañceva tumhākañcāti mayā ca tumhehi ca.
atk-s0402a0:911_7: Atha vā sandhāvitaṃ saṃsaritanti sandhāvanaṃ saṃsaraṇaṃ mamañceva tumhākañca ahosīti evamettha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:911_9: Sīlaṃ samādhi paññāti ime pana tayo dhammā maggaphalasampayuttāva veditabbā,
atk-s0402a0:911_14: Tāya hi sattā goṇā viya gīvāya bandhitvā taṃ taṃ bhavaṃ nīyanti,
atk-s0402a0:912_5: pacchā pana yamakasālānamantare anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbutoti yathānusandhinā desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0402a0:915_7: Punarāgatāti puna jātiṃ puna jaraṃ puna byādhiṃ puna maraṇaṃ āgatā nāma honti.
atk-s0402a0:915_8: Kataṃ kiccanti catūhi maggehi kattabbakiccaṃ kataṃ.
atk-s0402a0:915_10: Sukhenānvāgataṃ sukhanti sukhena sukhaṃ anuāgataṃ sampattaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:917_5: Vicināti mukhena so kalinti yo evaṃ pavatto,
atk-s0402a0:917_7: Kalinā tena sukhaṃ na vindatīti tena ca kalinā sukhaṃ na paṭilabhati.
atk-s0402a0:917_8: Sabbassāpi sahāpi attanāti sabbenapi sakena dhanena ceva attanā ca saddhiṃ yo parājayo,
atk-s0402a0:917_10: Yo sugatesūti yo pana sammaggatesu puggalesu cittaṃ padusseyya,
atk-s0402a0:917_11: ayaṃ cittapadosova tato kalito mahantataro kali.
atk-s0402a0:917_12: Idāni tassa mahantatarabhāvaṃ dassento sataṃ sahassānantiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:917_15: Pañca cāti abbudagaṇanāya ca pañca abbudāni.
atk-s0402a0:917_16: Yamariyagarahīti yaṃ ariye garahanto nirayaṃ upapajjati,
atk-s0402a0:919_1: Catutthe mātari pitari cātiādīsu mittavindako mātari micchāpaṭipanno nāma,
atk-s0402a0:921_9: Kāme ca paṭisevatīti kilesakāmehi vatthukāme paṭisevati.
atk-s0402a0:921_10: Pāpañca kammaṃ karotīti pāpañca pāṇātipātādikammaṃ karoti.
atk-s0402a0:921_11: Pāpañca kammaṃ na karotīti pañcaverakammaṃ na karoti.
atk-s0402a0:921_14: ṭhitattoti ayaṃ anāgāmī puggalo tasmā lokā puna paṭisandhivasena anāgamanato ṭhitatto nāma.
atk-s0402a0:924_4: aññampi ca suttanāmakaṃ tathāgatavacanaṃ suttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:924_9: yañca aññampi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi asaṅgahitaṃ buddhavacanaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:924_13: therigāthā suttanipāte nosuttanāmikā suddhikagāthā ca gāthāti veditabbā.
atk-s0402a0:924_16: Apaṇṇakajātakādīni paññāsādhikāni pañca jātakasatāni jātakanti veditabbāni.
atk-s0402a0:924_19: acchariyā abbhutā dhammā ānande”tiādinayappavattā sabbepi acchariyaabbhutadhammapaṭisaṃyuttā suttantā abbhutadhammanti veditabbā.
atk-s0402a0:924_21: laddhā laddhā pucchitā suttantā vedallanti veditabbā.
atk-s0402a0:924_22: Na atthamaññāya na dhammamaññāyāti aṭṭhakathañca pāḷiñca ajānitvā.
atk-s0402a0:924_23: Dhammānudhammappaṭipannoti navalokuttaradhammassa anurūpadhammaṃ sahasīlaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ na paṭipanno hoti.
atk-s0402a0:925_1: Sīlato ca sutena cāti sīlabhāgena ca sutabhāgena ca “ayaṃ dussīlo appassuto”ti evaṃ taṃ garahantīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:925_2: Tassa sampajjate sutanti tassa puggalassa yasmā tena sutena sutakiccaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0402a0:925_4: Nāssa sampajjateti sutakiccassa akatattā na sampajjati.
atk-s0402a0:927_5: Bhikkhu ca sīlasampannoti gāthāya kiñcāpi ekekasseva ekeko guṇo kathito,
atk-s0402a0:929_2: catūsu ṭhānesu sārajjābhāvaṃ paccavekkhantassa uppannasomanassamayañāṇassetaṃ nāmaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:929_10: sabbagavaseṭṭho sabbaparissayasaho seto pāsādiko mahābhāravaho asanisatasaddehipi asampakampiyo nisabho,
atk-s0402a0:929_14: Ṭhānanti catūhi pādehi pathaviṃ uppīḷetvā vavatthānaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:929_16: Yatheva hi nisabhasaṅkhāto usabho catūhi pādehi pathaviṃ uppīḷetvā acalaṭṭhānena tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0402a0:929_17: evaṃ tathāgatopi catūhi vesārajjapādehi aṭṭhaparisapathaviṃ uppīḷetvā sadevake loke kenaci paccatthikena paccāmittena akampiyo acalaṭṭhānena tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0402a0:929_18: Evaṃ tiṭṭhamānova taṃ āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti upagacchati na paccakkhāti,
atk-s0402a0:930_4: Yathā vā sīho sahanato ca hananato ca sīhoti vuccati,
atk-s0402a0:930_5: evaṃ tathāgato lokadhammānaṃ sahanato parappavādānañca hananato sīhoti vuccati.
atk-s0402a0:930_7: Tattha yathā sīho sīhabalena samannāgato sabbattha visārado vigatalomahaṃso sīhanādaṃ nadati,
atk-s0402a0:930_8: evaṃ tathāgatasīhopi tathāgatabalehi samannāgato aṭṭhasu parisāsu visārado vigatalomahaṃso “iti rūpa”ntiādinā
atk-s0402a0:931_0: Brahmacakkaṃ pavattetīti ettha brahmanti seṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ visuddhaṃ. Cakkasaddo panāyaṃ –
atk-s0402a0:934_0: Dhammacakke idha mato, tañca dvedhā vibhāvaye”.
atk-s0402a0:935_2: yehi samannāgatānaṃ devamanussāna”ntiādīsu hi ayaṃ sampattiyaṃ dissati.
atk-s0402a0:936_0: Taṃ panetaṃ dhammacakkaṃ duvidhaṃ hoti paṭivedhañāṇañca desanāñāṇañca.
atk-s0402a0:936_6: Tusitabhavanato vā yāva mahābodhipallaṅke arahattamaggā uppajjamānaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:936_8: Dīpaṅkarato paṭṭhāya vā yāva bodhipallaṅke arahattamaggā uppajjamānaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:937_1: sabbe dhammā mayā abhisambuddhā”ti evaṃ paṭijānato tava.
atk-s0402a0:937_2: Anabhisambuddhāti ime nāma dhammā tayā anabhisambuddhā.
atk-s0402a0:937_5: Nimittametanti ettha puggalopi dhammopi nimittanti adhippeto.
atk-s0402a0:937_9: yaṃ dassetvā “ayaṃ nāma dhammo tayā anabhisambuddho”ti maṃ paṭicodessatīti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0402a0:937_13: Dasabalassa hi “ayaṃ nāma dhammo tayā anabhisambuddho”ti codakaṃ puggalaṃ vā codanākāraṇaṃ anabhisambuddhadhammaṃ
atk-s0402a0:937_14: vā apassato “sabhāvabuddhoyeva vata samāno ahaṃ buddhosmīti vadāmī”ti paccavekkhantassa balavataraṃ somanassaṃ
atk-s0402a0:938_0: Antarāyikā dhammāti ettha pana antarāyaṃ karontīti antarāyikā.
atk-s0402a0:938_1: Te atthato sañcicca vītikkantā satta āpattikkhandhā.
atk-s0402a0:938_2: Sañcicca vītikkantaṃ hi antamaso dukkaṭadubbhāsitampi maggaphalānaṃ antarāyaṃ karoti.
atk-s0402a0:938_4: Methunaṃ sevato hi yassa kassaci nissaṃsayameva maggaphalānaṃ antarāyo hoti.
atk-s0402a0:939_0: Yassa kho pana te atthāyāti rāgakkhayādīsu yassa atthāya.
atk-s0402a0:939_2: Tatra vata manti tasmiṃ aniyyānikadhamme maṃ.
atk-s0402a0:940_3: Atha vā puthussitāti puthubhāvaṃ sitā upagatā,
atk-s0402a0:940_5: Yaṃ nissitāti etarahipi yaṃ vādapathaṃ nissitā.
atk-s0402a0:940_6: Na te bhavantīti te vādapathā na bhavanti bhijjanti vinassanti.
atk-s0402a0:942_5: Cīvarahetūti “kattha manāpaṃ cīvaraṃ labhissāmī”ti cīvarakāraṇā uppajjati.
atk-s0402a0:943_0: Taṇhādutiyoti ayañhi satto anamatagge saṃsāravaṭṭe saṃsaranto na ekakova saṃsarati,
atk-s0402a0:943_3: Itthabhāvaññathābhāvanti ettha itthabhāvo nāma ayaṃ attabhāvo,
atk-s0402a0:943_5: Evarūpo vā aññopi attabhāvo itthabhāvo nāma,
atk-s0402a0:943_10: Evamādīnavaṃ ñatvāti evaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannesu khandhesu ādīnavaṃ jānitvā.
atk-s0402a0:943_11: Taṇhaṃ dukkhassa sambhavanti taṇhaṃ ca “ayaṃ vaṭṭadukkhasambhūto sabhāvo kāraṇa”nti evaṃ jānitvā.
atk-s0402a0:943_12: Ettāvatā imassa bhikkhuno vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pattabhāvo dassito.
atk-s0402a0:943_15: Sato bhikkhu paribbajeti satisampajaññe vepullappatto khīṇāsavo bhikkhu sato sampajāno careyya vihareyyāti attho.
atk-s0402a0:943_16: Iti suttante vaṭṭaṃ kathetvā gāthāsu vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitanti.
atk-s0402a0:945_5: Sassatadiṭṭhisahagato ca rāgo dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo ca diṭṭhiyogo.
atk-s0402a0:945_10: Avijjāya yojetīti avijjāyogoti heṭṭhā vuttadhammānaṃyevetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:946_0: Idāni te vitthāretvā dassento katamo ca,
atk-s0402a0:946_15: idaṃ kāmesu yojanakāraṇaṃ bandhanakāraṇaṃ vuccatīti evaṃ sabbattha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:947_2: Iti kāmayogoti ettha iti saddo catūhipi yogehi saddhiṃ yojetabbo “evaṃ kāmayogo,
atk-s0402a0:947_13: Tasmā ayogakkhemīti vuccatīti yasmā appahīnayogo puggalo etehi dhammehi sampayutto hoti,
atk-s0402a0:947_14: tasmā catūhi yogehi khemaṃ nibbānaṃ anadhigatattā na yogakkhemīti vuccati.
atk-s0402a0:948_4: taṃ pādakaṃ katvā adhigato anāgāmimaggo ekanteneva kāmayogavisaṃyogo nāma.
atk-s0402a0:948_8: Idāni te vitthāravasena dassento katamo ca,
atk-s0402a0:949_13: Iti imasmiṃ suttepi gāthāsupi vaṭṭavivaṭṭameva kathitanti.
atk-s0402a0:951_1: Dutiyassa paṭhame adhivāsetīti cittaṃ adhiropetvā vāseti.
atk-s0402a0:951_4: Na byantīkarotīti na vigatantaṃ paricchinnaparivaṭumaṃ karoti.
atk-s0402a0:951_5: Na anabhāvaṃ gametīti na anuabhāvaṃ avaḍḍhiṃ vināsaṃ gameti.
atk-s0402a0:951_11: Evaṃ sabbattha atthaṃ ñatvā sukkapakkhe vuttavipariyāyena attho veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:954_3: Pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvutāti pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlena saṃvutā pihitā upetā hutvā viharatha.
atk-s0402a0:954_4: Ācāragocarasampannāti ācārena ca gocarena ca sampannā samupāgatā bhavatha.
atk-s0402a0:954_6: Bhayadassāvinoti tāni aṇumattāni vajjāni bhayato dassanasīlā.
atk-s0402a0:954_7: Samādāya sikkhatha sikkhāpadesūti sabbasikkhākoṭṭhāsesu samādātabbaṃ samādāya gahetvā sikkhatha.
atk-s0402a0:954_9: sikkhāpadesū”ti ettakena dhammakkhānena sikkhattaye samādāpetvā ceva paṭiladdhaguṇesu ca vaṇṇaṃ kathetvā
atk-s0402a0:955_0: Yataṃ careti yathā caranto yato hoti saṃyato,
atk-s0402a0:955_9: Ettāvatā atītā paccuppannā anāgatā ca pañcakkhandhā kathitā.
atk-s0402a0:955_13: khandhānaṃ udayabbayanti etesaṃ sabbaloke atītādibhedānaṃ pañcakkhandhadhammānaṃ udayañca vayañca samavekkhitā.
atk-s0402a0:955_15: vayaṃ passanto pañcavīsati lakkhaṇāni passatī”ti vuttehi samapaññāsāya lakkhaṇehi sammā avekkhitā hoti.
atk-s0402a0:955_22: Imasmiṃ pana sutte sīlaṃ missakaṃ kathetvā gāthāsu khīṇāsavo kathito.
atk-s0402a0:957_3: Māradheyyābhibhūtāti tebhūmakavaṭṭasaṅkhātaṃ māradheyyaṃ abhibhavitvā samatikkamitvā ṭhitā.
atk-s0402a0:957_4: Te asitāti te khīṇāsavā anissitā nāma.
atk-s0402a0:957_8: Te tusitāti te khīṇāsavā tuṭṭhā nāma.
atk-s0402a0:957_9: Jetvā māraṃ savāhininti sasenakaṃ māraṃ jinitvā ṭhitā.
atk-s0402a0:957_10: Te anejāti te khīṇāsavā taṇhāsaṅkhātāya ejāya anejā niccalā nāma.
atk-s0402a0:957_13: Te sukhitāti te khīṇāsavā lokuttarasukhena sukhitā nāma.
atk-s0402a0:958_0: “Sukhitā vata arahanto, taṇhā nesaṃ na vijjati;
atk-s0402a0:962_5: Tasmā vivekanissitantiādīsu ārammaṇavasena vā adhigantabbavasena vā nibbānanissitanti attho.
atk-s0402a0:963_2: Tattha vipassanā tadaṅgavasena kilese ca khandhe ca rāgaṃ pariccajatīti pariccāgavossaggo.
atk-s0402a0:963_4: Tasmā vossaggapariṇāminti yathā bhāviyamāno satisambojjhaṅgo vossaggatthāya pariṇamati,
atk-s0402a0:963_11: Ettha ca aṭṭhikasaññādikā pañceva saññā vuttā,
atk-s0402a0:963_12: imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne dasapi asubhāni vitthāretvā kathetabbāni.
atk-s0402a0:963_15: Khayaṃ dukkhassa pāpuṇeti dukkhakkhayasaṅkhātaṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇeyyāti.
atk-s0402a0:965_3: Yadidaṃ rāhu asurindoti yo esa rāhu asurindo ayaṃ aggoti.
atk-s0402a0:965_4: Ettha rāhu kira asurindo cattāri yojanasahassāni aṭṭha ca yojanasatāni ucco,
atk-s0402a0:965_11: Kāmabhogīnaṃ yadidaṃ rājā mandhātāti yo esa rājā mandhātā nāma,
atk-s0402a0:965_12: ayaṃ dibbepi mānusakepi kāme paribhuñjanakānaṃ sattānaṃ aggo nāma.
atk-s0402a0:965_13: Esa hi asaṅkheyyāyukesu manussesu nibbattitvā icchiticchitakkhaṇe hiraññavassaṃ vassāpento mānusake kāme dīgharattaṃ paribhuñji.
atk-s0402a0:965_14: Devaloke pana yāva chattiṃsāya indānaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:965_15: tāva paṇīte kāme paribhuñjīti kāmabhogīnaṃ aggo nāma jāto.
atk-s0402a0:965_17: Tathāgato aggamakkhāyatīti lokiyalokuttarehi guṇehi tathāgato aggo seṭṭho uttamo akkhāyati.
atk-s0402a0:966_0: Iddhiyā yasasā jalanti dibbasampattisamiddhiyā ca parivārasaṅkhātena yasasā ca jalantānaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:966_1: Uddhaṃ tiriyaṃ apācīnanti upari ca majjhe ca heṭṭhā ca.
atk-s0402a0:968_2: Rūpasokhummena samannāgato hotīti rūpe saṇhasukhumalakkhaṇapariggāhakena ñāṇena samannāgato hoti.
atk-s0402a0:968_4: Tena ca rūpasokhummenāti tena yāva anulomabhāvaṃ pattena sukhumalakkhaṇapariggāhakañāṇena.
atk-s0402a0:969_0: Rūpasokhummataṃ ñatvāti rūpakkhandhassa saṇhasukhumalakkhaṇapariggāhakena ñāṇena sukhumataṃ jānitvā.
atk-s0402a0:969_1: Vedanānañca sambhavanti vedanākkhandhassa ca pabhavaṃ jānitvā.
atk-s0402a0:969_2: Saññā yato samudetīti yasmā kāraṇā saññākkhandho samudeti nibbattati,
atk-s0402a0:969_4: Atthaṃ gacchati yattha cāti yasmiṃ ṭhāne nirujjhati,
atk-s0402a0:969_6: Saṅkhāre parato ñatvāti saṅkhārakkhandhaṃ aniccatāya lujjanabhāvena parato jānitvā.
atk-s0402a0:969_8: Dukkhato no ca attatoti iminā dukkhānattānupassanā.
atk-s0402a0:969_11: Iti suttante catūsu ṭhānesu vipassanāva kathitā,
atk-s0402a0:971_5: Chandā dosā bhayā mohāti chandena, dosena, bhayena, mohena.
atk-s0402a0:971_8: Navame tathābujjhanakānaṃ vasena dvīhipi nayehi kathitaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:973_3: Parisākasaṭo ca panesa vuccatīti ayañca pana so evarūpā parisākacavaro nāma vuccatīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:973_5: Parisāya maṇḍo ca panesa vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpā parisā vippasannena parisāmaṇḍoti vuccatīti.
atk-s0402a0:975_1: Tatiyassa paṭhame uruvelāyanti ettha uruvelāti mahāvelā,
atk-s0402a0:975_5: Velātikkamanahetu āhaṭā uru uruvelāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0402a0:975_6: Atīte kira anuppanne buddhe dasasahassā kulaputtā tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā tasmiṃ padese viharantā ekadivasaṃ sannipatitvā katikavattaṃ akaṃsu –
atk-s0402a0:975_9: Tasmā yo kāmavitakkaṃ vā byāpādavitakkaṃ vā vihiṃsāvitakkaṃ vā vitakketi,
atk-s0402a0:975_11: So attanāva attānaṃ codetvā pattapuṭena vālukaṃ āharitvā imasmiṃ ṭhāne ākiratu,
atk-s0402a0:975_13: Tato paṭṭhāya yo tādisaṃ vitakkaṃ vitakketi,
atk-s0402a0:975_16: Tato naṃ pacchimā janatā parikkhipitvā cetiyaṭṭhānamakāsi,
atk-s0402a0:975_23: velātikkamanahetu āhaṭā uru uruvelāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo”ti.
atk-s0402a0:976_0: Najjā nerañjarāya tīreti uruvelagāmaṃ nissāya nerañjarānadītīre viharāmīti dasseti.
atk-s0402a0:976_1: Ajapālanigrodheti ajapālakā tassa nigrodhassa chāyāya nisīdantipi tiṭṭhantipi,
atk-s0402a0:976_5: Udapādīti ayaṃ vitakko pañcame sattāhe udapādi.
atk-s0402a0:976_9: Hatthivānaratittirā kira ekasmiṃ padese viharantā “yo amhākaṃ mahallako,
atk-s0402a0:976_10: tasmiṃ sagāravā viharissāmā”ti nigrodhaṃ dassetvā “ko nu kho amhākaṃ mahallako”ti vīmaṃsantā tittirassa
atk-s0402a0:976_11: mahallakabhāvaṃ ñatvā tassa jeṭṭhāpacāyanakammaṃ katvā aññamaññaṃ samaggā sammodamānā viharitvā saggaparāyaṇā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0402a0:976_12: Taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā rukkhe adhivatthā devatā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0402a0:978_0: Diṭṭheva dhamme pāsaṃsā, samparāye ca suggatī”ti. ;
atk-s0402a0:979_0: Evaṃ ahetukatiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbattopi tathāgato sagāravavāsaṃ rocesi,
atk-s0402a0:979_6: Samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vāti ettha samitapāpabāhitapāpāyeva samaṇabrāhmaṇā adhippetā.
atk-s0402a0:979_7: Sakkatvā garuṃ katvāti sakkārañceva katvā garukārañca upaṭṭhapetvā.
atk-s0402a0:980_1: Devaggahaṇena cettha mārabrahmesu gahitesupi māro nāma vasavattī sabbesaṃ upari vasaṃ vatteti,
atk-s0402a0:980_5: dasahi aṅgulīhi dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu ālokaṃ pharati.
atk-s0402a0:980_6: So iminā sīlasampannataroti vattuṃ mā labhantūti samārake sabrahmaketi visuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:980_7: Tathā samaṇā nāma ekanikāyādivasena bahussutā sīlavanto paṇḍitā,
atk-s0402a0:980_9: Te iminā sampannatarāti vattuṃ mā labhantūti sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāyāti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:980_10: Sadevamanussāyāti idaṃ pana nippadesato dassanatthaṃ gahitameva gahetvā vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:980_11: Apicettha purimāni tīṇi padāni lokavasena vuttāni,
atk-s0402a0:980_15: Ettha ca sīlādayo cattāro dhammā lokiyalokuttarā kathitā,
atk-s0402a0:980_18: Pāturahosīti “ayaṃ satthā avīcito yāva bhavaggā sīlādīhi attanā adhikataraṃ apassanto ‘mayā paṭividdhanavalokuttaradhammameva
atk-s0402a0:980_22: gacchāmissa ussāhaṃ janessāmī”ti cintetvā purato pākaṭo ahosi,
atk-s0402a0:981_0: Vihaṃsu viharanti cāti ettha yo vadeyya –
atk-s0402a0:981_2: so “bhagavāpi bhante etarahi arahaṃ sammāsambuddho”ti iminā vacanena paṭibāhitabbo.
atk-s0402a0:982_0: “Na me ācariyo atthi, sadiso me na vijjati;
atk-s0402a0:984_0: Ādīhi cassa suttehi aññesaṃ buddhānaṃ abhāvo dīpetabbo.
atk-s0402a0:984_1: Tasmāti yasmā sabbepi buddhā saddhammagaruno, tasmā.
atk-s0402a0:984_3: Saraṃ buddhāna sāsananti buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ sarantena.
atk-s0402a0:985_1: Mahattena samannāgatoti rattaññumahattaṃ vepullamahattaṃ brahmacariyamahattaṃ lābhaggamahattanti iminā catubbidhena mahattena samannāgato.
atk-s0402a0:985_2: Atha me saṅghepi gāravoti atha mayhaṃ saṅghepi gāravo jāto.
atk-s0402a0:985_3: Kismiṃ pana kāle bhagavatā saṅghe gāravo katoti?
atk-s0402a0:985_5: Tadā hi bhagavā attano upanītaṃ dussayugaṃ “saṅghe, gotami, dehi,
atk-s0402a0:985_6: saṅghe te dinne ahañceva pūjito bhavissāmi saṅgho cā”ti vadanto saṅghe gāravaṃ akāsi nāma.
atk-s0402a0:987_2: Brāhmaṇāti huhukkajātikena brāhmaṇena saddhiṃ āgatā brāhmaṇā.
atk-s0402a0:987_12: na sampannamevāti taṃ etaṃ abhivādanādiakaraṇaṃ ananucchavikameva.
atk-s0402a0:988_8: Anidhānavatiṃ vācaṃ bhāsitāti na hadaye nidhetabbayuttakaṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā.
atk-s0402a0:988_15: Bālo therotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatīti andhabālo theroti saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0402a0:989_1: Paṇḍito therotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatīti paṇḍiccena samannāgatattā paṇḍito,
atk-s0402a0:990_0: Bahussuto hotīti bahuṃ assa sutaṃ hoti,
atk-s0402a0:990_1: navaṅgaṃ satthusāsanaṃ pāḷianusandhipubbāparavasena uggahitaṃ hotīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:990_3: Yassa hi ito gahitaṃ ito palāyati,
atk-s0402a0:990_5: parisamajjhe ekasuttaṃ vā jātakaṃ vā kathetuṃ vā vācetuṃ vā na sakkoti,
atk-s0402a0:990_7: Yassa pana uggahitaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggahitakālasadisameva hoti,
atk-s0402a0:990_8: dasapi vīsatipi vassāni sajjhāyaṃ akarontassa neva nassati,
atk-s0402a0:990_11: Yassa hi sutaṃ hadayamañjūsāya sannicitaṃ silāya lekhā viya suvaṇṇapatte pakkhittasīhavasā viya ca tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0402a0:990_14: Ekaccassa hi uggahitabuddhavacanaṃ dhātaṃ paguṇaṃ niccalikaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0402a0:990_15: “asukaṃ suttaṃ vā jātakaṃ vā kathehī”ti vutte “sajjhāyitvā saṃsanditvā samanuggāhitvā jānissāmī”ti vadati.
atk-s0402a0:990_17: “asukaṃ suttaṃ vā jātakaṃ vā kathehī”ti vutte uddharitvā tameva katheti.
atk-s0402a0:990_22: Yassa vācāya sajjhāyitaṃ buddhavacanaṃ manasā cintentassa tattha tattha pākaṭaṃ hoti,
atk-s0402a0:990_23: mahādīpaṃ jāletvā ṭhitassa rūpagataṃ viya paññāyati,
atk-s0402a0:990_25: Diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhāti atthato ca kāraṇato ca paññāya suppaṭividdhā.
atk-s0402a0:991_0: Ābhicetasikānanti abhicetoti abhikkantaṃ visuddhaṃ cittaṃ vuccati,
atk-s0402a0:991_8: Tāni hi appetvā nisinnā jhāyino imasmiṃyeva attabhāve asaṃkiliṭṭhanekkhammasukhaṃ vindanti,
atk-s0402a0:991_13: Akicchalābhīti sukheneva paccanīkadhamme vikkhambhetvā samāpajjituṃ samatthoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a0:991_22: na sakkoti nāḷikayantaṃ viya yathāparicchedeyeva vuṭṭhātuṃ.
atk-s0402a0:991_23: Yassa pana ayaṃ tividhāpi sampadā atthi,
atk-s0402a0:991_26: Evamidha sīlampi bāhusaccampi khīṇāsavasseva sīlaṃ bāhusaccañca,
atk-s0402a0:992_10: Paññāyatthaṃ vipassatīti sahavipassanāya maggapaññāya catunnaṃ saccānaṃ atthaṃ vinivijjhitvā passati.
atk-s0402a0:992_11: Pāragū sabbadhammānanti sabbesaṃ khandhādidhammānaṃ pāraṃ gato,
atk-s0402a0:992_17: samāpattipāragūti evaṃ chabbidhena pāragamanena sabbadhammānaṃ pāraṃ pariyosānaṃ gato.
atk-s0402a0:995_0: Evaṃ ettakena ṭhānena catūhi saccehi attano buddhabhāvaṃ kathetvā idāni tathāgatabhāvaṃ kathetuṃ yaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:995_4: Mutanti patvā gahetabbato gandhāyatanaṃ rasāyatanaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:995_6: Pattanti pariyesitvā vā apariyesitvā vā pattaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:995_7: Pariyesitanti pattaṃ vā appattaṃ vā pariyesitaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:996_1: yaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu imassa sadevakassa lokassa nīlaṃ pītakantiādi rūpārammaṇaṃ cakkhudvāre āpāthaṃ āgacchati,
atk-s0402a0:996_2: “ayaṃ satto imasmiṃ khaṇe imaṃ nāma rūpārammaṇaṃ disvā sumano vā dummano vā majjhatto vā jāto”ti sabbaṃ tathāgatassa evaṃ abhisambuddhaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:996_3: Tathā yaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu imassa sadevakassa lokassa bherisaddo mudiṅgasaddotiādi saddārammaṇaṃ sotadvāre āpāthaṃ āgacchati,
atk-s0402a0:996_4: mūlagandho tacagandhotiādi gandhārammaṇaṃ ghānadvāre āpāthaṃ āgacchati,
atk-s0402a0:996_5: mūlaraso khandharasotiādi rasārammaṇaṃ jivhādvāre āpāthaṃ āgacchati,
atk-s0402a0:996_6: kakkhaḷaṃ mudukantiādi pathavīdhātutejodhātuvāyodhātubhedaṃ phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ kāyadvāre āpāthaṃ āgacchati,
atk-s0402a0:996_7: “ayaṃ satto imasmiṃ khaṇe imaṃ nāma phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ phusitvā sumano vā dummano vā majjhatto vā jāto”ti sabbaṃ tathāgatassa evaṃ abhisambuddhaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:996_8: Tathā yaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu imassa sadevakassa lokassa sukhadukkhādibhedaṃ dhammārammaṇaṃ manodvārassa āpāthaṃ āgacchati,
atk-s0402a0:996_9: “ayaṃ satto imasmiṃ khaṇe imaṃ nāma dhammārammaṇaṃ vijānitvā sumano vā dummano vā majjhatto vā jāto”ti sabbaṃ tathāgatassa evaṃ abhisambuddhaṃ. Yañhi,
atk-s0402a0:996_11: imesaṃ sabbasattānaṃ diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:996_12: tattha tathāgatena adiṭṭhaṃ vā asutaṃ vā amutaṃ vā aviññātaṃ vā natthi,
atk-s0402a0:996_13: imassa pana mahājanassa pariyesitvā appattampi atthi,
atk-s0402a0:996_17: sabbampi tathāgatassa appattaṃ nāma natthi ñāṇena asacchikataṃ.
atk-s0402a0:997_0: Tasmā tathāgatoti vuccatīti yaṃ yathā lokena gataṃ,
atk-s0402a0:997_4: Iminā nayena sabbavāresu tathāgatoti nigamassa attho veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:998_0: Sabbaṃ lokaṃ abhiññāti tedhātukaṃ lokasannivāsaṃ jānitvā.
atk-s0402a0:998_1: Sabbaṃ loke yathātathanti tasmiṃ tedhātukalokasannivāse yaṃkiñci neyyaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:998_7: Sabbaganthappamocanoti sabbe cattāropi ganthe mocetvā ṭhito.
atk-s0402a0:998_16: Yasmā pana nibbāne kutoci bhayaṃ natthi,
atk-s0402a0:998_18: Vimutto upadhisaṅkhayeti upadhisaṅkhayasaṅkhāte nibbāne tadārammaṇāya phalavimuttiyā vimutto.
atk-s0402a0:998_19: Sīho anuttaroti parissayānaṃ sahanaṭṭhena kilesānañca hiṃsanaṭṭhena tathāgato anuttaro sīho nāma.
atk-s0402a0:998_23: Taṃ namassantīti taṃ tathāgataṃ te saraṇaṃ gatā namassanti.
atk-s0402a0:1000_4: Anāthapiṇḍikassa kira dhītā cūḷasubhaddā “sāketanagare kāḷakaseṭṭhiputtassa gehaṃ gacchissāmī”ti satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “bhante,
atk-s0402a0:1000_8: maṃ āvajjeyyātha bhagavā”ti paṭiññaṃ gahetvā agamāsi.
atk-s0402a0:1000_9: Seṭṭhi “suṇisā me āgatā”ti maṅgalaṃ karontova bahuṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ paṭiyādetvā pañca acelakasatāni nimantesi.
atk-s0402a0:1000_10: So tesu nisinnesu “dhītā me āgantvā arahante vandatū”ti cūḷasubhaddāya pesesi.
atk-s0402a0:1000_11: Āgataphalā ariyasāvikā arahanteti vuttamatteyeva “lābhā vata me”ti uṭṭhahitvā gatā te nissirikadassane acelake disvāva “samaṇā nāma na evarūpā honti, tāta,
atk-s0402a0:1000_13: na bahiddhā ottappaṃ atthī”ti vatvā “na ime samaṇā,
atk-s0402a0:1000_14: dhīdhī”ti kheḷaṃ pātetvā nivattitvā attano vasanaṭṭhānameva gatā.
atk-s0402a0:1001_0: Tato acelakā “mahāseṭṭhi kuto te evarūpā kālakaṇṇī laddhā,
atk-s0402a0:1001_1: kiṃ sakalajambudīpe aññā dārikā natthī”ti seṭṭhiṃ paribhāsiṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:1001_2: So “ācariyā jānitvā vā kataṃ hotu ajānitvā vā,
atk-s0402a0:1001_3: ahamettha jānissāmī”ti acelake uyyojetvā subhaddāya santikaṃ gantvā “amma,
atk-s0402a0:1002_0: “Kīdisā samaṇā tuyhaṃ, bāḷhaṃ kho ne pasaṃsasi;
atk-s0402a0:1003_0: Kiṃsīlā kiṃsamācārā, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchitā”ti.
atk-s0402a0:1009_0: Evañca pana vatvā seṭṭhissa pure ṭhatvā tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ guṇaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0402a0:1009_7: Sā sāyanhasamaye uparipāsādaṃ āruyha mahantaṃ pupphasamuggaṃ gahetvā satthu guṇe anussaritvā aṭṭha pupphamuṭṭhiyo
atk-s0402a0:1009_8: dasabalassa vissajjetvā añjaliṃ paggayha namassamānā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0402a0:1009_10: “bhagavā sve pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti.
atk-s0402a0:1009_11: Tāni pupphāni gantvā dasabalassa matthake vitānaṃ hutvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:1009_14: pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ mama gehe bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti āha.
atk-s0402a0:1009_17: saddhā pana upāsikā dūre yojanasatamatthakepi yojanasahassamatthakepi ṭhitā himavanto viya paññāyatīti vatvā –
atk-s0402a0:1011_0: Asantettha na dissanti, rattiṃ khittā yathā sarā”ti. –
atk-s0402a0:1012_0: Imaṃ gāthamāha. Anāthapiṇḍiko “bhante, mama, dhītu saṅgahaṃ karothā”ti vanditvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0402a0:1013_9: Tasmiṃ khaṇe vessavaṇo mahārājā cūḷasubhaddāya kathesi – “bhadde,
atk-s0402a0:1013_12: Adhivutthaṃ te bhagavatā svātanāya bhattaṃ saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghenā”ti.
atk-s0402a0:1013_18: Satthā pañcahi chaḷabhiññasatehi parivuto kūṭāgārayānena maṇivaṇṇaṃ ākāsaṃ vilikhanto viya sāketanagaraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0402a0:1014_0: Subhaddā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa dānaṃ datvā satthāraṃ vanditvā āha – “bhante,
atk-s0402a0:1014_4: Kāḷakaseṭṭhi sotāpanno hutvā attano uyyānaṃ dasabalassa adāsi.
atk-s0402a0:1014_5: Acelakā “amhākaṃ paṭhamaṃ dinna”nti nikkhamituṃ na icchanti.
atk-s0402a0:1014_6: “Gacchatha nīharitabbaniyāmena te nīharathā”ti sabbe nīharāpetvā tattheva satthu vihāraṃ kāretvā brahmadeyyaṃ katvā udakaṃ pātesi.
atk-s0402a0:1014_7: So kāḷakena kāritatāya kāḷakārāmo nāma jāto.
atk-s0402a0:1015_1: Te kira sāketanagaravāsino kulaputtā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā satthu santike pabbajitvā upaṭṭhānasālāya nisinnā “aho buddhaguṇā nāma mahantā,
atk-s0402a0:1015_2: evarūpaṃ nāma micchādiṭṭhikaṃ kāḷakaseṭṭhiṃ diṭṭhito mocetvā sotāpattiphalaṃ pāpetvā sakalanagaraṃ satthārā
atk-s0402a0:1015_4: Satthā tesaṃ guṇaṃ kathentānaṃ cittaṃ upaparikkhitvā –
atk-s0402a0:1015_6: desanāpariyosāne ca ime pañcasatā bhikkhū arahatte patiṭṭhahissanti,
atk-s0402a0:1015_7: mahāpathavī udakapariyantaṃ katvā kampissatī”ti dhammasabhaṃ gantvā paññattavarabuddhāsane nisinno te bhikkhū ādiṃ katvā yaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:1016_0: Tattha “tamahaṃ jānāmī”ti padapariyosāne mahāpathavī udakapariyantaṃ katvā akampittha.
atk-s0402a0:1016_7: Imehi tīhi padehi sabbaññutabhūmi nāma kathitā.
atk-s0402a0:1016_8: Taṃ tathāgato na upaṭṭhāsīti taṃ chadvārikaṃ ārammaṇaṃ tathāgato taṇhāya vā diṭṭhiyā vā na upaṭṭhāsi na upagañchi.
atk-s0402a0:1017_0: Taṃ mamassa musāti taṃ me vacanaṃ musāvādo nāma bhaveyya.
atk-s0402a0:1017_1: Taṃ passa tādisamevāti tampi musāvādo bhaveyya.
atk-s0402a0:1017_2: Taṃ mamassa kalīti taṃ vacanaṃ mayhaṃ doso bhaveyyāti attho.
atk-s0402a0:1018_1: Diṭṭhaṃ na maññatīti taṃ diṭṭhaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ “ahaṃ mahājanena diṭṭhameva passāmī”ti taṇhāmānadiṭṭhīhi na maññati.
atk-s0402a0:1018_2: Adiṭṭhaṃ na maññatīti “ahaṃ mahājanena adiṭṭhameva etaṃ passāmī”ti evampi taṇhādīhi maññanāhi na maññati.
atk-s0402a0:1018_3: Daṭṭhabbaṃ na maññatīti “mahājanena diṭṭhaṃ passāmī”ti evampi tāhi maññanāhi na maññati.
atk-s0402a0:1018_5: Evarūpāni hi vacanāni tīsupi kālesu labbhanti,
atk-s0402a0:1018_7: Daṭṭhāraṃ na maññatīti passitāraṃ ekasattaṃ nāma tāhi maññanāhi na maññatīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:1018_9: Iminā ettakena ṭhānena suññatābhūmi nāma kathitā.
atk-s0402a0:1019_16: Tamhā ca pana tādimhāti tato tathāgatatādito añño uttaritaro vā paṇītataro vā tādī natthīti ettāvatā tādibhūmi nāma kathitā.
atk-s0402a0:1019_17: Imāhi pañcabhūmīhi desanaṃ niṭṭhāpentassa pañcasupi ṭhānesu mahāpathavī sakkhibhāvena akampittha.
atk-s0402a0:1019_18: Desanāpariyosāne te pañcasate adhunāpabbajite kulaputte ādiṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ pattānaṃ devamanussānaṃ caturāsīti pāṇasahassāni amatapānaṃ piviṃsu.
atk-s0402a0:1020_0: Bhagavāpi suttaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā gāthāhi kūṭaṃ gaṇhanto yaṃkiñcītiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:1020_1: Tattha ajjhositaṃ saccamutaṃ paresanti paresaṃ saddhāya parapattiyāyanāya saccamutanti maññitvā ajjhositaṃ gilitvā pariniṭṭhāpetvā gahitaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1020_5: Saccaṃ musā vāpi paraṃ daheyyāti tesu sayaṃ saṃvutasaṅkhātesu diṭṭhigatikesu tathāgato tādī tesaṃ ekampi
atk-s0402a0:1020_6: vacanaṃ “idameva saccaṃ moghamañña”nti evaṃ saccaṃ musā vāpi paraṃ uttamaṃ katvā na odaheyya,
atk-s0402a0:1020_12: Jānāmi passāmi tatheva etanti yathāyaṃ pajā ajjhositā gilitvā pariniṭṭhāpetvā visattā laggā lagitā,
atk-s0402a0:1020_14: Tathā evaṃ yathā etāya pajāya gahitanti evaṃ ajjhositaṃ natthi tathāgatānanti attho.
atk-s0402a0:1022_1: Pañcame janakuhanatthanti tīhi kuhanavatthūhi janassa kuhanatthāya.
atk-s0402a0:1022_4: Na itivādappamokkhānisaṃsatthanti na tena tena kāraṇena katavādānisaṃsatthaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:1022_6: Na iti maṃ jano jānātūti na “evaṃ kira esa bhikkhu,
atk-s0402a0:1022_7: evaṃ kira esa bhikkhū”ti janassa jānanatthāya.
atk-s0402a0:1022_15: Maggabrahmacariyañhi nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karitvā nibbānassa antoyeva vattati pavattati.
atk-s0402a0:1022_17: Imasmiṃ sutte vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathetvā gāthāsu vivaṭṭameva kathitaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1024_2: Thaddhāti kodhena ca mānena ca thaddhā.
atk-s0402a0:1024_5: yaṃ siṅgaṃ siṅgāratā cāturatā cāturiyaṃ parikkhattatā pārikkhattiya”nti evaṃ vuttehi siṅgasadisehi pākaṭakilesehi samannāgatā.
atk-s0402a0:1024_7: Asamāhitāti cittekaggamattassāpi alābhino. Na me te,
atk-s0402a0:1024_9: bhikkhū māmakāti te mayhaṃ bhikkhū mama santakā na honti.
atk-s0402a0:1024_10: “Te mayha”nti idaṃ pana satthāraṃ uddissa pabbajitattā vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1024_13: bhikkhū māmakāti idhāpi meti attānaṃ uddissa pabbajitattā vadati,
atk-s0402a0:1024_15: Vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjantīti sīlādīhi guṇehi vaḍḍhanato vuddhiṃ,
atk-s0402a0:1024_20: Iti imasmiṃ suttepi gāthāsupi vaṭṭavivaṭṭameva kathitaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1026_5: Piṇḍiyālopabhojananti jaṅghāpiṇḍiyabalena caritvā ālopamattaṃ laddhaṃ bhojanaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1026_7: Yathā hi suvaṇṇavaṇṇopi kāyo pūtikāyoti vuccati,
atk-s0402a0:1027_2: Disā nappaṭihaññatīti yassa hi “asukaṭṭhānaṃ nāma gato cīvarādīni labhissāmī”ti cittaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0402a0:1027_8: Adhiggahitāti sabbete tuṭṭhacittassa bhikkhuno adhiggahitā honti antogatā na paribāhirāti.
atk-s0402a0:1029_2: Imaṃ kira mahāariyavaṃsasuttantaṃ bhagavā jetavanamahāvihāre dhammasabhāyaṃ paññattavarabuddhāsane nisinno
atk-s0402a0:1029_3: attanopi parapuggalānampi ajjhāsayavasena parivāretvā nisinnāni cattālīsa bhikkhusahassāni,
atk-s0402a0:1029_8: Yathā hi khattiyavaṃso brāhmaṇavaṃso vessavaṃso suddavaṃso samaṇavaṃso kulavaṃso rājavaṃso,
atk-s0402a0:1029_9: evaṃ ayampi aṭṭhamo ariyavaṃso ariyatanti ariyapaveṇī nāma hoti.
atk-s0402a0:1029_10: So kho panāyaṃ ariyavaṃso imesaṃ vaṃsānaṃ mūlagandhādīnaṃ kāḷānusārigandhādayo viya aggamakkhāyati.
atk-s0402a0:1030_2: Ariyā vuccanti buddhā ca paccekabuddhā ca tathāgatasāvakā ca,
atk-s0402a0:1030_4: Ito pubbe hi satasahassakappādhikānaṃ catunnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ matthake taṇhaṅkaro,
atk-s0402a0:1030_7: dīpaṅkaroti cattāro buddhā uppannā, te ariyā,
atk-s0402a0:1030_9: Tesaṃ buddhānaṃ parinibbānato aparabhāge asaṅkhyeyyaṃ atikkamitvā koṇḍañño nāma buddho uppanno…pe…
atk-s0402a0:1030_12: amhākaṃ bhagavā gotamoti cattāro buddhā uppannā,
atk-s0402a0:1031_0: Te kho panete aggaññā aggāti jānitabbā,
atk-s0402a0:1032_2: atha kho yathāladdhādīnaṃ itarītarena yena kenaci santuṭṭho hotīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:1032_3: Cīvarasmiñhi tayo santosā yathālābhasantoso yathābalasantoso yathāsāruppasantosoti.
atk-s0402a0:1032_7: anuppannā ceva kusalā dhammā uppajjantī”ti imasmiṃ sutte vuttanayeneva veditabbā.
atk-s0402a0:1032_8: Iti ime tayo santose sandhāya “santuṭṭho hoti itarītarena cīvarena,
atk-s0402a0:1032_9: yathāladdhādīsu yena kenaci cīvarena santuṭṭho hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1033_5: Tattha cīvaraṃ jānitabbanti khomādīni cha cīvarāni dukūlādīni cha anulomacīvarāni jānitabbāni.
atk-s0402a0:1034_0: Cīvarakkhettanti “saṅghato vā gaṇato vā ñātito vā mittato vā attano vā dhanena,
atk-s0402a0:1034_1: paṃsukūlaṃ vā”ti evaṃ uppajjanato cha khettāni,
atk-s0402a0:1034_2: aṭṭhannañca mātikānaṃ vasena aṭṭha khettāni jānitabbāni.
atk-s0402a0:1035_20: Gatapaccāgatanti matakasarīraṃ pārupitvā susānaṃ netvā ānītacīvaraṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1035_24: Panthikanti panthaṃ gacchantehi corabhayena pāsāṇehi koṭṭetvā pārutacīvaraṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1037_0: Tattha sādakabhikkhunā temāsaṃ nibaddhavāsaṃ vasitvā ekamāsamattaṃ vitakketuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0402a0:1037_1: So hi pavāretvā cīvaramāse cīvaraṃ karoti,
atk-s0402a0:1038_0: Thero kira “cetiyapabbatavihāre cetiyaṃ vandissāmī”ti āgato cetiyaṃ vanditvā cintesi –
atk-s0402a0:1038_3: So mahāvihāraṃ gantvā saṅghattheraṃ disvā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pucchitvā tattha vuttho punadivase cīvaraṃ ādāya āgantvā theraṃ vandi.
atk-s0402a0:1038_10: bhanteti gacchanto mahābodhidvārakoṭṭhake ṭhatvā “puññavantānaṃ vasanaṭṭhāne manāpaṃ labhissāmī”ti cintetvā
atk-s0402a0:1038_13: punadivase mahācetiyassa uttaradvārato tattheva paṭinivattitvā catutthadivase therassa santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0402a0:1038_14: Thero “imassa bhikkhuno vitakko na parisuddho bhavissatī”ti cīvaraṃ gahetvā tena saddhiṃyeva pañhaṃ pucchamāno gāmaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0402a0:1038_15: Tañca rattiṃ eko manusso uccārapalibuddho sāṭakeyeva vaccaṃ katvā taṃ saṅkāraṭṭhāne chaḍḍesi.
atk-s0402a0:1038_16: Paṃsukūlikatthero taṃ nīlamakkhikāhi samparikiṇṇaṃ disvā añjaliṃ paggahesi.
atk-s0402a0:1038_21: puṇṇadāsiyā sarīraṃ pārupitvā chaḍḍitaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ tumbamatte pāṇake vidhunitvā susānato gaṇhantena dukkarataraṃ kataṃ, bhanteti.
atk-s0402a0:1038_23: Paṃsukūlikattheropi tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne ṭhito vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā tīṇi phalāni patto taṃ sāṭakaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0402a0:1038_24: cīvaraṃ katvā pārupitvā pācīnakhaṇḍarājiṃ gantvā aggaphalaṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0402a0:1039_0: Cīvaratthāya gacchantassa pana “kattha labhissāmī”ti acintetvā kammaṭṭhānasīseneva gamanaṃ gamanasantoso nāma.
atk-s0402a0:1039_1: Pariyesantassa pana yena vā tena vā saddhiṃ apariyesitvā lajjiṃ pesalaṃ bhikkhuṃ gahetvā pariyesanaṃ pariyesanasantoso nāma.
atk-s0402a0:1039_2: Evaṃ pariyesantassa āhariyamānaṃ cīvaraṃ dūrato disvā “etaṃ manāpaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0402a0:1039_3: etaṃ amanāpa”nti evaṃ avitakketvā thūlasukhumādīsu yathāladdheneva santussanaṃ paṭilābhasantoso nāma.
atk-s0402a0:1039_5: ettakaṃ ekapaṭṭassā”ti attano pahonakamatteneva santussanaṃ mattapaṭiggahaṇasantoso nāma.
atk-s0402a0:1039_6: Cīvaraṃ pariyesantassa pana “asukassa gharadvāre manāpaṃ labhissāmī”ti acintetvā dvārapaṭipāṭiyā caraṇaṃ loluppavivajjanasantoso nāma.
atk-s0402a0:1040_0: Lūkhapaṇītesu yena kenaci yāpetuṃ sakkontassa yathāladdheneva yāpanaṃ yathālābhasantoso nāma.
atk-s0402a0:1040_1: Attano thāmaṃ jānitvā yena yāpetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0402a0:1040_3: Manāpaṃ aññassa datvā attanā yena kenaci yāpanaṃ yathāsāruppasantoso nāma.
atk-s0402a0:1041_1: kattha amanāpa”nti avicāretvā yena kenaci dhovanūpagena udakena dhovanaṃ udakasantoso nāma.
atk-s0402a0:1041_3: Dhovantassa pana muggarādīhi apaharitvā hatthehi madditvā dhovanaṃ dhovanasantoso nāma.
atk-s0402a0:1041_4: Tathā asujjhantaṃ paṇṇāni pakkhipitvā tāpitaudakenāpi dhovituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0402a0:1041_6: idaṃ sukhuma”nti akopetvā pahonakanīhāreneva karaṇaṃ karaṇasantoso nāma.
atk-s0402a0:1041_8: Cīvarakaraṇatthāya pana manāpaṃ suttaṃ pariyesissāmīti avicāretvā rathikādīsu vā devaṭṭhāne vā āharitvā
atk-s0402a0:1041_9: pādamūle vā ṭhapitaṃ yaṃkiñcideva suttaṃ gahetvā karaṇaṃ suttasantoso nāma.
atk-s0402a0:1042_0: Kusibandhanakāle pana aṅgulamatte satta vāre na vijjhitabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1042_1: Evaṃ karontassa hi yo bhikkhu sahāyo na hoti,
atk-s0402a0:1042_8: Rajantena pana kāḷakacchakādīni pariyesantena na caritabbaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:1042_11: Alabhantena pana manussehi araññe vākaṃ gahetvā chaḍḍitarajanaṃ vā bhikkhūhi pacitvā chaḍḍitakasaṭaṃ vā gahetvā rajitabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1042_13: Nīlakaddamakāḷasāmesu yaṃkiñci gahetvā hatthipiṭṭhe nisinnassa paññāyamānakappakaraṇaṃ kappasantoso nāma.
atk-s0402a0:1043_1: Dussaṃ pana labhitvā suttaṃ vā sūciṃ vā kārakaṃ vā alabhantena ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0402a0:1043_8: Aññasmiṃ cīvare sati paccattharaṇampi adhiṭṭhātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0402a0:1043_12: Vissajjentena pana na mukhaṃ oloketvā dātabbaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:1043_13: sāraṇīyadhamme ṭhatvā vissajjetabbanti ayaṃ vissajjanasantoso nāma.
atk-s0402a0:1044_2: Iti cīvarasantosamahāariyavaṃsaṃ pūrayamāno bhikkhu imāni dve dhutaṅgāni gopeti.
atk-s0402a0:1046_3: Yathā ekacco “kathaṃ nu kho cīvaraṃ labhissāmī”ti puññavantehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ ekato hutvā kohaññaṃ karonto uttasati paritassati,
atk-s0402a0:1046_4: santuṭṭho bhikkhu evaṃ aladdhā cīvaraṃ na paritassati.
atk-s0402a0:1046_9: Ādīnavadassāvīti anesanāpattiyañca gedhitaparibhoge ca ādīnavaṃ passamāno.
atk-s0402a0:1046_10: Nissaraṇapaññoti “yāvadeva sītassa paṭighātāyā”ti vuttaṃ nissaraṇameva pajānanto.
atk-s0402a0:1047_3: ko mayā sadiso atthī”ti attukkaṃsanaṃ na karoti.
atk-s0402a0:1047_4: No paraṃ vambhetīti “ime panaññe bhikkhū na paṃsukūlikā”ti vā,
atk-s0402a0:1047_5: “paṃsukūlikaṅgamattampi etesaṃ natthī”ti vā evaṃ paraṃ na vambheti.
atk-s0402a0:1047_6: Yo hi tattha dakkhoti yo tasmiṃ cīvarasantose vaṇṇavādādīsu vā dakkho cheko byatto.
atk-s0402a0:1047_8: Sampajāno paṭissatoti sampajānapaññāya ceva satiyā ca yutto.
atk-s0402a0:1048_5: Tattha piṇḍapātoti odano kummāso sattu maccho maṃsaṃ khīraṃ dadhi sappi navanītaṃ telaṃ madhu phāṇitaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1048_6: yāgu khādanīyaṃ sāyanīyaṃ lehanīyanti soḷasa piṇḍapātā.
atk-s0402a0:1049_0: Piṇḍapātakkhettanti saṅghabhattaṃ uddesabhattaṃ nimantanaṃ salākabhattaṃ pakkhikaṃ uposathikaṃ pāṭipadikabhattaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1049_1: āgantukabhattaṃ gamikabhattaṃ gilānabhattaṃ gilānupaṭṭhākabhattaṃ dhurabhattaṃ kuṭibhattaṃ vārabhattaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1050_0: Piṇḍapātasantosoti piṇḍapāte vitakkasantoso gamanasantoso pariyesanasantoso paṭilābhasantoso paṭiggahaṇasantoso
atk-s0402a0:1050_2: upakārasantoso parimāṇasantoso paribhogasantoso sannidhiparivajjanasantoso vissajjanasantosoti pannarasa santosā.
atk-s0402a0:1051_0: Tattha sādako bhikkhu mukhaṃ dhovitvā vitakketi.
atk-s0402a0:1051_1: Piṇḍapātikena pana gaṇena saddhiṃ caratā sāyaṃ therūpaṭṭhānakāle “sve kattha piṇḍāya carissāmāti?
atk-s0402a0:1051_3: bhante”ti ettakaṃ cintetvā tato paṭṭhāya na vitakketabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1051_5: Tato paṭṭhāya vitakkento ariyavaṃsā cuto hoti paribāhiro.
atk-s0402a0:1052_0: Piṇḍāya pavisantena “kuhiṃ labhissāmī”ti acintetvā kammaṭṭhānasīsena gantabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1052_2: Pariyesantena yaṃ vā taṃ vā aggahetvā lajjiṃ pesalameva gahetvā pariyesitabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1052_8: imaṃ amanāpaṃ na gaṇhissāmī”ti acintetvā yaṃkiñci yāpanamattaṃ gahetabbameva.
atk-s0402a0:1053_12: Paṭiggahaṇasmiñhi mattaṃ ajānanto manussānaṃ pasādaṃ makkheti,
atk-s0402a0:1053_16: Iti mattaṃ jānitvāva paṭiggahetabbanti ayaṃ mattapaṭiggahaṇasantoso nāma.
atk-s0402a0:1054_0: Piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjitvā “samaṇadhammaṃ anupālessāmī”ti evaṃ upakāraṃ ñatvā paribhuñjanaṃ upakārasantoso nāma.
atk-s0402a0:1054_5: “Jighacchāya paṭivinodanaṃ idamettha nissaraṇa”nti evaṃ paribhuñjanaṃ paribhogasantoso nāma.
atk-s0402a0:1054_6: Nidahitvā na paribhuñjitabbanti ayaṃ sannidhiparivajjanasantoso nāma.
atk-s0402a0:1055_0: Piṇḍapātappaṭisaṃyuttāni pana pañca dhutaṅgāni piṇḍapātikaṅgaṃ sapadānacārikaṅgaṃ ekāsanikaṅgaṃ pattapiṇḍikaṅgaṃ khalupacchābhattikaṅganti.
atk-s0402a0:1055_2: Iti piṇḍapātasantosamahāariyavaṃsaṃ pūrayamāno bhikkhu imāni pañca dhutaṅgāni gopeti,
atk-s0402a0:1056_4: Tattha senāsananti mañco pīṭhaṃ bhisi bimbohanaṃ vihāro aḍḍhayogo pāsādo hammiyaṃ guhā leṇaṃ aṭṭo māḷo
atk-s0402a0:1056_5: veḷugumbo rukkhamūlaṃ yattha vā pana bhikkhū paṭikkamantīti imāni pannarasa senāsanāni.
atk-s0402a0:1057_0: Senāsanakkhettanti saṅghato vā gaṇato vā ñātito vā mittato vā attano vā dhanena paṃsukūlaṃ vāti cha khettāni.
atk-s0402a0:1058_2: Senāsanappaṭisaṃyuttāni pana pañca dhutaṅgāni āraññikaṅgaṃ rukkhamūlikaṅgaṃ abbhokāsikaṅgaṃ sosānikaṅgaṃ yathāsanthatikaṅganti.
atk-s0402a0:1058_4: Iti senāsanasantosamahāariyavaṃsaṃ pūrayamāno bhikkhu imāni pañca dhutaṅgāni gopeti.
atk-s0402a0:1062_0: Iti bhagavā pathaviṃ pattharamāno viya sāgarakucchiṃ pūrayamāno viya ākāsaṃ vitthārayamāno viya ca paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1062_1: cīvarasantosaṃ ariyavaṃsaṃ kathetvā candaṃ uṭṭhāpento viya sūriyaṃ ullaṅghento viya ca dutiyaṃ piṇḍapātasantosaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1062_2: kathetvā sineruṃ ukkhipanto viya tatiyaṃ senāsanasantosaṃ ariyavaṃsaṃ kathetvā idāni sahassanayapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1062_3: catutthaṃ bhāvanārāmaṃ ariyavaṃsaṃ kathetuṃ puna caparaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:1063_6: Pajahanto ramatīti pahānārāmoti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0402a0:1064_0: Imesu pana catūsu ariyavaṃsesu purimehi tīhi terasannaṃ dhutaṅgānaṃ catupaccayasantosassa ca vasena sakalaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ kathitaṃ hoti,
atk-s0402a0:1064_2: Imaṃ pana bhāvanārāmaṃ ariyavaṃsaṃ kathentena bhikkhunā paṭisambhidāmagge nekkhammapāḷiyā kathetabbo,
atk-s0402a0:1070_16: ime dasa dhamme pajahanto ramati. Evaṃ kho,
atk-s0402a0:1073_14: bhikkhu seyyathāpi passeyya sarīraṃ sivathikāya chaḍḍitaṃ…pe…
atk-s0402a0:1073_16: So imameva kāyaṃ upasaṃharati ‘ayampi kho kāyo evaṃdhammo evaṃbhāvī evaṃanatīto’ti.
atk-s0402a0:1073_17: Iti ajjhattaṃ vā kāye kāyānupassī viharati…pe…
atk-s0402a0:1075_0: Abhidhamme niddesapariyāyenāti sabbepi saṅkhate “aniccato dukkhato rogato gaṇḍato …pe…
atk-s0402a0:1076_0: Nevattānukkaṃsetīti “ajja me saṭṭhi vā sattati vā vassāni aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti vipassanāya kammaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1076_1: karontassa ko mayā sadiso atthī”ti evaṃ attukkaṃsanaṃ na karoti.
atk-s0402a0:1076_2: No paraṃ vambhetīti “aniccaṃ dukkhanti vipassanāmattakampi natthi,
atk-s0402a0:1076_3: kiṃ ime vissaṭṭhakammaṭṭhānā carantī”ti evaṃ paravambhanaṃ na karoti.
atk-s0402a0:1077_4: ime cattāro ariyavaṃsā ariyatantiyo ariyapaveṇiyo ariyañjasā ariyavaṭumānīti suttantaṃ vinivaṭṭetvā idāni
atk-s0402a0:1077_5: mahāariyavaṃsaparipūrakassa bhikkhuno vasanadisā dassento imehi ca pana,
atk-s0402a0:1077_7: Tattha sveva aratiṃ sahatīti soyeva aratiṃ anabhiratiṃ ukkaṇṭhitaṃ sahati abhibhavati.
atk-s0402a0:1077_8: Na taṃ arati sahatīti taṃ pana bhikkhuṃ yā esā pantesu senāsanesu adhikusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhāvanāya arati nāma hoti,
atk-s0402a0:1078_2: Nārati dhīraṃ sahatīti idaṃ purimasseva kāraṇavacanaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1078_3: Yasmā sā dhīraṃ na sahati nappahoti dhīraṃ sahituṃ adhibhavituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0402a0:1078_5: Dhīro hi aratissahoti aratisahattā hi so dhīro nāma,
atk-s0402a0:1078_7: Sabbakammavihāyīnanti sabbaṃ tebhūmakakammaṃ cajitvā paricchinnaṃ parivaṭumaṃ katvā ṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1078_8: Panuṇṇaṃ ko nivārayeti kilese panuditvā ṭhitaṃ ko nāma rāgo vā doso vā nivāreyya.
atk-s0402a0:1078_10: ko taṃ ninditumarahatīti jambonadasaṅkhātassa jātirattasuvaṇṇassa nikkhasadisaṃ garahitabbadosavimuttaṃ ko taṃ puggalaṃ nindituṃ arahati.
atk-s0402a0:1078_11: Brahmunāpi pasaṃsitoti mahābrahmunāpi esa puggalo pasaṃsitoyevāti.
atk-s0402a0:1081_1: Abyāpannena cetasāti sabbakālaṃ pakatibhāvaṃ avijahantena cittena.
atk-s0402a0:1081_2: Sato ekaggacittassāti satiyā samannāgato ārammaṇe ekaggacitto assa.
atk-s0402a0:1081_3: Ajjhattaṃ susamāhitoti niyakajjhatte suṭṭhu ṭhapitacitto imasmiṃ suttepi gāthāyapi vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1083_8: Tamahaṃ tattha evaṃ vadeyyanti taṃ ahaṃ tasmiṃ kāraṇe evaṃ vadeyyaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1083_9: Paṭikkositabbaṃ maññeyyāti paṭikkositabbāni paṭibāhitabbani vā maññeyya.
atk-s0402a0:1084_1: Vassabhaññāti vasso ca bhañño cāti dve janā.
atk-s0402a0:1084_2: Ahetukavādāti “natthi hetu natthi paccayo sattānaṃ visuddhiyā”tievamādivādino.
atk-s0402a0:1084_3: Akiriyavādāti “karoto na karīyati pāpa”nti evaṃ kiriyapaṭikkhepavādino.
atk-s0402a0:1084_5: Te imesu tīsupi dassanesu okkantaniyāmā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1084_7: Yo hi evarūpaṃ laddhiṃ gahetvā rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānesu nisinno sajjhāyati vīmaṃsati,
atk-s0402a0:1084_8: tassa “natthi hetu natthi paccayo karoto na karīyati pāpaṃ…pe…
atk-s0402a0:1084_10: kāyassa bhedā ucchijjatī”ti tasmiṃ ārammaṇe micchāsati santiṭṭhati,
atk-s0402a0:1084_15: sattame buddhānampi atekiccho anivatti ariṭṭhakaṇṭakasadiso hoti.
atk-s0402a0:1084_16: Tattha koci ekaṃ dassanaṃ okkamati, koci dve,
atk-s0402a0:1084_20: abhabbo tassa attabhāvassa anantaraṃ saggampi gantuṃ,
atk-s0402a0:1084_25: Nindābyārosanaupārambhabhayāti attano nindabhayena ghaṭṭanabhayena upavādabhayena cāti attho.
atk-s0402a0:1084_27: arahatte sikkhamāno appamatto nāma vuccatīti suttante vaṭṭaviṭṭaṃ kathetvā gāthāya phalasamāpatti kathitāti.
atk-s0402a0:1086_2: Catucakkaṃ vattatīti cattāri sampatticakkāni vattanti ghaṭiyantiyevāti attho.
atk-s0402a0:1086_5: Sappurisāvassayoti buddhādīnaṃ sappurisānaṃ avassayanaṃ sevanaṃ bhajanaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:1086_12: Yena hi ñāṇasampayuttacittena kusalakammaṃ kataṃ hoti,
atk-s0402a0:1086_13: tadeva kusalaṃ taṃ purisaṃ patirūpadese upaneti,
atk-s0402a0:1086_15: so eva ca puggalo attānaṃ sammā ṭhapeti.
atk-s0402a0:1088_2: Dānañcātiādīsu ekacco hi dāneneva saṅgaṇhitabbo hoti,
atk-s0402a0:1088_6: ekekena pana vacanena sabbaṃ makkhetvā nāseti,
atk-s0402a0:1088_22: evarūpo na sevitabbo”ti evaṃ atthacariyakathāva kathetabbā.
atk-s0402a0:1088_24: Ekacco hi dānādīsu ekampi na paccāsīsati,
atk-s0402a0:1088_28: So sace gahaṭṭhassa jātiyā pabbajitassa sīlena sadiso hoti,
atk-s0402a0:1088_30: Tattha tattha yathārahanti tesu tesu dhammesu yathānucchavikaṃ samānattatāti attho.
atk-s0402a0:1088_31: Rathassāṇīva yāyatoti yathā rathassa gacchato āṇi saṅgaho nāma hoti,
atk-s0402a0:1088_34: Na mātā puttakāraṇāti yadi mātā ete saṅgahe puttassa na kareyya,
atk-s0402a0:1088_35: puttakāraṇā mānaṃ vā pūjaṃ vā na labheyya.
atk-s0402a0:1088_39: Pāsaṃsā ca bhavantīti pasaṃsanīyā ca bhavanti.
atk-s0402a0:1090_1: Tatiye sīhoti cattāro sīhā – tiṇasīho, kāḷasīho,
atk-s0402a0:1090_4: Tesu tiṇasīho kapotavaṇṇagāvisadiso tiṇabhakkho ca hoti.
atk-s0402a0:1090_7: Kesarasīho lākhāparikammakateneva mukhena agganaṅguṭṭhena catūhi ca pādapariyantehi samannāgato,
atk-s0402a0:1090_8: matthakatopissa paṭṭhāya lākhātūlikāya katā viya tisso rājiyo piṭṭhimajjhena gantvā antarasatthimhi dakkhiṇāvattā hutvā ṭhitā.
atk-s0402a0:1090_9: Khandhe panassa satasahassagghanikakambalaparikkhepo viya kesarabhāro hoti,
atk-s0402a0:1090_11: Imesu catūsu sīhesu ayaṃ kesarasīho idha adhippeto.
atk-s0402a0:1091_2: suvaṇṇaguhato vā rajatamaṇiphalikamanosilāguhato vā nikkhamatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a0:1091_3: Nikkhamamāno panesa catūhi kāraṇehi nikkhamati andhakārapīḷito vā ālokatthāya,
atk-s0402a0:1092_0: Vijambhatīti suvaṇṇatale vā rajatamaṇiphalikamanosilātalānaṃ vā aññatarasmiṃ dve pacchimapāde samaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0402a0:1092_1: purimapāde purato pasāretvā sarīrassa pacchābhāgaṃ ākaḍḍhitvā purimabhāgaṃ abhiharitvā piṭṭhiṃ nāmetvā
atk-s0402a0:1092_2: gīvaṃ ukkhipitvā asanisaddaṃ karonto viya nāsapuṭāni pothetvā sarīralaggaṃ rajaṃ vidhunanto vijambhati.
atk-s0402a0:1092_3: Vijambhanabhūmiyañca pana taruṇavacchako viya aparāparaṃ javati,
atk-s0402a0:1092_4: javato panassa sarīraṃ andhakāre paribbhamantaṃ alātaṃ viya khāyati.
atk-s0402a0:1093_2: Tasmiṃ kira sīhanādaṃ nadante papātāvāṭādīsu visamaṭṭhānesu carantā hatthigokaṇṇamahiṃsādayo pāṇā papātepi āvāṭepi patanti,
atk-s0402a0:1093_4: Kiṃ panassa luddassa paramaṃsakhādino anuddayā nāma atthīti?
atk-s0402a0:1093_6: Tathā hi “kiṃ me bahūhi ghātitehī”ti attano gocaratthāyāpi khuddake pāṇe na gaṇhāti.
atk-s0402a0:1094_0: Sīhanādaṃ nadatīti tikkhattuṃ tāva abhītanādaṃ nadati.
atk-s0402a0:1094_1: Evañca panassa vijambhanabhūmiyaṃ ṭhatvā nadantassa saddo samantā tiyojanapadesaṃ ekaninnādaṃ karoti,
atk-s0402a0:1094_2: tamassa ninnādaṃ sutvā tiyojanabbhantaragatā dvipadacatuppadagaṇā yathāṭhāne ṭhātuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0402a0:1094_4: So hi vijambhanabhūmiyaṃ ṭhatvā dakkhiṇato vā vāmato vā uppatanto usabhamattaṃ ṭhānaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0402a0:1094_5: uddhaṃ uppatanto cattāripi aṭṭhapi usabhaṭṭhānāni uppatati,
atk-s0402a0:1094_6: same ṭhāne ujukaṃ pakkhandanto soḷasausabhamattampi vīsatiusabhamattampi ṭhānaṃ pakkhandati,
atk-s0402a0:1094_7: thalā vā pabbatā vā pakkhandanto saṭṭhiusabhamattampi asītiusabhamattampi ṭhānaṃ pakkhandati,
atk-s0402a0:1094_8: antarāmagge rukkhaṃ vā pabbataṃ vā disvā taṃ pariharanto vāmato vā dakkhiṇato vā uddhaṃ vā usabhamattaṃ apakkamati.
atk-s0402a0:1094_9: Tatiyaṃ pana sīhanādaṃ naditvā teneva saddhiṃ tiyojane ṭhāne paññāyati,
atk-s0402a0:1094_10: tiyojanaṃ gantvā nivattitvā ṭhito attanova nādassa anunādaṃ suṇāti.
atk-s0402a0:1095_1: Bhayaṃ santāsaṃ saṃveganti sabbaṃ cittutrāsasseva nāmaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1095_2: Sīhassa hi saddaṃ sutvā bahū bhāyanti,
atk-s0402a0:1095_5: Samasīho hatthājānīyo assājānīyo usabhājānīyo purisājānīyo khīṇāsavoti.
atk-s0402a0:1096_3: Pavisantīti “idāni āgantvā gaṇhissatī”ti maggaṃ oloketvā pavisanti.
atk-s0402a0:1096_9: samantā tiyojanaṭṭhāne saddaṃ sutvā palāyantānaṃ vasena mahānubhāvatā veditabbā.
atk-s0402a0:1097_0: Evameva khoti bhagavā tesu tesu suttantesu tathā tathā attānaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0402a0:1097_3: tathāgatassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassā”ti imasmiṃ tāva sutte sīhasadisaṃ attānaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0402a0:1097_14: Imasmiṃ pana sutte sīhasadisameva katvā attānaṃ kathento evamāha.
atk-s0402a0:1098_1: sīhassa kañcanaguhādīsu vasanakālo viya hi tathāgatassa dīpaṅkarapādamūle katābhinīhārassa aparimitakālaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1098_2: pāramiyo pūretvā pacchimabhave paṭisandhiggahaṇena ceva mātukucchito nikkhamanena ca dasasahassilokadhātuṃ
atk-s0402a0:1098_3: kampetvā vuddhimanvāya dibbasampattisadisaṃ sampattiṃ anubhavamānassa tīsu pāsādesu nivāsakālo daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0402a0:1098_4: Sīhassa kañcanaguhādito nikkhantakālo viya tathāgatassa ekūnatiṃsasaṃvacchare vivaṭena dvārena kaṇḍakaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1098_5: āruyha channasahāyassa nikkhamitvā tīṇi rajjāni atikkamitvā anomānadītīre brahmunā dinnāni kāsāyāni paridahitvā
atk-s0402a0:1098_6: pabbajitassa sattame divase rājagahaṃ gantvā tattha piṇḍāya caritvā paṇḍavagiripabbhāre katabhattakiccassa
atk-s0402a0:1098_7: sammāsambodhiṃ patvā paṭhamameva magadharaṭṭhaṃ āgamanatthāya yāva rañño paṭiññādānakālo.
atk-s0402a0:1099_0: Sīhassa vijambhanakālo viya tathāgatassa dinnapaṭiññassa āḷārakālāmaupasaṅkamanaṃ ādiṃ katvā yāva sujātāya
atk-s0402a0:1099_2: Sīhassa sarīravidhunanaṃ viya sāyanhasamaye sottiyena dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatāhi
atk-s0402a0:1099_3: thomiyamānassa gandhādīhi pūjiyamānassa tikkhattuṃ bodhiṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā bodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha cuddasahatthubbedhe
atk-s0402a0:1099_4: ṭhāne tiṇasantharaṃ attharitvā caturaṅgavīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhāya nisinnassa taṃkhaṇaññeva mārabalaṃ vidhametvā
atk-s0402a0:1099_5: tīsu yāmesu tisso vijjā visodhetvā anulomappaṭilomaṃ paṭiccasamuppādamahāsamuddaṃ yamakañāṇamanthanena
atk-s0402a0:1099_6: manthentassa sabbaññutaññāṇe paṭividdhe tadanubhāvena dasasahassilokadhātukampanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1100_0: Sīhassa catudisāvilokanaṃ viya paṭividdhasabbaññutaññāṇassa sattasattāhaṃ bodhimaṇḍe viharitvā paribhuttamadhupiṇḍikāhārassa
atk-s0402a0:1100_1: ajapālanigrodhamūle mahābrahmuno dhammadesanāyācanaṃ paṭiggahetvā tattha viharantassa ekādasame divase
atk-s0402a0:1100_2: “sve āsāḷhipuṇṇamā bhavissatī”ti paccūsasamaye “kassa nu kho ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ deseyya”nti āḷārudakānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1100_3: kālakatabhāvaṃ ñatvā dhammadesanatthāya pañcavaggiyānaṃ olokanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1100_4: Sīhassa gocaratthāya tiyojanaṃ gamanakālo viya attano pattacīvaraṃ ādāya “pañcavaggiyānaṃ dhammacakkaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1100_5: pavattessāmī”ti pacchābhatte ajapālanigrodhato vuṭṭhitassa aṭṭhārasayojanamaggaṃ gamanakālo.
atk-s0402a0:1101_0: Sīhassa sīhanādakālo viya tathāgatassa aṭṭhārasayojanamaggaṃ gantvā pañcavaggiye saññāpetvā acalapallaṅke
atk-s0402a0:1101_1: nisinnassa dasahi cakkavāḷasahassehi sannipatitena devagaṇena parivutassa “dveme,
atk-s0402a0:1101_3: antā pabbajitena na sevitabbā”tiādinā nayena dhammacakkappavattanakālo veditabbo.
atk-s0402a0:1101_4: Imasmiṃ ca pana pade desiyamāne tathāgatasīhassa dhammaghoso heṭṭhā avīciṃ upari bhavaggaṃ gahetvā dasasahassilokadhātuṃ paṭicchādesi.
atk-s0402a0:1101_5: Sīhassa saddena khuddakapāṇānaṃ santāsāpajjanakālo viya tathāgatassa tīṇi lakkhaṇāni dīpetvā cattāri
atk-s0402a0:1101_6: saccāni soḷasahākārehi saṭṭhiyā ca nayasahassehi vibhajitvā dhammaṃ kathentassa dīghāyukānaṃ devānaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1102_2: āsayabhūtāya kanakaguhāya nikkhamanaṃ viya gandhakuṭito nikkhamanakālo,
atk-s0402a0:1103_2: himavantanissitāya kañcanaguhāya nikkhamanaṃ viya ārammaṇavasena nibbānanissitāya phalasamāpattiyā vuṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:1103_6: gocarāya pakkamanaṃ viya asampattānaṃ veneyyasattānaṃ santikūpasaṅkamanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1104_1: Tathāgatoti heṭṭhā vuttehi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi tathāgato.
atk-s0402a0:1104_3: Uppajjatīti abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya yāva bodhipallaṅkā vā arahattamaggañāṇā vā uppajjati nāma,
atk-s0402a0:1105_3: Ettāvatā sabhāvato sarasato pariyantato paricchedato parivaṭumato sabbepi pañcupādānakkhandhā dassitā honti.
atk-s0402a0:1105_4: Iti sakkāyasamudayoti ayaṃ sakkāyassa samudayo nāma.
atk-s0402a0:1105_6: Iti sakkāyassa atthaṅgamoti ayaṃ sakkāyassa atthaṅgamo.
atk-s0402a0:1106_1: Dhammadesanaṃ sutvāti pañcasu khandhesu paṇṇāsalakkhaṇappaṭimaṇḍitaṃ tathāgatassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā.
atk-s0402a0:1106_4: Tesaṃ hi khīṇāsavattā cittutrāsabhayampi na uppajjati,
atk-s0402a0:1106_5: saṃviggassa yoniso padhānena pattabbaṃ pattatāya ñāṇasaṃvegopi.
atk-s0402a0:1106_12: Iti tesaṃ sammāsambuddhe vaṭṭadosaṃ dassetvā tilakkhaṇāhataṃ katvā dhammaṃ desente ñāṇabhayaṃ nāma okkamati.
atk-s0402a0:1107_2: Paṭivedhañāṇaṃ nāma yena ñāṇena bodhipallaṅke nisinno cattāri saccāni soḷasahākārehi saṭṭhiyā ca nayasahassehi paṭivijjhi.
atk-s0402a0:1107_3: Desanāñāṇaṃ nāma yena ñāṇena tiparivaṭṭaṃ dvādasākāraṃ dhammacakkaṃ pavattesi.
atk-s0402a0:1107_6: Taṃ panesa yāva aṭṭhārasabrahmakoṭīhi saddhiṃ aññākoṇḍaññattherassa sotāpattiphalaṃ na uppajjati,
atk-s0402a0:1107_8: Tasmiṃ uppanne pavattitaṃ nāma hotīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1109_9: Aggamakkhāyatīti guṇehi aggo uttamo seṭṭhoti akkhāyati.
atk-s0402a0:1111_4: Tatrupāyāyāti “imasmiṃ kāle imaṃ nāma kattabba”nti evaṃ tattha tattha upāyabhūtāya paññāya samannāgato.
atk-s0402a0:1111_7: Neva kho tyāhanti neva kho te ahaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1111_17: Na taṃ vitakkaṃ vitakketīti kāmavitakkādīsu ekampi na vitakketi.
atk-s0402a0:1111_20: Ahañhi brāhmaṇātiādīsu paṭhamanayena khīṇāsavassa sīlañceva bāhusaccañca kathitaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:1111_21: dutiyatatiyehi khīṇāsavassa kiriyavitakkāni ceva kiriyajjhānāni ca,
atk-s0402a0:1112_2: Disvā ca sutvā cāti ñāṇeneva passitvā ca suṇitvā ca.
atk-s0402a0:1114_1: Chaṭṭhe antarā ca ukkaṭṭhaṃ antarā ca setabyanti ettha ukkaṭṭhāti ukkāhi dhārīyamānāhi māpitattā evaṃladdhavohāraṃ nagaraṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1114_6: mañca tañca kimantara”nti ca ādīsu kāraṇe.
atk-s0402a0:1114_8: aññatarā itthī vijjantarikāya bhājanaṃ dhovantī”tiādīsu khaṇe.
atk-s0402a0:1114_11: “Apicāyaṃ tapodā dvinnaṃ mahānirayānaṃ antarikāya āgacchatī”tiādīsu vivare.
atk-s0402a0:1114_13: Tasmā ukkaṭṭhāya ca setabyassa ca vivareti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0402a0:1114_15: Īdisesu ca ṭhānesu akkharacintakā “antarā gāmañca nadiñca yātī”ti evaṃ ekameva antarāsaddaṃ payuñjanti,
atk-s0402a0:1115_0: Addhānamaggappaṭipanno hotīti addhānasaṅkhātaṃ maggaṃ paṭipanno hoti,
atk-s0402a0:1115_3: Taṃ divasaṃ kira bhagavā idaṃ addasa “mayi taṃ maggaṃ paṭipanne doṇo brāhmaṇo mama padacetiyāni passitvā
atk-s0402a0:1115_4: padānupadiko hutvā mama nisinnaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā pañhaṃ pucchissati.
atk-s0402a0:1115_6: Brāhmaṇo tīṇi sāmaññaphalāni paṭivijjhitvā dvādasapadasahassaparimāṇaṃ doṇagajjitaṃ nāma vaṇṇaṃ vatvā
atk-s0402a0:1115_7: mayi parinibbute sakalajambudīpe uppannaṃ mahākalahaṃ vūpasametvā dhātuyo bhājessatī”ti.
atk-s0402a0:1115_9: Doṇopi sudaṃ brāhmaṇoti doṇo brāhmaṇopi tayo vede paguṇe katvā pañcasate māṇavake sippaṃ vācento taṃdivasaṃ
atk-s0402a0:1115_10: pātova uṭṭhāya sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā satagghanakaṃ nivāsetvā pañcasatagghanakaṃ ekaṃsavaragataṃ katvā
atk-s0402a0:1115_11: āmuttayaññasutto rattavaṭṭikā upāhanā ārohitvā pañcasatamāṇavakaparivāro tameva maggaṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0402a0:1116_2: Kiṃ pana bhagavato gacchantassa akkantaṭṭhāne padaṃ paññāyatīti?
atk-s0402a0:1116_5: Buddhānañhi sukhumacchavitāya akkantaṭṭhānaṃ tūlapicuno patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ viya hoti,
atk-s0402a0:1116_7: Yathā ca balavato vātajavasindhavassa paduminipattepi akkantamattameva hoti,
atk-s0402a0:1116_8: evaṃ mahābalatāya tathāgatena akkantaṭṭhānaṃ akkantamattameva hoti,
atk-s0402a0:1116_11: tassa satthu padavaḷañjaṃ disvā maddituṃ avisahantassa gamanavicchedo bhaveyya.
atk-s0402a0:1116_14: Doṇo pana brāhmaṇo tathāgatassa adhiṭṭhānavasena passi.
atk-s0402a0:1116_15: Bhagavā hi yassa padacetiyaṃ dassetukāmo hoti,
atk-s0402a0:1116_17: Tasmā māgaṇḍiyabrāhmaṇo viya ayampi brāhmaṇo tathāgatassa adhiṭṭhānavasena addasa.
atk-s0402a0:1118_0: Devo no bhavaṃ bhavissatīti ettha “devo no bhava”nti ettāvatāpi pucchā niṭṭhitā bhaveyya,
atk-s0402a0:1118_1: ayaṃ pana brāhmaṇo “anāgate mahesakkho eko devarājā bhavissatī”ti anāgatavasena pucchāsabhāgeneva kathento evamāha.
atk-s0402a0:1118_2: Bhagavāpissa pucchāsabhāgeneva kathento na kho ahaṃ, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0402a0:1118_7: Anupalitto lokenāti taṇhādiṭṭhilepānaṃ pahīnattā saṅkhāralokena anupalitto.
atk-s0402a0:1118_8: Buddhoti catunnaṃ saccānaṃ buddhattā buddho iti maṃ dhārehi.
atk-s0402a0:1119_6: Toyena nupalippatīti udakato ratanamattaṃ accuggamma ṭhitaṃ saraṃ sobhayamānaṃ bhamaragaṇaṃ hāsayamānaṃ toyena na lippati.
atk-s0402a0:1119_7: Tasmā buddhosmi brāhmaṇāti desanāpariyosāne tīṇi maggaphalāni pāpuṇitvā dvādasahi padasahassehi doṇagajjitaṃ nāma vaṇṇaṃ kathesi,
atk-s0402a0:1119_8: tathāgate ca parinibbute jambudīpatale uppannaṃ mahākalahaṃ vūpasametvā dhātuyo bhājesīti.
atk-s0402a0:1123_2: idameva sacca”nti evaṃ pāṭiekkaṃ gahitattā paccekasaṅkhātāni diṭṭhisaccāni panuṇṇāni nīhaṭāni pahīnāni assāti panuṇṇapaccekasacco.
atk-s0402a0:1123_5: sammā avayā saṭṭhā esanā assāti samavayasaṭṭhesano,
atk-s0402a0:1123_18: Paṭinissaṭṭhānīti yathā na puna cittaṃ ārohanti,
atk-s0402a0:1124_2: “Brahmacariyaṃ esissāmi gavesissāmī”ti evaṃ pavattajjhāsayasaṅkhātā brahmacariyesanāpi arahattamaggeneva paṭippassaddhiṃ vūpasamaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0402a0:1124_3: Diṭṭhibrahmacariyesanā pana sotāpattimaggeneva paṭippasambhatīti veditabbā. Evaṃ kho,
atk-s0402a0:1124_4: bhikkhaveti evaṃ catutthajjhānena passaddhakāyasaṅkhāro vūpasantaassāsapassāso nāma hoti.
atk-s0402a0:1125_0: Gāthāsu kāmesanā bhavesanāti etā dve esanā,
atk-s0402a0:1125_1: brahmacariyesanā sahāti tāhiyeva saha brahmacariyesanāti tissopi etā.
atk-s0402a0:1125_2: Idha ṭhatvā esanā paṭinissaṭṭhāti iminā padena saddhiṃ yojanā kātabbā.
atk-s0402a0:1125_4: diṭṭhiṭṭhānā samussayāti “iti saccaṃ iti sacca”nti gahaṇaparāmāso ca diṭṭhisaṅkhātāyeva diṭṭhiṭṭhānā
atk-s0402a0:1125_5: ca ye samussitattā uggantvā ṭhitattā samussayāti vuccanti,
atk-s0402a0:1125_7: Idha ṭhatvā diṭṭhiṭṭhānā samūhatāti iminā padena saddhiṃ yojanā kātabbā.
atk-s0402a0:1125_12: taṇhākkhaye ca nibbāne pavattāya arahattaphalavimuttiyā samannāgato,
atk-s0402a0:1125_15: Sa ve santoti so evarūpo kilesasantatāya santo.
atk-s0402a0:1125_17: Aparājitoti sabbakilese jinitvā ṭhitattā kenaci aparājito.
atk-s0402a0:1125_20: Iti imasmiṃ suttepi gāthāsupi khīṇāsavova kathitoti.
atk-s0402a0:1127_1: Navame saṅghātaṃ āpajjantīti vadhaṃ maraṇaṃ āpajjanti.
atk-s0402a0:1127_3: Anukulayaññanti amhākaṃ pitūhi pitāmahehi dinnattā evaṃ kulānukulavasena yajitabbaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:1127_6: dvīhi pariyaññehi yajitabbassa ekavīsatiyūpassa ṭhapetvā bhūmiñca purise ca avasesasabbavibhavadakkhiṇassa yaññassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1127_8: catūhi pariyaññehi yajitabbassa saddhiṃ bhūmiyā assamedhe vuttavibhavadakkhiṇassa yaññassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1127_10: divase divase sammaṃ khipitvā tassa patitokāse vediṃ katvā saṃhārimehi yūpādīhi sarassatinadiyā nimuggokāsato
atk-s0402a0:1127_11: pabhuti paṭilomaṃ gacchantena yajitabbassa sabbayāgassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1127_13: ekena pariyaññena sattarasahi pasūhi yajitabbassa beluvayūpassa sattarasakadakkhiṇassa yaññassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1127_15: Navahi pariyaññehi yajitabbassa saddhiṃ bhūmiyā purisehi ca assamedhe vuttavibhavadakkhiṇassa sabbamedhapariyāyanāmassa
atk-s0402a0:1127_19: Na te honti mahapphalāti ettha niravasesatthe sāvasesarūpanaṃ kataṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1127_22: Yaṃ pana tattha antarantarā dānaṃ diyyati,
atk-s0402a0:1127_23: taṃ iminā samārambhena upahatattā mahapphalaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0402a0:1127_26: Yajanti anukulaṃ sadāti ye aññe anukulaṃ yajanti,
atk-s0402a0:1127_29: Na pāpiyoti pāpaṃ kiñci na hoti.
atk-s0402a0:1129_14: Dakkhiṇeyyesu yaṃ katanti yaṃ dakkhiṇāya anucchavikesu upakappitaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:1131_2: Divāsaññaṃ adhiṭṭhātīti divāti evaṃ saññaṃ adhiṭṭhāti.
atk-s0402a0:1131_3: Yathā divā tathā rattinti yathā divā ālokasaññā manasi katā,
atk-s0402a0:1132_5: Tassa pariggahitavatthārammaṇatāya tā vedanā “evaṃ uppajjitvā evaṃ ṭhatvā evaṃ nirujjhantī”ti viditā uppajjanti,
atk-s0402a0:1133_1: Iti rūpanti evaṃ rūpaṃ ettakaṃ rūpaṃ na ito paraṃ rūpaṃ atthīti.
atk-s0402a0:1133_2: Iti rūpassa samudayoti evaṃ rūpassa uppādo.
atk-s0402a0:1133_9: yaṃ mayā etaṃ puṇṇakapañhe “saṅkhāya lokasmi”ntiādi bhāsitaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:1133_10: taṃ idaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ sandhāya bhāsitanti attho.
atk-s0402a0:1134_4: Natthi kuhiñci loketi lokasmiṃ katthaci ekakkhandhepi ekāyatanepi ekadhātuyāpi ekārammaṇepi natthi.
atk-s0402a0:1134_7: Evamettha suttante maggekaggatampi kathetvā gāthāya phalasamāpattiyeva kathitāti.
atk-s0402a0:1136_1: Dutiye yo ca tesaṃ tattha tattha,
atk-s0402a0:1136_2: jānāti anudhammatanti yo etesaṃ pañhānaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne byākaraṇaṃ jānāti.
atk-s0402a0:1136_4: āhu bhikkhuṃ tathāvidhanti tathāvidhaṃ bhikkhuṃ tesu catūsu pañhesu kusaloti evaṃ vadanti.
atk-s0402a0:1136_5: Durāsado duppasahoti parehi ghaṭṭetuṃ vā abhibhavituṃ vā na sakkā.
atk-s0402a0:1136_11: Dhīro paṇḍitoti pavuccatīti dhitisampanno puggalo “paṇḍito aya”nti evaṃ pavuccati.
atk-s0402a0:1138_1: Tatiye kodhagaru na saddhammagarūti kodhaṃ gāravena garuṃ katvā gaṇhāti,
atk-s0402a0:1138_3: saddhammaṃ pana agāravena lāmakaṃ katvā gaṇhāti.
atk-s0402a0:1139_1: sañjātamūlāya vā saddhāya patiṭṭhahanti acalā bhavanti.
atk-s0402a0:1141_2: Na cavati na upapajjatīti idaṃ aparāparaṃ cutipaṭisandhivasena gahitaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1141_4: Lokassa antanti satthā saṅkhāralokassa antaṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0402a0:1141_8: So pana “attano pañhena saddhiṃ satthu byākaraṇaṃ sametī”ti saññāya sampahaṃsanto acchariyantiādimāha.
atk-s0402a0:1142_3: Katahatthoti usabhappamāṇepi vālaggaṃ vijjhituṃ samatthabhāvena katahattho.
atk-s0402a0:1142_8: tāvatā kālena ekaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ atikkamāmīti attano javasampattiṃ dasseti.
atk-s0402a0:1143_0: Puratthimā samuddā pacchimoti yathā puratthimā samuddā pacchimasamuddo dūre,
atk-s0402a0:1143_1: evaṃ me dūre padavītihāro ahosīti vadati.
atk-s0402a0:1143_2: So kira pācīnacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ ṭhito pādaṃ pasāretvā pacchimacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiṃ atikkamati,
atk-s0402a0:1143_6: Bhikkhācārakāle kiresa nāgalatādantakaṭṭhaṃ khāditvā anotatte mukhaṃ dhovitvā kāle sampatte uttarakurumhi
atk-s0402a0:1143_7: piṇḍāya caritvā cakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ nisinno bhattakiccaṃ karoti,
atk-s0402a0:1143_10: ayaṃ pana vassasatāvasiṭṭhe āyumhi gamanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0402a0:1143_12: Antarāyeva kālaṅkatoti cakkavāḷalokassa antaṃ appatvā antarāva mato.
atk-s0402a0:1143_13: So pana tattha kālaṃ katvāpi āgantvā imasmiṃyeva cakkavāḷe nibbatti.
atk-s0402a0:1144_11: imasmiṃ pana catumahābhūtike kāyasmiṃyeva paññapemī”ti dasseti.
atk-s0402a0:1146_1: Sattame suvidūravidūrānīti kenaci pariyāyena anāsannāni hutvā suvidūrāneva vidūrāni. Nabhañca,
atk-s0402a0:1146_4: Tattha kiñcāpi pathavito ākāsaṃ nāma na dūre,
atk-s0402a0:1149_4: Anelagalāyāti niddosāya ceva agaḷitāya ca apatitapadabyañjanāya.
atk-s0402a0:1149_8: vaṭṭanissitaṃ katvā na kathetīti ayamettha adhippāyo.
atk-s0402a0:1150_4: Paggaṇhe isinaṃ dhajanti abbhuggataṭṭhena navalokuttaradhammo isīnaṃ dhajo nāma vuccati,
atk-s0402a0:1150_9: Dhammo hi isinaṃ dhajoti heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva lokuttaradhammo isīnaṃ dhajo nāmāti.
atk-s0402a0:1152_5: niccanti saññāvipallāsoti anicce vatthusmiṃ “niccaṃ ida”nti evaṃ gahetvā uppajjanakasaññā,
atk-s0402a0:1153_0: Anattani ca attāti anattani “attā”ti evaṃsaññinoti attho.
atk-s0402a0:1153_3: Khittacittāti te saññādiṭṭhiyo viya uppajjamānena khittena cittena samannāgatā.
atk-s0402a0:1153_6: Te yogayuttā mārassāti te mārassa yoge yuttā nāma honti.
atk-s0402a0:1153_7: Ayogakkheminoti catūhi yogehi khemaṃ nibbānaṃ appattā.
atk-s0402a0:1153_15: Sabbaṃ dukkhaṃ upaccagunti sakalaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ samatikkantā.
atk-s0402a0:1155_1: Dasame upakkilesāti virocituṃ adatvā upakkiliṭṭhabhāvakaraṇena upakkilesā.
atk-s0402a0:1155_3: Dhūmo rajoti dhūmo ca rajo ca.
atk-s0402a0:1155_6: Samaṇabrāhmaṇā na tapanti na bhāsanti na virocantīti guṇappatāpena na tapanti,
atk-s0402a0:1155_9: Surāmerayapānā appaṭiviratāti pañcavidhāya surāya catubbidhassa merayassa ca pānato aviratā.
atk-s0402a0:1158_9: Cīvaraṃ paribhuñjamānoti cīvaratthāya vatthaṃ labhitvā sūcisuttādīnaṃ abhāvena taṃ nikkhipantopi karontopi
atk-s0402a0:1158_10: pārupantopi jiṇṇakāle paccattharaṇaṃ karontopi paccattharitumpi asakkuṇeyyaṃ bhūmattharaṇaṃ karontopi
atk-s0402a0:1158_11: bhūmattharaṇassa ananucchavikaṃ phāletvā pādapuñchanaṃ karontopi “paribhuñjamāno”tveva vuccati.
atk-s0402a0:1158_12: Yadā pana “pādapuñchanampi na sakkā ida”nti sammajjitvā chaḍḍitaṃ hoti,
atk-s0402a0:1158_15: Appamāṇo tassa puññābhisandoti iminā dāyakassa puññacetanāya appamāṇataṃ katheti.
atk-s0402a0:1158_16: Tassa hi “khīṇāsavo me cīvaraṃ paribhuñjatī”ti punappunaṃ anussaraṇavasena pavattā puññacetanā appamāṇā hoti.
atk-s0402a0:1158_18: Piṇḍapātādīsu pana yo piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjitvā sattāhampi teneva yāpeti,
atk-s0402a0:1158_20: so sattāhampi taṃyeva piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjamāno nāma hoti.
atk-s0402a0:1158_21: Ekasmiṃ pana senāsane rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānādīsu caṅkamantopi yāva taṃ senāsanaṃ pahāya aññaṃ na gaṇhāti,
atk-s0402a0:1158_23: Ekena pana bhesajjena byādhimhi vūpasante yāva aññaṃ bhesajjaṃ na paribhuñjati,
atk-s0402a0:1161_2: Tāni hi ariyānaṃ kantāni honti piyāni manāpāni.
atk-s0402a0:1161_3: Sesaṃ suttante tāva yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā,
atk-s0402a0:1162_0: Gāthāsu pana saddhāti sotāpannassa saddhā adhippetā.
atk-s0402a0:1162_2: Ujubhūtañca dassananti kāyavaṅkādīnaṃ abhāvena khīṇāsavassa dassanaṃ ujubhūtadassanaṃ nāma.
atk-s0402a0:1164_1: Tatiye sambahulāpi kho gahapatī ca gahapatāniyo cāti bahukā gahapatayo ca gahapatāniyo ca āvāhavivāhakaraṇatthāya
atk-s0402a0:1164_4: Chavo chavāyāti guṇamaraṇena matattā chavo guṇamaraṇeneva matāya chavāya saddhiṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1165_4: Dhammajīvinoti dhamme ṭhatvā jīvikaṃ kappentīti dhammajīvino.
atk-s0402a0:1165_5: Atthāsaṃ pacurā hontīti vaḍḍhisaṅkhātā atthā etesaṃ bahū honti.
atk-s0402a0:1167_3: Imesu pana dvīsupi suttesu agārikapaṭipadā kathitā.
atk-s0402a0:1169_3: Tathāgato hi taṃ raṭṭhaṃ pāpuṇanto imesaṃyeva dvinnaṃ saṅgaṇhanatthāya pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0402a0:1169_4: Nakulapitā kira pañca jātisatāni tathāgatassa pitā ahosi,
atk-s0402a0:1169_7: Nakulamātāpi pañca jātisatāni tathāgatassa mātā ahosi,
atk-s0402a0:1169_10: Te satthu diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya puttasinehaṃ paṭilabhitvā “hantāta,
atk-s0402a0:1169_11: hantātā”ti vacchakaṃ disvā vacchagiddhinī gāvī viya viravamānā upasaṅkamitvā paṭhamadassaneneva sotāpannā jātā.
atk-s0402a0:1169_12: Nivesane pañcasatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ āsanāni sadā paññattāneva honti.
atk-s0402a0:1171_3: Āyuṃ kho pana datvāti āyudānaṃ datvā.
atk-s0402a0:1172_5: Puññena puññaṃ saṃsandamānāti puññena saddhiṃ puññaṃ ghaṭayamānā.
atk-s0402a0:1172_6: Mahapphalā lokavidūna vaṇṇitāti evarūpā dānasaṅkhātā dakkhiṇā tividhalokaṃ viditaṃ katvā ṭhitattā lokavidūnaṃ buddhānaṃ vaṇṇitā,
atk-s0402a0:1174_4: Sakkacca dadātīti sahatthā sakkāraṃ katvā dadāti.
atk-s0402a0:1174_5: Cattāri ṭhānāni anuppavecchatīti cattāri kāraṇāni anuppaveseti dadāti.
atk-s0402a0:1176_2: Paccupaṭṭhito hotīti atiharitvā dātukāmatāya patiupaṭṭhito hoti upagato,
atk-s0402a0:1177_1: Tesaṃ divā ca ratto cāti ye evaṃ catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0402a0:1177_2: tesaṃ divā ca rattiñca pariccāgavasena ca anussaraṇavasena ca sadā puññaṃ pavaḍḍhati.
atk-s0402a0:1177_3: Saggañca kamatiṭṭhānanti tādiso ca bhaddakaṃ kammaṃ katvā saggaṭṭhānaṃ upagacchati.
atk-s0402a0:1179_9: tena tena senāpatiseṭṭhiṭṭhānādikāraṇena saddhiṃyeva uppajjantūti attho.
atk-s0402a0:1179_12: Saha upajjhāyehīti sukhadukkhesu upanijjhāyitabbattā upajjhāyasaṅkhātehi sandiṭṭhasambhattehi saddhiṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1180_1: Kiccaṃ aparādhetīti kattabbayuttakaṃ kiccaṃ akaronto taṃ aparādheti nāma.
atk-s0402a0:1180_7: Āpātadasoti taṃ taṃ atthaṃ āpāteti tameva passati,
atk-s0402a0:1181_3: sedaṃ muñcitvā vāyāmena payogena samadhigatehīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:1181_11: Catūsu pattakammesu ekaṃ bhogehi kattabbakammaṃ bhogajātameva ṭhānagataṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1181_13: Āyatanaso paribhuttanti kāraṇeneva paribhuttaṃ bhogajātaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a0:1182_2: evaṃ ādittagehanibbāpanādīnaṃ atthāya dhanapariccāgaṃ katvā tāsaṃ āpadānaṃ maggaṃ pidahati nivāreti.
atk-s0402a0:1182_3: Sotthiṃ attānaṃ karotīti nirupaddavaṃ khemaṃ attānaṃ karoti.
atk-s0402a0:1182_9: Sabbametaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ yathānucchavikavasena dātabbadānassa adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1183_0: Khantisoracce niviṭṭhāti adhivāsanakkhantiyañca susīlatāya ca niviṭṭhā.
atk-s0402a0:1183_1: Ekamattānaṃ damentīti ekaṃ attanova attabhāvaṃ indriyadamena damenti.
atk-s0402a0:1183_7: Suṭṭhu aggānaṃ dibbavaṇṇādīnaṃ dasannaṃ visesānaṃ nibbattanato saggasaṃvattanikā,
atk-s0402a0:1184_1: Pecca sagge pamodatīti paralokaṃ gantvā yattha sagge paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0402a0:1186_2: Kāmabhogināti vatthukāme ca kilesakāme ca paribhuñjantena.
atk-s0402a0:1187_4: anavajjasukhaṃ ekaṃ koṭṭhāsanti evaṃ paññāya passamāno dve koṭṭhāse jānātīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:1187_5: Anavajjasukhassetanti etaṃ tividhampi sukhaṃ anavajjasukhassa soḷasiṃ kalaṃ nāgghatīti.
atk-s0402a0:1191_1: Pañcame rūpe pamāṇaṃ gahetvā pasanno rūpappamāṇo nāma.
atk-s0402a0:1191_3: Ghose pamāṇaṃ gahetvā pasanno ghosappamāṇo nāma.
atk-s0402a0:1191_4: Cīvaralūkhapattalūkhesu pamāṇaṃ gahetvā pasanno lūkhappamāṇo nāma.
atk-s0402a0:1191_5: Dhamme pamāṇaṃ gahetvā pasanno dhammappamāṇo nāma.
atk-s0402a0:1191_7: Sabbasatte ca tayo koṭṭhāse katvā dve koṭṭhāsā rūpappamāṇā,
atk-s0402a0:1191_9: Pañca koṭṭhāse katvā cattāro koṭṭhāsā ghosappamāṇā,
atk-s0402a0:1191_11: Dasa koṭṭhāse katvā nava koṭṭhāsā lūkhappamāṇā,
atk-s0402a0:1191_13: Satasahassaṃ koṭṭhāse katvā pana eko koṭṭhāsova dhammappamāṇo,
atk-s0402a0:1192_0: Rūpe pamāṇiṃsūti ye rūpaṃ disvā pasannā,
atk-s0402a0:1192_5: Chandarāgavasūpetāti chandassa ca rāgassa ca vasaṃ upetā.
atk-s0402a0:1192_6: Ajjhattañca na jānātīti niyakajjhatte tassa guṇaṃ na jānāti.
atk-s0402a0:1192_7: Bahiddhā ca na passatīti bahiddhāpissa paṭipattiṃ na passati.
atk-s0402a0:1192_13: bahiddhā ca vipassatīti niyakajjhatte guṇaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0402a0:1192_15: Bahiddhā phaladassāvīti tassa parehi kataṃ bahiddhā sakkāraphalaṃ passanto.
atk-s0402a0:1192_17: Na so ghosena vuyhatīti so ghosena na nīyati.
atk-s0402a0:1194_1: Chaṭṭhe mohajaṃ cāpaviddasūti mohajaṃ cāpi aviddasū apaṇḍitā.
atk-s0402a0:1194_5: Yathā dhammā tathā santāti yathā rāgādayo dhammā ṭhitā,
atk-s0402a0:1194_7: Na tassevanti maññareti mayaṃ evaṃsantā evaṃsabhāvāti tassa na maññare,
atk-s0402a0:1196_1: Sattame imāni cattāri ahirājakulānīti idaṃ daṭṭhavisāneva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1196_3: sabbete imesaṃ catunnaṃ ahirājakulānaṃ abbhantaragatāva honti.
atk-s0402a0:1197_6: Sabbe sattāti ito pubbe ettakena ṭhānena odissakamettaṃ kathetvā idāni anodissakamettaṃ kathetuṃ idamāraddhaṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1197_7: Tattha sattā pāṇā bhūtāti sabbānetāni puggalavevacanāneva.
atk-s0402a0:1197_9: Mā kañci pāpamāgamāti kañci sattaṃ pāpakaṃ lāmakaṃ mā āgacchatu.
atk-s0402a0:1197_10: Appamāṇo buddhoti ettha buddhoti buddhaguṇā veditabbā.
atk-s0402a0:1197_17: katā me parittāti mayā ettakassa janassa rakkhā ca parittāṇañca kataṃ.
atk-s0402a0:1197_18: Paṭikkamantu bhūtānīti sabbepi me kataparittāṇā sattā apagacchantu,
atk-s0402a0:1199_1: Aṭṭhame acirapakkante devadatteti saṅghaṃ bhinditvā nacirapakkante.
atk-s0402a0:1199_4: Attavadhāya gabbhaṃ gaṇhātīti taṃ assena saddhiṃ sampayojenti,
atk-s0402a0:1199_5: sā gabbhaṃ gaṇhitvā kāle sampatte vijāyituṃ nasakkontī pādehi bhūmiṃ paharantī tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0402a0:1199_6: Athassā cattāro pāde catūsu khāṇūsu bandhitvā kucchiṃ phāletvā potakaṃ nīharanti.
atk-s0402a0:1201_1: Navame kilesānaṃ saṃvaratthāya pavesanadvāraṃ pidahanatthāya padhānaṃ saṃvarappadhānaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:1201_3: kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ brūhanatthāya vaḍḍhanatthāya padhānaṃ bhāvanāppadhānaṃ,
atk-s0402a0:1203_1: Dasame adhammikā hontīti porāṇakarājūhi ṭhapitaṃ dasabhāgabaliñceva aparādhānurūpañca daṇḍaṃ aggahetvā
atk-s0402a0:1203_2: atirekabalino ceva atirekadaṇḍassa ca gahaṇena adhammikā.
atk-s0402a0:1203_12: Devatā parikupitā bhavantīti vātesu hi visamesu apañjasesu vāyantesu rukkhā bhijjanti,
atk-s0402a0:1203_15: tā devassa sammā vassituṃ na denti.
atk-s0402a0:1203_16: Tena vuttaṃ devo na sammā dhāraṃ anuppavecchatīti.
atk-s0402a0:1203_17: Visamapākāni sassāni bhavantīti ekasmiṃ ṭhāne gabbhīni honti,
atk-s0402a0:1203_19: ekaṃ ṭhānaṃ paccatīti evaṃ visamaṃ pākāni sassāni bhavanti.
atk-s0402a0:1204_0: Samaṃ nakkhattāni tārakarūpāni parivattantīti yathā kattikapuṇṇamā kattikanakkhattameva labhati,
atk-s0402a0:1204_1: migasirapuṇṇamā migasiranakkhattamevāti evaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ māse sā sā puṇṇamā taṃ taṃ nakkhattameva labhati,
atk-s0402a0:1204_3: Samaṃ vātā vāyantīti avisamā hutvā samayasmiṃyeva vāyanti,
atk-s0402a0:1204_5: cha māsedakkhiṇāti evaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ janapadānaṃ anurūpe samaye vāyanti.
atk-s0402a0:1205_2: Nette jimhaṃ gate satīti nayatīti nettā.
atk-s0402a0:1205_3: Tasmiṃ nette jimhaṃ gate kuṭilaṃ gantvā atitthaṃ gaṇhante itarāpi atitthameva gaṇhantīti attho.
atk-s0402a0:1207_2: Yoni cassa āraddhā hotīti kāraṇañcassa paripuṇṇaṃ hoti.
atk-s0402a0:1209_6: Ettha ca asappuriso pāpicchatāya attano avaṇṇaṃ chādeti,
atk-s0402a0:1209_8: Idāni yasmā asappuriso hirottapparahito saṃvāsena avajānāti,
